14.21: But da king guy fo Sodom, he tell Abram, âEh, jus let da peopo go wit me. Keep all da stuffs fo yoaself!â (He like peopo tink dat he da one dat make Abram come rich, az why he talk lidat
14.22: But Abram tell da king guy fo Sodom, âNo way! Right hea an now, I put up my hand fo make promise to Yahweh, da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, da One dat wen make da sky an da world.
14.23: I tell God dis: I no goin take even one ting from yoa stuffs. Not even one piece thread o one strap fo one slippa. I no like bumbye you go tell, âEh, no was God -- was me! dat wen make Abram come one rich guy.â
14.24: Notting for me, ony da food dat my young guys wen eat awready, an da share fo da odda guys dat wen go wit me -- dass Aner an Eshcol an Mamre. Let dem take dea share.â

15.1: Afta Abram wen get Lot outa trouble, one nodda ting happen. Abram wen get jalike one dream, ony he not sleeping. Da God Yahweh wen tell um di
15.2: Abram tell, âYou my Boss, you Yahweh. But ony wase time, fo you give me plenny stuffs. Cuz bumbye wen I goin mahke, I no mo kids, an da ony one dat goin get my stuffs goin be one a da worka guys, born fo work fo me, da guy Eliezer from Damascus town.
15.3: You neva give me kids notting! Dass why all my stuffs goin be fo one guy dat not my boy. He ony one guy dat wen born fo work inside my house!â
15.4: Dis da ting dat Yahweh wen tell Abram: âNo way! Dat guy, he no goin be da one dat goin get yoa stuffs afta you mahke. Cuz you goin get one boy, dat goin come from yoa own body. Him, da one goin get all yoa stuffs bumbye.â
15.5: Den Yahweh take Abram outside, an tell um, âEh! Look up dea inside da sky! Count da stars, if you can! Dass how plenny peopo goin come from you! So plenny, no can count um!â
15.6: Abram trus Yahweh fo do wat he wen say. An Yahweh, he tinking, âDis guy get um right wit me, cuz he trus me.â
15.7: An Yahweh tell Abram one nodda ting too. He tell, âMe, I Yahweh, da One dat wen take you outa Ur town, Babylon side. I wen bring you ova hea, cuz I goin give you dis land. Goin come yoa land bumbye.â
15.8: Abram tell um, âO Yahweh, you my Boss! Try tell, how I goin know fo shua you goin give me dis land bumbye?â
15.9: Yahweh tell um, âDis how you goin know. Firs ting, go get one cow an one goat, girl kine, an one sheep, boy kine, ery one a dem three year old. Bring um ova hea fo make sacrifice fo me. Bring one dove an one bebe pigeon too.â
15.10: Abram wen go get all da animals an bring um in front God, an kill um fo make sacrifice. He cut ery animal down da middo, an put one piece one side an da odda piece da odda side. Ony da birds, he neva cut um up.
15.11: Had some big scavenja birds fly down fo eat da meat, but Abram chase um awa
15.12: Den, wen da sun go down, Abram wen pass out sleep. He feel jalike someting dark wen come ova him, an he scared plenny.
15.13: Den Yahweh tell Abram, âI like you know dis fo shua: Da peopo dat goin come from you, dey goin go live inside one nodda land dat not dea own land. Da peopo ova dea goin make um be dea slaves, an fo four hundred years dey goin make any kine to dem.
15.14: But I goin punish da peopo dat make um come slaves, an den yoa peopo goin go outa dat land wit plenny stuffs.
15.15: But you, befo all dat happen, you goin mahke an bury awready wen you real old. You goin go wea yoa ancesta guys stay dat wen mahke awready, an all dis no goin bodda you.
15.16: Goin be yoa great-great grandkids dat goin come back ova hea dis land. But befo dey come back, da Amor peopos ova hea goin do so plenny bad kine stuff, dat goin be time fo punish dem. So now, you know!â
15.17: Den da sun wen go down an eryting all come dark. Had jalike one pot wit fire inside an smoke dat come out, an one torch dat burn. An Abram see dat fire going in da middo a da pieces from da cut up sacrifice animals.
15.18: Right den an dea, Yahweh make one spesho deal fo Abram, an da sacrifice was da sign fo da deal. Yahweh wen tell Abram, âAll dis land, from da Egypt border to da big river dey call Eufrates -- all dis, I give um to da peopo dat goin come from you!
15.19: I give you da land fo da Ken peopo, da Keniz peopo, da Kadmon peopo,
15.20: da Het peopo, da Periz peopo, da Refa peopo,
15.21: da Amor peopo, da Canaan peopo, da Girgash peopo, an da Jebus peopo too. Goin come you guys land bumbye.â

16.1: Sarai, Abram wife, she neva get kids, but she take one slave wahine from Egypt name Hagar.
16.2: Sarai tell Abram, âYou know, God neva let me get kids. So den, get dis custom, you go sleep wit my slave wahine Hagar, fo make kids fo me hanai dem. Maybe dat way I get one boy from her, an start one ohana fo you.â
16.3: So, ten year afta dey come back Canaan side, Abram wife Sarai, she take Hagar, da slave wahine from Egypt side, an give her to her husband Abram fo be his odda wife.
16.4: Abram an Hagar, dey wen sleep togedda, an she come hapai. But wen she know she hapai, she start fo tink she mo betta den Sarai, da lady she work f
16.5: Den Sarai tell Abram, âEh! No good, how dis wahine make to me! Az yoa fault! Was me wen tell you fo take her an sleep wit her. But now, she know she hapai, she make jalike she mo betta den me! Da God Yahweh Up Dea Inside Da Sky, he da judge, an he know dat you da one wen mess up, not me!â
16.6: Abram tell Sarai, âEh! You da one own her, not me! Go do wateva you like, den.â From dat time, Sarai wen make any kine to Hagar, an Hagar run away from Sara
16.7: Hagar go da boonies. Had one angel messenja guy, dat was Yahweh, an he find her dea by one puka wea get watta inside, in one place wea you can see da road dat go Shur side.
16.8: He tell, âEh! You Hagar, da slave dat work fo Sarai. Wea you coming from? An wea you going?â
16.9: Da angel messenja guy dass Yahweh tell her, âYou go back now, to da lady you work fo. Show her respeck an do wat she tell you, no matta she make any kine to you.â
16.10: Den da angel guy tell her di
16.13: Hagar, she tinking, âWow! God wen see me, an den I wen see God! An I still alive!â Dass why Hagar wen give Yahweh one new name. She tell: âYou, I goin call you Da God Dat See Eryting, now.â
16.14: Dat puka wea da watta come out, nowdays dey call um Be`er Lahai Ro`i, cuz a wat Hagar wen say dat time. Dat mean âDa Puka Wea Da God Dass Alive Wen See Me,â Hebrew language. Stay in da middo Kadesh town and Bered tow
16.15: Hagar, she wen go home an born Abram's boy. Abram wen give his boy da name Ishmael.
16.16: Abram 86 year old awready, dat time Hagar wen born Ishmael fo Abra

17.1: Lata, wen Abram 99 year old awready, Yahweh wen let Abram see him. He tell um, âMe, I da God Dat Get All Da Powa. So, live da way I tell you, an no do notting dat goin make shame.
17.2: I wen make one deal fo me an you, an I goin make dat happen fo shua. I goin make choke plenny peopo come from you.â
17.3: Abram, he wen go down right den an dea wit his face on top da groun fo show respeck fo God. God wen talk to him lidis:
17.4: âCuz I get dis deal wit you, you goin come da ancesta guy fo big stack diffren peopos.
17.5: From now, yoa name no goin be Abram no moa, dat mean âImportan Faddaâ. Yoa name goin be Abraham, dat mean âFadda Fo Plenny Peoposâ. Cuz I making you da ancesta guy fo big stack diffren peopos.
17.6: I goin give you choke plenny peopo come from you bumbye, diffren kine peopos, so you goin be jalike one tree dat get plenny fruits. Even goin get king guys dat goin come from you to
17.7: âI making dis deal now, jus fo me an you. Dis deal wit you, goin stay foeva! I goin be da God fo you, an fo all da peopo dat goin come from you bumbye, even afta you mahke.
17.8: An one mo ting: right now, you guys ony making house dis Canaan land. But I goin give all dis land to you an da peopo dat goin come from you, foeva. An I goin be da God fo all dem too.â
17.9: Den God wen tell Abraham dis: âYou, Abraham, dis wat you gotta do. You an all da peopo dat goin come from you, all you guys gotta stick wit da deal foeva.
17.10: Hea's da deal I making, wat you an da peopo dat goin come from you gotta do. Fo ery guy inside yoa ohana, dey gotta cut skin fo show you my peopo.
17.11: Goin get one spesho mark on top all da guys body. Da cut skin mark, dat goin be da sign fo da deal dat me an you ge
17.12: â So from now to foeva, ery time you guys get new bebe boy, wen da kid eight day old, gotta cut skin. Wen yoa slave guys get boy kine kids, gotta cut skin. No matta da fadda mudda guys wen born fo yoa ohana, o you buy slave peopo dat not from yoa ohana,
17.13: gotta cut skin dem too. All you guys gotta get da mark fo dat on top yoa bodies, an dass how you guys goin show dat da deal I make wit you guys fo be my peopo, goin stay foeva.
17.14: If get one guy by you dat neva cut skin, an no like cut skin, gotta throw da guy outa yoa ohana, cuz dat kine guy goin mess up da deal you guys get wit me.â
17.15: Den God tell Abraham dis too: âYoa wife Sarai, from now, you no goin call her Sarai. Her name goin be Sarah, dat mean âprincessâ.
17.16: I goin do good tings fo her, an I goin give her one boy fo you. I goin make good tings come out fo her, so she goin be da ancesta wahine fo plenny diffren peopos. Goin get king guys fo diffren peopos dat goin come from her too!â
17.17: Den Abraham wen go down wit his face on top da groun fo show respeck to God. But he laugh same time, cuz inside, he tinking, âNo way! How can?! Me, one hundred year old, an Sarah, ninety year old. How us can get kids?!â
17.18: Abraham tell God, âOkay den. I like Ishmael be da one you goin take care of.â
17.19: God say, âI know you tink dis no goin happen. But I talking bout yoa wife Sarah. Her, dat goin born one boy fo you. You goin give him da name Isaac (dat mean, âhe laughâ). I goin make da same deal fo him dat I get wit you, him an da peopo dat goin come from him, foev
17.20: âAn no worry bout Ishmael. I wen lissen to you awready. I promise, I goin do good tings fo him too. I goin make him get so choke plenny peopo goin come from him, twelve important leada guys goin come from him. I goin make his ohana come one importan peopo.
17.21: But I goin set up my spesho deal wit Isaac, not wit Ishmael. Nex year, dis same time, Sarah goin born yoa boy.â
17.22: Afta God pau talk to Abraham, God go way from Abraham up inside da sk
17.23: Dat same day, Abraham tell his boy Ishmael, an all da slave guys fo his ohana, da ones he wen buy an da ones dat wen born dea, fo come togedda. He cut skin all dem, jalike God wen tell um fo do.
17.24: Wen Abraham wen cut skin, he 99 year old awready.
17.25: He wen cut skin his boy Ishmael wen Ishmael 13 year old.
17.26: Da fadda Abraham an his boy Ishmael, dey wen cut skin same day,
17.27: an same ting fo all da slave guys fo da Abraham ohana, da ones dat wen born fo his ohana, an da ones dat he wen buy from peopo from odda plac

18.1: One nodda time, Abraham wen stay by da big trees, Mamre place. Abraham's God, Yahweh, wen let Abraham see um again. Dis wat wen happe
18.2: Abraham look outside. Right den an dea, he see three guys standing nea da tent. Wen he see um, he run outside from da tent fo tell um âAloha!â Den he [wen] go down wit his face on top da groun in front dem, fo show dem respeck.
18.3: He tell da leada guy, âEh mista, I jalike yoa slave guy. If you like, please stay hea litto bit. Let me give you someting fo eat befo you hele on.
18.4: I goin tell one a da worka guys go get litto bit watta fo wash you guys feets, an you guys can lay down an rest litto bit unda da tree.
18.5: An let me go get litto bit bread. Make you guys feel mo strong, you know. Lata, you can hele on. Cuz you wen come by me, an I jalike you guys slave.â
18.6: Den Abraham wen run back inside da tent an tell Sarah, âQuick! Get da spesho wheat flour, one big pan full, an make nuff bread fo dese guys!â
18.7: He run from dea ova by wea da cows stay. He pick one young cow wit good meat, an tell one young guy dat work fo him fo go kill da cow quick an fix da meat nice.
18.8: He get soft cheese an milk, an da meat from da young cow dey wen kill, an put da food in front da three guys. All da time dey eating, Abraham stand ova dea unda da tree fo make shua dey get plenn
18.9: Da guys aks Abraham, âWea yoa wife Sarah stay?â
18.10: Den one a dem tell, âSame time, one year from now, I goin come back by you, an garans yoa wife goin get bebe boy!â
18.11: (Gotta rememba, dey real old, Abraham an Sarah, an Sarah from long time she wen pau her time fo get bebe awready.)
18.12: So Sarah wen laugh inside, cuz she tinking, âNow I all dry up, an my husband, he old too! Dis mean, fo real I goin get bebe an feel good inside, o wat?â
18.13: Den Yahweh tell Abraham, âEh! How come Sarah stay laugh? She tinking, âFo real, I goin get bebe, me, no matta I real old?â
18.14: Eh! You tink get stuff dat so hard, Yahweh no can do um, o wat? I goin come back by you nex year, dis same time, an Sarah goin get one boy.â
18.15: Sarah, she scared, so she tell, âI neva laugh!â
18.16: Da three guys wen stand up an make ready fo go. Dey wen look down da valley wea Sodom town stay. Abraham, he go wit dem litto bit fo show aloha.
18.17: Yahweh, he tink, âDa ting I goin do now -- I like let um stay secret so Abraham no goin know, o I goin tell him?
18.18: Cuz da peopo dat goin come from Abraham, dey goin come one importan peopo bumbye, wit plenny peopo. All da diffren peopos all ova da world, bumbye wen dey tink bout Abraham, dey goin say, âEh! We like God do good tings fo us guys, jalike he doing fo Abraham!â
18.19: âHe da guy I wen pick fo come tight wit me. Dass how I know he goin tell his kids, an da peopo dat work fo him, an da peopo dat goin come from dem, dat dey all gotta live da way I tell um. Den dey can do da right ting erytime an stick wit my rules. Dass how I goin make come fo Abraham da tings dat I wen tell him goin come. So. I goin tell um dis!â
18.20: Den Yahweh tell Abraham, âAbraham! Ova an ova, get peopo aks me fo help dem, cuz da Sodom an Gomorrah peopo so bad. Real heavy kine, da bad kine stuff dey doing! Gotta make um stop!
18.21: I gotta go down dea, fo make shua az fo real da ting da peopo aksing me fo help um wit. If not so bad, I goin find out dat too.â
18.22: Da two odda guys, dey hele on from dea fo go Sodom side. But Abraham, he stay standing dea still yet in front Yahweh.
18.23: Abraham talk to Yahweh jalike you talk to one judge: âEh Boss, can aks you one ting? You goin wipe out da peopo dat stay doing da right ting, togedda wit da peopo dat stay doing bad kine stuff, same time, o wat?
18.24: Suppose get fifty peopo inside da town dat stay do da right ting. You still yet goin wipe out all da peopo from dat place? Mo betta you let um all go, yeah? Cuz get da fifty good peopo inside dea too, you know.
18.25: No can be, dat you goin wipe um all out, da way you wen say! If you kill da peopo dat do da right ting, same time you kill da bad peopo, den dat mean you tink dey not diffren, da peopo dat do da right ting an da bad peopo! No can be! You da Judge fo all da people inside da world. So den, you gotta make diffren kine to da good peopo an to da bad peopo!â
18.26: Yahweh tell, âIf get fifty peopo inside Sodom town dat stay do da right ting, I goin let go all da peopo from dat place, cuz a dem.â
18.27: Den Abraham tell him, âLook, I like talk some moa to you if you let me. I know you da Boss, an me, I ony one dirt, I notting.
18.28: Suppose no mo da fifty peopo dat do da right ting. Suppose ony get forty-five? You goin wipe out da whole town, jus cuz need five peopo moa?â
18.29: Den Abraham talk mo to Yahweh. He tell, âAn if get forty ova dea?â
18.30: Den Abraham tell Yahweh, âEh! No come huhu wit me, no matta you da Boss. But I ony goin aks you dis: suppose you can find thirty peopo ova dea dat do da right ting?â
18.31: Abraham tell, âI like try one mo time, cuz you da Boss. Suppose get ony twenty ova dea?â
18.32: Den Abraham tell, âBoss, dis da las time I goin talk, so, no come huhu, yeah? Suppose ony get ten ova dea?â
18.33: Afta Yahweh pau talk wit Abraham, he hele on Sodom town. Abraham, he go back his plac

19.1: Da two angel messenja guys dat was wit Yahweh, Abraham place, dey wen get to Sodom sunset time. Dea was Lot, sitting inside da town gate wit da odda importan guys. Wen Lot spock da angel guys, he stand up an tell um âAloha!â Den he go down in front dem wit his face on top da groun fo show dem respeck,
19.2: an he tell um, âEh! I like you guys stay my house tonite. Cuz jalike you guys my bosses an I yoa slave guy, yeah? Ova dea you guys can wash yoa feet an go sleep. Den tomorrow early, you guys can wake up an hele on.â
19.3: But Lot tell um, âNo way! You guys gotta stay my house!â So dey go wit him his house. Lot tell his peopo fo make good kine food, an fo make da kine bread witout yeast fo dem. Den dey ea
19.4: Befo dey go sleep, all da guys from Sodom town, young guys and old guys, dey all wen come togedda from all ova, an stay all aroun outside Lot house.
19.5: Dey yell to Lot, âEh Lot! Wea da guys dat wen come yoa house tonite? Bring um outside hea by us guys. We like rape um!â
19.6: Lot, he go outside fo talk to dem. But he shut da door behind him.
19.7: He tell, âEh, my bruddas! No do dis bad ting!
19.8: You know wat? I get two daughtas dat neva sleep wit any guy yet. So, let me bring dem outside hea fo you guys, so you can make to dem howeva you like. Ony no do wat you talking bout to dese guys, cuz dey come from odda place an dey wen come my house, an I gotta take good care dem.â
19.9: But da town guys yell, âGet outa da way, we going inside!â Dey telling each odda, âDis bugga, he not from hea, he ony live hea short time. But now, he tink he da judge fo tell us wat fo do!â
19.10: But da two angel guys inside da house, dey wen put dea hands outside an grab Lot an pull um back inside da house. Den dey shut da door.
19.11: Den da angel guys zap all da guys outside da house, da guys dat not importan an da guys dat important. Dey zap um wit light so strong, da guys outside no can see notting. Dey give up fo find da doo
19.12: Den da two angel guys tell Lot, âSo! You get odda peopo from yoa ohana hea inside dis town? Yoa wife, yoa boys, yoa daughtas, son-in-law guys, anybody else you get inside dis town - get um outa dis place!
19.13: Cuz us guys hea fo wipe out dis place. Get so plenny peopo dat stay yell to Yahweh fo help um, cuz da peopo hea so bad. Az why Yahweh wen send us hea, fo wipe out eryting.â
19.14: So Lot wen go talk to da guys dat goin come his son in law guys wen dey marry his daughtas. He tell um, âGet up! Get outa dis place! Da God Yahweh goin wipe out da whole town!â But da guys dat like marry his daughtas, dey tink he making joke, so dey no do nottin
19.15: Early morning time, wen ony litto bit red da sky, da angel messenjas guys wen try fo make Lot hurry up. Dey talk: âMove now! Take yoa wife, an yoa two daughtas dat stay hea wit you! No good Yahweh goin blow you away wit dem wen he wipe out da town fo da tings dey do dat need punish!â
19.16: But Lot, he still neva like hurry up. So da two guys wen grab dea hands, Lot, an his wife, an da two daughtas, an dey take um all outside da town an leave um dea. Dass how Yahweh wen show pity fo dem an give um chance.
19.17: Afta dey get um outside da town, one a da angel messenja guys tell Lot, âRun away some place wea you no goin mahke! No look behind you! No stay nea da towns. Run away mauka side, cuz dea you okay. No good Yahweh blow you away too!â
19.18: Lot tell um, âEh! You da boss. But no can, you know.
19.19: You wen like help me, an I jalike yoa slave guy, an you wen stick wit me plenny, an cuz a you I alive still yet. But me, no way I can run all da way mauka side, so dis bad ting no goin catch me an kill me.
19.20: Look ova dea, dat small town! Stay nea, an I can run away ova dea. Az ony small place, so let me run to dat place, so I goin stay alive!â
19.21: Da angel guy tell Lot, âKay den. I goin let you do how you say. I no goin bus up dat small town you talking about.
19.22: But hurry up! Run ova dea, cuz I no can wipe out notting till you get dea.â (Dass how dat small town get da name, Zo`ar, dat mean ânot importan.â
19.23: Da sun jus coming up awready, wen Lot go inside Zoar town.
19.24: Den Yahweh wen make burning sulphur come down outa da sky wea he stay. Da fire wen come down on top Sodom town an Gomorrah town, jalike was rain.
19.25: God wen wipe out eryting inside dose towns, eryting aroun da towns, all da peopo dat live inside da towns, all da stuff dat grow on top da groun, erytin
19.26: But Lot wife, she wen look behind her, an right den an dea she come salt rock, all hard kine jalike one pos
19.27: Dat morning, Abraham wen get up early an go to da place wea him an Yahweh wen stand fo talk da day befo.
19.28: He look down da valley to Sodom town an Gomorrah town an all da land in da valley aroun dea. Da ony ting he can see is smoke coming up from all ova da land, jalike da thick smoke from one place wea dey melt da meta
19.29: Dass wat wen happen da time God wen go wipe out da towns all ova da Siddim Valley. But God neva foget da ting Abraham aks um fo do, an he get Lot folks outa dea befo he zap da towns, da place wea Lot wen liv
19.30: Lata, Lot an his two daughtas wen go way from Zo`ar to da mountains. He scared fo stay wit da Zo`ar peopo, az why. Ova dea mauka side, Lot an his two daughtas wen live inside one cav
19.31: One time, da older daughta tell da younga daughta, âEh! No mo even one guy us can sleep wit fo get kids, an our fadda getting too old awready.
19.32: We do dis den: we give our fadda plenny wine fo drink. Den we go sleep wit him. Dat way, him an us goin get kids an make our ohana stay alive.â
19.33: Dat same nite, dey give dea fadda plenny wine fo drink. Den da older daughta wen go by her fadda an go sleep wit him. Cuz da fadda drunk, he neva know notting, wen she lay down wit him an wen she get u
19.34: Da nex day da older daughta tell da younga daughta, âEh! Las nite, I wen go sleep wit our fadda. We do da same ting tonite. We give um plenny wine fo drink, den you go sleep wit him. Dat way him an us goin get kids an make our ohana stay alive.â
19.35: Dat nite, same ting, dey wen give dea fadda plenny wine. Da younga daughta wen go sleep wit him, an cuz he drunk, he neva know notting wen she lay down wit him an wen she get u
19.36: Dass how da two wahines, Lot daughtas, dey wen come hapai from dea own fadda.
19.37: Da older daughta, she wen born one boy, an she give um da name Mo`ab, dat mean, âFrom Fadda.â He da ancesta guy fo da Moab peopo dat get nowdays.
19.38: Da younga daughta, same ting. She wen born one boy, an she give um da name Ben-`Ammi, dat mean, âBoy From My Ohana.â He da ancesta guy fo da Ammon peopo dat get nowday

20.1: Abraham move house from da place he stay an go sout to da Negev land. He put up his tents in da middo Kadesh town an Shur town. Afta dat, he go Gerar town fo live short time.
20.2: Wen he dea, Abraham tell bout his wife Sarah, âDis my sista.â So Abimelek, da king guy fo Gerar, he go take Sarah fo come his wif
20.3: But one nite, God wen go by Abimelek an make um dream. Inside da dream God tell um, âYou know wat you doing? You mahke awready, cuz you wen take dat wahine Sarah, an she get husband awready.â
20.4: But Abimelek, he neva even go nea her yet. He tell God, âEh, you da Boss! So, you goin kill me an my peopo too, o wat? Cuz we neva do notting wrong.
20.5: Abraham da one wen tell me, âDis my sistaâ! An da wahine tell me da same ting, âDass my bruddaâ. Da ting I wen do, no can poin finga me, cuz inside me, I no tink I stay do notting bad cuz a dem. An I neva do notting!â
20.6: Inside da dream, God tell Abimelek, âI know, no can poin finga you fo dat, cuz inside, you neva like do notting bad. Dass why I neva let you go do notting bad agains me. Az why I neva let you touch her.
20.7: Wat you gotta do, you gotta give da wahine back to her husband. He one talka guy fo me, you know. Den he goin pray fo you, an you can stay alive. But if you no like give her back, you goin mahke fo shua, you an all yoa peopo.â
20.8: Da nex morning, Abimelek get up early an tell all da guys dat work fo him fo come by him. He tell um eryting dat wen happen. Dey wen come real scare
20.9: Den Abimelek tell Abraham fo come. He tell Abraham, âWass up? No good, dis ting you do to us! I neva do notting bad to you! But you wen make to me so I wen go do one real bad ting, an now God goin punish me an all my peopo.
20.10: So! Wat kine guy you wen tink me, hah? dat make you make lidat to me.â
20.11: Abraham tell, âI ony was tinking lidis: No mo nobody dis place dat get respeck fo God. Fo shua dey goin kill me so dey can take away my wife.
20.12: Plus, she my sista fo real kine, you know. Us get da same fadda, but diffren mudda. Den, she wen come my wife.
20.13: Dass why, wen God wen make me go way from da place wea my fadda guy stay, I tell her, âEh! Me an you, we gotta stick togedda, you know. Get one ting I like you do fo help me. Ery place we go, tell da peopo dat I yoa brudda guy.â-â
20.14: Cuz a dat, Abimelek, he bring togedda plenny sheeps an cows an slave peopo, guys an wahines. He give um to Abraham, an he give Abraham's wife Sarah back to him.
20.15: Abimelek tell Abraham, âLook. I get plenny land dis side. You can live any odda place you like.â
20.16: Den Abimelek tell Sarah, âIn front erybody, I giving yoa brudda guy tousand piece silva. I do dat so erybody know you neva do notting wrong, an from now eryting okay fo all you guys an me.â
20.17-18: All da time Sarah stay Abimelek house, Yahweh neva let da wahines dea come hapai, cuz a Sarah. Den Abraham pray to God fo Abimelek peopo. So afta Abraham aks God, God make Abimelek an his wife come good so she can get kids, an same ting fo all da slave wahines inside Abimelek hous

21.1: Lata, Yahweh wen take care Sarah, jalike he wen make promise fo do. He do good ting fo her.
21.2: Sarah wen get hapai. Az jalike da God Yahweh wen tell Abraham befo time, dat he goin give um one boy. She born da boy fo Abraham wen he real old awready.
21.3: Abraham, he give da name Isaac to da new bebe, da boy dat Sarah wen born fo him. (Dat name mean âLaugh.â)
21.4: An wen Isaac eight day old, Abraham cut skin, jalike God tell um he suppose to do.
21.5: Da time wen Isaac born, Abraham hundred year old awread
21.8: Da boy Isaac wen come mo big, an his mudda pau nurse him. Abraham wen make big bebe lu`au fo Isaac, da time his mudda pau nurse hi
21.9: Dat time, Sarah wen see Ishmael, da boy dat Hagar da wahine from Egypt wen born fo Abraham. Da two boys, dey stay playing togedda.
21.10: Sarah tell Abraham, âYou gotta throw out dat slave wahine an her boy! No way dat slave wahine's boy goin get some a yoa stuffs afta you mahke! My boy Isaac, he goin get um all!â
21.11: Wen bodda Abraham plenny, da ting Sarah wen say. Cuz Ishmael his own boy too.
21.12: But God tell Abraham, âNo need stay sore inside cuz a da boy an yoa slave wahine. Wateva Sarah tell you fo do, lissen to wat she tell. Cuz bumbye, wen dey talk bout da peopo dat come from you, dey mean da peopo dat goin come from Isaac, not from Ishmael.
21.13: An you know, fo da slave wahine's boy, I goin make one peopo come from him too, cuz he come from you.â
21.14: Abraham get up early da nex morning, an go get food an one goat skin all sew up fo carry watta. He give um to Hagar, an help her put da food an da watta on top her back an da boy's back. Den, he make her an da boy go way from de
21.15: Wen da watta pau inside da goat skin, she leave da boy unda da shade a one a da bushes de
21.16: Den Hagar go mo down, like hundred yard. She sit down ova dea da odda side, cuz she tinking, âI no can handle fo see my boy die!â An she bus out cryin
21.17: Same time, da boy pray to God, an God lissen to him. One angel messenja guy from God call to Hagar from da air. He tell her, âHui! Hagar! Wass up wit you? No scared! Cuz da boy wen pray ova dea, an God, he lissen awready.
21.18: Stand up! Go by Ishmael an put yoa arms aroun him! You gotta take good care him so notting bad happen. Cuz da peopo dat goin come from him, I goin make dem come one important peopo!â
21.19: An den, God let Hagar see dat get one puka wit watta inside. She go dea an put da goat skin down inside da puka an fill um up. Den she pull um up an give da boy fo drink.
21.20: From dat time, an wen Ishmael come big, God help him plenny. Lata, he go live inside da boonies, an he come good fo use da bow an arrow fo hunt.
21.21: Da time Ishmael stay live inside da boonies Paran side, his mudda go Egypt side, an she bring back one wahine from dea fo come Ishmael wif
21.22: Had one time, King Abimelek an his main army guy Pikol come talk wit Abraham. Abimelek tell Abraham, âEryting you do, God stay wit you an he help you.
21.23: So now, I like you make one strong promise fo me an swea to God right hea an now. Promise dat you no goin bulai me o trick me, an same ting fo all my ohana peopo an erybody dat goin come from me bumbye. Promise dat wateva you do wit me an wit da land wea you making house, you goin stick wit me an stay my friend, jalike eryting I wen do wit you, I wen stick wit you an stay yoa friend.â
21.24: Abraham tell, âI promise an I swea to God.â
21.25: But lata, Abraham gotta go talk wit Abimelek, cuz had guys dat work fo Abimelek who wen take ova one puka fo watta dat Abraham guys wen dig befo time.
21.26: Abimelek, he tell, âEh, I donno wat guy wen do dis. An you neva say notting befo time, an I neva hear notting till today.â
21.27: Abraham take sheeps, goats, an cows an give um to Abimelek, an da two guys make deal fo share da watt
21.28: Same time, Abraham wen put seven bebe sheeps, girl kine, one side.
21.29: Abimelek aks um, âEh, da seven bebe sheeps, girl kine, dat you wen put ova dea, how come?â
21.30: Abraham tell um, âI like you take dis seven sheeps from me, fo make proof fo me in front erybody dat you know was me dat wen tell my guys fo dig da puka, so bumbye no goin get mo problem fo us use da watta.â
21.31: So da two guys wen make strong promise to each odda. Dass how come dey call dat place Beer-Sheba, dat mean âDa Seven Sheep Puka,â an same time, âDa Puka Wit Da Promise.â
21.32: Afta dey make da Beer-Sheba promise, Abimelek an his main army guy Pikol, dey go home. (Dass da same land wea da Filisha peopo live nowdays, you know.)
21.33: Abraham, he wen go plant one ironwood tree ova dea Beer-Sheba side. Dat place, he wen tell Yahweh, âEh! You, da God Dat Stay Foeva! I like you help me, cuz I know wat kine God you!â
21.34: An Abraham wen live long time, ova dea inside da land wea da Filisha peopo live nowday

22.1: Long time afta, God wen go check out Abraham. He tell um, âEh Abraham!â
22.2: God tell um, âGo get yoa boy Isaac, da ony one you get, da one you get plenny love an aloha fo him. Take um an go Moriah side. Wen you get dea, I goin show you one a da hills ova dea. Take yoa boy on top dat hill, an kill um dea, fo make da kine sacrifice wea you burn up da whole ting.â
22.3: Da nex morning, Abraham get up early an put saddle on top his donkey. Den he chop wood fo burn da sacrifice, an put um on top da donkey. Den he start fo go da place God wen tell um, him an his boy Isaac an two young worka guys.
22.4: Day numba three, Abraham look, an he can see da place, far still yet.
22.5: Abraham tell his worka guys, âKay den. You guys, stay wait hea wit da donkey. Me an my boy, we going ova dea. Dass da place we goin go down in front God fo show him love an respeck. Den, we come back by you guys.â
22.6: Befo dey go, Abraham take down from da donkey da wood fo burn da sacrifice. He put um on top his boy Isaac back fo carry um. Abraham wen carry one pot wit hot charcoal inside, an da knife in da odda hand. Abraham an Isaac wen go on top da mountain togedda.
22.7: Afta dey go litto bit, Isaac, he aks: âEh Dad!â
22.8: Abraham tell um, âMy boy, God da One goin give da sheep fo da sacrifice.â Den dey go some moa togedd
22.9: Den dey come da place God wen tell Abraham. Abraham pile up rocks ova dea fo burn da sacrifice on top. He put da wood on top da alta. Den he go tie up his boy Isaac an put him on top da alta, on top da wood.
22.10: Den Abraham pick up da knife, fo kill his own boy.
22.11: Right den one angel messenja guy from Yahweh yell to him from da air, âHui! Abraham!â
22.12: Yahweh tell um, âPut down da knife, no hurt da boy! No do notting to um. You was ready fo kill um cuz az wat I tell you fo do! But now, I know fo shua dat you get plenny respeck fo me, yoa God. Cuz you neva even hold back from me da ony boy you get, az why.â
22.13: Right den an dea, Abraham look up. He see one big sheep, boy kine, dat get da horn stuck inside da bushes an no can get out. Abraham go pull da sheep outa da bushes, an take him to da altar. He kill um fo make da sacrifice, an burn up da whole body. Da sheep take place fo da bo
22.14: Afta, Abraham give dat place da name Yahweh Yir`eh. Dat mean, âYahweh Give Wat I Need.â Nowdays peopo say still yet: âOn top da mountain wea Yahweh stay, God awready give us wat we need.â
22.15: Da messenja guy from da sky, dat was Yahweh! He talk to Abraham from da air one mo time.
22.16: He tell, âEh! I Yahweh, an I like make one strong promise to you. No mo odda guy mo big den me, you know. Dass why I no goin make one promise an say dat some odda guy goin make shua I really goin do um. Me, I make dis promise an I da one dat make shua I really goin do wat I sa
22.17: I goin make eryting come good fo you, fo real kine. Da peopo dat goin come from you bumbye, I goin make dem come choke plenny peopo, jalike get plenny stars inside da sky an plenny sand on top da beach. An dey goin take ova da towns wea da peopo dat stay agains dem live.
22.18: All da diffren peopos all ova da world, bumbye wen dey tink bout da peopos dat come from you, dey goin say, âGod do good tings fo us, cuz a da Abraham ohana!â Dey goin say dat, cuz today, you wen do wat I tell you fo do.â
22.19: Den Abraham an Isaac wen go back by da worka guys, an dey all go home togedda Beer-Sheba side. Dass da place Abraham wen live, dat tim
22.20: Lata, somebody wen tell Abraham, âEh! You know yoa brudda Nahor? Him an his wife Milkah, dey get kids now!
22.21: Uz, he da numba one. Afta him get his brudda Buz. Den get Kemu`el, dat get one boy Aram awready.
22.22: An Nahor get odda kids Kesed, Hazo, Pildash, Yidlaf, an Betu`el.â
22.23: (Betu`el, he Rebecca fadda.) Dass eight boys dat Milkah wen born fo Nahor, an Abraham dea uncle.
22.24: Nahor wen marry one nodda wife, her name Reumah. She get kids too: Tebah, Gaham, Tahash, an Ma`aka

23.2: She mahke Canaan side, Kiriat-Arba town (dass Hebron, you know). Abraham go inside da tent wea dey put Sarah body, an he cry plenny fo her. He no shame fo show erybody dat he real sore inside.
23.3: Den Abraham stand up an go outa da tent wea his wife body stay, an go ova by da town gate fo talk to da Het peopo dat live dea. He tell um,
23.4: âYou guys know I not from dis place, but now I live wit you guys. Please, let me get one land ova hea fo put my mahke wife inside an bury her dea.â
23.5: Da leada guys fo da Het peopo tell Abraham,
23.6: âWe know dat God wen make you one importan guy hea wit us guys, jalike you da boss fo us. We like you go take da bestes place dat us guys get fo bury yoa mahke wife. No mo nobody from all us guys goin tell you no can use one place fo bury yoa wife.â
23.7: Den Abraham wen go down fo show respeck to da Het peopo dat was da local peopo ova dea.
23.8: Den dey talk togedda. Abraham tell um, âIf you tell me az okay fo me bury my mahke wife hea, den I like you guys do one ting fo help me. Go talk to Efron fo me, dass Zohar boy.
23.9: Aks um if he like sell me da cave he get ova dea Makpelah side, da odda end a his land. I pay him good money fo da cave, so I can get one place by you guys fo bury my peopo wen dey mahke.â
23.10: Efron, he stay dea awready wit da odda Het peopo. So he talk to Abraham so all da odda Het peopo from dat town can hear him, all da peopo dat wen come togedda inside da town gate, da place wea da importan peopo come togedda. He say,
23.11: âCuz you jalike da boss fo me, I goin tell you dis. No need fo you buy dat land. Right now in front all my peopo, I give um to you, da land an da cave, fo bury yoa mahke wife.â
23.12: Abraham, he wen go down in front all da local peopo fo show um respeck.
23.13: He tell Efron, so all da odda local peopo can hear too, âOny lissen, let me tell dis one ting. I like pay you fo da land. Take da money, so I can bury my wife dea.â
23.15: âI tell you dis, cuz you da boss fo me, you know. Da land worth plenny, 400 silva piece. But me an you, us friends. So dass notting. Go bury yoa wife ova dea.â
23.16: Abraham, he say, âKay den.â He weigh da silva money dey wen talk bout in front da Het ohana peopo an give um to Efron -- 400 silva piece, da kine da business peopo use ova dea dat time.
23.17: Dass how da land dat Efron get Makpelah side wea you can see Mamre town -- da land, an da cave inside, an all da trees dea -- da whole land wen come
23.18: Abraham's land dat he wen buy. All da importan Het peopo know dat, cuz dey was dea by da town gate wen dey make da dea
23.19: Den Abraham wen bury his wife Sarah inside da cave, inside da land Makpelah side, wea you can see Mamre town -- dass da place dey call Hebron nowdays, inside da Canaan land.
23.20: Dass how da land wit da cave inside wen come Abraham land from da Het peopo, fo bury da mahke peopo from Abraham ohan

24.1: Abraham stay real old awready now, uku plenny years. Yahweh wen make eryting come out okay fo him.
24.2: One time, Abraham wen tell da oldes guy dat work fo him fo come. Dat guy, da luna in charge a all Abraham stuffs. Abraham tell um, âI like you put yoa hand undaneat my thigh, da way our peopo do wen dey make one strong promise.
24.3: I like you make me one strong promise in front Yahweh, da God dat stay in charge a da sky an da whole world. Promise an swea to God dat you goin find one wahine fo my boy. But you gotta promise, no find one Canaan kine wahine from dese peopo aroun hea wea I live.
24.4: You gotta go my land, da land wea I wen born, fo find one wahine fo come my boy Isaac wife.â
24.5: Da luna guy tell Abraham, âKay den. But wat if da wahine no like come dis land wit me, wat I gotta do den? I gotta take yoa boy back to da place you wen come from, o wat?â
24.6: Abraham tell um, âTake care! No take my boy back dea!
24.7: Was Yahweh, da God dat stay in charge a da sky, dat wen take me outa da place wea my fadda guy wen live, da land wea I wen born. Yahweh, he make one strong promise to me. He tell me, âI goin give dis land to da peopo dat goin come from you.â Dass da same God dat goin send his angel messenja guy to da place you goin go, so you find one wahine from dea fo marry my boy.
24.8: If da wahine no like come hea wit you, den da promise you make to me, pau. Ony one ting --you no goin take my boy back dea!â
24.9: So da luna guy put his hand undaneat his boss Abraham thigh, an make strong promise fo do wat Abraham wen tell u
24.10: Da luna, he take ten camel from da ones da boss get, an all da bestes kine stuffs from his boss fo give gifs fo da wahine ohana. He go ova dea by da Aram peopo Mesopotamia side between da two big rivas, da town wea Abraham brudda Nahor wen live befo time.
24.11: Bumbye he come nea outside da town, one place wea get puka fo watta. He make his camels go down an rest dea. Was late aftanoon time, da time wen da wahines go da puka fo get watt
24.12: Den da luna guy tell God, âEh Yahweh, you da God dat my boss Abraham get plenny love an respeck fo. Make eryting come okay fo me today, so I can find da wahine fo come my boss boy wife. I like you do good ting fo my boss Abraham now, cuz you an him get deal.
24.13: So. I standing hea by da puka wea da watta come out, an da young wahines from dis town stay coming out hea fo get watta.
24.14: I goin tell one a da wahines, âPlease, give me litto bit watta fo drink outa yoa watta pot.â An if she tell, âOkay, drink up, an I give you watta fo da camels too,â let dat one be da wahine dat you wen pick fo come da wife fo yoa guy Isaac. If she do dat, dass how I goin know dat she da one, an dat you stay stick wit my boss guy Abraham, cuz you an him get deal.â
24.15: Right den, befo da luna guy pau talk to God, hea come Rebecca outa da town, carrying one watta pot on top her shoulda. (Her fadda, Betu`el. Her granfadda, Nahor, az Abraham brudda. Nahor wife, Milkah, an Betu`el dea boy.)
24.16: Da young wahine real good looking, an she neva sleep wit any guy yet. She go down inside da puka place an fill up da pot wit watta. Den she come back up.
24.17: Da luna guy run ova dea by Rebecca. He tell, âPlease, give me litto bit watta outa yoa watta pot.â
24.18: Da young wahine tell, âShua, mista, drink up.â Right away she take down da watta pot an hold um so da luna guy can drink.
24.19: Afta she pau let um drink plenny, she tell um, âEh! If you like, I can pull up watta fo yoa camels too, till dey get nuff fo drink.â
24.20: Right den an dea, she wen pour all da watta she get awready inside da trough wea da animals drink, an den she run back to da puka, an pull up plenny mo watta till all da camels pau drin
24.21: Da luna guy, he jus stand dea an look fo see if da young wahine az da right one. He no say notting, cuz he like find out if God make da trip come out okay, o no
24.22: Den, afta da camels pau drink, da luna guy wen go open one a da bags dey carrying, an he take out one expensive gold nose ring an two expensive gold arm bracelet, fo one gif fo da girl.
24.23: He tell, âTry tell me, wat ohana you from. An yoa fadda, get room his house fo stay tonite, me an my guys?â
24.24: Rebecca tell him, âMe, I Betu`el daughta. His fadda Nahor, an his mudda Milkah.
24.25: Get plenny food fo da animals our house too, an get room fo all you guys fo sleep ova dea tonite.â
24.26: Da luna guy go down on top da groun fo show respeck fo Yahweh.
24.27: He say, âI like say dis: Yahweh, he da God fo my boss guy Abraham. He make eryting come out good fo Abraham, fo shua! God not slack fo stick wit my boss an do wat he say he goin do. An same ting fo me too, Yahweh show me wea fo go, strait to da peopo from my boss guy ohana, jalike I suppose to!â
24.28: Da girl Rebecca, she run home quick an tell all her mudda ohana peopo da tings dat wen happe
24.29-30: Now, Rebecca get one brudda guy, his name Laban. Afta Laban see da nose ring, an da two bracelet on top his sista arms, an afta he hear Rebecca tell wat da luna guy wen say to her, Laban run ova dea outside da town by da watta puka, by da guy. Da luna guy, he still stay standing dea wit da camels wea da watta come out.
24.31: Laban tell um, âEh mista! Fo shua, Yahweh do plenny good kine stuff fo you! Try come our house! No need stay standing outside hea! Cuz I wen make eryting ready, our house, fo you an da camels.â
24.32: Da luna guy go inside Laban house, an dey take down da bags from da camels. Laban worka guys wen give da camels food, an dey bring watta so da luna guy an da odda guys wit him can wash fee
24.33: But wen dey bring da food, da luna guy say, âBefo I eat, I goin tell you wat I suppose to tell you. Den can eat.â
24.34: Da luna guy tell, âMe, I work fo yoa fadda uncle guy Abraham.
24.35: Yahweh Up Dea Inside Da Sky, he do plenny good tings fo my boss. He one important guy awready. God give um sheeps an goats an cows, an silva money an gold money, an guys an wahines fo slaves, an camels, an donkeys, eryting.
24.36: Sarah, my boss wife, an she wen born one boy fo Abraham, no matta she real old. An Abraham tell, dat afta he mahke, his boy goin get all Abraham stuff
24.37: âMy boss Abraham, he wen make me make one strong promise to him. He tell me, âI stay live ova hea on top da Canaan peopo land, you know, but I no like you go get one Canaan wahine fo marry my boy.
24.38: No way! Dis wat you gotta do: go my fadda house, by my ohana peopo, fo get one wife fo my boy.â
24.39: I wen tell my boss, âBut auwe! If da wahine no like come back hea wit me, wat I suppose to do den?â
24.40: Abraham tell me, âDa way I live, da God Yahweh see eryting I do. He tell me, dat he goin send one a his angel messenja guys wit you. Dass how he goin make eryting come out okay fo you. You goin get one wahine from my fadda guy's ohana fo come my boy wife.
24.41: Den yoa promise goin be pau bout dis ting I telling you dat you gotta do. An wen you get dea by my ohana peopo, if dey no let you take nobody, dass okay too. Yoa promise goin be pau.â
24.42: âToday, I wen come hea, by da puka wea da watta come out. I tell God, âEh Yahweh, you da God fo my boss Abraham. I like you make eryting come out okay, fo dis ting dat I come hea fo do!
24.43: Now, I standing hea by dis puka wea da watta come out. So, if one young wahine come outa da town fo get watta, I goin tell her, âPlease, let me drink litto bit watta outa yoa watta pot.â
24.44: An if she tell me, âShua, drink up, an I go pull up watta fo yoa camels tooâ -- eh Yahweh, let dat be da wahine dat you wen pick fo come da wife fo my boss boy!â
24.45: âBefo I pau say all dis inside my heart, hea come dis Rebecca outside da town wit her watta pot on top her shoulda, an she go down inside wea get da puka an fill up da watta pot. Den I tell her, âPlease, I like one drink watta.â
24.46: Right away she take down da watta pot an tell, âDrink. I get watta fo yoa camels too.â So I wen drink, an den she get watta fo da camels to
24.47: âI wen aks her, âYoa fadda guy, who him?â She tell me, âMe, I Betu`el daughta. His fadda Nahor, an his mudda Milkah.â Den I wen give her da nose ring an da arm bracelets fo wear.
24.48: I wen go down on top da groun fo show respeck fo Yahweh, da God fo my boss Abraham. I wen tell Yahweh dat he wen do one real good ting fo me, cuz he wen bring me da right way fo find my boss own brudda guy, so I can take his daughta fo come da wife fo Abraham bo
24.49: âSo now, I like you guys tell me dis: You guys goin stick wit my boss, an do da right ting fo him, o wat? An if you guys no like, tell me strait, an I go odda place.â
24.50: Den Laban an Bethu`el tell da luna guy, âWas Yahweh dat wen bring you hea awready fo aks fo Rebecca. Us guys no can tell you âYeahâ o âNo.â
24.51: Rebecca stay right hea in front you. You can take her wit you fo come da wife fo yoa boss boy, jalike Yahweh tell.â
24.52: Wen da luna guy fo Abraham hear wat dey say, he go down on top da groun fo show love an respeck fo Yahweh.
24.53: Den he take stuff outa da bags fo give Rebecca. He give her all kine silva an gold kine jewelry, an clotheses. He give plenny expensive stuffs to her brudda an her mudda too.
24.54: Den da luna guy an da odda guys wit him, wen eat an drink, an den dey sleep dea dat nit
24.55: But da brudda guy an da mudda guy, dey tell, âMo betta let Rebecca stay hea wit us guys like ten days moa, an afta, she can go.â
24.56: Da luna tell dem, âDa God Yahweh wen make eryting I do come out okay. So, no good make me stay hea long time. I like you guys let me go back by my boss.â
24.57: Da brudda guy an da mudda guy, dey tell, âWe tell da girl fo come, an aks her wat she like do.â
24.58: Dey tell Rebecca fo come, an dey aks her, âYou like go now wit dis guy, o wat?â
24.59: So, dey wen let dea sista Rebecca go, her an da lady dat work fo her from small bebe time. Dey wen go wit Abraham luna guy an his helpa guy
24.60: Da ohana peopo aks God fo do good tings fo Rebecca. Dey tel
24.61: Den Rebecca an da wahines dat work fo her wen go ride on top da camels, an go wit da luna guy. He take Rebecca an he g
24.62: Dat time, Isaac wen come back by his fadda guy Abraham from Be`er-Lahai-Ro`i side, cuz he live inside da Negev.
24.63: Wen da sun going down, Isaac wen go fo one walk inside da countryside. He look, an he spock some camels coming.
24.64: Rebecca, look same time, an she spock da guy Isaac. She come down quick from on top da camel.
24.65: She tell da luna guy, âEh, dat guy ova dea inside da open country, da one dat stay walking dis way, who him?â
24.66: Da luna guy wen tell Isaac eryting he wen do.
24.67: Den Isaac marry Rebecca. He bring Rebecca fo live inside da same tent wea his mudda guy Sarah live befo she mahke. Isaac get plenny love an aloha fo her. So, no matta his mudda wen mahke, now he no mo sore inside, cuz he get Rebecc

25.1: Abraham wen marry again, an his new wife name was Keturah.
25.2: She wen born fo him Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, an Shuah.
25.3: Lata, Jokshan wen get two boys, Sheba an Dedan. Da Ashur peopo, an da Letush peopo, an da Le`um peopo, dey all wen come from Dedan.
25.4: Midian, he wen get boys, Efah, Efer, Enoch, Abida, an Elda`ah. All dese peopo, az Abraham ohana from Keturah dea mudd
25.5: Abraham wen fix up eryting so Isaac get all Abraham stuff afta he mahke.
25.6: Fo da odda kids dat wen born from Abraham an his odda wifes, Abraham give each kid plenny stuffs befo he mahke, but den he make um move house da east side, an no stay nea his boy Isaa
25.7: So dass da story wat happen da time Abraham stay live. He live 175 year.
25.8: Abraham get eryting he like, an he feel good inside. He live plenny year an he stay good inside. Den he mahke. He go da same place his ancesta guys wen go.
25.9-10: Abraham boys, Isaac an Ishmael, dey bury him inside da cave Makpelah side, nea to Mamre town, inside da land dat Abraham wen buy from Efron, Zohar boy, da Het guy. Dey bury Abraham, da same place he wen bury his wife Sarah.
25.11: Afta Abraham mahke, God do plenny good tings for Abraham boy Isaac. Isaac make house nea da puka fo watta dat dey call Be`er Lahai Ro`i, dat mean, âDa Puka Wea Da God Dass Alive Wen See Meâ
25.12: Now, dis da story bout Ishmael an his ohana. He Abraham boy, da one dat Hagar wen born fo Abraham. She da Egypt wahine dat wen work fo Sarah.
25.13: Da boys dat wen come from Ishmael, dis dea names from da oldes to da younges: Nebaiot was da numba one boy, den Kedar, Adbe`el, Mibsam,
25.15: Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Nafish, an Kedmah.
25.16: All dese guys, dey Ishmael boys, an dey all get dea own small place fo live, an da peopo dat live dea afta give dea place da same name jalike da Ishmael boys, cuz dey da main guys dat dea twelve ohanas come from.
25.17-18: Da places wea da Ishmael boys go fo live start from Havilah an go all da way to Shur nea da Egypt land, wea you go Ashur side. But Ishmael, he wen live da east side a all his ohana guy
25.19: Now, dis da story bout Isaac, da time he stay live. (Abraham was Isaac fadda.)
25.20: Wen Isaac was 40 year old, he marry Rebecca. Her fadda, Betu`el da Aram guy from Padan-Aram. Rebecca get one brudda guy, Laban da Aram gu
25.21: Had one time, Isaac pray to Yahweh fo give his wife Rebecca one bebe, cuz she no mo bebe yet. Yahweh wen lissen to wat Isaac wen pray. Den his wife Rebecca come hapai.
25.22: Was twins, an feel jalike da two bebes pushing each odda aroun inside her. Den she aks Yahweh fo tell her, âWass happening? If dass how I stay, how come?â
25.24: Wen time fo her born da bebes, was twins.
25.25: Da firs one dat come out get red kine skin an choke plenny hair all ova, so dey call him Esau, cuz sound kinda like âplenny hair,â dea language.
25.26: Afta dat, da odda brudda come out, holding Esau heel wit his hand. Dass how come he get da name Jacob, cuz sound kinda like âgrab heel,â dea language, an kinda like âtake ovaâ too. Wen da boys wen born, Isaac 60 year ol
25.27: Lata, wen da boys come big, Esau come real smart fo hunts, an he like stay outside in da boonies. Jacob, he mo quiet kine, an he like live inside da tents.
25.28: Isaac, he love Esau mo den Jacob, cuz Isaac like grind da wild meat too. But Rebecca, she love Jaco
25.29: Had one time, Jacob stay cook stew. Esau, he come back from the boonies, an he real tired an hungry.
25.30: Esau tell Jacob, âEh brudda, give me some a dat red stuff fo grind, cuz I real hungry.â (Dass how come dey wen give Esau da nickname Edom, dat mean âred.â
25.31: Jacob tell, âOkay, but firs, you gotta sell me yoa right fo get our fadda stuffs bumbye afta he mahke, cuz you da oldes. Den I let you eat.â
25.32: Esau tell, âEh, me, I litto mo mahke awready from no eat. No matta I get da right fo get his stuffs cuz I wen born befo you, no mean notting -- cuz I goin mahke!â
25.33: Jacob tell, âSwear to God right now dat you give me da right!â So Esau wen swear to God. Dass how he wen sell Jacob da right fo get dea fadda stuffs bumbye afta dea fadda mahke.
25.34: Den Jacob give Esau bread an lentil stew. An Esau eat an drink, an den he stand up an go way. Dass how Esau wen ack like he no care, cuz he da oldes an he give away da right fo get his fadda stuff, to Jaco

26.1: Had one time, no mo notting fo eat, Canaan side. Same ting happen befo time wen Abraham live dea. Isaac, he move Gerar side an set up his tents wea King Abimelek was da king fo da Filisha peop
26.2: Befo Isaac move Gerar, Yahweh wen let Isaac see him, an he tell Isaac, âNo go Egypt side fo get stuff fo eat. Do how I tell you, stay dis land.
26.3: Stay hea dis land, set up yoa tents! I goin stay wit you an make eryting come out good fo you. Cuz you an da peopo dat goin come from you, I goin give all da lands aroun hea to you bumbye. I wen make one strong promise to Abraham, yoa fadda, an bumbye I goin make happen da ting I wen tell him.
26.4: So Isaac go way from Gerar town. He put up his tents makai from da town, an go by da Gerar Stream, an live dea.
26.5: I goin do all dis cuz yoa fadda Abraham wen lissen to me an do all da tings I tell um dat he gotta do, an eryting I teach um.â
26.6: Dass how come Isaac stay Gerar side, dat time.
26.7: Da Gerar guys ask um bout his wife Rebecca. He tell um, âShe my sista.â He scared fo tell um she his wife, cuz he tinking bumbye dem guys goin kill um so dey can take Rebecca. She real good looking, az wh
26.8: Long time afta dey go Gerar, da Abimelek guy dass da king fo da Philistine peopo, he looking down from da window, an he spock Isaac an his wife Rebecca fooling aroun.
26.9: Abimelek tell Isaac fo come by him. He tell, âDa wahine, she yoa wife, yeah? How come you wen say she yoa sista?!â
26.10: Abimelek tell, âNo good, how you make to us guys! Might be one a our guys go take yoa wife an go sleep wit her, an den, God go punish all us guys cuz a wat you wen do!â
26.11: Den Abimelek tell all his peopo, âAnybody touch dis guy o his wife, dey mahke!â
26.12: Dat year, Isaac plant seeds inside da Gerar land. An from ery bag wheat seeds dat Isaac plant, he get hundred bag wheat! Yahweh give him da powa so he can do plenny,
26.13: an Isaac wen come erytime mo an mo rich.
26.14: Isaac wen get plenny sheeps an goats, plenny cows, an plenny slave peopo dat work fo him. Da Philistine peopo, dey wen come jealous.
26.15: Ery puka fo watta, da Filisha guys go fill um up wit dirt inside so da watta no come out. Az da puka dat da guys dat befo time wen work fo Isaac fadda Abraham, wen dig.
26.16: Abimelek, he tell Isaac, âEh, mo betta you go way from our land. You get mo plenny powa an mo plenny stuffs den us guys, an we no can handle.â
26.18: Isaac tell his guys fo go back an dig da dirt outa da pukas dat da guys dat work fo his fadda Abraham wen dig befo Abraham mahke. Den da watta come out again, afta da Filisha guys wen dump dirt inside. Isaac give ery puka fo watta da same name dat his fadda Abraham wen give u
26.19: Lata, da guys dat work fo Isaac wen dig nea da Gerar Stream, an dey find one new puka ova dea wea plenny watta come out all da time.
26.20: But da Gerar guys dat take care da sheeps dat side, dey make argue wit da guys dat take care da sheeps fo Isaac. Dey tell, âEh! Dass oua watta!â Dass why Isaac give dat puka da name Esek, dat mean âargue,â cuz dey wen make argue wit him.
26.21: Isaac guys wen dig one nodda new puka fo watta, an same ting happen -- da Gerar guys make argue bout dat one too. So Isaac give dat puka da name Sitnah, dat mean âpoint finga.â
26.22: Den Isaac wen move from dea. He dig one mo puka fo watta, an da odda guys neva make argue bout dat one. So Isaac give dat puka da name Rehovot, dat mean âplenny room,â cuz he say, âDis time, Yahweh wen give us guys plenny room inside dis land. Now us guys can come plenny peopo!â
26.23: Lata, Isaac wen move one mo time, up country Beer-Sheba side.
26.24: Da nite he get dea, Yahweh let Isaac see him, an Yahweh tell um, âMe, I da God dat yoa fadda Abraham wen get love an respeck fo. So no scared, cuz I stay wit you. I goin give you da powa fo do eryting I like you fo do. I goin make choke plenny peopo come from you bumbye, cuz a da deal I wen make wit Abraham, da guy dat wen work fo me.â
26.25: Dass how come Isaac wen pile up rocks dat place fo make sacrifice on top. He tell Yahweh, âI like aks you fo help me, cuz I know wat kine God you.â Den Isaac put up his tents dat place, an da guys dat work fo him wen start fo dig one puka fo watt
26.26: Den Abimelek, da king fo Gerar town, wen come by Isaac. Abimelek good friend Ahuzzat, an Pikol, da leada fo Abimelek army guys, dey come too.
26.27: Isaac tell um, âHow come you guys come ova hea by me? You guys was agains me, and you wen throw me outa yoa land. So, wass up?â
26.28: Dey tell, âNow, us guys see dat Yahweh stay wit you fo shua. So us guys tinking, mo betta make deal, us guys an you guys, and we all make strong promise fo do how we say. Dis da deal we like make wit you:
26.29: You no goin do notting bad to us. Same ting, jalike us guys neva hurt you. Us guys erytime ony make good to you. We wen let you go way an eryting okay wit you. An now, us guys see dat Yahweh do plenny good kine stuff fo you!â
26.30: Isaac wen make lu`au fo dem, an dey wen eat an drink plenny togedd
26.31: Morning time, dey all get up early. Ery guy make strong promise to da oddas. Den Isaac let um go home. Dey go, an eryting stay oka
26.32: Dat same day, some a da guys dat work fo Isaac come by him. Dey tell um, âEh, you know dat puka us guys start fo dig? Get watta!â
26.33: Isaac give da puka da name Shivah, dat mean âstrong promise.â Dass how come dat place get da name Be`er-Sheba, dat mean âDa Puka Wea Dey Make Promise.â Dass how dey call um still ye
26.34: Wen Esau 40 year old, he go marry Judit. Her fadda, Be`eri da Het guy. Same time, he marry Basmat, her fadda Elon da Het guy.
26.35: Cuz a dem two wahines, Isaac and Rebecca wen come plenny sore insid

27.1: Had one time, Isaac was real old an his eye stay bad so no can see good. He tell his older boy Esau fo come by him. Wen Esau get dea, Isaac tell um, âEh my boy!â
27.2: Isaac tell um, âYou know, I one old man now. I donno how long befo I mahke.
27.3: I like you go get da stuff fo hunt, da bag wit da arrows inside, an da bow. Go da boonies an hunt wild meat fo me.
27.4: Den cook um fo me fancy kine da way you know how I like fo eat um. Bring um hea fo me eat, so den from inside my heart, I goin tell all da good tings I like God do fo you bumbye. I like make blessing fo you befo I mahke.â
27.5: Same time Isaac stay talking to his boy Esau, Rebecca wen hear dem. Den, Esau go da boonies fo hunt da wild meat fo bring to Isaac.
27.6: Rebecca tell her odda boy Jacob, âI wen hear yoa fadda talking wit yoa brudda Esau. He tell Esau,
27.7: âGo bring me wild meat an cook um fancy kine, da way you know how I like fo eat um. Afta I eat um, I goin tell in front Yahweh, all da good tings dat Yahweh let me aks him fo do fo you bumbye. Cuz I like make blessing lidat befo I mahke.â-â
27.8: Den Rebecca tell Jacob, âSo now, my boy, lissen wat I telling you dat you gotta do.
27.9: Go outside wea da goats stay an bring me two nice bebe goat from ova dea. I goin cook um fancy kine fo yoa fadda, da way he like fo eat um.
27.10: Den, you take um by yoa fadda fo eat um, so all da tings he goin tell fo make da blessing, all goin be fo you an not fo Esau! He ony goin do dat dis one time befo he mahke, you know.â
27.11: Jacob tell his mudda Rebecca, âBut wat? My fadda, he goin know. My brudda Esau, he get plenny hair all ova, but me, I ony get smooth skin.
27.12: Maybe if my fadda touch me, bumbye he tink I no mo respeck fo him. Den he go aks God fo do bad tings fo me, not good tings.â
27.13: Da mudda tell um, âIf he aks God fo do bad tings fo you, I goin aks God fo do bad tings fo me, not fo you! Jus go do how I tell you: go bring da bebe goats hea by me.â
27.14: So Jacob wen go get da bebe goats an kill um, an bring um by his mudda Rebecca like she tell um fo do. She wen cook um fancy kine fo make da kine food dat Jacob fadda like.
27.15: Den, Rebecca go wea her older boy Esau keep his clotheses inside her house. She take out da mos nices kine clotheses dat he get, an tell her younga boy Jacob fo put um on.
27.16: Den she take da skins from da bebe goats an make um jalike one glove, den put um on top Jacob hands an arms an da smooth part a da neck wea no mo hair.
27.17: Afta dat she give her boy Jacob da fancy kine food and da bread she wen coo
27.18: Jacob go inside da place wea his fadda stay wit da food. He say, âEh Pa!â
27.19: Jacob tell his fadda, âDis me, Esau, yoa numba one boy. I do how you wen tell me fo do. So please, sit up an eat some a dis wild meat I wen bring. Afta, you can tell me da blessing Yahweh do fo me bumbye.â
27.20: Isaac tell his boy, âEh my boy! You wen find da wild meat quick, yeah?â
27.21: Isaac tell Jacob, âCome ova hea, my boy. I like touch you, fo make shua if you my boy Esau fo real kine, o you not.â
27.22: Jacob go nea his fadda Isaac, an his fadda touch him, but he still not shua yet. Isaac tinking, âDa voice, sound jalike Jacob, but da hands, az Esau.â
27.23: Da fadda neva find out az was Jacob, cuz he get plenny hair on top da hands, jalike his brudda Esau. Dass why az was him dat Isaac wen tell all da good tings dat he like Yahweh fo do fo his boy bumby
27.24: Da fadda wen aks, âFo real, you my boy Esau?â
27.25: Isaac tell um, âKay den. Bring da food ova hea by me, an let me eat some a da wild meat dat you wen bring. Afta, I goin tell all da good tings dat I like Yahweh do fo you bumbye.â Jacob give Isaac da food, an Isaac eat um. Jacob bring wine too, an Isaac drink u
27.26: Den Isaac wen tell his boy Jacob, âNow, my boy, come nea an kiss me.â
27.27: So Jacob go by him an kiss him. Isaac smell da clothes, den he come shua az his son, an he make spesho blessing for him. Dis wat he sa
27.30: Afta Isaac pau tell Jacob all da good tings he like Yahweh fo do fo his boy bumbye, Jacob go outa da place wea his fadda Isaac stay. An same time, Jacob brudda Esau come back from hunt wild meat.
27.31: Esau cook da wild meat fancy kine, da way his fadda like. Den he take um by his fadda, jalike his brudda wen do. He tell his fadda, âI come back awready, Pa. Sit up an eat da wild meat dat I bring you. Den you can tell all da good tings dat you like Yahweh do fo me bumbye.â
27.32: Isaac tell Esau, âWot! Who you?â
27.33: Isaac, he shake all ova. He plenny scared. He tell, âDen, who da odda guy dat wen go hunt wild meat an bring um by me? I already eat all dat meat befo you wen come hea, you know. An den, I wen make blessing fo him an tell all da good tings dat I like Yahweh do fo him bumbye! An dat kine blessing, no can change! Az ony fo him.â
27.34: Wen Esau hear wat his fadda wen tell, he cry an yell real loud. Esau tell his fadda Isaac, âBless me too, Pa! Tell me all da good tings dat you like Yahweh do fo me too bumbye!â
27.35: But Isaac tell um, âNo can! Yoa brudda was hea an he wen trick me. Az how he wen take away da blessing dat was fo you!â
27.36: Esau tell, âAz right! You wen give him da name Jacob, dat sound kinda like âtake ova,â so now, he take ova wass mines two times awready! Firs time, he take away da rights fo get yoa stuffs afta you mahke, dat I get cuz I yoa numba one boy. Dis time, he wen take away from me da ting you wen tell, bout all da good tings dat you like Yahweh do fo yoa older boy bumbye!â
27.37: Isaac tell Esau, âWo! Hard, you know. I wen make him da boss fo you. I awready wen give him all his brudda guys fo work fo him, an I wen give him plenny wheat an wine fo make him strong. So now, fo you, no mo odda ting dat I can aks God fo give you, cuz I give eryting to him, my boy!â
27.38: Esau tell his fadda, âNo mo even one fo me, Pa? Az ony one time you goin make blessing?! Tell me too, all da good tings dat you like Yahweh do fo me bumbye!â Den Esau wen cry plenny lou
27.39: Den his fadda Isaac wen tell Esau di
27.41: From dat time, Esau stay huhu inside bout Jacob, cuz dea fadda wen tell Jacob an not him, all da good tings dat he like Yahweh do fo his boy Jacob bumbye. Esau tinking, âBumbye my fadda guy mahke, an afta da funeral time, den I goin kill my brudda Jacob!â
27.42: Somebody wen hear wat Esau was goin do, an tell Rebecca. She send somebody fo tell her younga boy Jacob fo come. She tell um, âDis how yoa brudda Esau figga he goin take away da sore he goin get inside wen his fadda mahke -- he tinking, âBumbye I kill Jacob!â
27.43: So now, my boy, lissen wat I tell you. Get outa hea an run away Haran side right now, by my brudda Laban.
27.44: Stay his place till yoa brudda pau huhu,
27.45: till he no like kill you no moa, an he foget da ting you do to him. Den, I send somebody fo bring you back hea. No good I lose you two boys, same time!â
27.46: Den Rebecca go talk to Isaac. She tell um, âYou know da wahines from aroun hea from da Het ohana? I no like dem! If Jacob go marry one a dem wahines from da Het peopo jalike Esau wen do, one local kine wahine from aroun hea, mo betta I mahke!â

28.1: So Isaac tell Jacob fo come by him. He aks God fo make Jacob so he can do eryting God like him fo do. Den he tell Jacob, âNo take one Canaan kine wahine from hea fo come yoa wife.
28.2: You gotta go now Padan-Aram side, by yoa mudda's fadda Betu`el house. Yoa mudda brudda Laban, he get daughtas. Take one a dem fo yoa wife.
28.3: I like Da God Dat Get All Da Powa fo make you so you can do eryting he like you do, so you get plenny kids. Goin get plenny diffren peopos come from you bumbye.
28.4: I like God do da same good tings fo you an da peopo dat goin come from you, jalike he wen tell Abraham he goin do. I like you come da owna fo da land wea you put up yoa tents right now, da land dat God wen tell Abraham he goin give um bumbye.â
28.5: Den Isaac tell Jacob fo go Padan-Aram side, by his uncle Laban. Laban fadda was Betu`el da Aram guy, an Laban sista was Rebecca, Jacob an Esau mudd
28.6: Bumbye, Esau find out dat Isaac wen tell God da good tings dat he like God do fo Jacob, an dat Isaac like send Jacob Padan Aram side fo get one wahine from ova dea. Esau find out too, dat Isaac wen tell Jacob, âNo marry one Canaan kine wahine!â
28.7: Esau know dat Jacob lissen to his fadda an mudda guys an like go Padan-Aram sid
28.8: Now Esau see dat his fadda Isaac no like da Canaan wahines.
28.9: Az why Esau go by his uncle Ishmael. Esau awready get two wifes, but he marry Mahalat too. Her, Ishmael daughta an Nebaiot sist
28.10: Jacob go way from Be`er-Sheba, an now go Haran side.
28.11: He come one place an stay dea dat nite, cuz da sun go down awready. He take one big rock from ova dea fo put unda his head, an he lay down sleep.
28.12: Den Jacob get one dream. Inside da dream, he see jalike had stone steps from on top da groun all da way up inside da sky. He see angel messenja guys from God going up an coming down on top da step
28.13: Den, inside da dream, Jacob see Yahweh standing way up on top da step in da sky. Yahweh tell, âDis me, Yahweh. I da God dat yoa granfadda Abraham an yoa fadda Isaac wen pray to. Dis same land wea you stay sleep tonite, I goin give um to you an to da peopo dat goin come from you bumbye.
28.14: Yoa peopo goin come plenny, jalike no can tell how plenny sand get on top da groun. Dey goin go all ova dis land, makai side an mauka side, up country side an low country side. All da diffren ohanas all ova da world, bumbye wen dey tink bout you an da peopos dat goin come from you, dey goin say, âEh! We like God do good tings fo us guys too, jalike he doing fo Jacob an fo his odda ohana dat come from him!â
28.15: So you know wat? I stay wit you. I goin take care you, ery place you goin go. Bumbye I goin bring you back hea, dis land. I no goin leave you behind. I make dis promise: I goin do eryting dat I tell you I goin do.â
28.16: Den Jacob wake up. He tell, âFo real, Yahweh, stay dis place! An me, I neva know!â
28.17: Jacob come all shook up, an he tell, âScary, dis place! Gotta be, dis da house wea God stay, an da gate fo go inside da sky!â
28.18: Da nex morning early, Jacob wake up. He take da big rock dat he wen put unda his head fo sleep, an he set um up jalike one post, an he pour olive oil on top fo show love an respeck fo God.
28.19: He give dat place da name Bethel, dat mean, âGod's House.â (Befo time, da town dat was dea, dey ony call um Luz
28.20: Den Jacob make one strong promise. He tell, âGod, if you stay wit me, an take care me dis trip I making, an give me food fo eat an clotheses fo wear,
28.21: an if I come back my fadda house an eryting go good fo me -- den you, Yahweh, you goin be da God fo me too.
28.22: Dis rock hea, dat I put up jalike one spesho post fo no foget wat wen happen dis place, dis goin be God's house. An God, from eryting you give me, I goin give ten percent to you.â

29.1: From Bethel, Jacob wen hele on, till he come da land wea da ohanas from da east side live.
29.2: Ova dea inside da boonies, in front him, he see one puka wea da watta come out. Had plenny sheeps laying down ova dea, cuz ery day da sheep farma guys let um drink da watta dat come outa da puka. Had da sheeps from one sheep farma one side, and da sheeps from one nodda farma da odda side, and da sheeps from one nodda farma, da odda side, three sheep farma guys. But had one big rock stay cova da puka.
29.3: Da sheep farma guys, dey erytime wait till all da sheeps come togedda. Den dey push da big rock from on top da puka an let da sheeps go drink. Afta, dey put back da big rock on top da puk
29.4: Jacob tell um, âEh bruddas, wea you guys from?â
29.5: He aks um, âSo, you guys know Laban? Nahor grankid?â
29.6: Den he aks, âLaban, he stay okay, o wat?â
