37.31: Den Joseph brudda guys go kill one a dea goats. Dey trow Joseph fancy robe inside da blood.
37.32: Den dey send somebody by dea fadda Jacob wit da fancy robe fo tell him, âUs guys wen find dis ova dea. Try check out da robe. Dis yoa boy's robe, o wat?â
37.33: Jacob check out da robe, an he tell, âDass my boy robe fo shua! One wild animal wen go eat um! Gotta be, Joseph all bus up!â
37.34: Den Jacob wen rip his own clotheses fo show he plenny sore inside. From den, aroun da middo he wear ony scratchy kine clothes made from goat hair, an fo long time he stay crying fo his boy.
37.35: All Jacob's odda kids, guys an wahines, go by him fo try help um fo come good inside. But he no like lissen to dem. He tell, âNo way. Bumbye wen I go down da Mahke Peopo Place, I still goin stay crying fo my boy.â An he stay sore inside lidat, long tim
37.36: Same time, da guys from Midian side, dey go Egypt. Afta dey get dea, dey sell Joseph to Potifar, an he wen buy um. He one officer dat work fo Pharaoh da King. He da head guy fo da army guys dat kill da prisonas dat da king like kil

38.1: Almos da same time, Judah go way from da place wea his brudda guys stay. He wen go da sout side, an put up tent nea one guy name Hirah from da peopo dat stay Adullam side.
38.2: Ova dea, Judah spock one wahine. Her fadda, one guy from da Canaan peopo name Shuwa. Judah, he marry da wahine an dey live togedda.
38.3: Judah wife come hapai, an she born one boy. Judah give da boy da name Er.
38.4: Da wahine come hapai one mo time, an she born one nodda boy, an she give um da name Onan.
38.5: Afta dat, she born one nodda boy, an she give um da name Shelah. Dat time wen she born him, dey stay live Kezib sid
38.6: Afta Er come big, Judah go get wife fo him, cuz he da numba one boy. Her name, Tamar.
38.7: Da way Yahweh wen see Er, Judah numba one boy, he was one real bad guy. Az how come Yahweh make shua he mahk
38.8: Den Judah tell Onan, âYou da brudda in law, you know, an wen yoa older brudda wen mahke, he no mo kids. So now, you gotta marry da wahine dat was yoa brudda guy wife, an make her come hapai fo yoa brudda guy, so can keep yoa brudda name.â
38.9: But Onan, he figga dat if he make Tamar hapai, da kid no goin be fo him, goin be fo his mahke brudda ohana. Dass how come, erytime him an Tamar make sex, Onan pull out quick make shua her no come hapai fo his mahke brudda ohana.
38.10: Yahweh, he see dat az real bad, how Onan no stay do wat he suppose to fo his mahke brudda guy. Az how come Yahweh make shua Onan mahke to
38.11: Judah tell his daughta in law Tamar, âGo back to yoa fadda place. You can live dea, cuz yoa husban mahke. Bumbye my odda boy Shelah come big, den he marry you jalike suppose to.â
38.12: Long time afta dat, Judah wife, dat was Shuwa daughta, wen mahke. Judah wen make funeral fo her. Afta da funeral pau, Judah an his friend Hirah from da Adullam peopo, dey go togedda Timnah side, cuz Judah get guys ova dea dat cutting wool from his sheeps.
38.13: Somebody tell Tamar, âEh! Yoa fadda in law going Timnah fo help dem cut wool from da sheeps he get ova dea.â
38.14: Den Tamar change her clotheses. Befo time, she wen wear da kine clotheses she supposed to wear cuz her husband mahke. Now, she put on regula kine clotheses, an she take one piece cloth an cova her face. She go ova dea wea da Timnah road go inside Enaim, an she sit down ova dea nea to da road, wit one blanket aroun her. Tamar do dat cuz she know dat Shelah big awready, but Judah neva tell her fo come marry Shela
38.15: Judah, he see Tamar sitting dea. He figga az one wahine dat fool aroun fo money, cuz she cova her face.
38.16: Judah wen stop an go ova dea by her, an tell her, âEh come! I like sleep wit you!â He talk lidat cuz he neva know, az was his own daughta in la
38.17: Judah tell, âI send you one bebe goat, from da goats I get.â
38.18: Judah tell, âWat kine tings you like?â
38.19: Den Tamar go home from dea. She take off da cloth dat cova her face, an change her clotheses, so now she wearing da kine clotheses she suppose to wear cuz her husband mahk
38.20: Lata, Judah tell his friend da Adullam guy, âEh! Take dis bebe goat to da wahine ova dea dat fool aroun fo money, an bring back da tings I wen leave by her.â But da Adullam guy no can find her.
38.21: Da friend, he aks da peopo from dat place, âEh, you guys know da wahine dat fool aroun fo money, da one from da temple fo you guys gods, Enaim side? Da one dat was sitting ova dea nea da road?â
38.22: Da Adullam guy go back by Judah, an tell um, âI no can find da wahine dat fool aroun fo money! An da peopo from dat place, dey tell me, no mo dat kine wahine ova dea.â
38.23: Judah tell his friend, âMo betta da wahine keep da tings I wen give her. No good erybody make us guys shame cuz dey tink us guys no like pay. Fo shua, I wen send dis bebe goat fo her, but you neva find her.â
38.24: Three month afta dat wen somebody tell Judah, âEh! You know yoa daughta in law, Tamar? She wen go sleep wit some guy fo money. Now, she hapai.â
38.25: Wen dey ready fo go take her outside fo kill her, she tell one guy fo go by her fadda in law, an tell um dis: âDa guy dat wen make me come hapai, he wen give me three tings, an he da fadda fo my bebe.â
38.26: Judah know dass his stuffs. He tell, âYeah, dass mines. Dis Tamar, she wen do da right ting mo den me. Cuz fo shua, I suppose to give her to my boy Shelah fo marry from long time, an I neva.â Afta dat, Judah neva touch Tamar agai
38.27: Wen time awready fo born da bebe, had twin boys!
38.28: Afta Tamar start fo born da bebes, one a dem put his hand outside. Da wahine dat helping Tamar, she grab da hand an tie one piece red string on top, fo show dat was da bebe dat wen born firs.
38.29: But da bebe wen pull da hand back inside, an den da odda brudda come out. Tamar say, âWot! How you wen push fo open da way fo yoaself fo come outside!â Dass how come dey give um da name Perez, cuz sound kinda like âpush fo come outside,â dea language.
38.30: Da odda brudda dat get da red string tie on top his hand, he come out afta. Dey give him da name Zerah, cuz sound kinda like âstrong color,â dea languag

39.1: Now, come back to da guy Joseph. Had one Egypt guy Potifar, one a da head guys dat work fo da king, Egypt side. He stay in charge a da army guys dat kill da prisonas dat gotta mahke. Afta da Ishmael guys take Joseph ova dea, dey sell um to Potifar.
39.2: Dass how come Joseph stay Potifar house, da Egypt guy, cuz Potifar wen buy hi
39.3: Da owna guy, Potifar, he see dat, an know dat Yahweh stay make Joseph so eryting he do come good.
39.4: Az why Potifar like Joseph plenny. He make Joseph his own right hand guy. He make um in charge a eryting inside da house dea, an eryting he get.
39.5: From da time da Egypt guy wen make Joseph in charge, Joseph God Yahweh wen make eryting come out real good, inside da house an inside da fields, an eryting Potifar own, cuz a Joseph.
39.6: Potifar neva even make Joseph show him da receipts. Da ony ting Potifar even tink bout was wat kine food he like eat nex tim
39.7: So afta Joseph do all dat kine stuff, an cuz he good looking, Potifar wife wen like him. She tell um, âCome! We go bed togedda.â
39.8: But Joseph, he no like. He tell Potifar wife, âNo way! Tink bout my boss. Wit me hea, da boss no even make me show him da receipts fo da house. He let me take ova eryting dat he own.
39.9: Inside dis house, no mo nobody mo important den me. Ony one ting he hold back from me -- dass you, cuz you his wife! An you tink I goin do dat to him?! No way I goin go agains God an do dis real bad ting you talking bout!â
39.10: Ery day, she talk to Joseph lidat, fo try make um go bed wit her o hang out wit her. But Joseph no lissen, an try fo no go nea he
39.11: But had one time, Joseph go inside Potifar house fo work. Da odda worka guys, dey no stay dea, dat time.
39.12: Potifar wife go grab his shirt an tell, âWe go bed togedda now!â But Joseph, he run away outside da house. But his shirt come off, an Potifar wife still get um in her han
39.13: Da wahine see dat Joseph run away outside from inside dea, but she get da shirt wit her.
39.14: So she wen yell fo help real loud an da odda worka guys all come. She tell um, âEh look! Dat Hebrew bugga Joseph, my husban wen bring um hea by us fo make us shame! Da guy wen like rape me, but I wen yell plenny fo help.
39.15: An wen he hear me yelling, he run away outside da house, an he leave his shirt by me!â
39.16: Da wahine wen keep Joseph's shirt. She wait till her husband come home.
39.17: Den she tell um, âEh! You know dat Hebrew slave guy, da one you wen go bring inside oua house? Da bugga wen come by me, fo make me shame!
39.18: But I wen yell fo help, he run away outside da house, an he leave his shirt by me!â
39.19: Potifar, wen he hear da tings his wife tell um bout wat his slave guy wen do, he come real huhu fo shua.
39.20: He take Joseph an trow um inside da jail wea da guys dat da king say gotta go. An dass da place Joseph stay, inside da jai
39.21: Yahweh, he wen [stick / stay tight] wit Joseph inside dea too, an take care him. Yahweh even wen make da guy in charge a da jail so he like Joseph plenny.
39.22: Da guy wen make Joseph in charge a all da odda prisona guys dat stay dea. Cuz a Joseph, eryting wen come out good inside da jail.
39.23: Afta dat, da guy in charge a da jail neva worry bout notting dat he suppose to do, cuz Joseph take care eryting an Yahweh stay wit Joseph. An eryting Joseph do, Yahweh make um come out goo

40.1: Long time afta dat, had one guy dat get da job fo give da wine to da king a Egypt, an one nodda guy dat get da job fo bake da bread fo him too. Dose guys, dey wen do tings dat da king neva like.
40.2: Da Pharaoh (dass wat da Egypt peopo call dea king guy), he come huhu wit dese two palace guys, da main guy in charge a da wine, an da main guy in charge fo bake da bread.
40.3: So da Pharaoh guy turn um ova to da guy in charge a da army guys dat execute prisonas, fo keep um inside da prison. Was da same prison wea Joseph stay inside.
40.4: Dey stay inside da prison long time, an da guy in charge a da army guys give Joseph da job fo work fo da two guy
40.5: One time, da two guys get dream nite time, wea dey stay inside da prison. Da guy dat use to give da wine to da king befo time get one dream, an same ting fo da guy dat use to bake da bread fo da king befo time. Da dreams wen mean diffren ting fo dem.
40.6: Morning time, Joseph go by dem inside da prison, an he look dem, an he see dat something stay bodda dem plenny.
40.7: Joseph talk to da two guys dat use to work fo Pharaoh befo time, an now dey stay wit Joseph inside da prison wea his boss stay in charge. He tell um, âEh! Wassup? You sick o wat? Da way you guys look today, someting stay bodda you!â
40.8: Dey tell um, âNite time, us two guys wen get dream. But no mo nobody hea fo tell us wat da dream mean!â
40.9: Den da guy dat was da boss befo time fo da peopo dat give da wine to da king, he tell Joseph wat he wen dream firs. He tell um: âInside my dream, had dis grape plant in front me.
40.10: On top da grape plant, had three branch. Ony had small kine buds an flowa on top, but right den an dea, da flowa come big, den quick time had plenny grapes ready fo pick awready!
40.11: I was holding da spesho wine glass fo da Pharaoh guy inside my hand, so I go grab da grapes an squeeze um so da juice go inside da glass. Den I wen give da spesho wine glass to da Pharaoh guy. An dass my dream.â
40.12: Joseph tell da guy: âKay den. I know wat dis mean, da ting you wen dream. Da three branch, dat mean, three days.
40.13: Three days from now, da Pharaoh guy goin make up his mind dat you okay an no need stay inside da prison. He goin give you da same job jalike befo time, fo give da wine to him.
40.14: So. Bumbye wen eryting come okay fo you, I like you tink bout me, an do someting good fo help me. Go tell da Pharaoh guy bout me, an aks him fo get me outa dis prison too.
40.15: You know, I come from da land wea da Hebrew peopo stay live, but some guys wen kidnap me an bring me ova hea, an nobody ova dea know. But ova hea Egypt side, I neva do notting bad fo make um trow me inside dis prison ova hea!â
40.16: Den da odda guy, da one dat use to befo time stay in charge a da guys dat bake da bread fo da king, he see dat wen Joseph tell wat da firs dream mean, he tell good tings going happen fo him. So dat guy tell Joseph, âEh! Same ting wit me! Inside my dream, had dese three baskets wit fancy kine bread an cake inside. I stay carry dem on top my head.
40.17: Inside da basket dat stay on top, had all kine stuff dat I wen bake fo da Pharaoh guy eat. But da birds wen come an eat um outa da basket on top my head!â
40.18: Joseph tell da guy: âI tell you wat da ting you wen dream mean. Da three basket, dat mean, three days.
40.19: Three days from now, da Pharaoh guy goin tell da army guys fo cut off yoa head an hang yoa body on top one pole. Den da birds goin come ova dea an eat da meat from yoa body.â
40.20: So den, three days from dat time, da Pharaoh guy wen make one big party fo his birfday. He tell all his importan worka guys come. Den, he tell all dem guys fo go get da guy dat befo time stay in charge a da guys dat give da wine to da king, an da guy dat befo time bake da bread fo da king, an dey bring um to him.
40.21: Fo da firs guy, dat befo time was in charge a da guys dat give da wine to da king, da king give um back da same job jalike befo time.
40.22: Da odda guy, dat befo time was in charge a da guys dat bake da bread fo da king, da king tell da army guys fo kill um an hang um on top one pol
40.23: Still yet, da guy in charge a da peopo dat give da wine to da king, he neva even tink bout Joseph. Da guy wen go foget all bout hi

41.1: Two year afta dat, da Pharaoh guy, dass da king guy Egypt side, wen get one dream. Wat he see, he was standing by da Nile Riva.
41.2: He spock seven cows, coming up outa da watta. Dey real good looking an fat. Dey go by da tall grass by da Riva, an dey was eating u
41.3: Den da Pharaoh guy see seven odda cows coming up from da Riva afta da firs cows. Dey all look ugly an skinny. Dey go stay stand by da cows dat awready stay ova dea by da Riva.
41.4: Den da ugly skinny kine cows, dey go eat um up da seven good looking fat cows. Afta dat, Pharaoh wake u
41.5: Den da Pharaoh guy go sleep one mo time an get dream, secon time again. An you know wat he see? He see one wheat plant dat grow up wit seven bunch wheat on top, an dey solid an good looking.
41.6: But den, he see one nodda plant wit seven bunch wheat come up right afta da firs one, all skinny kine. Look jalike da hot wind come from da east side an burn da skinny wheat awready.
41.7: Da skinny kine bunch wheat go eat up all da seven bunch solid an full kine wheat. Pharaoh wake up again, an den he know dat he get one drea
41.8: Morning time, da dream bodda da Pharaoh guy plenny inside. He send peopo fo go tell all da kahuna guys from all ova Egypt fo come, an same ting fo all da guys inside da land dat suppose to know wat fo do erytime. Da Pharaoh tell um wat kine dream he wen get, but no mo nobody ova dea can tell um wat da dream mea
41.9: Den da guy dat stay in charge a da guys dat give da wine to da king, he talk. He tell da Pharaoh guy dis: âI gotta tell you one ting I rememba bout da time I wen do someting bad.
41.10: Dat time, you was huhu wit some a yoa worka guys. You wen make me go prison. Da main guy fo da army guys dat execute da prisonas, he da one dat stay in charge ova dea. Was me, an da guy dat bake da bread, dat you wen put inside de
41.11: âOne time, him an me wen get da same kine dream, da same nite. But da tings us guys wen dream, wen mean diffren tings.
41.12: Had dis young Hebrew guy inside dea wit us. He one slave fo da main army guy. We tell him wat kine dream we wen get. He tell me wat my dream mean, an he tell da odda guy wat his dream mean.
41.13: An eryting wen happen jalike da guy wen tell us guys. You wen give da same job jalike befo time back to me. Da odda guy, you wen tell da army guys fo go kill um, den hang um on top one post.â
41.14: Den da Pharaoh guy go send guys fo bring Joseph by him right den an dea. Dey take um outa da prison, an afta he shave an change all his clotheses, he go by Pharaoh.
41.15: Da Pharaoh guy tell Joseph, âI wen get one dream, but no mo nobody can tell wat da dream mean. I wen hear bout you, dat you one guy dat ony need hear one dream, fo tell wat da dream mean.â
41.16: Joseph tell da Pharaoh guy, âNot me! Ony my God can tell you wat da dream mean, an dat goin help you come out okay.â
41.17: Da Pharaoh guy tell Joseph: âDis wat I wen dream. I was standing ova dea by da big Nile Riva.
41.18: An den, you know wat? Had seven cows come up outa da watta. Dey fat an good looking. Dey go inside da tall grass dea by da Riva, an start fo eat.
41.19: Den I see seven odda cows come up afta da firs cows. Dey all look skinny an real ugly, jalike dey neva eat notting long time. All ova da Egypt land, I neva see cows dat look so skinny an bad, like dem!
41.20: Da seven skinny an ugly cows wen go eat up da seven fat cows dat wen come up firs time.
41.21: But afta dey eat dem all up, neva look like dey wen eat notting, cuz dey still look ugly jalike firs time. Den I wake u
41.22: âDen, I get one mo dream. Dis time I see one wheat plant wit seven bunch wheat on top, an da wheat get plenny wheat an all look good.
41.23: An den you know wat? Had anodda plant wit seven bunch wheat on top dat come up afta da odda wheat, but dey all skinny kine an all dry up, jalike da hot wind from da east side wen go burn um wen dey coming up.
41.24: Da skinny kine wheat wen go eat up da seven bunch good kine wheat! I wen tell da kahuna guys bout dis, but no mo nobody can tell me wat dey mean, notting.â
41.25: Joseph tell da Pharaoh guy, âDa tings you wen dream, dass one dream! Mean same ting! God stay telling you wat he goin do.
41.26: Da seven good looking cows, dass seven years wen you goin get plenny a eryting. Same ting, da seven good looking bunch wheat, dass seven years, cuz get ony da one dream.
41.27: An da seven skinny an ugly cows dat come up afta da oddas, dass seven years too, same ting jalike da seven bunch wheat dat stay skinny an all dry up from da hot wind from da east side. Dass seven years wen erybody goin stay hungr
41.28: âSo Pharaoh, dis wat I tell you awready: Da ting God stay show you, dass wat he goin do.
41.29: From now, goin get seven year wea all da time goin get choke plenny fo eat all ova da Egypt land.
41.30: But afta, goin get seven mo year wea all dat time erybody goin stay hungry. All ova da Egypt land, peopo goin foget bout da time wen had plenny fo eat. Wen da food pau, den eryting goin come poho all ova Egypt land.
41.31: Da time dat goin come afta, goin be real hard. Cuz wen no mo notting fo eat, no mo nobody goin rememba da time wen had plenny fo eat all ova da land.
41.32: An one mo ting. You wen get da same dream two time. Dat mean dat da ting God say, stay solid fo shua. an he goin do um pretty soon no
41.33: âSo now, [Pharaoh,] dis wat you gotta do. You gotta go find one guy dat can figga out tings an know wat fo do erytime, an make dat guy da one in charge a da Egypt land.
41.34: You gotta do um, Pharaoh! Get some odda guys fo be his officer guys ova da land. Dey gotta take twenny percent fo tax from eryting dat goin grow inside Egypt, fo da seven year wen goin get plenny food.
41.35: From all da diffren kine food an tings dat grow da good years dat stay coming, dey gotta bring togedda da twenny percent. You da Pharaoh guy, az why you gotta give yoa guys da right fo take da good kine wheat from da peopo fo tax, an put um inside da big towns, an put guards ova dea so nobody steal um.
41.36: Dat way, you guys goin get plenny food fo eat, wen da seven year come wea erybody goin stay hungry all ova Egypt land. No good da whole land come wipe out cuz no mo food!â
41.37: Da Pharaoh guy, he like da plan dat Joseph make. Same ting fo all da guys dat work fo da king, dey like um too.
41.38: Den Pharaoh tell his worka guys, âEh! You guys tink we goin find one guy mo betta den dis guy? No way! Cuz him, he get God's Spirit inside him!â
41.39: Den da Pharaoh guy tell Joseph, âEh! Cuz God wen let you know all dis stuff, fo shua, no mo odda guy mo betta den you, fo figga out tings an fo know wat fo do!
41.40: You goin stay in charge a my govmen. Wateva you tell all my peopo, dey goin do tings yoa way. I da Pharaoh, an I da ony guy mo importan den you.â
41.41: Da Pharaoh guy tell Joseph dis too: âSo! You stay in charge now. I turning ova to you awready, eryting inside Egypt land.â
41.42: Den Pharaoh take da ring he use fo stamp da govmen papers from his own finga an he put um on top Joseph finga. He give um fancy linen kine clotheses fo wear, an he put one gold chain aroun Joseph neck.
41.43: He give Joseph his fancy horse wagon fo ride inside, da one dass spesho fo da numba two guy, an ery place he go, had guys run down da street in front him an yell, âErybody go down in front Joseph fo show um respeck! He stay coming!â Dass how da Pharaoh guy wen do fo make Joseph in charge a all da land, Egypt sid
41.44: Da Pharaoh guy wen tell Joseph dis too: âI da king fo Egypt, an I say dis: all ova dis land, nobody goin move dea hand o dea foot, till you tell um dass okay!â
41.45: Pharaoh give Joseph one Egypt kine name, Zafnat-Paaneah, dat mean, âGod stay alive, an he tell stuff,â da Egypt language. Pharaoh give um one wife too. Her name Asnat, her fadda Poti-Fera, da pries fo da Egypt god dey call On. Dass how Joseph wen come da boss for da whole Egypt lan
41.46: Joseph was thirty year old wen he start fo work fo da Pharaoh guy. Firs ting, he go outside da palace wea da Pharaoh guy stay, an he go all ova Egypt.
41.47: Seven year, da land wen make plenny fo eat.
41.48: Da seven year wen eryting was good inside Egypt land, Joseph tell his guys fo go bring togedda all da food dey suppose to put away. He tell um fo put um inside ery town, from da fields outside dat town.
41.49: Joseph wen put away uku paila [food / wheat] ery place, so plenny, jalike da sand on top da beach. Lata, he stop counting how much he wen put away, cuz too much fo figg
41.50: Dat time, befo da land stop making da food, Joseph wen get two boys. Asnat, she dea mudda, Poti-Fera [daughta / girl / #], da pries fo da Egypt god On[, her fadda].
41.51: Da boy dat wen born firs, Joseph call um Manasseh, cuz dat sound like how fo say âfogetâ in Hebrew language. Joseph tell, âGod wen make me foget eryting bout da bad time I wen get, an foget all my fadda ohana.â
41.52: Da numba two boy, Joseph call um Efraim, cuz dat sound like how fo say âcome plennyâ in Hebrew language. Joseph tell, âGod give me plenny kids ova hea inside da land wea dey wen make any kine to me.â
41.53: An den, afta erybody inside da Egypt land grow plenny food, da seven good year wen pau.
41.54: Den, da odda seven years start, jalike Joseph wen tell um firs time, an no mo notting fo eat. All ova da odda lands, same ting, no mo notting fo eat. But inside Egypt land, had plenny food.
41.55: Even all ova Egypt land, da peopo wen start fo come hungry too. Dey start fo grumble fo da Pharaoh guy give um food. He tell all da Egypt peopo, âGo by Joseph. Wateva he tell you guys fo do, do um!â
41.56: Dat time, all ova da land, no can grow notting fo eat. Eryting come hard fo get, ova dea inside Egypt. So Joseph tell his guys fo open up da place he get all da food inside, an sell um to da Egypt peopo.
41.57: Had peopo from all ova da odda lands dat wen go Egypt side fo buy food from Joseph, cuz all ova, no can grow food notting, an erybody get hard tim

42.1: Jacob find out dat get wheat fo buy, Egypt side. He tell his boys, âWassa matta you guys? You ony stay looking each odda!
42.2: You know wat? I stay hear, get wheat fo buy, Egypt side. Go ova dea. Buy food fo all us, so we can stay alive an no mahke.â
42.3: So ten a Joseph olda brudda guys wen go Egypt side fo buy wheat.
42.4: But da odda brudda Benjamin, Jacob neva let him go wit da oddas, cuz he tinking, âMaybe someting bad goin happen to him.â
42.5: Dass how da Israel boys wen go Egypt side fo buy food, jalike plenny odda peopo, cuz no mo notting fo eat Canaan side, dat tim
42.6: Dat time, Joseph was da guy in charge a all da land, Egypt side. Was him dat stay sell da food to all da peopo inside dat land. Joseph brudda guys go by him, an dey go down in front him, and put dea face on top da groun fo show um respeck.
42.7: Joseph see his brudda guys, an he know who dem right away. But he neva let dem know who him. He talk rough, an tell um, âEh! Wea you guys come from?â
42.8: Joseph, he know who dem, but dey donno who him.
42.9: An Joseph rememba da tings he wen dream bout dem, befo time. He tell um, âNah! You guys, you ony spies! You come hea fo check out wat part a our land we no can guard!â
42.10: But da brudda guys tell Joseph, âNo! We wen come hea ony fo buy food. But, not how you tink! You da boss, an us guys, jalike we yoa slave guys.
42.11: All us guys get da same fadda. We honest guys, an not spies! We jalike yoa slave guys!â
42.12: Joseph tell um, âNot even! You guys ony come hea fo check out wat part a our land we no can guard!â
42.13: Dey tell Joseph, âUs twelve bruddas, yoa slave guys, dat come from da same fadda, Canaan side. Ony now, da younga brudda, he stay ova dea wit our fadda. An da odda brudda, he no mo awready.â
42.14: Joseph tell um, âSame ting, jalike I stay tell you guys awready, you guys spies!
42.15: Dis how I goin check you guys out, fo find out if you telling da trut, o not. Ony one way you guys goin get outa hea, an da Pharaoh guy goin back me up wen I say dis: You guys younga brudda gotta come hea, den you can go.
42.16: One a you guys go fo bring yoa brudda ova hea. Da odda guys goin stay hea inside da jail. Dass how I goin check out if you guys telling da trut o not! An if you guys not telling da trut, da Pharaoh guy goin back me up, dat you guys spies!â
42.17: So, Joseph wen keep da brudda guys inside da jail, three day
42.18: Afta da three days, Joseph tell da brudda guys, âYou know, I one guy dat get plenny respeck fo God. Az how come I telling you guys wat you gotta do so you no goin mahke.
42.19: If you guys honest peopo, one a yoa brudda guys gotta stay inside da jail wea I wen put all you guys. You odda guys, go. Take da food you wen buy fo yoa ohana guys dat stay hungry.
42.20: But still yet, you gotta bring back yoa younga brudda hea by me. Dass how you guys goin make proof dat you stay tell da trut. Dass wat you guys gotta do fo no mahke.â
42.21: Da brudda guys talk to each odda wit dea own language. Dey tell, âAz right, you know! Us getting punish cuz all da bad ting we wen do to our brudda guy Joseph. Dat time, we wen see dat he was scared an plenny sore inside, an he beg us fo show pity to him, but we neva lissen! Az how come us guys stay sore inside now.â
42.22: Den Reuben talk. He tell um, âNo foget, I wen tell you guys dat time, âNo do notting fo hurt da boy!â But you guys neva like lissen. An now, wat?! Jalike us guys gotta pay fo his blood!â
42.23: Da ten brudda guys, dey neva know dat Joseph undastan eryting dey stay talking. Cuz Joseph, he ony use da Egypt kine language fo talk to dem, but get one interpreta guy dat use da Hebrew language fo tell da brudda guys wat Joseph say.
42.24: Den Joseph go way from dem an cry plenny. Afta he feel betta, he come back inside an talk wit dem. Joseph pick one a da brudda guys, Simeon, an he tell his guys fo tie up Simeon in front da odda brudda guy
42.25: Joseph do one nodda ting too: he tell his worka guys fo go get wheat an fill up ery gunny bag da bruddas wen bring, an same time he tell um fo take da money dat ery guy wen pay, an put um inside dat guy bag. Joseph tell his guys fo give da brudda guys food fo eat fo da trip too. Da worka guys do all dat fo dem.
42.26: Den da brudda guys put da wheat dey wen buy on top dea donkeys, an go home from de
42.27: Dat nite, wen dey stop, one a da brudda guys open his bag fo give his donkey someting fo eat. He find da money, right dea inside da top a da bag.
42.28: He tell his brudda guys, âWo! Dey give me back da money I wen pay! Look, right hea inside my bag!â
42.29: Wen da brudda guys come by dea fadda Jacob, Canaan side, dey tell him eryting dat wen happen to dem. Dey tell,
42.30: âGet dis guy ova dea, he da boss fo da land. He talk mean to us, an he make to us jalike we spies dat stay checking out da land ova dea.
42.31: But us guys tell um, âNot how you tink! We honest guys! Us not spies!
42.32: Us guys had twelve brudda guys dat all get da same fadda. But get one brudda dat mahke awready, an da younga brudda guy, he stay wit oua fadda right now, Canaan side.â
42.33: âDen da guy dat stay in charge a da land ova dea, he tell us, âKay den. Dis how I goin find out if you guys honest o you not. Leave one a yoa brudda guys hea by me, an take da food fo yoa ohana guys dat stay hungry, an go home.
42.34: But bring yoa younga brudda guy back hea by me. Dass how I goin find out if you honest guys, o spies. If you okay, den I give you guys back da odda brudda guy dat I keeping ova hea, and you guys can go any place you like inside oua land.â-â
42.35: Afta dey tell dea fadda dat, dey take da wheat outa dea bags, an you know wat? Inside ery bag, get da small package money dat ery guy wen pay! Wen dey see da money, dey come real scared. Even dea fadda, he scared too.
42.36: Dea fadda Jacob tell um, âYou guys! You take my boys away from me! Joseph, he mahke awready. Simeon, gone awready. An now, you like take away Benjamin too! Eryting stay go agains me!â
42.37: Reuben tell his fadda, âI goin take care Benjamin fo you, an I goin bring him back by you fo shua. If I no bring um back, you can kill my two boys!â
42.38: But Jacob tell um, âNo way. My boy no goin go wit you guys. His brudda, mahke awready. He da ony one dat stay still yet from Rachel. If someting bad happen to him ova dea, fo shua you guys goin make me come real plenny sore inside, an you goin make my gray hair go down da Mahke Peopo Place!â

43.1: But dat time, was hard, cuz neva have notting fo eat, Canaan side.
43.2: Lata, all da wheat dey wen bring back from Egypt, dey eat um all awready. So dea fadda Jacob wen tell his boys, âGo back dea one mo time. Buy litto bit food fo us.â
43.3: But Judah tell um, âDa main guy ova dea tell us guys serious kine, âOny one way you guys goin see me one mo time. Yoa odda brudda gotta be wit you guys.â
43.4: So, if stay okay wit you, fo let oua brudda go wit us guys, den we goin go Egypt an buy food fo you.
43.5: But if you no like let um go, us no can go. Cuz da Egypt guy wen tell us awready, âOny one way you guys goin see me one moa time. Yoa odda brudda gotta be wit you guys.â-â
43.6: Jacob tell, âHow come you guys wen make all dis ting come bad fo me? How come you guys wen tell da Egypt guy dat you get one nodda brudda?â
43.7: Dey tell um, âDa guy, he was aksing plenny question bout us guys an bout our ohana. He wen tell, âYoa fadda, he still alive, o wat? You guys get odda brudda guy?â Us guys, we wen tell um wateva he wen aks. Eh! you tink us guys know dat bumbye da guy goin tell us, âYou gotta bring yoa odda brudda ova hea!â?â
43.8: Den Judah tell his fadda Israel, âKay den. Send da boy Benjamin wit me. Den we can go, so we goin stay alive an no mahke -- us guys, an you, an our kids.
43.9: Me, I da guy dat goin be responsible fo him. I goin take da blame if someting happen. If I no bring um back by you an show you dat he stay okay, den I goin be shame in front you till I mahke, cuz I goin know dass one bad ting I wen do to you.
43.10: Cuz you know, if us no had wait so long time bout dis, us wen go Egypt side an come back hea two times awready.â
43.11: Den dea fadda Israel tell um, âKay den. If az how gotta be, den az how goin be. So do dis: go get da bestes kine stuffs dat come from dis land. Take um wit you inside yoa bags, fo make present fo da main man -- litto bit sap from da kine bush dass good fo medicine, an litto bit honey, an da kine sap you get outa da tragacanth root, an sap dat smell nice from da ladanum bush, an pistachio nut, an almond nut.
43.12: Take two times da money you guys going need. Plus, dat money dat dey wen give back inside yoa bags, take all dat back to da guy. Might be somebody wen make mistake lidat.
43.13: An yoa brudda guy, take him too. Go back by da Egypt guy.
43.14: Da God Dat Get All Da Powa, I like he make dat Egypt guy tink good bout you guys an give you guys chance, an let yoa odda brudda go wit you guys, an Benjamin too. Me, if I gotta lose my boy, den I gotta lose um, an dass it!â
43.15: Den da guys wen take da present, an two times da money, an Benjamin. Dey wen go Egypt side, an dey go stand in front Joseph.
43.16: Joseph, he see Benjamin dea wit dem. He tell da guy dat take care his house kine stuff fo him, âEh! Take dese guys ova dea my house. Kill one a da cows, an cook um nice. Noon time, I like dese guys eat wit me.â
43.17: Da guy do jalike Joseph wen tell um. He take da brudda guys Joseph hous
43.18: Da brudda guys, dey come scared cuz da guy take um Joseph house. Dey tinking, âEh! How come dey taking us ova dea? Cuz a dat money dat somebody wen put back inside our bags da firs time us come hea, az why! Fo shua, dey goin jump us guys ova dea, an bus us up, an make us dea prisonas, fo make us come dea slaves, us guys an our donkeys too.â
43.19: Befo da brudda guys go inside da gate, dey go nea da guy dat take care Joseph house kine stuff fo him, an dey talk wit him.
43.20: Dey tell um, âEh, mista, can tell you one someting? Befo time, us guys wen come hea fo buy food.
43.21: But afta us guys go way from hea, da place we wen stay dat nite, we open up oua bags, an you know wat? Ery guy, all da money he wen pay, stay dea inside da guy's bag! Now, we bringing back dat money.
43.22: Plus, we wen bring da odda money dat we suppose to pay fo da food dis time. Us donno who wen put dat money inside our bags.â
43.23: Da guy dat work fo Joseph, he tell um, âEh! No worry, eryting okay! No scared! Gotta be yoa God, yoa fadda guy's God, dat wen put money inside yoa bags. Cuz da money you guys wen pay dat time, all dat wen come to me, you know.â
43.24: He take um all inside Joseph house, an he give um watta fo wash dea feet, an he give um stuff fo da donkeys eat.
43.25: Dem, dey make ready da present fo Joseph wen he come home noon time, cuz dey wen hear dat dey suppose to eat lunch his hous
43.26: Den Joseph come home. Dey bring inside da house da present dey get fo him. Den dey go down in front him on top da groun fo show respeck.
43.27: Joseph aks um if dey stay okay. He tell um, âYou guys fadda, da ol guy you wen tell me bout, he okay? He still stay alive, o wat?â
43.28: Dey tell um, âHe stay okay, our fadda guy, cuz get you fo boss. He still stay alive.â An dey wen go down on top da groun one mo time fo show um respec
43.29: Den Joseph look aroun, an he see his brudda Benjamin, da one dat get da same mudda jalike him. He aks da odda brudda guys, âDis guy hea, dis you guys younga brudda? Da one you guys wen tell me bout him?â He tell Benjamin, âMy boy, I like God do plenny good tings fo you!â
43.30: Afta he say dat, Joseph get outa dea quick. He feel real funny kine inside, cuz he get so much aloha fo his brudda dat he look fo one place wea he can cry. So he go inside one nodda room an cry dea.
43.31: Den Joseph wash face an go back by da brudda guys, an now he cool an can handle. He tell da worka guys, âBring da food awready.â
43.32: Dey give Joseph his food one place, an da brudda guys one nodda place, an da Egypt guys dat was eating wit Joseph one nodda place. Cuz da Egypt guys no can eat togedda wit da Hebrew guys, dass kapu an jalike pilau fo da Egypt guys.
43.33: Da brudda guys, wen dey show um dea place fo sit down, dey put da oldes brudda in da spesho place, an den da nex brudda, an da nex, till da younges brudda. Wen da bruddas see dat, dea jaws wen drop. Ery one a dem tell da guy nex to him, âEh! Wassup?â
43.34: Joseph tell da worka guys for take da brudda guys dea share food from his own table. But fo Benjamin, he tell um fo take plenny extra food fo him, five times mo den fo da odda brudda guys. An dey all drink togedda wit Joseph, till dey all drun

44.1: Wen da bruddas ready fo go home, Joseph tell da guy dat take care his house, âGo fill da guys bags wit food, all dat can go inside da bag. Fo ery guy bag, put da money back inside too dat dey wen pay.
44.2: An you know da spesho silva cup fo wine dass mines? Go put um inside da younga brudda bag, same time you put da money fo da food inside his bag too.â Da worka guy go do jalike Joseph tell u
44.3: Early morning time, wen get light, Joseph's guys wen help da brudda guys put da bags on top da donkeys an go.
44.4: Afta da brudda guys go litto bit outside da town, Joseph tell da guy dat take care his house, âNow! Go afta dem guys! Chase um, an stop um, an wen you catch um up, tell um dis: âEh! My boss wen make good to you guys, but you guys, you do bad ting fo pay um back!
44.5: I talking bout da special cup fo wine dat my boss use fo drink. An fo shua, he can use um fo find out from da gods wat goin happen. No good, da ting you guys stay do!â-â
44.6: Joseph guy wen go catch up da brudda guys. He tell um wat he suppose to tell.
44.7: Dey tell him, âNo way, boss! How come you talking lidat? Us guys, jalike we yoa slave guys. Us not da kine peopo dat do da kine stuff you talking bout.
44.8: Look! Us guys wen bring back da extra money from da Canaan land. We wen find um inside oua bags firs time. How you figga we goin steal silva o gold from inside yoa boss house now?
44.9: Go check out all us guys bags hea, cuz we jalike yoa slave guys. If you find da spesho cup inside anybody's stuffs, you can kill da guy, an all us odda guys, we goin come yoa slave guys.â
44.10: Joseph's guy tell um, âKay den, jalike you guys say. If I find da cup wit one a you guys, dat guy goin come one slave fo me. But I no goin poin finga you odda guys.â
44.11: So dey go take down da bags from on top da donkeys real quick an put um on top da groun, an ery guy open his own bag.
44.12: Joseph guy wen check out all da bags. He start from da oldes brudda firs, an den da next. Da las one he wen check out, was dea younga brudda Benjamin. An he find da spesho silva cup right dea inside da bag!
44.13: Da brudda guys, bodda dem plenny dat dey wen rip dea own clotheses. Dey put da bags back on top dea donkeys an go back inside da tow
44.14: Joseph, he still dea inside his house. Judah an da odda brudda guys, dey go inside, an right away dey go down on top da groun in front Joseph fo show um respeck.
44.15: Joseph tell um, âWot! Wass dis ting you guys wen go do? You guys donno dat me, I da kine guy dat know how fo find out from da gods wat happening!â
44.16: Judah talk: âEh boss! Wat we can say to you? No mo notting us can say, fo shua! How we goin make proof to you dat we neva do notting bad? No can! God, he wen find out da bad ting us guys wen go do awready. So, wat? Us guys wen come back fo be yoa slaves now, an you da boss fo all us guys, even da guy dey wen find wit da spesho cup!â
44.17: Joseph tell um: âNo! I not da kine guy fo make all you guys come slaves! Ony da guy dat dey wen find wit da spesho cup, dat guy goin come one slave fo me! You guys can go back by yoa fadda guy, an no need worry, eryting goin be okay.â
44.18: Den Judah, he go nea Joseph an tell um, âEh, you my boss, an I yoa slave guy! So please, if I say someting you no like, I da one dass wrong. Try let me say someting. No come huhu wit me, cuz you an Pharaoh, you get da same kine powa!
44.19: Eh boss, befo time, you wen aks us dat stay yoa slave guys, âYou guys, you get fadda? you get brudda?â
44.20: Us guys wen tell you, âYeah, we get fadda, he alive, an he old. An us get one mo younga brudda guy, dat wen born wen our fadda guy old awready. One nodda brudda, his real brudda mahke awready, so him da ony one dat stay from his mudda. Dass how come his fadda get plenny love an aloha fo him.â
44.21: Befo time, you wen tell us guys dat work fo you, âBring yoa younga brudda guy hea by me Egypt side, so I can see him.â
44.22: You da boss fo us, but us guys wen tell you dat time, âDa young guy no can leave his fadda. Cuz if he go leave him, da fadda guy goin mahke.â
44.23: But you wen tell us guys dat yoa slave guys, âIf yoa younga brudda guy no come hea wit you guys, you guys no goin see me again!â
44.24: So us guys wen go back by oua fadda, dass yoa slave guy too. We wen tell him wat you wen say, cuz you da boss fo us guys to
44.25: âDen lata, our fadda guy wen tell us, âGo back again. Buy litto bit mo food fo all us guys.â
44.26: We tell um, âNo way us guys can go back dea. Ony if oua younga brudda guy stay come wit us, den we can go dea. Ony one way we goin see da main Egypt guy - if oua younga brudda stay come wit us!â
44.27: âDen oua fadda, dass yoa slave guy, he tell us, âYou guys know dat my wife wen born two boys fo me.
44.28: One a dem no stay no moa wit me, maybe da wild animals wen rip um up. Long time now I neva see um.
44.29: An now, you guys like take away dis odda boy from me too?! Fo shua, if someting bad happen to him an he mahke too, dat goin be real bad, an you guys goin make me come so plenny sore inside, dat I goin go wit all my grey hair to da place wea da mahke peopo stay.â
44.30: âSo, I no can go home to my fadda dass yoa slave guy, an da boy no stay wit us. My fadda an da boy, dey stay so tight wit each odda dat my fadda goin stay alive ony if da boy stay alive too.
44.31: If he see dat da boy not wit us, he goin mahke, an us guys dat yoa slave guys goin be da guys dat goin make oua fadda so plenny trouble an come sore inside lidat, an he goin go wit all his grey hair to da Mahke Peopo Place.
44.32: Me, I yoa slave guy, but I wen make promise to my fadda, dat I myself da guy goin take care fo bring back da boy. I wen tell um, âIf I no bring him back to you, den I goin get shame foeva from do bad ting.â
44.33: So now I like aks you: please, let me stay hea an be da slave fo you an you da boss, but not da boy. Let him go back wit his odda bruddas.
44.34: No way I can go back by my fadda guy, if da boy no stay wit me! Eh, no make me see da bad ting dat goin happen to my fadda den!â

45.1: Had plenny Egypt peopo standing nea Joseph. But now moa, he no can wait no mo fo tell his brudda guys who him. So he yell in da Egypt language, âErybody, get outa hea! I like stay hea wit dem ones!â Dass how lata, Joseph wen let his brudda guys know who him, an da Egypt guys not dea.
45.2: Den Joseph was crying so loud, dat da Egypt guys wen hear, an even inside da palace wea da Pharaoh guy stay, dey find out to
45.3: Joseph tell his brudda guys, âDis me! I Joseph! My fadda, he stay alive still yet, o wat?â But his brudda guys, dey no can talk, cuz dey so scared dey litto mo mahke, dea in front hi
45.4: Den Joseph tell his brudda guys, âCome ova hea by me.â So dey go nea by him, an he tell dem, âMe, I yoa brudda guy Joseph. I da one you guys wen sell an make me go Egypt side.
45.5: But now, no worry! No come all huhu wit yoaself cuz you wen sell me an make me come hea. You guys neva do um. God wen do um. God wen send me ova hea befo you guys wen come hea, fo keep you guys alive!
45.6: Cuz get two year awready, dat no mo food inside dis land. An still yet goin get five mo year, wen nobody goin plow da groun o cut da wheat.
45.7: Az how come God wen send me hea befo you guys wen come, fo make shua you guys an yoa kids goin be da ones dat goin stay alive hea inside da world. God wen like do something awesome so you guys goin come out okay an no goin mahke.
45.8: So, neva was you guys dat wen send me ova hea. Was God! He wen make me jalike I one fadda guy fo da king, dass da Pharaoh guy. I da boss fo all his ohana peopo, an I stay in charge a da whole Egypt lan
45.9: âAn now, hurry up! Go back by my fadda. Tell um dat his boy Joseph say dis: âGod wen make me da boss fo da whole Egypt land. So come by me, no wait!
45.10: You goin make house Goshen side, so you goin stay nea me -- you, an yoa kids an yoa grankids, an yoa sheeps an yoa cows, an eryting you get.
45.11: I goin make shua all you guys get nuff food ova dea wen you come, cuz goin be five mo year dat no goin get food notting. I goin make shua dat you an all yoa ohana peopo an eryting you get, no need pay all da money you get fo food.â
45.12: Look! You guys can see wit yoa own eyes, an my brudda Benjamin can see wit his own eyes too, dat dis me fo real kine, dat stay talking to you guys.
45.13: You guys gotta tell my fadda eryting -- all da plenny respeck I get ova hea Egypt side, an eryting you guys wen see. Den go bring my fadda back hea real quick!â
45.14: Den Joseph wen cry cuz he was so happy, an he wen go hug his brudda Benjamin, an same time Benjamin wen hug Joseph an cry too.
45.15: Den Joseph go kiss all his brudda guys an cry wen he hug um. An afta dat, Joseph an his brudda guys wen talk story togedda plenn
45.16: Ova dea wea Pharaoh get his palace, dey wen hear bout Joseph an his bruddas. Dey tell, âJoseph, he get bruddas guys, an dey stay come hea awready.â
45.17: Da Pharaoh guy, dass da king, he tell Joseph, âTell yoa brudda guys dis: âDis wat you guys gotta do. Put yoa stuffs on top yoa donkeys. Go Canaan side right away.
45.18: Go bring yoa fadda guy, an all yoa ohana peopo, an come back by me. I goin give dem da bestes place inside Egypt land. You guys goin eat da bestes stuffs dat grow inside dis land.â-â
45.19: An Pharaoh tell Joseph fo tell da brudda guys dis too: âTake wagons from Egypt fo erybody dat no can walk good, yoa kids an yoa wifes. Go bring yoa fadda guys hea.
45.20: No worry bout yoa house kine stuffs, cuz da bestes stuff inside da whole Egypt land goin be fo you guys!â
45.21: Israel boys, dey do wat Joseph wen tell um. Joseph give um plenny wagons jalike da Pharaoh guy wen tell um, an he give um plenny food fo da trip.
45.22: Fo ery guy, Joseph give um fancy clotheses wit nice robe. But fo Benjamin, Joseph give him three hundred piece silva, an five fancy clotheses wit nice robe.
45.23: Fo his fadda, Joseph wen send plenny stuffs: ten boy kine donkeys dat carry da bestes kine stuffs Egypt get, an ten girl kine donkeys dat carry clean wheat, an bread, an plenny food, so his fadda can eat wen he coming.
45.24: Wen Joseph tell his brudda guys goodbye fo go home, he tell um, âWen you going, no make ugly wit each odda.â
45.25: Da brudda guys go outa Egypt, an go back by dea fadda Jacob, Canaan side.
45.26: Dey tell Jacob, âYou know wat? Joseph, he alive still yet! He da boss guy fo da whole Egypt land!â
45.27: But den, afta dey tell bout eryting Joseph wen tell um, an afta Jacob see da wagons dat Joseph wen send fo carry him Egypt side, den dea fadda Jacob come jalike he new an alive inside.
45.28: Israel talk (dass Jacob, you know): âNuff awready! My boy Joseph, he alive still yet! I goin go see him, befo I mahke!â

46.1: So Israel (dass Jacob, you know), wit all his peopo an all his animals an all his stuffs, move house Egypt side. Wen he come Beer-Sheba (dat mean, Seven Puka Fo Watta), he kill some animals fo make sacrifice fo show love an respeck fo God, da same God dat Isaac, dat was Israel fadda, wen pray to befo time.
46.2: Nite time, Jacob was still up, an he wen see someting jalike one dream, dat God was talking to him. God tell, âHui Jacob! Jacob!â
46.3: God tell um, âDis me, God, da same God yoa fadda wen pray to befo time. No scared go Egypt side. Wen you stay dea, I goin make da peopo dat goin come from you, come real rich an importan kine peopo.
46.4: I going wit you Egypt side. An I goin bring you back hea too fo shua. Wen you mahke, Joseph da one goin stay wit you an take care yoa body wen you pau.â
46.5: Den Israel go way from Beer-Sheba, Da Place Wit Da Seven Puka Fo Watta. Israel boys put dea fadda guy an all dea kids an dea wifes, inside da wagons dat Pharaoh wen send fo help um move house.
46.6: Dey take wit dem all dea sheeps an dea cows an all da rich stuffs dey get inside da Canaan land. Dass how wen happen wen Jacob an all da peopo dat come from him go Egypt side.
46.7: His boys an dea kids, an his girls an dea kids -- all da peopo dat come from Jacob, he take um all Egypt side wit hi
46.8: Now, all da Israel ohana peopo from dat time, dass Jacob an da peopo dat wen come from him dat wen go Egypt side wit him, dis dea name
46.9: Reuben, his boys, dey Enoch, an Palu, an Hezron, an Karmi.
46.10: Simeon, his boys, dey Jemuel, an Jamin, an Ohad, an Jachin, an Zohar, an Saul (his mudda one wahine from Canaan).
46.11: Levi, his boys, Gershon, an Kohath, an Merari.

46.13: Issachar, his boys, dey Tola, an Puvah, an Iob, an Shimron.
46.14: Zebulun, his boys, dey Sered, an Elon, an Jahleel.

46.19: Da boys dat Jacob wife Rachel wen born, dey Joseph an Benjamin.

46.24: Naftali, his boys, Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer, an Shillem.

46.27: Inside Egypt, get Joseph two boys dat wen born dea. So az 70 peopo da Jacob ohana peopo get, Egypt sid
46.28: Judah was da one Israel wen send befo dem fo meet Joseph, so Joseph can show dem how fo go Goshen. Dass how da peopo wen go Goshen side.
46.29: Joseph tell his guys fo tie da horses to his fancy horse wagon. Den he go Goshen fo meet his fadda Israel. Joseph look Israel, an hug um plenny, an cry long time.
46.30: Israel tell Joseph, âNow, okay fo me mahke, cuz I see yoa face wit my own eyes awready, an you alive still yet.â
46.31: Den Joseph tell his brudda guys an all his fadda ohana peopo, âKay den. I going by da Pharaoh guy, dass da king, an tell um wat wen happen hea. I goin tell, âMy brudda guys, an all my fadda ohana peopo, dey was inside da Canaan land, an now dey all come hea by me.
46.32: Dese guys, dey take care small animals. From long time, dey breed cows. Dey wen bring wit dem all dea small animals an cows, an all dea stuffs.â
46.33: Now, I like tell you guys dis: da Pharaoh guy, da king, he goin tell you guys come by him, an he goin aks you guys, âWat you guys do?â
46.34: Den you guys goin tell um dis: âYou da boss an us guys yoa slaves. From small kid time till now, us guys breed cows, same ting jalike our ancesta guys.â I telling you guys wat fo say, so dat he let you guys stay Goshen side. Da Egypt peopo, dey tink all da sheep farma guys pilau, az why.â

47.1: Den Joseph go by Pharaoh an tell um, âMy fadda an my brudda guys, wit dea small animals an big animals an eryting dey get, dey stay come hea awready from da Canaan land. Now, dey stay Goshen side.â
47.2: Joseph take five bruddas from all his brudda guys an take um fo meet da Pharaoh gu
47.3: Pharaoh aks Joseph brudda guys, âWat you guys do?â
47.4: Us guys come dis side fo live, cuz ova dea Canaan side, da grass dry up, an no mo fo da animals eat. Us yoa slave guys now, so please, let us guys stay Goshen side.â
47.5: Pharaoh tell Joseph, âAz good, yoa fadda an yoa brudda guys wen come by you awready.
47.6: All da Egypt land stay in front you, Joseph. Go put yoa fadda an yoa brudda guys inside da bestes part. Okay fo dem stay Goshen side. An I like some a dem dat really know how fo take care da animals, fo take care my animals too.â
47.7: Den, Joseph bring his fadda Jacob fo meet da Pharaoh guy. Jacob tell Pharaoh, âI like God do good tings fo you!â
47.8: Pharaoh wen aks Jacob, âHow old you stay now?â
47.9: Jacob tell Pharaoh, âHundred thirty years, I stay inside dis world. Not plenny, da years I get, an all come fo notting. But my fadda an granfadda guys, dey wen get plenny mo years den me, wen dey stay hea inside dis world.â
47.10: Den Jacob tell Pharaoh, âKay den, sir, I going now. I like God do good tings fo you!â An he wen go out from da place wea da Pharaoh guy sta
47.11: Joseph wen do jalike da Pharaoh guy wen tell um fo do. He give his fadda an his brudda guys land inside da bestes part a Egypt, nea to da place dey call Rameses town.
47.12: Joseph even take care his fadda an his brudda guys, an all da ohana peopo dat come from his fadda. He give um food ova an ova so dey no mahk
47.13: All ova da land, no mo food, dat time. Was hard, cuz no mo notting can grow. Inside Egypt land, an inside Canaan land, same ting, no mo food an ery year mo worse, az why hard.
47.14: All da money dat get inside Egypt land an inside Canaan land, come to Joseph cuz da peopo pay him fo da food dat he sell. Joseph take all da money inside da Pharaoh guy's palace.
47.15: An lata, all da money pau awready inside da Egypt land an da Canaan land. All da Egypt peopo go by Joseph an tell um, âEh! Please, give us mo food! No need us guys mahke right hea in front you, jus cuz us no mo money.â
47.16: Joseph tell um, âKay den. If no mo money, bring yoa animals ova hea, an you guys goin pay me wit da animals, an I goin sell you guys food.â
47.17: So da peopo bring dea animals by Joseph, an he give um food an dey give him dea horses an sheeps an cows an donkeys. Dat year, he wen take all dea animals an he help um out wit foo
47.18: Da nex year, da peopo come by Joseph one mo time. Dey tell um, âEh, boss, no way us guys goin bulai you. You know awready, dat all us no mo money an you get all da animals. Da ony ting us guys can do now, boss, is fo make deal fo come yoa slaves, an let you take ova da land we get fo farm.
47.19: No good us guys mahke in front you, an our land come poho. So, buy us guys an our land, an pay us wit food fo eat! Den, us come slave guys fo da Pharaoh guy, an our land come his land. Jus give us guys seeds fo plant! Den we can stay alive an no mahke, an da land no come poho!â
47.20: Dass how Joseph take ova all da farms inside da Egypt land fo da Pharaoh guy. All da Egypt peopo wen go sell dea field. Cuz dea food pau, an was hard fo dem. Az how Pharaoh come da owna fo all da land.
47.21: From one side Egypt to da odda side, Joseph make da whole Egypt peopo move house to da big towns.
47.22: Ony da pries guys fo da Egypt gods, Joseph neva take ova dea land, cuz from long time Pharaoh give da pries guys dea food. Dey eat da stuffs da Pharaoh guy give um. Dass how come dey no need sell dea lan
47.23: Den Joseph tell all da peopo, âSo, now I wen buy all you guys fo Pharaoh, an all you guys farms too. I goin give you guys seeds now, fo you guys plant um inside da groun.
47.24: Den, erytime you guys cut da food, you gotta pay twenny percent fo Pharaoh. Da odda eighty percent, dass fo you guys. Use um fo seeds fo da fields, an fo food fo you guys, an yoa ohana peopo, an yoa kids!â
47.25: Da peopo tell Joseph, âDa tings you wen do fo us guys, az how come us guys alive still yet! We like you stay make good to us guys! So, we slaves now, fo da Pharaoh guy, but we stay alive!â
47.26: Den Joseph wen make one rule fo da land inside Egypt, an da Egypt peopo use dat rule still yet: Da Pharaoh guy get twenny percent. Ony da pries guys fo da Egypt gods, Pharaoh neva take dea lan
47.27: Dass da story, how Israel (dass Jacob) wen move house Egypt side. He wen make house Goshen side, an his ohana wen get da right fo stay dea too. Da peopo wen get plenny kids, az how dey come plenny peop
47.28: Jacob wen live Egypt side seventeen year. He wen mahke wen he was 147 year old.
47.29: Wen was time fo Israel mahke, he wen send somebody fo tell his boy Joseph, âCome!â He tell Joseph, âPlease, I like you do one ting fo me. Put yoa hand unda my thigh fo show you stay stick wit me an I can trus you fo do wat I say. Den make promise to me dat fo shua you goin do one ting fo me: please, no bury me ova hea Egypt side.
47.30: I goin go sleep wea my mahke ancesta guys stay. You gotta take my body outa Egypt, an bury me inside da same place wea my ancesta guys stay.â
47.31: Jacob tell Joseph, âSwear to God dat you goin do dat fo me.â

48.1: Afta all dat wen happen, somebody been tell Joseph, âEh! Yoa fadda stay sick, you know.â Joseph go by Jacob, an he take his two boys, Manasseh an Efraim wit hi
48.2: Somebody tell Jacob, âYoa boy Joseph stay hea. He like see you.â Israel (dass Jacob), he stay weak, but he make all da strong he can, so he can sit up on top da be
48.3: Jacob tell Joseph, âYou know, Da God Dat Get All Da Powa wen let me see him, Luz side, inside da Canaan land. He da one give me da powa fo come out okay.
48.4: God wen tell me, âDis me! I goin make you so you can get plenny kids an come plenny peopo bumbye. I goin make plenny differen peopos come from you. Da peopo dat goin come from you afta you mahke, I goin give dem dis land, fo be dea land foeva.â
48.5: âSo, yoa two boys, da ones dat wen born fo you hea inside da Egypt land befo I stay come by you dis side, I goin hanai dem. Dey goin be jalike Reuben an Simeon my boys, same ting, Efraim an Manasseh goin be mine from now on.
48.6: If you get mo kids afta dat, dey goin carry yoa name. But yoa younga kids goin get Efraim an Manasseh stuffs afta dey mahke, cuz dem two bruddas, dey goin carry my name.
48.7: Dat time I was coming back from Padan, yoa mudda Rachel wen mahke, inside da Canaan land nea Efrat. I wen come sore inside, an I wen bury her ova dea on da side by da Efrat road.â (Efrat, dass da ol name fo Betlehem, you know
48.8-10: Den Israel look an see da two boys. (Israel no can see good, cuz he real old.) He aks Joseph, âEh! Who dem? Az yoa boys?â
48.11: Den Israel tell Joseph, âBefo time I figga, I no goin see you again. But look! Now God let me see you, an even yoa kids too!â
48.12: Den Joseph take da boys from wea dey sitting nex to dea granfadda, an Joseph wen go down on top da groun in front his fadda fo show um respeck.
48.13: Den Joseph take Efraim wit his right hand an put um nea Jacob lef hand. Same time he take Manasseh with his lef hand an put um nea Jacob right hand.
48.14: But Israel, he wen cross his hands. He put his right hand on top Efraim head, no matta he da numba two boy. Den Israel wen put his left hand on top Manasseh head, no matta he da numba one boy an suppose to get da spesho right hand kine blessing.
48.15: Den Israel wen aks God fo take care Joseph, lidi
48.17: Wen bodda Joseph, cuz he see dat his fadda wen put da right hand on top Efraim head. So he take his fadda right hand fo change um from Efraim head to Manasseh head, cuz Manasseh da olda boy.
48.18: Joseph tell his fadda, âNot lidat, Pa! Da odda one, he da numba one boy. You gotta put yoa right hand on top his head.â
48.19: But Joseph fadda guy no like lissen. He tell, âEh my boy, I know, I know. Da older one, he goin come one peopo too, an he goin come importan. Still yet, da younga brudda, he goin come mo importan den da odda one. Da peopo dat goin come from him, goin get mo plenny, dey goin be plenny diffren peopos.â
48.20: Dass how Israel wen aks God fo do good tings fo his grankids, dat time. He tell, âBumbye, wen da Israel peopo aks God fo do good tings fo dea kids, dey goin tink bout you, Joseph. Dey goin tell dea kids, âI like God make you come jalike Efraim an Manasseh!â-â Dass how Israel wen make fo Efraim like he mo importan den his older brudda Manasse
48.21: Den Israel tell Joseph, âI goin mahke pretty quick now. But God goin stay wit you guys. He goin bring you guys back to da land wea yoa ancesta guys wen live.
48.22: An now, Joseph, I goin give you one ridge land mo den I goin give fo yoa brudda guys. Dass da one I wen take away from da Amor peopo wit my sword an my bow an arrow.â

49.1: Lata, Jacob tell all his boys fo come by him. He say, âCome togedda aroun me. I goin tell you guys wat goin happen to you afta I mahk
49.28: Dass da twelve ohanas dat come from Israel, an dass wat dea fadda guy tell um wen he make da spesho blessing fo dem. Fo ery boy, he wen give um da kine words dat stay right fo hi
49.29: Den Israel tell his boys wat dey gotta do. He say, âPretty soon, I goin mahke an go meet my peopo. Bury me da place wea my ancesta guys stay, ova dea inside da cave inside da piece land dat Efron da Het guy had,
49.30: da one inside da Makpelah field, wea can see Mamre, Canaan land. Dass the land dat Abraham wen buy fo bury his peopo dea, from Efron da Het guy.
49.31: Dass da place dey wen bury Abraham an his wife Sarah. Same ting fo Isaac an his wife Rebecca. Dass da same place I wen bury Leah.
49.32: Az da land wit da cave inside dat our ancesta guy wen buy from da Het peopo.â
49.33: Afta Jacob pau tell his boys wat dey gotta do, he wen pull his feets inside da bed. Den he breave da las time an mahke, an he go meet his peopo from befo tim

50.1: Joseph fall down on top his mahke fadda. He cry plenny fo him, an he kiss um.
50.2: Den Joseph tell da docta guys dat work fo him fo fix up his fadda guy body fo bury. So da docta guys wen do wat Joseph tell um fo do.
50.3: Wen take um forty day, cuz dass how much time need fo make one body ready fo bury, Egypt style. Da Egypt peopo all come sad fo him, seventy da
50.4: Wen pau da time fo show sad, Joseph go by da guys dat work fo da Pharaoh guy, dass da king. He tell um, âEh, you guys my friends. So, please do dis fo me. Go talk to da Pharaoh guy, an tell um dat Joseph say,
50.5: âMy fadda guy, he wen make me make one strong promise. He tell, âI goin mahke, you know. You gotta bury me inside da place I wen make ready fo myself, inside da Canaan land.â So now, I like go ova dea fo bury my fadda guy. Den I come back hea.â-â
50.6: Da Pharaoh guy tell um, âGo. Bury yoa fadda guy, jalike he wen make you make strong promise fo do.â
50.7: So Joseph go Canaan side fo bury his fadda. All da govmen guys dat work fo da Pharaoh, an da importan guys from Pharaoh palace, an all da older leada guys from Egypt, dey go wit him.
50.8: All da peopo dat work fo Joseph, an his brudda guys, an da peopo dat wen work fo his fadda befo time, dey go too. Ony da kids an da real old peopo, an da sheeps an da goats an da cows, dey stay back Goshen land.
50.9: Had army wagons an guys dat ride horse dat go wit him too, az real plenny peopo all togedd
50.10: Wen dey get to one place you can go across da Jordan Riva, da place dey call Goren Ha-Atad, dey cry plenny an real hard fo him. Joseph make funeral seven days fo his mahke fadda.
50.11: Da Canaan peopo dat live dea, dey see da peopo crying ova dea, an dey tell, âDa Egypt peopo, dey stay get one important kine funeral!â Az why dey call dat place Abel-Mizraim, dat mean âEgypt Peopo Funeral Place,â dea language. Stay da odda side da Jordan Riv
50.12: Dass how da Israel boys do wat dea fadda guy wen tell um fo do.
50.13: Da boys carry his body an bury him inside da cave dat stay inside da Makpelah field wea you can see Mamre, Canaan land. Dass da same field dat Abraham wen buy from Efron da Het guy fo bury his peopo dea.
50.14: Afta dey bury Joseph fadda, Joseph an his brudda guys an all da odda peopo dat wen go Canaan side wit him, wen go back Egypt sid
50.15: Now cuz dea fadda mahke, Joseph brudda guys tinking plenny bout wat goin happen wit dem. Dey say, âWat if Joseph still yet stay nuha wit us guys, an he goin pay us back fo all da bad kine stuff we wen do to him!â
50.16: So dey send message to Joseph fo tell um, âBefo yoa fadda wen mahke, he wen tell us
50.17: fo tell you dis: âPlease, I like you let yoa brudda guys go, an no poin finga dem cuz dey wen go agains you, dat time dey wen do bad tings to you.â So now, we aksing you, let us go, cuz we slave guys fo da same God yoa fadda guy wen work fo.â Wen dey tell Joseph dat, he cr
50.18: Lata, afta dey send da message, Joseph brudda guys go by him, an dey go down on top da groun in front him fo show um respeck, an tell um, âUs guys, we yoa slave guys.â
50.19: But Joseph tell um, âNo scared! You tink I God, o wat?!
50.20: You guys wen make plan fo do bad ting to me, but God, he make plan fo do good ting! God da one dat make dis kine ting happen dat get today -- get plenny peopo now dat stay alive an neva mahke.
50.21: So, no scared. I goin take care you guys an yoa kids.â He talk real nice to dem fo give um good kine words an make dem so dey trus hi
50.22: From dat time, Joseph an all his fadda guy ohana peopo stay Egypt side. Joseph, he live 110 year.
50.23: He come old, but he wen see Efraim kids an grandkids. Manasseh too, same ting, wen Manasseh boy Makir get kids, Joseph hanai de
50.24: Lata, Joseph tell his brudda guys, âPretty soon now, I goin mahke. But God, he goin take care you guys. He goin take you guys outa dis land, to da odda land, da one dat he wen make promise fo give to Abraham, an Isaac, an Jacob.â
50.25: Den Joseph wen make da odda Israel boys make strong promise to him. He tell um, âBumbye wen God take care you guys, you guys gotta carry my body wit you outa dis land.â
50.26: Joseph mahke wen he 110 year old. His brudda guys make his body ready fo bury Egypt style, an dey put um inside one coffin, ova dea Egypt lan

1.1: Dis, da names fo da Israel boys dat wen go Egypt side wit dea fadda Jacob an dea ohana
1.5: Joseph, he awready stay Egypt side, da time all da ohanas wen go dea. Had seventy peopo from Jacob ohana dat wen go Egypt wit hi
1.6: Lata, Joseph wen mahke, an all his brudda guys too, all da peopo from dat time.
1.7: But da Israel ohana peopo (az Jacob dem), dey wen get plenny kids an grandkids. Dey wen come choke plenny peopo, an dey fill up da lan
1.8: Long time afta, had one new king dat take ova da Egypt peopo. Dat king, he neva know notting bout Joseph an wat he do.
1.9: Da king tell his peopo, âYou know wat?! Dat Israel ohana peopo, dey coming so plenny, dey awready mo strong den us guys.
1.10: So! Us guys gotta be smart fo figga how fo make shua dey no come mo plenny. Cuz bumbye if get war, no good if dey go help da guys dat fight agains us, an afta dat, dey go outa our land.â
1.11: So da Egypt peopo wen make da Israel peopo dea slave guys. Dey wen give um mean kine luna guys. Dey give um real plenny work, an make dem feel jalike dey notting. Was da Israel peopo dat wen build two towns wit plenny warehouse inside fo da Pharaoh guy (dass how dey call da king guy fo Egypt, you know). Da towns, dey give um da name Pitom an Ramses.
1.12: But no matta da Egypt peopo still give da Israel peopo real hard time erytime, da Israel peopo stay come mo plenny still yet. Erytime da Egypt guys see one Israel guy, bodda dem plenny an scare de
1.13: Dass why da Egypt peopo wen bus up da Israel peopo fo make um do slave kine work, an dey wen make da Israel peopo come sore inside, cuz dey make um work so hard.
1.14: Da Egypt peopo no give da Israel peopo chance notting. Dey make um make plenny mud fo make brick, an dey make um work long day inside da fields. Cuz if dey no do dat, da Egypt peopo bus um u
1.15: Had two Israel wahines, dea name Shifrah and Pu`ah. Dey help da odda Israel wahines wen dey born dea kids. Da king fo Egypt tell um,
1.16: âErytime wen you stay help da Israel wahines born one bebe, an you see um ova dea on top da spesho stone fo born bebe, if get boy kine, kill um! If get girl kine, let um live.â
1.17: But da helpa wahines, dey mo scared fo go agains God. Az why dey neva do wat da king guy tell um. Dey let da boy kine bebes live to
1.18: Lata, da king guy wen tell da helpa wahines fo come by him. He tell um, âWassa matta wit you? How come you guys doing dis ting, hah? Why you stay let da boys live!â
1.19: Da helpa wahines, dey tell da Pharaoh guy, âEh, you know, da Israel wahines, dey not slow like da Egypt wahines. Befo us guys can get dea fo help dem, da bebe born awready!â
1.20: God, he wen do good tings fo da helpa wahines cuz a wat dey wen do. Cuz dey neva kill da boys, da Israel peopo wen come mo plenny, an dey come plenny strong.
1.21: An cuz da helpa wahines mo scared a God den dey scared a da king, God give dem kids fo dea own ohana to
1.22: Den, da Pharaoh guy tell all his peopo, âAll da small boy kine bebes from da Israel peopo, throw um inside da Nile Riva! But da girl kine, let um live.â

2.1: Dat time, had one guy from da Levi ohana dat wen go marry one wahine from da Levi ohana.
2.2: Da wahine, she come hapai an wen born one boy. She see dat da bebe good looking, so she hide um fo three months.
2.3: But den she no can hide um no moa. She get one basket, made from da tall papyrus plants dat grow inside da riva nex to da land. She put sticky kine black stuff all ova da basket so da watta no can come inside. She put da bebe inside da basket. Den she put um inside da Nile Riva wea get plenny reed plants inside da watta.
2.4: Moses older sista go mo down, fo watch wat goin happen wit da beb
2.5: Da Pharaoh guy daughta wen go da Nile Riva fo bafe. Her an da girls dat work fo her, dey walk nea da riva. Da king daughta, she spock da basket ova dea wea get plenny reed plants inside da watta! She tell one slave girl fo go get um.
2.6: Da king daughta open da basket. She see da bebe inside, an eh! was one bebe boy, an he crying. She know she no like notting hurt da bebe, an she tell, âEh! Gotta be, dis one a da Israel bebes!â
2.7: Da older sista, she go by da Pharaoh guy daughta. She tell, âEh, you like I go find one Israel wahine dat get milk? She can feed da bebe fo you, you know.â
2.8: Da Pharaoh guy daughta tell her, âGo!â So da girl run home an tell da bebe own mudda fo g
2.9: Da Pharaoh guy daughta, she tell da mudda, âEh! You, take dis bebe yoa house. Give um yoa milk fo me. I pay you.â So da mudda wen take her own bebe her place, an feed u
2.10: Lata, da kid come big. Da mudda take um back by da Pharaoh guy daughta. Da Pharaoh guy daughta hanai da kid, so he come her boy. She give um da name Moses, cuz she tell, âI wen pull um outa da watta,â cuz in da Hebrew language, âMosesâ sound kinda like âpull um out.â
2.11: One time afta Moses come one big man Egypt side, he go visit his ohana peopo, da Israel peopo. He see how hard da Egypt peopo make um work. Wen Moses stay dea, he spock one Egypt guy bussing up one a da Israel slave guys from Moses own peopo.
2.12: Moses, he turn an look aroun, an he see dat no mo nobody dea. So he wack da Egypt guy an kill um, an hide da body inside da san
2.13: Da nex day, Moses go see his ohana peopo again. He spock two Israel guys, dey making argue. Moses tell da guy dat making da trouble, âEh! How come you bussing um up, hah? Az yoa same ohana kine guy!â
2.14: Da guy tell Moses, âEh! Who you tink you?! Who wen make you da leada o da judge, fo tell us guys wat fo do?! Now you goin kill me, same ting jalike you wen kill dat Egypt guy, hah?â
2.15: An fo shua, wen da Pharaoh guy find out, he tell da police fo go kill Moses. Moses, he run away from da Pharaoh guy, all da way Midian sid
2.16: Had one guy dat was pries fo da Midian peopo. He get seven daughtas. Ery day, da daughtas go by da puka wea da watta come out. Dey pull up watta outa da puka an fill up da trough fo give watta to dea fadda guy sheeps an goats.
2.17: Get odda sheep farma guys ova dea dat erytime go da same place an make da girls go way an no give dea sheeps watta. But dat time, Moses stand up an help da girls pull up da watta. He give watta to da sheeps an goat
2.18: Da girls, dey go back by dea fadda guy, his name Reuel. He tell, âEh! Quick, you guys come back today! How come?â
2.19: Dey tell um, âHad one Egypt guy wen get us guys outa trouble from da sheep farma guys. Den, he pull up watta fo us guys an give um to da sheeps an goats fo drink.â
2.20: Da pries guy tell his daughtas, âSo! Wea da guy now? How come you jus wen leave um ova dea? Go! Tell um fo come hea fo eat!â

3.1: One time, Moses was taking care da sheeps an goats fo his fadda in law Jetro (dass Reuel). Jetro, he da pries fo da Midian peopo. Moses wen take da sheeps an goats way inside da boonies, Mount Sinai side. (Dass da mountain wea God show up.)

3.7: Yahweh tell Moses dis too: âI see eryting, all da hard time dat da Egypt peopo give my peopo! I hea how dey stay yell fo me fo help um from da luna guys. Yeah, I know how plenny dey suffa.

3.13: Den Moses tell God, âBut, wen I go by da Israel peopo an tell um, âDa same God dat yoa ancesta guys wen pray to, dass da one wen send me by you guys,â dey no goin believe. Den dey goin ask me, âKay den, wass his name?â So, wat I goin tell um?â

3.16: âGo now! Tell all da older leadas fo da Israel peopo fo come togedda. Den tell um dis: âYahweh, da God dat yoa ancesta guys wen pray to, da God fo Abraham an Isaac an Jacob, he wen let me see him. He wen tell me, âI wen watch an see awready wat dey doing to you guys Egypt side.

4.1: Moses tell, âBut eh! Wat if da leada guys no trus me, an no lissen wat I say, cuz dey tinking, âNah! Yahweh, he neva let you see um!â Den wat?â

4.5: Yahweh say, âYou do dis fo help da Israel peopo believe dat me, Yahweh, I wen let you see me, an dat I da same God dat yoa ancesta guys wen pray to, da God fo Abraham an Isaac an Jacob.â

18.1: Now Jetro, he was da pries fo da Midian peopo, an Moses fadda-in-law. He hear eryting dat God was doing fo Moses an fo God's peopo, da Israel peopo, an how Yahweh wen bring da Israel peopo outa Egyp

18.9: Jetro, he feel good inside cuz a all da good kine stuff Yahweh wen do fo da Israel peopo wen he get dem outa trouble wit da Egypt peopo.

19.4: You guys see awready wat I wen do to da Egypt peopo. You guys know dat was me da One dat take you guys outa Egypt, jalike I one eagle bird an I carry you guys away from dea on my wings, an I bring you guys ova hea by me.

19.21: Yahweh tell Moses, âGo down now. Tell da peopo fo watch out. No good dey go broke da kapu rule an come up hea fo look me, Yahweh. Cuz if dey do dat, plenny a dem goin mahke!
