23.12: Ery week you guys work six days. Da numba seven day, you guys gotta stop. Dass so yoa cows an yoa donkeys can res too, an yoa worka guys an da peopo from odda place dat stay wit you guys can res to
23.13: Take care bout eryting I telling you guys. No even talk bout da odda gods. No even say dea name nottin
23.14: Ery year, three times you goin take yoa sacrifices to one spesho place, fo make one spesho religious time fo m
23.17: Three time ery year, all da mens gotta come togedda in front me, Yahweh da Bos
23.18: âWen you make sacrifice fo me, no put blood wit da kine bread dat get yeast inside. An wen you kill one animal fo da spesho religious times, no let da fat part stay till da nex day.
23.19: âWen you guys cut da firs tings dat come up on top you guys land, bring da bestes stuffs by me, Yahweh, yoa Go
23.20: âDis wat I doing: I stay send one angel messenja guy fo go in front a you, fo make shua notting bad happen to you. He goin make shua you goin reach da place I wen make ready fo you.
23.21: Take care wen you wit him, an lissen to wat he tell. No go agains him wit bad feeling. Cuz if you guys go against wat he tell, he no goin take dat, cuz he get his powa from me.
23.22: But if you lissen real good to wat he tell, an do eryting I goin tell you fo do, den I goin go agains da peopo dat go agains you, an I goin go fight da peopo dat goin fight yo
23.23: âCuz my angel guy, he goin go in front an take you da place wea da Amor peopo, da Het peopo, da Periz peopo, da Canaan peopo, da Hiv peopo, an da Jebus peopo live. Wen you get dea, I goin wipe out dose peopos.
23.24: You betta not go down in front dea gods fo pray to dem, an you betta not let dose peopo make you do stuff fo dea gods, da way dey make. You gotta broke um up dea idol gods, an smash da big stones dat dey set up fo dem pray in front.
23.25: You goin work fo me, Yahweh, yoa God. Den I goin make yoa food an yoa watta be good kine. I goin make shua you guys no come sick.
23.26: Da wahines inside yoa land, dey no goin lose dea kids befo dey born o afta. Dey all goin get kids. I goin let you guys live long tim
23.27: âBefore you get to da Canaan land, I goin make da peopo inside dea come scared a me. All da places you goin go, all da peopo no goin know wat fo do, an dey all stay scared. Da peopo dat stay agains you, I goin make um turn aroun an run away.
23.28: I goin make da peopo jalike dey lose fight befo you get dea. Da Hiv peopo an da Canaan peopo an da Het peopo, dey all goin stay outa yoa way.
23.29: But I no goin make um all go way da same year, cuz no good da land stay lidat, an no mo peopo an get plenny wild animals fo hurt you.
23.30: I goin make da peopo go way litto by litto. Dat way, afta you get plenny kids, den you can take ova da lan
23.31: âI goin set you up wit all da land from da Red Sea to da Mediterranean Sea, an from da boonies to da Eufrates Riva. I goin turn ova da peopo dat stay live inside dat land to you, an you goin make um all go way.
23.32: No make deal wit da peopo dea, o no make deal wit dea gods.
23.33: No let dem stay yoa land. Cuz no good bumbye dey make you do how I say you not suppose to do. If you go do stuff fo dea gods, dat goin be jalike one trap fo catch you.â

24.1: Den God tell Moses, âCome up hea on top da mountain, by me, Yahweh. Bring Aaron an his boys Nadab an Abihu. Bring seventy a da older leadas fo da Israel peopo. Wen you guys still long way from da top, start fo go down in front me.
24.2: Den Moses, you da ony guy dat goin come all da way to me, Yahweh. Da leada guys, dey no can go nea dea. Da odda peopo, dey no can even come on top da mountain litto bit wit da leada guys.â
24.3: Moses go by da peopo. He tell um all da tings Yahweh wen tell him, an all da Rules. All da peopo say to him togedda, âEryting Yahweh say we gotta do, we goin do um!â
24.4: Den Moses write down all da tings Yahweh wen tel
24.5: Den he pick some young guys from da Israel peopo, an send um fo go kill some animals an put da bodies on top da altar an burn um up fo make sacrifice. So dey take boy kine cows an make da kine sacrifice dat show dat eryting okay wit dem an Yahweh.
24.6: Moses wen half half da blood from da cows. He put half inside tubs. Da odda half he wen throw on top da side a da altar.
24.7: Den he take wat he wen write down bout da deal dat God make fo dem, an he read um real loud so all da peopo can hear. Da peopo tell, âEryting Yahweh stay say, us guys hear, an we goin do um!â
24.8: Den Moses take da blood from inside da tubs an sprinkle um on top da peopo. He say, âDis blood, fo make real da deal dat Yahweh wen make wit you guys, bout all dese tings dat he tell!â
24.9: So den Moses go up da mountain. Aaron, Nadab, an Abihu, an da seventy older leadas fo da Israel peopo, dey go too.
24.10: Up dea, dey wen see da God fo da Israel peopo! Da place he standing, get someting dat look like one brick floor undaneat, wit da blue kine jewelry stone dey call sapphire, blue an bright jalike da clear sky.
24.11: But no matta da leada guys fo da Israel peopo see God dea, God neva do notting fo hurt dem. Dey even wen eat an drink togedda in front hi
24.12: Den Yahweh tell Moses, âCome up da mountain by me. Wait dea. I goin write da Rules an all da tings dat da peopo gotta do. I goin write um on top flat stone an give um to you, fo teach to da peopo.â
24.13: Moses an his helpa guy Joshua start fo go up God's mountain.
24.14: Befo dey go, Moses tell da leada guys, âYou guys stay hea. Wait fo me an Joshua come back by you guys. Get Aaron an Hur wit you guys fo stay in charge, so anybody dat need fo talk to one judge can go by dem.â
24.15: Wen Moses go up da mountain, had one cloud cova da mountain.
24.16-17: Yahweh wen stay on top Mount Sinai, awesome to da max. Fo six day, da cloud cova da mountain. Da Israel peopo, dey no can see da awesome Yahweh up dea. Da ony ting dey can see is one fire on top a da mountain dat look jalike stay burning eryting. Da numba seven day, Yahweh wen talk to Moses from inside da cloud.
24.18: Den Moses go inside da cloud. He go all da way up to da top a da mountain. He stay dea forty days, day time an nite tim

25.2: âGo tell da Israel peopo fo bring me someting dey like give an bring um to me. You guys take wat dey give.
25.3: Dis da kine presents you guys goin let dem give you: gold, an silva, an bronze.
25.4: Wool string, blue an purple an dark red. Egypt kine linen cloth. Hair from da goats fo make cloth.
25.5: Red leather from sheeps dat gotta dye um. Skins from dolphins. Koa kine wood.
25.6: Olive oil fo da lamps. Stuff dat smell nice fo mix wit da olive oil fo put on top da prieses head fo show God wen pick dem, an fo make da incense smell nice.
25.7: Blue lapis lazuli stones an odda stones fo put togedda fo make jewelry, fo da ves da main pries guy wear, an fo his ches piece in front.
25.8: Den I like da peopo make me one spesho place fo live, so I can stay wit dem.
25.9: I goin show you da plan fo my Tent an fo all da stuff inside da Tent, den you guys goin make um all jalike I stay show yo

25.11: All ova da outside a da box, an all ova da inside, tell um fo put hundred percent pure gold. Den put pure gold molding aroun da top.
25.12: Melt gold metal fo make four rings. Put um on top da four feet, two rings one side an two rings da odda side.

25.14: Put da poles inside da rings on top da two sides a da box, so can carry um.
25.15: Da poles gotta stay inside da rings, no take um out.
25.16: Den put inside da box, da ting I goin give you fo make shua you no foget da Deal I making wit yo
25.17: âMake one cova fo da box outa pure gold, three feet nine inch long an two feet three inch wide. Dass da place I goin hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, fo bring um on da same side wit me.
25.18: Make two statues dat look like awesome angel watcha guys wit wings. Make um outa gold dat you work wit da hammer from da back side. One a dem go on top one side a da cova, an da odda go on top da odda side a da cova.

25.20: Da statues dat look like awesome angel watcha guys wit wings, make dem jalike dey looking at each odda, ova da cova from da two sides. Make da statues wit da wings spread up ova da cova fo hide da cova. Cuz dass da place wea I goin hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, fo bring um on da same side wit me.
25.21: Den take da flat stones I goin give you fo make you rememba da Deal I making wit you guys, an put um inside da Box. Den put da cova on top da Box. Dass da place wea I goin hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, fo bring um on da same side wit me.
25.22: Az da place wea I goin meet wit you guys. I goin talk wit you from da spesho place wea I goin hemo da shame fo da bad tings da peopo do, right dea in da middo a da two statues dat look like da awesome angel watcha guys, dat stand ova da Box Fo Rememba My Deal. From dat place, I goin tell you eryting da Israel peopo gotta d
25.23: âMake one table from koa wood, three feet long, one an a half feet wide, an two feet three inch high.

25.26: Make four gold ring fo da table, an put da rings on top da four cornas wea da four table legs stay.

25.31: âMake one stan fo put da lamps on top, wit gold. Put all da pieces togedda fo make um come one piece pure gold, an use hammer fo shape um. Make da bottom wit da main piece dat go strait up, an da side pieces too, wit cup dat look like da bud a one flowa.

28.30: âInside da ches piece dey use wen dey gotta know how fo do, put da Urim an da Tumim. Erytime Aaron go in front Yahweh, da Urim an da Tumim goin be dea, on top his heart. 29.2: an from flour dat no mo yeast inside, make roun breads, an anodda kine bread dat no mo yeast inside wit olive oil on top, an make cracka dat no mo yeast inside an get olive oil on top. Make um all wit da bestes kine wheat flour.
29.3: Put all da bread kine stuff inside one basket, an bring um in front me, God. Bring da boy kine cow an da two boy kine sheeps dea to
29.4: âDen bring Aaron an his boys ova dea in front da Tent Fo Come Togedda Wit Me, in front da door. Wash dem wit watta.
29.5: Take da spesho religious kine clotheses, an put um on Aaron wit da shirt fo undaneat da robe, den da robe dat go wit da ves, an da ves, an da ches piece. Da fancy kine band dass da bottom part a da ves, tie um aroun Aaron waist.
29.6: Put da pries kine hat on top his head, wit da gold piece dat say he spesho fo me.
29.7: Da spesho olive oil fo show dat Aaron da guy I wen pick, pour um on top his hea
29.8: âDen bring Aaron boys put on dem da pries kine shirts
29.9: an put da hats on top dea head. Den tie da sashes on top Aaron an his boys too. Dey da ohana dat goin get da right fo be da pries guys foev
29.10: Bring da boy kine cow up in front da Tent Wea You Come Togedda Wit Me. Den Aaron an his boys goin put dea hands on top da cow head, fo show dat wen dey kill da cow, dass fo dem.
29.11: Kill da cow in front me, Yahweh, right dea wea you go inside da Tent Wea You Come Togedda Wit Me.
29.12: Take some a da blood from da cow, an put um on top da four tings jalike horns dat stick outa da altar, wit yoa finga. Da res a da blood, pour um aroun da bottom a da altar.
29.13: Take all da fat dat cova da guts, da hard ting dat stick out from da liver, an da two kidneys wit da fat dat go aroun dem, an burn um on top da altar fo make smoke.
29.14: All da odda meat from dat cow, an da skin, an eryting from inside da guts, take um outside da camp. Burn um all up ova dea, cuz dass da sacrifice fo da bad tings da pries guys wen d
29.15: âNex, take one a da boy kine sheeps. An Aaron an his boys goin put dea hands on top da sheep head fo show dat wen dey kill da sheep, dass fo dem.
29.16: Kill da sheep, an sprinkle da blood all aroun da altar.
29.17: Cut up da sheep, an wash da inside parts an da legs. Put um on top da altar, togedda wit da cut up pieces an da head.
29.18: Kay den, burn up da whole sheep on top da altar. Dass da kine sacrifice you burn up wit fire fo me, Yahweh, an da smell goin make me feel good insid
29.19: âNow, take da odda boy kine sheep. Aaron an his boys goin put dea hands on top dat sheep head too fo show dat wen dey kill da sheep, dass fo dem.
29.20: Kill da sheep, an take some a da blood, an put um on da bottom a Aaron an his boys right ear, an on top da thumb a dea right hand, an on top da big toe a dea right feet. Den sprinkle da res a da blood all aroun da altar.
29.21: An take some a da blood on top da altar, an some a da olive oil you wen pour on top Aaron fo show dat God wen pick him. Sprinkle um on top Aaron an da spesho religious kine clotheses he wearing, an on top his boys an dea spesho clotheses. Den Aaron an his boys goin come da pries guys fo me, Yahwe
29.22: âCut da fat pieces from da sheep -- da fat tail, da fat dat cova da inside parts, da ting dat stick out from da liver, an da two kidneys wit da fat aroun dem. Take da right back leg too, cuz dis sheep da one you use fo make dis guys da prieses.
29.23: Den, from da basket full a breads dat no mo yeast inside dat you wen put in front me, Yahweh, take one round bread, an one small wheat bread dat you make wit olive oil, an one cracka. Put dat on top da fat an da meat from da sheep.
29.24: Tell Aaron an his boys fo put out dea hands in front dem. Put all da stuff on top dea hands, so dey can lif um up an move um dis side an dat side all togedda. Dass one lif up kine sacrifice dey goin make in front Yahweh.
29.25: Den take all dat from dea hands, an burn up da whole ting on top da altar. Dass da kine sacrifice you burn up wit fire fo me, Yahweh, an da smell goin make me feel good insid
29.26: âYou, Moses, afta you take da ches meat from da sheep you wen kill fo make Aaron da pries, lif um up in front me, Yahweh, fo one sacrifice fo me. An dass fo you eat.
29.27: Da ches meat dat da prieses lif up in front me, Yahweh, an da hind quarter meat dat dey lif up fo give um to me, jalike da meat dat Aaron an his boys da pries guys wen lif up from dat sheep you wen kill, da time you make Aaron-dem come da prieses. All dat meat you goin make spesho fo me, God.
29.28: Dat kine meat goin be dea food. Da Israel peopo goin give um to Aaron an all da odda pries guys dat goin come from him, foeva. Cuz dat meat, jalike one present fo God. Dass why dis goin be da kine present da Israel peopo goin give to me, from da sacrifices dey goin make fo me cuz I stay make eryting okay fo de
29.29: âDa spesho religious kine clotheses, Aaron goin give um to da nex guy dat goin come from him, fo da time wen dey put da olive oil on top dat guy an make da sacrifices fo come prieses bumbye.
29.30: Wen Aaron mahke an one a his boys come da main pries guy, fo go inside da Tent Wea I Come Togedda Wit You Guys fo do da pries kine stuff inside da Place Dat Stay Spesho Fo Me, dat guy goin wear da spesho clotheses, seven day
29.31: âDa boy kine sheep you wen kill fo make Aaron dem da prieses, take da res a da meat an cook um inside one place dat stay spesho fo me.
29.32: Aaron an his boys goin eat dat sheep meat, an da breads dat stay inside da basket, by da place fo go inside da Tent Wea I Goin Come Togedda Wit You Guys.
29.33: Ony da pries guys, da ones dey wen make da sacrifice fo da time dey make um come prieses, fo hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do, dey da ony ones dat can eat dat meat. Da regula peopo, dey no can eat dat meat, cuz az spesho fo me, God.
29.34: If get some mo meat o bread from da sacrifice fo make um da prieses, dat stay till da nex day, gotta burn all dat. No can eat um, cuz az spesho fo m
29.35: âSo, like I wen tell you fo do fo Aaron an his boys fo make um come prieses, you gotta do dat, seven days.
29.36: Ery day you gotta kill one boy kine cow, fo make da bad tings da peopo wen do come right. Ery day you gotta make sacrifice fo make da altar come okay fo use. Den you gotta pour olive oil on top da altar, fo make um spesho fo me.
29.37: Seven days, you gotta do all dat fo hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff da peopo wen do, an fo make da altar spesho fo me. Afta da seven days, goin be so spesho fo me, dat anyting dat even touch da altar, goin come spesho fo me to
29.38: âFrom now, dis wat you guys goin sacrifice ery day fo me: two bebe sheeps one year ol.
29.39: You goin kill one bebe sheep morning time, an da odda one right afta da sun go down but still get light.
29.40: Morning time, take two poun fancy kine wheat flour wit one quart a da bestest kine olive oil fo burn, an one quart wine fo pour on top da bebe sheep wen you burn um up fo sacrifice.
29.41: Afta da sun go down, wen you kill da odda bebe sheep fo sacrifice, you do da same ting, jalike morning time. Dass da kine sacrifice you burn up wit fire fo me Yahweh, an da smell make me feel good inside.
29.42: Dass da regula sacrifice you goin make ery day foeva, by da place you go inside da Tent Wea I Come Togedda Wit You Guys, in front me, Yahwe
29.43: an I goin meet da Israel peopo dea too. An cuz I da awesome God, dat place goin be real spesho fo me.
29.44: Dat Tent, an da altar, an Aaron an his boys, I goin make dem all spesho fo do da pries kine work fo me.
29.45: I goin make house wit da Israel peopo, an I goin be da God fo dem.
29.46: Dey goin know dat me, Yahweh, I dea God, an dat I da one dat wen get um outa Egypt land so dat I can live wit dem. Dass me, Yahweh, dea God, dass talkin

30.1: âMake one altar outa koa wood fo burn incense on top.
30.2: Make um square, 18 inch by 18 inch, an 3 feet high, wit tings jalike horns coming out from it.
30.3: Put pure gold all ova on top da altar - da top, da sides, da tings jalike horns, eryting. Put gold molding aroun um.
30.4: Make gold rings fo da alta, an put um unda da molding, two on one side an two on da odda side. Da rings, fo hold da poles fo carry da altar.
30.5: Make da poles outa koa wood, an put gold all ova de
30.6: âPut da altar in front da thick curtain dat hide da Box Fo Rememba My Deal, dat one dat get da cova ova da deal dat stay inside. Dat Box, da place wea I come togedda wit you, an da place wea I goin hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, so dey can get um right wit me.
30.7: Aaron gota burn da kine incense dat smell real good, on top da altar. Ery day, morning time, wen he take care da olive oil lamps, he goin do dat,
30.8: an ery day wen da sun go down an Aaron put up da olive oil lamps on top da stand, same ting. Goin be one incense kine sacrifice dat dey make in front me, Yahweh, foeva.
30.9: Gotta be one pries from yoa peopo dat burn da right kine incense on top dat altar. No put on top dat altar any kine incense, o use um fo da kine sacrifice you gotta kill an den you burn um up. No use um fo sacrifice wheat on top. No use um fo pour wine on top fo make sacrifice.
30.10: Ery year, from now to foeva, make one spesho day. Dat day, Aaron goin make da sacrifice fo hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff da peopo do. Den he goin put da blood from dat sacrifice on top da four tings jalike horns dat stick out from da incense altar. Dat blood, make da altar okay fo use fo me. Dat altar goin stay spesho fo me, Yahweh, foeva.â
30.12: âWen you make all da peopo sign up fo find out how much Israel peopo get ery place, ery guy gotta pay me, Yahweh, fo let um go. Den da real bad kine sick no goin hit da peopo wen dey sign up.
30.13: Da guys wen dey go ova to da side wea awready wen count da peopo, dey gotta give one half shekel silva fo me, Yahweh. (Dass da kine shekel da pries guys use, 5 shekel weigh jalike one silva ounce.)
30.14: All da guys dat 20 year ol o moa, dey all gotta sign up, an dey all gotta pay fo give um to me, Yahweh Inside Da Sky.
30.15: Da rich guys no goin pay mo den one half shekel silva, an da guys dat no mo notting, still yet dey gotta pay da whole half shekel wen dey give um to me, cuz dass fo me hemo da shame fo ery one a you guys.
30.16: Take da money dat da Israel peopo pay fo me hemo dea shame, an use um fo da work dat da pries guys do inside da Tent Wea I Come Togedda Wit You Guys. Wen dey pay dat money, da Israel peopo no goin foget dat dey wen pay um in front me, Yahweh, so den I hemo dea shame.â
30.18: âMake one big watta tub outa bronze metal, fo put da watta inside dat da pries guys goin use fo wash. Make one bronze stand fo hold um up. Set um up inside da middo, wit da Tent Wea I Goin Come Togedda Wit You Guys one side, an da big altar da odda side. Put watta inside da tub.
30.19: Aaron an his boys goin wash dea hands an dea feets wit da watta from da tub.
30.20: Erytime dey go inside da Tent, dey gotta wash wit watta, so bumbye dey no mahke. Same ting, erytime dey go nea da big altar fo do dea job, fo burn up da sacrifices dey make wit fire fo me, Yahweh,
30.21: dey gotta wash dea hands an feets, so dey no mahke. Dis goin be da Rule fo Aaron an da pries guys dat goin come from him bumbye foeva.â
30.23: âGo get da bestest kine sap fo make perfume. Weigh da sap da way da pries guys weigh u
30.25: Mix da diffren tings da way da perfume guys make um. Dass fo make da oil dass spesho fo me, fo put on top da prieses an da tings da prieses use, fo show dat I wen pick da prieses an dey spesho fo me, Yahweh.
30.26: Den put da olive oil on t
30.31: âTell da Israel peopo: âDis kine oil, goin be spesho fo me foeva, fo show who da ones I wen pick.
30.32: No can use um fo rub on top one guy's body. No can make odda oil wit da same stuffs inside, o da same measures. Dat kine oil, spesho fo me, an gotta be spesho fo you guys too.
30.33: Anybody go make da same kine oil outa da same kine stuffs, o anybody go put um on top some guy dat not one pries, gotta cut dem off from da Israel peopo an no let um stay wit you guys!â
30.34: Den Yahweh tell Moses: âTake da nice smell spices fo make da incense -- yellow gum resin, da kine sea shell dat smell nice wen you burn um, galbanum sap. Put um togedda wit da pure sap from da frankincense bush. How much you put one kine, az how much you put ery odda kine, same same.
30.35: Make um, same way peopo make perfume. Da incense gotta get salt inside too, an be hundred percent pure, an be spesho fo me.
30.36: Grind up some fo make um come powder, an put some in front da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal, inside da Tent Wea I Come Togedda Wit You Guys. You guys know, dat stuff real spesho fo me.
30.37: Wen you guys make dis kine incense, no make um fo yoa own self, cuz dis kine stay spesho fo me, Yahweh.
30.38: Anybody go make da same kine incense, jus so dey can smell um, gotta cut dem off from da Israel peopo an no let um stay wit you guys!â

31.2: âYou know wat? I stay give you da name fo da guy dat goin work wit you. Dass Bezalel, Uri boy. His granfadda, Hur. He come from da Judah ohana.
31.3: An I wen make my Spirit take ova him, fo make him smart how fo make nice looking tings, an know all da diffren ways fo do um, an know how fo do any kine job he gotta do.
31.4: He know how fo tink bout how da gold an silva an bronze metal goin look, an den make um look good.
31.5: He know how fo cut da jewelry stones an make frame fo dem, an how fo cut da wood fo make ery kine ting. Bezalel, az da guy dat know how fo do all dese kine ting
31.6: An I wen pick Oholiab fo help him, Ahisamak boy. He from da Dan ohana. Get plenny odda peopo dat I wen make dem smart fo make all kine stuffs. I like dey make all da tings I stay tell you fo mak
31.11: An da helpa guys goin make da spesho oil fo put on top da pries guys head fo make um come da prieses, and da incense dat smell nice fo go inside da Spesho Place inside da Tent. Dey goin make um all jalike I wen tell you fo make um.â
31.13: âTell da Israel peopo dis: No matta wat happen bumbye, you guys gotta do wat da Rules fo da Res Day say foeva. Da Res Day, goin show dat me an you guys get deal, an even da peopo dat goin come from you guys. So den you guys no goin foget dat was me Yahweh, dat wen make you guys spesho fo me.
31.14: You guys gotta make da Res Day one spesho day, cuz was me dat wen make dat day spesho fo you guys. Anybody dat no mo respeck fo da Res Day, gotta mahke. Anybody go work dat day, you guys gotta cut um off from da Israel ohana an no let um stay wit you guys.
31.15: Get six days fo work an do eryting you gotta do. But da numba seven day, dass da day fo no work an do notting, ery week. Dat day, spesho fo me, Yahweh. Anybody go work da Res Day, gotta mahke.
31.16: Da Israel peopo gotta do wat da Rules fo da Res Day say, you guys, an da peopo dat goin come from you guys afta. Dass da deal foeva.
31.17: Dis goin be jalike one sign foeva, fo da Deal dat I get wit you Israel peopo. Cuz me, I Yahweh, an I wen work six days fo make da sky an da world, but da numba seven day, I pau my work, an wen res an feel good bout um.â
31.18: Wen Yahweh tell Moses eryting he gotta do, ova dea on top Mount Sinai, he give Moses da two flat stone. Was God dat wen write da Deal his own self on top da stone wit his fing

32.1: Wen da Israel peopo see Moses stay on top Mount Sinai long time, dey tinking, âHow come dis guy Moses no come down from ova dea?!â So dey all come togedda in front Aaron, an tell um, âMake one idol god fo show us guys wea fo go. Cuz dat guy Moses, da one dat wen get us outa da Egypt land, we donno wat happen to him!â
32.2: Aaron tell um, âKay den. Take off da gold earrings dat you guys wifes an boys and daughtas get, an bring um ova hea by me.â
32.3: So all da peopo take off dea gold earrings an take um by Aaron.
32.4: Aaron take da earrings. He melt da gold, an wit one tool, he make one idol god dat look jalike one bebe boy kine co
32.5: Wen Aaron see how dey like dis, he build one altar in front da idol god. He tell erybody, âTomorrow, we make one spesho religious kine ting fo Yahweh!â
32.6: So da nex day, early morning time, da peopo make sacrifices fo da idol god an burn da sacrifices, an dey bring odda kine sacrifices to da idol god fo show dat eryting okay wit him an dem. Den dey sit down an party an drink plenny. Den dey start fo go fool arou
32.7: Den Yahweh tell Moses, âGo back down da mountain quick! Yoa peopo, da one you wen bring outa da Egypt land, dey stay mess up an doing all pilau kine stuff awready.
32.8: I wen tell um da right way fo do, but right away dey stay turn aroun an go da wrong way awready. Dey wen melt gold fo make one idol god dat look jalike one bebe boy kine cow. Dey go down in front da idol god an make sacrifices fo um. Dey telling, âAll you Israel peopo! Dis idol god fo shua, az one a da gods dat wen bring you guys outa da Egypt land!â Az wat dey tell.â
32.9: Yahweh tell Moses: âI know dis peopo. Get plenny hard head.
32.10: So now, Moses, you leave me alone, cuz I no like wat dey stay doing. I goin wipe dem out. Den, I goin make you da ancesta fo one importan peopo.â
32.11: But Moses, he beg Yahweh his God fo no do dat. He say, âYou, you Yahweh. How come you stay huhu wit yoa own peopo? You wen get dem outa da Egypt land, an you wen use plenny powa an make strong fo do dat.
32.12: If you go wipe um out, da Egypt peopo goin say, âDat god fo da Israel peopo, fo shua he wen like make bad to his peopo. Cuz wen he take um outa oua Egypt land, was ony fo go kill um inside da mountains an wipe um out, so den dey no stay inside da world.â
32.13: Tink bout Abraham an Isaac an Israel, da guys dat wen work fo you befo time. You wen make strong promise by yoaself dat you really goin do wat you say you goin do fo dem. You wen tell dem, âI goin make da peopo dat goin come from you come so plenny, dey goin be jalike da zillion stars inside da sky. Da peopo dat goin come from you, I goin give um da whole land dat I was talking about, fo come dea land foeva.â-â
32.14: So Yahweh change his mind bout da bad tings he wen plan fo do to his peopo, da Israel peopo, an he no do u
32.15: Den Moses turn aroun an go down from da mountain. He get da two flat stone in his hands wea God wen write da Deal front side an back side.
32.16: Da flat stones, God da one dat wen make da shape, an he da one dat wen cut da alphabets on top da stone
32.17: Moses come da place wea Joshua stay waiting fo him. Joshua hear da peopo making plenny noise. He tell Moses, âEh! Soun jalike get fight inside da camp!â
32.19: Wen Moses come nea da camp, he see da idol kine god dat look jalike one bebe boy kine cow, wit da peopo dancing in front. Moses come real huhu. He wen throw down da flat stone he stay carry, an broke um up, right dea down by da mountain.
32.20: An den Moses take da idol god dey wen make, dat look jalike one bebe boy kine cow, an he burn um up. Den he pound up da gold an make um jalike powda. He mix um wit watta an make da Israel peopo drink da watta wit da powda insid
32.21: Moses tell Aaron, âSo, wat? Wat dese peopo wen do to you, fo make you do dis real bad ting to dem?â
32.22: Aaron tell, âMoses, you da boss. No get mad bout dis. You know dis peopo, dey like do bad kine stuff.
32.23: Dey tell, âAaron! Make gods fo us guys, dat goin show us wea fo go! Cuz dat guy Moses, da one dat wen bring us guys outa da Egypt land, we donno wat happen to him.â
32.24: So, I tell um, âAnybody get gold kine stuff, take um off!â Dey give um to me, an I throw um inside da fire, an dass how come get dis bebe cow kine ting.â
32.25: Moses see dat da peopo, dey stay run wild, an Aaron da one wen let um, an Moses know dat all da peopo dat stay agains dem stay laugh at um.
32.26: So Moses go stand by da camp gate, an yell, âErybody dat stay stick wit Yahweh, come ova hea by me!â All da Levi ohana guys wen come togedda by Mose
32.27: Moses tell da Levi guys, âDis wat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel ohana, say. Go get yoa swords an tie um on top yoa belt. Den go all ova da camp, one side to da odda side an back, all da way to da camp gates. Go kill da idol god guys, no matta dey yoa brudda guys, an yoa neighba guys, an yoa ohana guys!â
32.28: Da Levi ohana guys do wat Moses tell um fo do. Dat day, bout 3,000 guys wen mahk
32.29: Den Moses tell da Levi ohana guys, âDa ting you guys do today, dat make you guys spesho fo Yahweh from now. Cuz all you guys even wen go agains yoa own boys an yoa own brudda guys. Cuz a wat you wen do today, God goin do good tings fo you.â
32.30: Nex day, Moses tell da peopo, âDa stuff you guys wen do, was plenny bad. Still yet, I going back up dea by Yahweh. Maybe I can do someting so he go let you guys go fo da bad ting you wen do, an hemo yoa shame, an let you guys come back to him.â
32.31: So Moses go back by Yahweh. He tell, âPlease! Dese peopo, dey wen do plenny bad ting, cuz dey wen make one gold idol god fo demself!
32.32: But now, if you like let um go fo da bad ting dey wen do, an hemo dea shame from dat, okay. If you no like let um go, mo betta you wipe my name out too from inside yoa book!â
32.33: But Yahweh tell Moses, âOny da peopo dat wen do bad kine stuff cuz dey stay agains me, dey da ones I goin wipe out dea names from inside my book.
32.34: Now, you go. Take da peopo da place I wen tell you fo go. Goin get one angel messenja guy from me dat goin go in front a you. An wen da time come fo me fo punish peopo, I goin punish da ones dat wen do da bad kine stuff.â
32.35: An, az wat Yahweh wen do. Yahweh make da real bad sick dat hit da peopo, cuz a wat dey wen do wit da idol god dat look jalike one bebe boy kine cow, da one Aaron wen mak

33.1: Den Yahweh tell Moses: âGo way from dis place, you an da peopo dat you wen bring outa da Egypt land. Go up da land wea I wen make strong promise to Abraham, an Isaac, an Jacob: âI goin give dat land to da peopo dat goin come from you guys.â
33.2: I goin send one angel messenja guy fo go in front a you guys. I goin throw out from dat land da Canaan peopo, da Amor peopo, da Het peopo, da Periz peopo, da Hiv peopo, an da Jebus peopo.
33.3: Go dat good land, wea get plenny milk an honey erytime. But me, I no goin go wit you guys, cuz you all hard head, an bumbye I go wipe out all you guys befo you get dea!â
33.4-5: Yahweh tell Moses dis too, âTell da Israel peopo: âYou guys, you one hard head kine peopo! If I go wit you guys even one minute, I goin wipe out all you guys. So, take off all yoa jewelry now. I goin go tink wat I goin do to you guys.â-â So wen da peopo hear dis ting God tell um, dey no can handle, an dey come real sore inside, jalike wen somebody mahke. Nobody like wear jewelry cuz a dat.
33.6: Dass why, from Mount Sinai all da way to dea land, da Israel peopo no wear jewelry nottin
33.7: Moses, he erytime put one small tent outside da camp place, long way from da camp. Dey call um da Tent Fo Meet Wit God. Anybody dat like aks God bout someting, dey go ova dea outside da camp by da Tent Fo Meet Wit God, fo aks um.
33.8: Erytime Moses go out by da tent, all da peopo stand up in front dea own small tent, an dey stay watch Moses till he go inside da tent.
33.9: Wen Moses go inside da tent, da cloud dat go from da groun to da sky come down an stay by da door, all da time Yahweh stay talking wit Moses.
33.10: Erytime da peopo see da cloud dat go from da groun to da sky, standing in front da tent, all da peopo go down on top dea face on top da groun, right wea dey standing in front dea own small tents, fo show God love an respeck.
33.11: Yahweh, he stay talk wit Moses, jalike wen one guy stay talking togedda wit his friend. Afta, Moses go back da camp. But da young helpa guy fo Moses, dat Joshua Nun's boy, he no go way from inside da tent, he stay de
33.12: Moses tell Yahweh, âYou stay telling me, âGo take dese peopo da place dey suppose to go.â But you, you no let me know who you goin send wit me. You tell me, âI know who you an I know yoa name. I wen check you out an I like you.â
33.13: Kay den. If az how you stay feel bout me, if fo real you like me, I like you fo show me wat kine stuff you do. Den fo real kine I goin know you, so den bumbye I can still stay da kine guy dat you like. Rememba dis too: You da one wen pick dis peopo, fo be yoa peopo.â
33.14: God tell Moses, âGoin be me dat stay go wit you, an I goin make tings so you can rest.â
33.15: Moses tell, âIf you no stay go wit us guys, no make us go way from dis place.
33.16: Cuz ony get one way dat anybody goin find out dat you like me an yoa peopo. You gotta go wit us guys! An if you go wit us guys, az how me an yoa peopo goin be diffren [from / den] all da odda peopos inside da world.â
33.17: Yahweh tell Moses, âDis ting you aksing me fo do, I goin do um, cuz I like you, an I know what kine guy you, an I know yoa name.â
33.18: Den Moses tell, âPlease now, I like you let me see how awesome you stay fo real kine.â
33.19: An Yahweh tell Moses, âI goin show you eryting bout how good I stay. I goin let you hear wat my name Yahweh mean. I goin do plenny good tings fo whoeva I like do um fo, an I goin show plenny pity fo whoeva I get pity fo.
33.20: But you no can see my face, cuz no mo nobody can see me fo real kine, an stay alive still yet.â
33.21: Den Yahweh tell Moses, âOva hea, nea me, get one place you can stand, on top one big stone.
33.22: Den, wen I go by dea an show you how awesome I stay fo real kine, I goin put you inside one crack inside da big rock, an put my hand ova you so you no can see notting, till afta I go by dea.
33.23: Den I goin take away my hand an let you see my back. But my face, no can see.â

34.1: Yahweh tell Moses, âGo cut two flat stone jalike da ones I wen give you da firs time. I goin write on top dem da same words dat da firs ones wen say, da ones you wen broke.
34.2: Be ready fo go up Mount Sinai morning time. You goin stand in front me ova dea, on top a da mountain.
34.3: No mo odda guy goin go up dea wit you. Nobody can go any place on top da mountain. Not even yoa sheeps an cows can eat grass down side dat mountain.â
34.4: So, Moses wen cut two flat stone, jalike da firs ones. Early morning time, Moses get up an go up Mount Sinai, jalike Yahweh wen tell um fo do. He carry da two flat stones in his han
34.5: Den Yahweh come down to da top a da mountain inside da cloud. He stand dea wit Moses, an he talk strong an tell who him, an how come he get da name Yahweh.
34.6: Den Yahweh pass by in front Moses. He talk strong an tel
34.8: Moses go down on top da groun real quick, fo show God love an respeck.
34.9: He tell, âBoss, if fo real kine you wen check me out an you like me, let me aks you one ting: stay go wit us guys, no matta dese peopo, dey hard head. Let us guys go wen we get outa line an do bad kine stuff. Take us fo be yoa peopo!â
34.10: Den Yahweh say, âRight hea an now, I make deal wit all yoa Israel peopo. In front all yoa peopo, I goin do awesome tings dat nobody wen do befo time eva, not any place inside da world, not wit any odda peopo. All da peopo dat stay wit you now, dey goin see how scary da tings I goin do fo you guys, cuz I Yahweh.
34.11: So lissen wat I telling you today. Befo you get dea, I goin throw out da diffren peopos dat live inside da land -- da Amor peopo, da Canaan peopo, da Het peopo, da Periz peopo, da Hiv peopo, an da Jebus peop
34.12: âMake shua you no make deal notting wit da peopo dat stay live now inside da land wea you going agains dem. Bumbye dey goin come jalike one trap fo grab you guys, right dea wea you guys stay.
34.13: Dis wat you gotta do: you gotta broke down dea altars, an smash da big stones dey put up fo dea gods, an cut down da poles dey put up dea fo dea wahine god Asherah, nex to da altar fo dem pray an make sex in front.
34.14: You no go show love an respeck fo any odda god, ony fo me. Cuz I Yahweh, da one dey call da Jealous God, an I one God dat go all out fo keep my good name. I not like da odda gods!
34.15: Watch out you no goin make deal wit da peopo dat stay live inside da land. Cuz wen dey go do stuff fo dea gods, dey goin go all out, jalike one guy like go all out fo fool aroun one wahine dat take money fo sex. Dey goin make sacrifice to dea gods, an den dey goin tell you fo come eat da sacrifice meat wit dem.
34.16: Den you goin make deal wit dem fo yoa boys marry dea daughtas. But dea daughtas, dey goin go all out fo do stuff fo dea gods, jalike wen one guy like go all out fo fool aroun one wahine dat take money fo sex, an dey goin make yoa boys like do da same ting like dem fo dea wifes god
34.17: âYou no can make idol gods fo yoa own self wit metal dat you mel
34.18: âYou gotta come togedda fo make da spesho religious time wen erybody eat da Bread Dat No Mo Yeas Inside. Seven days you goin eat bread dat no mo yeas, jalike I wen tell you fo do awready. Dat time going be spesho fo God, ery year spring time, da same month you guys wen come outa Egyp
34.19: âDa firs bebe dat born, no foget, dey mines. Wen da firs bebe come from one a yoa animals, dey mines, no matta wat kine dem, cows o sheeps o goats.
34.20: Kill dat animal fo make sacrifice. But da firs bebe dat come from one donkey, no make sacrifice wit dat. Make sacrifice wit one sheep o goat fo pay me fo da donkey. An if you no make da sacrifice fo pay me fo da bebe donkey, gotta broke da donkey neck, no can keep um. Same ting, gotta make sacrifice wit one sheep o one goat fo pay me fo da firs boy dat come from yoa wife, cuz he mines to
34.21: âWork six days. Da numba seven day, you gotta res, no work. No matta time fo plow da groun o cut da foo
34.22: âYou gotta make da spesho Start Fo Cut Da Food religious time, seven weeks afta da Passova. You gotta be da one fo do um, no odda guy can do um fo you. Dass wen you bring me da firs wheat you cu
34.23: Three times ery year, all yoa guys gotta come togedda in front me, cuz I yoa Boss Yahweh. I da God fo you Israel peopo.
34.24: Cuz wen you guys reach inside dat land, I goin push out da odda peopos. I goin give you guys plenny land. An da three times ery year wen you guys go da place wea you suppose to come togedda in front me, Yahweh, da God fo you guys, you guys no need worry bout yoa land, all da time you guys no stay dea, cuz nobody goin take da land away from yo
34.25: âWen you guys make sacrifice fo me, no put da blood from da sacrifice on top notting dat get yeast inside. Wen you kill da bebe sheep fo da Passova, no leave notting till da nex da
34.26: â You guys gotta bring da bestest firs tings you cut from yoa land ery year, [to] my house, cuz I yoa God Yahweh.â
34.27: Den Yahweh tell Moses, âWrite down all dis stuff I wen tell you fo do. Cuz fo me make deal wit you an da odda Israel peopo, you guys gotta do eryting I stay tell you fo do.â
34.28: Moses stay ova dea on top Mount Sinai wit Yahweh, forty days an forty nites. Moses neva eat food an neva drink watta, all dat time. An he write on top da flat stones da tings God say da peopo gotta do fo get deal wit God -- dass da Ten Commandment
34.29: Den Moses come back down from Mount Sinai. Wen he come down from dea wit da two flat stones dat get da Deal on top, Moses neva know his face stay shining cuz he was talking wit God.
34.30: Wen Aaron an all da odda Israel peopo see dat Moses skin stay shining, dey scared fo go nea hi
34.31: But Moses, he call da peopo fo come. An Aaron an all da main guys from da peopo come wit him, an Moses talk to dem.
34.32: Lata, all da Israel peopo come by Moses. Moses teach dem eryting Yahweh say dey gotta do, jalike Yahweh wen tell Moses fo say, wen he stay up dea on top Mount Sinai.
34.33: Wen Moses pau talk wit dem, he cova his face wit one clot
34.34: Erytime Moses go in front Yahweh fo talk wit him, Moses take off da cloth from his face. Wen he come out an tell da Israel peopo wat God tell him fo tell dem wat fo do,
34.35: da Israel peopo see how Moses face stay shine. Afta he talk to dem, he put da cloth ova his face again, till da nex time he go inside da Tent fo talk wit Yahwe

35.1: Moses tell all da Israel peopo fo come togedda. He tell um, âDis wat Yahweh say you guys gotta do.
35.2: Get six days you can work. Da numba seven day, you goin res an no work notting. Dat day, spesho fo Yahweh. Anybody dat work dat day, gotta kill um.
35.3: No even make fire inside yoa house dat Res Day.â
35.4: Moses tell all da Israel peopo dis too: âDis wat Yahweh say you guys gotta do.
35.5: From da tings you guys get, bring gifs fo Yahweh. Erybody dat like do dat, go bring him gold, an silva, an bronze metal,
35.6: blue, an purple, an red wool string, fancy kine cloth made from linen, hair from da goats,
35.7: red ledda made from sheep skins, an skin from da dolphin, koa wood,
35.8: oil from da olive fo burn inside da lamps, spices fo da oil fo put on top da pries guys fo show God wen pick dem, an fo make da kine incense dat smell real nice,
35.9: jewelry stones fo put inside frames on top da ves an da ches piece fo da main prie
35.10: âErybody dat know how fo make stuff good, come make all da tings Yahweh wen say us guys gotta make:
35.11: Fo da Tent, make da inside tent an da cova, da hooks an da boards, da bars an da poses, an da bases dat go undaneat,
35.12: da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal, wit da poles, an da gold cova, an da thick curtain so no can see inside,
35.13: da Table fo da Breads, wit da poles fo carry da table an all da tings dey use fo da breads dat dey put in front Yahweh, an da breads,
35.14: da lamp stand fo da light, da tings dey use fo da lamps dey put on top da stand, an da oil from da olive fo da light,
35.15: da small altar fo da incense wit da poles fo carry um, da spesho oil fo put on top da pries guys head, da incense dat smell nice, da thick cloth dat go in front da door fo da Tent so no can see inside,
35.16: da big altar wea dey burn up da sacrifices, da bronze grill inside da altar, da poles fo carry um, an all da tings dey use wit da altar, da watta tub an da stand dat go undaneat,
35.17: da cloth dat go aroun da yard, wit da poses an da bases dat go undaneat, an da thick cloth so no can see inside da yard,
35.18: da tent pegs fo da main Tent, da pegs fo hold up da poses dat go aroun da yard, an da rope fo dem,
35.19: da clotheses dey goin weave fo da pries guys wear erytime dey do dea work inside da Place Dass Spesho Fo God, da spesho clotheses fo Aaron da pries guy, an da spesho clotheses fo his boys dat goin do da pries kine wor
35.20: Den all da Israel peopo go way from da place wea Moses talk to dem.
35.21: Erybody dat dea heart tell um fo come do um, wen come dea. Erybody dat inside dea heart really like come fo help, dey all bring stuff fo give to Yahweh, fo make da Tent Fo Come Togedda Wit God, an fo all da work, an fo all da clotheses dat stay spesho fo Go
35.22: Erybody dat inside dea heart like fo help, da men o wahines, dey all come. Dey bring pins an earrings an rings and necklaces, all kine gold tings. Dey all hold up dea gold tings in front Yahweh, an dey give um to him,
35.23: Erybody dat get stuffs dea place, blue an purple an red wool string, fancy kine linen cloth, hair from goats, red ledda from sheep skins, dolphin skins, dey all bring dea stuffs.
35.24: Erybody dat like give silva o bronze fo make gif fo Yahweh, dey bring um. Erybody dat get koa wood dea place fo all da work dey gotta do, dey bring dat too.
35.25: Had wahines who know how fo make real good kine wool string wit dea own hands. Dey all wen bring da blue an purple an red wool string dey wen make, an same ting fo da fancy kine linen cloth.
35.26: Odda wahines dat really like make da real good kine string outa goat hair, dey wen do dat.
35.27: Da leada guys, dey bring all kine jewelry stones fo make frame an put um on top da ves an da ches piece fo da main pries.
35.28: Dey bring olive oil fo make light inside da lamps, an fo da oil dey use fo show dat God wen pick da new pries guy, an spice fo make da kine incense dat smell real nic
35.29: Dass how da Israel peopo make. All da guys an da wahines dat inside dea hearts really like do someting fo God, dey bring stuff fo do da work dat Yahweh wen tell um fo do. Dey really like bring um to Yahweh, jalike he tell Moses fo tell da peopo fo d
35.30: Den Moses tell da Israel peopo, âYahweh wen pick Bezalel an tell me his name. His fadda, Uri, an his granfadda, Hur, from da Judah ohana.
35.31: Bezalel get da kine spirit inside him dat come strait from God, so he real smart fo know how fo make eryting,
35.32: an how fo figga out how fo make da tings outa gold an silva an bronze,
35.33: an how fo work wit da jewelry stone dat go inside da frames, an how fo work wit wood -- ery kine ting he goin make, he know how fo figga um.
35.34: An fo teach da odda worka guys wat dey gotta do, God wen give da heart fo teach lidat to Bezalel, an to Oholiab Akisamak boy from da Dan ohana,
35.35: God da one make dem smart fo do any kine work, make tings, figga out da work fo do um, weave cloth wit blue an purple an red wool string, an make fancy kine linen cloth -- all kine tings fo figga out how da stuff goin look lik

36.1: So now, time fo Bezalel fo do eryting Yahweh wen tell um dey gotta do -- him, an Oholiab, an all da odda peopo dat Yahweh make um know how fo make da tings dat stay spesho fo God, dat he wen tell um fo make.â
36.2: Den Moses tell Bezalel an Oholiab fo come by him. Same ting fo all da odda peopo dat know how fo do um from Yahweh. Erybody dat like do da job, he tell um fo start da work.
36.3: Da worka guys wen get from Moses, all da tings dey need, from da gifs dat da Israel peopo wen bring, fo do da work fo make da Tent. Ery morning, had peopo dat still yet bring to Moses mo an mo plenny stuffs dat dey like giv
36.4: Da guys dat know real good how fo make da tings fo da Tent, dey all wen leave da tings dey making
36.5: fo go tell Moses, âNuff awready! No need fo da peopo bring mo plenny stuffs den wat us guys need fo do da work Yahweh say we gotta do.â
36.6: So Moses tell peopo fo go all ova da camp fo tell erybody. âNuff awready! No need anybody stay bring mo gifs fo da Spesho Tent now!â Dass why da peopo wen pau bring stuff,
36.7: cuz dey wen bring mo plenny fo all da tings da worka guys need fo make da stuf
36.8: Da peopo dat know how fo make stuff, dey wen make da inside tent. Dey weave da fancy kine linen cloth, ten long piece. Wen dey weave um, dey put da blue an purple an red wool string fo make picha dat look like God's awesome angel watcha guys.
36.9: Ery piece cloth, 42 feet by six feet, same same.
36.10: Dey put togedda five piece cloth, long side to long side, fo make da piece fo da front side a da tent, an da odda five piece cloth fo make da piece fo da back side.
36.11: Dey take da blue kine wool string an make loops all down one side a da piece fo da front side wea dey come togedda, an same ting fo one side a da piece fo da back side.
36.12: Dey make 50 loop fo da piece on da front side, an 50 loop fo da piece on da back side, so ery loop fo da one piece come togedda wit da loop on da odda piece, fo make da whole tent come one piece.
36.13: Den dey make 50 gold hook fo hold da two parts togedda, fo make da whole tent come one piec
36.14: Da worka guys wen make cloth outa goat hair fo make one tent dat go ova da inside tent. Dey wen make 11 long piece cloth fo dat one.
36.15: Ery piece 45 feet long by six feet, same same.
36.16: Fo make da back side a da outside tent, dey put togedda five piece, an fo da front side, six piece.
36.17: Dey make 50 loops all down one side wea da back side come togedda, an same ting fo da piece fo da front side.
36.18: Den dey make 50 bronze hook fo hold da two parts togedda, fo make da whole outside tent come one piece.
36.19: Fo da cova ova da whole Tent, dey make da inside one outa red ledda from da sheep skins, an dey make da outside one outa dolphin skin
36.20: Da boards dat stand up fo hold up da Tent, dey make um outa koa wood.
36.21: Ery board 15 feet high an 27 inch wide.
36.22: Da bottom side wea ery board fo da Tent stand up, dey make two piece dat stick out nex to each odda, fo go inside da metal piers.
36.23: Fo da sout side a da Tent dey make 20 boards
36.24: an 40 silva piers fo go unda da 20 boards, two piers fo one board, wit holes fo da two piece dat stick out from da board, an same ting fo all da boards.
36.25: Fo da odda side, da nort side, dey make 20 boards
36.26: an 40 silva piers fo go unda da 20 boards, two piers fo one board, an same ting fo all da boards.
36.27: Fo da back side, dass da wes side, dey make six boards.

36.29: Da corna boards, jalike was two side boards dat come togedda, same same, but dey make um one piece from da bottom side to da top. Da top side, get ring dea fo make da corner boards stay togedda wit da odda boards, da two sides.
36.30: So fo da back side, get eight boards wit 16 silva piers, two piers unda ery boar
36.31: Dey make koa wood poles dat go across fo make da odda boards stay togedda. Dey make five fo hold togedda da boards one side a da Tent,
36.32: five fo hold togedda da boards da odda side a da Tent, an five fo hold togedda da boards da back side a da Tent, da wes side.

36.35: Dey weave fancy kine linen curtain fo make two rooms inside da Tent. Dey weave um, an put da blue an purple an red wool string wit da linen fo make picha dat look like God's awesome angel watcha guys.
36.36: Fo hold up da thick cloth inside da middo, dey make four poses outa koa wood an cova dem wit gold. Dey make gold hooks fo da poses, an dey melt silva fo make four piers fo undanea
36.37: Dey make one nodda curtain so no can look inside da Tent from outside. Dey make um outa da fancy kine linen cloth, an weave um fancy kine with da blue an purple an red wool string.

37.1: Bezalel make da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal. Dey make um outa koa wood, 3 feet 9 inch long an 2 feet 3 inch wide an 2 feet 3 inch high.
37.2: He cova da inside an da outside wit pure gold, an he put gold molding all aroun da top.
37.3: He melt gold metal fo make four rings fo da bottom cornas a da Box, two rings one side an two rings da odda side.
37.4: Den he make poles outa koa wood an cova dem wit gold.
37.5: He put da poles inside da rings on top da two sides a da Box, so da peopo can use um fo carry da Bo
37.6: Den Bezalel make one cova fo da Box outa pure gold, 3 feet 9 inch long an 2 feet 3 inch wide. Dat cova, fo show dat God goin hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, so dey can come back same side wit him.
37.7: He make two statues dat look like awesome angel watcha guys. He make um outa gold dat you work wit da hammer.
37.8: One a da statues go on top one side a da cova, an da odda go on top da odda side a da cova. Da two angel kine statues an da cova, he put um all togedda fo come one piece gold.
37.9: Da statues dat look like da awesome angel watcha guys, Bezalel make um jalike dey looking down on top da cova from da two sides. He make da statues wit da wings open wide ova da cova, da place wea God hemo da shame fo all da bad tings da peopo do, so dey can come back same side wit hi
37.10: Bezalel dem make one table outa koa wood, 3 feet long, 1 foot 6 inch wide, 2 feet 3 inch high.
37.11: Den dey put pure gold all ova da table, an put gold molding aroun da top.
37.12: He put 3 inch rim all aroun da top so notting can fall off da table, wit gold molding all aroun da top a da rim.
37.13: He melt gold metal fo make four ring fo da table, an put da four rings by da cornas, wea da four legs stay.
37.14: Da rings go right unda da rim dat stay aroun da top, fo hold da poles fo carry da table.
37.15: Da poles, dey make um outa koa wood fo carry da table, an put gold all ova dem.
37.16: Dey make dishes an pans an cups an bowls outa gold fo go wit da table, fo pour out da kine wine offering
37.17: Bezalel dem make one gold stand fo put da lamps on top. Dey make um from pure gold, an put um togedda fo come one piece pure gold, an dey use da hammer fo shape um. Dey make da bottom, an da main piece go strait up, an da side piece wit cup dat look like da bud fo one flowa.

37.19: Ery side piece get three small cup on top. Da cup, dey wen make um look jalike da almond flowa on top da branch, wit da bud part an da flowa, an same ting fo da six branches da come outa da main piece.
37.20: Da main piece inside da middo, dat one get four small cup on top, jalike da almond flowa, wit da bud part an da flowa.
37.21: Da three place wea da side pieces come outa da main piece, make one almond flowa unda each place.
37.22: Da main piece, da side pieces, an da almond flowas, dey make um wit da hammer, an come all one piece pure gold.
37.23: Bezalel dem make da seven olive oil lamp fo go on top da lamp stand, an da pans fo carry da fire an da tings fo pio da light, dey make um all outa pure gold.

37.27: Down from da molding, dey put two gold rings one side, an two gold rings da odda side. Da rings, fo hold da poles fo carry da altar.
37.28: Dey make da poles outa koa wood, an put gold all ova de

38.1: Bezalel dem wen make da big altar fo burn up da sacrifices. Dey make um outa koa wood, 7 feet 6 inch square, an 4 feet 6 inch high.
38.2: Dey make tings dat look like horn, dat stick out, an put um on top da four corna. All dis, he make um in one piece, den cova da whole ting wit bronze metal.
38.3: Dey use bronze metal too fo make da buckets an da shovels fo take away da ashes, an da bowls, an da forks fo da meat, an da pans fo carry da fire.
38.4: Dey make one bronze grill jalike one net. Da grill go inside da middo a da altar, half way down unda da top.
38.5: Dey melt bronze metal fo make four rings fo da four cornas a da grill, fo put da poles fo carry um.
38.6: Dey make da poles outa koa wood and cova dem wit bronze.

38.9: Nex, Bezalel dem make fo da yard aroun da Tent Fo Come Togedda Wit God, one fence. Da sout side, get 50 yards fancy kine linen cloth,

38.12: Da wes side, had 25 yards fancy kine linen cloth, wit 10 poses an 10 bronze piers undaneat. Da top a da poses, get silva hooks an strap
38.13: Da eas side, dass da front side, get 25 yards fancy kine linen cloth --

38.15: an 7 an a half yards on top three poses an three piers da odda side a da doo

38.17: All da piers dat go undaneat da poses, dey make um outa bronze metal. Da hooks an da straps on top a da poses, dey make um outa silva, an cova da top part a da poses wit silv
38.18: Fo da gate in front da yard, dey weave one curtain outa fancy linen, an den dey take da blue an purple an red wool string an make pichas all ova. Da front curtain, 10 yards long an 7 feet 6 inch high. Same ting fo da odda curtains dat go aroun da yard, dey all 7 feet 6 inch high.
38.19: Da gate curtain get 4 poses. Ery pos get bronze pier undaneat. Da hooks on top fo hold da curtain, dey make um outa silva, an dey cova da tops a da poses an make da straps aroun um wit silva.
