18.9: âYou betta not make sex wit yoa sista, no matta her yoa fadda's girl o yoa mudda's girl, no matta she grow up da same house wit you, o anodda plac
18.10: âYou betta not make sex wit yoa boy's girl, o yoa girl's girl. Dat goin make shame fo yo
18.11: âNo make sex wit yoa fadda's odda wife's girl, cuz yoa fadda her fadda too. She yoa sist
18.12: âNo make sex wit yoa fadda's sista. She yoa fadda's close ohan
18.13: âNo make sex wit yoa mudda's sista. She yoa mudda's close ohan
18.14: âNo go nea yoa fadda's brudda's wife fo make sex wit her. No make shame fo yoa fadda brudda lidat. She yoa aunti
18.15: âNo make sex wit yoa daughta in law. She yoa boy's wife. No make sex wit he
18.16: âNo make sex wit yoa brudda wife. No make shame fo yoa brudda lida
18.17: âIf you make sex wit one wahine, no go make sex wit her girl too. An no go make sex wit her boy's girl o her girl's girl. Dey da wahine's close ohana. Az one real bad kine ting you doin
18.18: âNo take yoa wife sista fo come anodda wife fo you, cuz den dey goin fight. No make sex wit her wen yoa real wife still yet stay alive.
18.19: âNo go nea one wahine fo make sex wit her wen she get her sick time ery month, wen she no can come in front m
18.20: âNo go make sex wit any odda guy wife, an make yoaself pilau lidat so you no can come in front m
18.21: âNo give any a yoa own kids fo make um go through da fire fo make sacrifice fo da idol kine god Molek, cuz you guys betta not make my name pilau. I Yahwe
18.22: âNo make sex wit one guy jalike you make sex wit one wahine. Az pilau da
18.23: âNo make sex wit one animal, an make yoaself come pilau lidat. One wahine betta not give herself to one animal an make sex wit um. Dat mean dey ack jalike peopo an animals not diffren, an az going agains doing da right ting
18.24: âNo go do dis kine stuff an make yoaself so you no can come in front me, Yahweh. Az how da peopos dat donno me stay make, dat stay live inside da land I goin give you guys, da ones I goin move um outa da land.
18.25: Dey wen even make da land pilau awready. So I goin punish da land cuz a all da bad kine stuff da peopo ova dea do. Jalike da land goin throw up da peopo dat stay dea now.
18.26: But you peopo gotta take care fo live da way I wen tell you gotta do, an do wat my rules tell you fo do. An you gotta no do notting dat stay pilau, da kine I wen tell you bout. Da guys dat born hea an da guys from odda place dat live wit you guys, same ting, dey betta not do notting dat stay pilau kine.
18.27: Da peopo dat wen live inside da land befo you guys, dey wen do all dat pilau kine stuff. Dey make da land pilau too.
18.28: If you guys make da land pilau, da land goin throw up you guys, jalike wen throw up da peopo dat stay dea befo you guy
18.29: âAnybody do any a dese pilau kine tings, you gotta cut dem off so dey not yoa peopo no moa.
18.30: You guys gotta make shua fo do da stuff I tell dat you guys gotta do. No follow da pilau kine style da peopo dat wen stay dea befo you guys do. No make yoaself so you no can come in front me lidat. Me, I yoa God Yahweh!â

19.2: fo tell all da Israel peopo dis: âYou guys gotta live spesho an good kine, cuz I yoa God Yahweh, an I stay spesho an goo
19.3: âErybody gotta show plenny respeck fo dea mudda an fadda. An ery Res Day, you guys gotta follow my Rules an res. I yoa God Yahwe
19.4: âNo leave me fo make o follow idol kine gods, cuz dey no can do notting. An no pour hot metal fo make gods fo yoaself. I yoa God Yahweh, az wh
19.5: âWen you guys make sacrifice dat show dat you an me, Yahweh, stay tight wit each odda, make um good so I goin like take um from you.
19.6: Gotta eat um da same day you make da sacrifice, o da nex day. If someting stay lefova till day numba three, you gotta burn um up.
19.7: If day numba three, anybody eat um, az pilau, an I no goin take da sacrifice.
19.8: Whoeva eat um goin get da blame fo do um, cuz dey make pilau wat stay spesho fo me, Yahweh. You gotta cut dem off so dey not yoa peopo no mo
19.9: âWen you cut da food from yoa fields inside da land, no cut um all da way by da edge, o pick up da extra food dat da harvesta guys no pick up.
19.10: No go ova yoa grape field one mo time fo make shua you get eryting, an no pick up da grapes dat wen fall down. Leave um dea fo da peopo dat no mo notting, an da peopo from odda place dat live wit you guys. I yoa God Yahwe
19.11: âNo go steal notting. No bulai. No go cheat each odd
19.12: âNo go make strong promise an tell az me, Yahweh, said um. Az how you give me bad name. I yoa God Yahwe
19.13: âNo give presha on anodda guy o steal from hi
19.14: âNo [put kahuna on top / talk stink bout] one guy dat no can hear [an tell he no matta]. No put someting in front one guy dat no can see so he trip an fall down. Stay scared an show respeck fo me, cuz I yoa God Yahwe
19.15: âWen you guys judge peopo, make shua you do um da right way, an make um even. No make diffren to some guys dat stay mo betta den to odda guys, no matta dey no mo notting o dey rich. Judge odda peopo da right an same wa
19.16: âNo go aroun an make bulai story bout anybody wit yoa peop
19.17: âNo hate yoa brudda inside yoa heart. Wen anodda guy do someting wrong, tell um az wrong strait out, so you no get da blame wit hi
19.18: âIf one a yoa peopo do someting bad to you, no go do someting bad to um too. No stay nuha wit um, but get love an aloha fo da odda guy, jalike you get love an aloha fo yoaself. I Yahweh, say di
19.19: âDo wat I tell you you gotta d
19.20: âIf one guy make sex wit one slave girl dat goin marry anodda guy, an da guy she goin marry no buy her yet an no pay da owna yet so she not one slave no moa, den da guy dat make sex wit her gotta pay da guy she going marry, cuz he jalike her husban. But you no goin kill da girl o da guy dat make sex wit her, cuz she still one slave girl.
19.21: But da guy dat make sex wit da slave wahine, gotta bring one boy kine sheep by da place you go inside da yard fo da Tent wea da peopo come fo meet me, Yahweh, fo make da kine sacrifice dat take away da blame fo wat he wen do.
19.22: Wen da pries guy kill da boy kine sheep fo da sacrifice fo take away da blame, da pries guy goin bring da guy da same side wit me, Yahweh, cuz a da bad kine ting da guy wen do. Den I goin hemo his shame an let him g
19.23: âWen you guys go inside da land an plant any kine fruit trees, tink bout da fruit lidis: no can eat um yet, cuz jalike kapu. Fo three years, you no can eat um.
19.24: Da year numba four, all da fruit goin be spesho fo me, Yahweh. Goin be jalike one sacrifice fo me fo tell how good I stay.
19.25: Den, year numba five, you guys can eat da fruit. Az how you guys goin get even mo fruit. I yoa God Yahwe
19.26: âNo eat no meat dat still yet get blood insid
19.27: âWen somebody mahke, no cut da hair on da sides a yoa head like da odda peopo fo show you stay sad. No cut off da edge a yoa beard.
19.28: âNo cut yoa body fo show you stay sore inside cuz a da mahke guys. No make tattoo on top yoa skin. I Yahwe
19.29: âNo make yoa girl come pilau cuz you make her come one wahine dat fool aroun fo money. If you guys make lidat, erybody inside da land goin make lidat too, an den goin get plenny real bad kine stuff all ova da lan
19.30: âMake jalike I tell you fo my Res Day. Show respeck fo da place dat stay spesho fo me, Yahwe
19.31: âNo go look fo da wahines dat talk to da mahke peopo, an no go find da guys dat know how fo find out wat da mahke peopo spirits know. Cuz if you guys do dat, goin make you guys so you no can come in front me. I yoa God Yahwe
19.32: âStand up wen ol peopo come nea you, an show respeck fo dem. Show respeck fo me, yoa God. I Yahwe
19.33: âWen somebody from odda place come live wit you guys inside yoa land, no make any kine to dem.
19.34: Somebody from odda place dat live wit you guys, you gotta make to dem jalike to one guy dat wen born same place by you guys. Get love an aloha fo da guy, jalike you get love an aloha fo yoaself. Cuz you guys wen stay Egypt side, an you guys not from dea. I yoa God Yahwe
19.35: âNo use bulai kine measure wen you tell how long someting, o how heavy someting stay, o how much get.
19.36: Use da kine scale an measure dat stay right an tell da truth. I yoa God Yahweh dat wen bring you guys outa Egyp
19.37: âYou guys gotta make shua fo do all da tings I tell you guys you gotta do, an all da rules I give you fo do um. Cuz I Yahweh.â

20.2: fo tell da Israel peopo dis: âAny Israel guy, o any guy from odda place dat stay live wit da Israel guys, if dey give any a dea kids fo make um go inside da fire fo make sacrifice fo da idol kine god Molek, dey gotta mahke. Da Israel peopo gotta throw stones fo kill um.
20.3: I goin go agains dat guy, an cut him off from his peopo. Wen he give his kid fo make sacrifice fo Molek, he make my spesho place pilau, an he talk bad an make dirty my good an spesho name too.
20.4: But if da Israel peopo ack jalike notting happen wen dose peopo give one a dea kids fo Molek, an da Israel peopo no kill um,
20.5: I goin go agains whoeva make da sacrifice fo Molek, an agains dea ohana. I goin cut dem off so dey not my peopo no moa. Same ting fo erybody dat make jalike dem, cuz dey make like one wahine dat fool aroun fo money wen dey go down in front Molek, cuz dey ony suppose to go down in front m
20.6: âI goin go agains whoeva go look fo da wahines dat talk to da mahke peopo, an da guys dat know how fo find out wat da mahke peopo spirits know. Dey make like one wahine dat fool aroun fo money wen dey go agains me an follow da odda spirits. I goin cut dem off so dey not dea peopo no mo
20.7: âMake yoaself come good an spesho fo me, cuz I yoa God Yahweh.
20.8: You guys, make shua fo do wat my rules tell. I Yahweh, da One dat make you guys spesho fo m
20.9: âIf anybody [put kahuna on top / talk stink bout] dea fadda o mudda [an tell dey no matta], dey gotta mahke. Cuz dey wen [put kahuna on top / talk stink] dea fadda o mudda, dey da ones get da blame, an dey gotta mahke.
20.10: If somebody fool aroun wit anodda guy's wife, wit any odda guy wife, you guys gotta kill da guy an da wahine dat wen fool arou
20.11: âIf somebody make sex wit his fadda's wife, he no mo respeck fo his fadda. Da guy an da wahine, gotta mahke. Da two a dem, get da blame fo wat dey d
20.12: âIf somebody make sex wit dea daughter in law, da guy an da wahine gotta mahke. Wat dey wen do, az one real pilau kine ting. Da two a dem, get da blame fo wat dey wen d
20.13: âIf one guy make sex wit anodda guy jalike he make sex wit one wahine, az pilau dat. You guys gotta kill dem. Da two a dem, get da blame fo wat dey d
20.14: âIf somebody marry one wahine an her mudda too, az one real bad kine ting. You guys gotta burn da guy an da wahines in da fire fo kill um. Dat way, da kine real bad stuff no goin stay wit you guy
20.15: âIf somebody make sex wit one animal jalike az one wahine, you guys gotta kill da guy an da anima
20.16: âIf one wahine go by one animal fo make sex wit um, you guys gotta kill da wahine an da animal. Dey gotta mahke cuz dey get da blame fo wat dey wen d
20.17: âIf somebody marry his sista, no matta his fadda's girl o his mudda's girl, an dey make sex togedda, az shame fo dem. You guys gotta cut dem off in front all da peopo, so dey not dea peopo no moa. Da guy make his sista shame, so he get da blame fo da
20.18: âIf somebody make sex wit one wahine wen she get her sick time ery month, he wen show wea da blood stay come from, an she wen show um too. You guys gotta cut dem off so dey not yoa peopo no mo
20.19: âNo make sex wit yoa mudda's sista o yoa fadda's sista, cuz dat goin show dat you no mo respeck fo one close ohana. You two guys get da blame togedda fo da
20.20: âIf somebody sleep wit his auntie, he show dat he no mo respeck fo da uncle. Dey get da blame fo do one bad ting. Wen dey mahke, dey no goin get kid
20.21: âIf somebody marry an make sex wit his brudda's wife an da brudda still alive, az one pilau ting. He no mo respeck fo his brudda. Dey goin get kid
20.22: âYou guys gotta make shua fo do wat all my rules tell, eryting I tell you cuz I da judge. Den no need throw out you guys from da land wea I goin bring you guys fo live.
20.23: You guys betta not make like da odda peopos ova dea. I goin throw dem outa da land in front you guys. Cuz dey do all dis pilau kine stuff, I hate dem.
20.24: But I wen tell you guys, âYou guys goin take ova dea land, an you guys goin own um. Az one land dat get plenny milk an honey.â I yoa God Yahweh. I wen make you guys diffren den all da odda peopo
20.25: âAz why you guys gotta know an make diffren, da kine animals an birds dat you guys can eat, an da kine animals an birds dat you guys no can eat. No make yoaself pilau from eat one animal o bird, o da kine animal dat move aroun on top da groun -- da kine I tell you guys fo no eat, cuz dey make you so you guys no can come in front me.
20.26: You guys suppose to be spesho fo me, cuz I Yahweh, an I stay good an spesho. I wen make you guys diffren den da odda peopos, fo come mine
20.27: âDa guys o da wahines dat talk to da mahke peopo, o dat know how fo find out wat da mahke peopo spirits know, dey gotta mahke. You guys goin throw stones at dem fo kill dem. Dey get da blame fo wat dey wen do.â

21.1: Yahweh tell Moses fo tell da pries guys, Aaron's boys, dis: âWen somebody mahke from one pries guy ohana, da pries guy no can make so he no can come in front me.
21.2: Ony if one close ohana mahke, his mudda o fadda, his boy o his girl, his brudda, den he can make himself so he no can come in front me.
21.3: An if one sista dat neva marry still yet, an he stay take care her cuz she no mo husban, an she mahke, he can make himself lidat fo her.
21.4: He no can make himself so he no can come in front me, wen somebody from his wife ohana mahke. Az pilau fo hi
21.5: âWen somebody mahke, da pries guys betta not shave part a da hair from dea head, o shave off da edge a dea beard, o cut dea bodies fo show dey stay sore inside.
21.6: Dey gotta stay spesho ony fo me, dea God. Dey betta not make dirty my good an spesho name lidat. Cuz dey da ones make da sacrifice fo me, Yahweh, wit fire, an az jalike dey give food to me, dea God. Az why dey gotta stay spesho fo m
21.7: âDey no can marry wahine dat make herself pilau cuz she fool aroun fo money, o dat her husban wen throw her out, cuz da prieses stay spesho fo me, dea God.
21.8: Tink bout da pries guys jalike dey real spesho fo me, cuz dey make sacrifice an give food to me, yoa God. Tink bout dem like spesho guys, cuz I, Yahweh, stay spesho, an I make you guys spesh
21.9: âIf one pries's girl make herself pilau cuz she fool aroun fo money, she make her fadda shame so he no can make sacrifice. Gotta burn her up fo kill her wit fir
21.10: âDa main pries, da one dat goin get da olive oil on top his head fo show dat I wen pick him. He get da right fo wear da pries kine clotheses. He no can let his hair come mess up, o broke his clotheses, wen somebody mahke.
21.11: Da main pries no can go inside one place wea get one mahke body. He no can let himself come so he no can go in front me, not even fo his fadda o mudda.
21.12: He no can go way from my spesho place fo go funeral, cuz den he goin make my spesho place come pilau. He get da olive oil on top his head fo show dat I wen pick him. I Yahwe
21.13: âDa wahine dat he marry, she gotta be da kine dat neva sleep wit one guy befo.
21.14: He no can marry one widow, one wahine dat get divorce, o one wahine dat stay pilau cuz she wen fool aroun fo money. He ony can marry one wahine from his own pries kine ohana dat neva sleep wit one man.
21.15: Dat way, he know his kids not pilau, cuz dey come from his peopo. I Yahweh dat make him spesho fo me.â
21.16: Yahweh tell Moses fo tell Aaron dis:
21.17: âFo yoa kids an dea kids dat come afta dem, no mo nobody dat get someting wrong wit dem can come nea me, dea God, fo make sacrifice fo me wit food.
21.18: No mo nobody dat get someting wrong wit dem can come nea -- anybody dat no can see, o dat no can walk good, o dat get his face o his body mess up, no can make sacrifice fo me.
21.19: No mo nobody dat get one feet o hand dat stay all any kine,
21.20: o get crooked back, o one guy dat no can grow tall, o dat get someting wrong wit dea eye, o dat get da kine sore dat da pus stay run out, o dat get da privates hurt.
21.21: No mo nobody dat come from Aaron dat get someting wrong wit dem can come nea me fo make da kine sacrifice dey make wit fire. Dey no can come nea fo give food to me, dea God.
21.22: But any pries guys dat get someting wrong wit dea body, dey can eat da mos spesho food fo me, dea God, an da spesho food dass fo da pries guys.
21.23: But cuz dey get someting wrong wit dem, dey no can go inside da room wit da thick curtain, an dey no can go by da altar, cuz den dey make my spesho place pilau. I Yahweh, dat make da pries guys come spesho fo me.â
21.24: So Moses tell dis to Aaron an his boys, an to all da Israel peop

22.1: Yahweh tell Moses fo tell Aaron an his boys
22.2: âTake care! Goin come some times wen da pries guys no can touch da sacrifices dat da Israel peopo make spesho fo me. Cuz if dey touch um wen dey not suppose to, dey goin make dirty my good an spesho name. I Yahwe
22.3: âTell um dis: Fo da pries guys dat stay alive now an bumbye, if anybody from dea ohana no can come in front me, an yet dey come nea da sacrifices dat da Israel peopo make spesho fo me, Yahweh, you guys gotta cut dem off so dey no can come in front me. I Yahwe
22.4: âIf any a da pries guys dat come from Aaron get da kine sick on top dea skin dat odda guys can catch, o someting come outa dea body, dey no can eat da kine sacrifice dat stay spesho fo me, till da ting pau an den dey can come in front me. Dey no can come in front me if dey touch someting dat wen touch one mahke body, o if dey get semen come out from dem,
22.5: o if dey touch anyting dat crawl dat make um so no can come in front me, o if dey touch anybody dat make um so no can come in front me, no matta wat make um lidat.
22.6: Any pries guy touch dat kine stuff, dey no can come in front me till da sun go down. Dey no can eat da food from one sacrifice dat stay spesho fo me, till dey bafe wit watta.
22.7: Afta da sun go down, an dey stay clean, den dey can come in front me, an afta dat can eat da sacrifice dat stay spesho fo me, cuz az dea food.
22.8: Da pries guys no can eat animal dat awready mahke o dat da wild animals wen rip um up, cuz dat goin make um so he no can come in front me. I Yahwe
22.9: âDa pries guys gotta do wat I tell um fo do, so dey no get da blame an mahke cuz dey no mo respeck fo wat I tell. I Yahweh, an I make dem spesho fo m
22.10: âNo mo nobody can eat da sacrifices dat stay spesho fo me, ony da pries guys an dea ohana can eat um. His friend dat come stay wit him his house, an da guy he pay fo work fo him, dey no can eat um.
22.11: But if one pries guy buy one slave wit silva, o if one slave wen born inside da pries guy house, dat slave can eat his food.
22.12: If one pries girl marry somebody dat not one pries, she no can eat any food dat stay spesho fo me.
22.13: But if one pries girl come one widow o get divorce, an no mo kids, an her go back live inside her fadda's house, jalike wen her young, her can eat her fadda's food. But no odda guy can eat u
22.14: âIf somebody not from da pries ohana eat da food dat stay spesho fo me, an neva know stay spesho befo, dey gotta pay back da pries guy fo da sacrifice, an twenty percent moa.
22.15: Da pries guys betta not make pilau da spesho sacrifices da Israel peopo give me, Yahweh,
22.16: cuz dey let da odda peopo eat da food dat stay spesho fo me. Cuz den da pries guys make da odda peopo get da blame fo eat da spesho kine food, so den da odda peopo gotta make da kine sacrifice fo take away da blame. Me, Yahweh, I da one make da pries guys spesho fo me.â
22.18: fo tell Aaron an his boys an all da Israel peopo dis: âAny Israel guy, o any guy from odda place dat live by you guys, if dey like give one animal fo make one burn up kine sacrifice fo me, Yahweh, fo one strong promise dey wen make, o cuz dey like do um,
22.19: dey gotta give one boy kine cow dat no mo notting wrong wit um, o one boy kine sheep, o one boy kine goat. Den I goin take um an make good fo dem.
22.20: No bring anyting dat get someting wrong wit um, cuz I no goin take um fo make good fo you guys.
22.21: Wen anybody bring one a da cows o da sheeps fo make da kine sacrifice dat show dat dem an me, Yahweh, stay tight wit each odda, cuz a one strong promise dey wen make, o cuz dey like do um, gotta be one animal dat no mo notting wrong wit um. Den I goin take um from dem.
22.22: No bring me one animal dat no can see, o dat get broke bone, o bad cut, o dat get sore dat get pus run out, o get rash o odda sick on top da skin. No put dese kine animals on top da altar fo one sacrifice you make wit fire fo me, Yahweh.
22.23: Wen you give one sacrifice ony cuz you like give, you can give one boy kine cow o sheep dat no come out good, o small, but I no take dat kine sacrifice if you wen make one strong promise fo make sacrifice fo me.
22.24: You betta not give me one animal dat get dea privates cut off o mess up. You betta not make lidat wen you reach yoa own land,
22.25: an you guys betta not take dat kine animals from one guy from odda place, an make sacrifice fo give um to me fo food. I no goin take um fo make good fo you guys, cuz dey get someting wrong wit um.â
22.27: âWen one bebe cow, bebe sheep, o bebe goat born, dey gotta stay wit dea mudda fo seven days. From da day numba eight, I goin take um fo da kine sacrifice you make wit fire fo me, Yahweh.
22.28: No kill one mudda cow o one mudda sheep da same day you kill dea beb
22.29: âWen you make da kine sacrifice fo tank me, Yahweh, make um da right way so I goin take um an make good fo you.
22.30: You gotta eat um da same day you kill um, an no leave notting till morning. I Yahwe
22.31: âMake shua you lissen wat I tell you fo do, an do um. I Yahweh.
22.32: No talk bad an make dirty my good an spesho name. All da Israel peopo gotta show dat dey know I good an spesho. I Yahweh, da One make you guys spesho fo me.
22.33: I wen bring you guys outa Egypt, fo me come yoa God. I Yahweh.â

23.2: fo tell da Israel peopo dis: âDese da spesho times dat I, Yahweh, tell you guys fo make. You guys goin call all da peopo fo come togedda fo dose times dat stay spesho fo m
23.3: âGet six days wen you guys can work. But day numba seven, az da Res Day, fo erybody res. Dass wen you guys goin come togedda fo do stuff dat spesho fo me. No matta wea you guys live, you no can work dat day. Az one Res Day you give fo me, Yahwe
23.4: âDese, da odda spesho times fo come togedda fo me, Yahweh. You guys goin tell da peopo wen da times goin come dat stay spesho fo me.
23.5: Da Passova fo Yahweh start wen da sun go down, da month numba one, day numba 14.
23.6: Da day afta da Passova, anodda spesho time fo Yahweh start, wen erybody eat da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast. Fo seven days, all da bread you guys eat, gotta be da kine dat no mo yeast.
23.7: Da firs day afta da Passova, tell da peopo fo come togedda fo one time dass spesho fo me, Yahweh, an no do regula kine work.
23.8: Fo seven days, make da kine sacrifices you make wit fire fo me. Da day numba seven, come togedda fo da time dass spesho fo me, an no do regula kine work.â
23.10: fo tell da Israel peopo dis: âWen you guys go inside da land I goin give you, an you guys cut da food dat you grow, bring da pries guy one bunch wheat you tie up from da firs wheat you cut.
23.11: Da day afta da Res Day, he goin lif up da wheat in front me, Yahweh, so I goin take um, az one sacrifice from you guys.
23.12: Da same day you lift up da wheat, you gotta make one burn up kine sacrifice for me, Yahweh, wit one bebe sheep, one year ol, dat no mo notting wrong wit um.
23.13: An you gotta make sacrifice wit wheat o barley wit four pound flour, mix wit olive oil. Az one sacrifice you make wit fire, one real nice smell dat I like. An you pour out one quart wine by da altar fo make one drink sacrifice.
23.14: You guys no can make da bread fo eat, o roast da wheat o barley an eat um, o eat da new wheat o barley, till da day you bring da sacrifice dat go wit da wheat in front me, yoa God. You guys an yoa kids goin do how dis rule tell foeva, no matta wea you guys live.â
23.15: âDa day afta da Res Day wen you bring da wheat you cut an tie um up, fo make da sacrifice you lif up, from dat day, count seven weeks.

23.17: From wea eva you guys live, ery house an dea ohana gotta bring two breads you make from four pound fancy kine flour from da inside a da wheat. Make um wit yeast. Den give um to da pries guys fo him make da kine sacrifice you lift up fo me, Yahweh.
23.18: Wit dis bread, you gotta give seven boy kine bebe sheep, one year ol kine, an no mo notting wrong wit um. An give one young boy kine cow, an two boy kine sheeps. 23.20: Da pries guy goin lif up da two boy kine bebe sheep in front me, Yahweh, wit da bread from da wheat you cut dat time. Az one sacrifice dat stay spesho fo me, Yahweh, an da food, az fo da pries guy.
23.21: Dat same day, you goin tell da peopo fo come togedda fo one spesho religious time, an no do regula kine work. Dis goin be one spesho time you guys an yoa kids goin make from now an foeva, no matta wea you guys stay liv
23.22: âWen you cut da food from yoa field inside yoa land, no cut um all da way by da edge a da land, o pick up da extra food dat da harvesta guys no pick up. Leave um dea fo da peopo dat no mo notting, an da peopo from odda place dat stay live wit you guys. I yoa God Yahweh.â

23.37: (âDese da spesho religious times I Yahweh tell you guys fo make ery year. 24.2: fo tell da Israel peopo fo do dis: âBring me clear kine olive oil you guys smash from da olives, fo make da light inside da Tent, so you guys can make da lights dea stay burn all da time.

24.15: Tell da Israel peopo: If somebody talk stink bout his God, jalike he tink I no matta, den he get da blame fo da bad ting he wen do.

24.17: âIf somebody kill one guy o wahine, you guys gotta kill dem.

24.21: Whoeva kill one animal, dey gotta pay back da owna. But whoeva kill one guy o wahine, dey gotta mahke.

25.1: Da time Moses stay up on top a Mount Sinai, Yahweh tell Moses
25.2: fo tell da Israel peopo dis: âWen you guys go inside da land I goin give you guys, den ery seven year, da land gotta res fo me, Yahweh.

25.4: But da year numba seven, az da Res Year, wen da land goin res fo me, Yahweh. All dat year, you no can plant seed inside yoa fields, an no can trim da grape plants.
25.5: No go fo cut da food dat grow from da seed you wen drop da las time you cut food, o da grapes dat grow wea you no trim. Da land goin get one year fo res.
25.6: Wateva come up dat year dat you guys no work fo plant, goin be food fo you guys, fo da guys an wahines dat work fo you guys, fo da guys you pay fo work fo you guys, an fo da peopo from odda place dat live wit you guys.
25.7: Yoa animals, an da wild animals inside yoa land can eat um too. Wateva come up from da land, can eat u

25.11: Az goin be da spesho Give Back Year, numba fifty. No go plant seed dat year, an no use da food dat grow from wat wen fall down da las time you cut food, o da grapes dat grow wea you no trim.
25.12: Az da Give Back Year numba fifty. You guys, you gotta make dat year spesho fo me, Yahweh. You can eat da food you get from da field
25.13: âDa Year Fo Give Back, numba fifty, erybody goin go back dea own propert

25.16: Wen get plenny mo years fo cut food, you gotta pay mo fo um, an wen no mo plenny years, you pay um ony litto bit fo um, cuz da ony ting dey sell you fo real kine, is how plenny years you can cut da food from dat land.
25.17: No scam each odda, but stay scared an show respeck fo me, Yahweh. I yoa God Yahwe
25.18: âDo wat my rules tell, an make shua fo do wat I say. Den you guys goin live inside da land an no need worry.

25.20: You guys goin aks, âWat us guys goin eat da year numba seven, if we no can plant seed o cut food?â

25.23: âYou guys no can sell da land to somebody foeva, cuz da land az mines, an you guys stay live on top my land ony short time.

25.25: âIf one Jew no mo notting, so he sell some a da ohana land, one guy dass da mos nea ohana to him, suppose to come fo buy back wat da odda guy wen sell, so da land still stay wit da ohana.

25.28: But if da guy dat own da land befo time no mo nuff fo buy um back, den da guy dat wen buy da land can keep um till da spesho Year Fo Give Back. Dat year, da guy dat wen buy um gotta give um back to da guy dat wen own um befo, so den da firs owna guy can go back to his lan
25.29: âIf one guy sell one house, inside one big town dat get wall aroun um, he get da right fo buy um back one year afta he wen sell um. He can buy um back dat year.

25.31: But da kine house inside one small town dat no mo wall aroun um, dey jalike da land outside da towns. Da guy dat wen sell um, o somebody from da guy ohana, can buy um back. An da guy dat buy um, gotta give um back, da spesho Year Fo Give Bac

25.47: âIf one guy from odda place, o one guy dat live wit you guys fo short time, come rich, an one Jew no mo notting, so da Jew guy sell himself to da guy from odda place dat live nea you, o to da guy's ohana,

26.1: âNo make da kine no good idol kine gods fo yoaself. No put up idol statues o big kine stones dat odda peopos put up fo dem pray in front, an no put up one stone you cut fo make someting inside yoa land, fo you go down in front um. Cuz I yoa God, me, Yahweh.
26.2: Ery day I make one Res Day, res. Show respeck fo my spesho place. I Yahwe
26.3: âIf you guys do da way I tell you gotta live, an take care fo lissen wat I tell you fo do,
26.4: den I goin send rain da right times fo you guys, da groun goin grow food, an da trees inside da field goin give you dea kine fruits.
26.5: You guys goin stay shake da barley an wheat from da junk kine stuffs, till time fo cut grape. An den da grape plants goin stay give grapes, till time fo plant seed again. You guys goin eat all da food you like, an you goin stay shua you no need worry inside yoa lan
26.6: âI goin make eryting come good fo you guys inside da land. Wen you guys lay down, you no need stay scared a nobody. I goin take away da wild kine animals from da land, an no mo nobody goin go thru dea making war.
26.7: You guys goin go afta da guys dat stay agains you, an you goin kill um wit yoa swords.
26.8: Five a you guys goin chase one hundred a dea guys, an one hundred a you guys goin chase ten tousand a dea guys. Da guys dat stay agains you, you guys goin kill um wit yoa sword
26.9: âI goin make good to you guys. I goin give you guys plenny kids so you goin come mo plenny peopo. I goin stick wit da deal I wen make wit you guys.
26.10: You guys wen grow so plenny food da year befo, dat you still yet eat dat food wen you guys gotta move out dat food fo make room fo da new food you guys cut.
26.11: I goin make my house by you guys, an I no goin make to you guys jalike you no good.
26.12: I goin live wit you guys, an come yoa God, an you guys goin come my peopo.
26.13: I yoa God Yahweh. I wen bring you guys outa Egypt, so you guys no gotta be slaves fo da Egypt peopo no moa. I wen broke da yoke dey wen put on top you guys neck, so dat you guys can walk wit yoa head strait up an no need get sham
26.14: âBut if you guys no lissen to me, an no do all da tings I tell you guys fo do,
26.15: an if you guys no like da tings I tell you gotta do, an if you guys get mad wen I make diffren to da good peopo an da bad peopo, an so you guys broke da deal I wen make wit you guys --
26.16: wen you guys make lidat, den fo shua I goin do dis to you guys: Right den an dea I goin make you guys come real scared. I goin give you guys da kine sick dat make you come poho, an wit fever. All dat goin make you guys eyes so you no can see, an make you guys weak, den you mahke. You guys goin plant seed fo notting, cuz da peopo dat stay agains you guys goin eat um.
26.17: I goin go agains you guys, so dat da guys dat stay agains you guys goin win ova you guys an come yoa boss. You guys goin run away, even wen no mo nobody stay chase yo
26.18: âAfta I make all dese kine tings to you guys, an you guys still yet no like lissen me, I goin punish you guys seven times mo fo da bad kine stuff you guys still yet do.
26.19: You guys get big head cuz you strong, but I goin bus up you guys an show dat you not strong. I goin take away da rain from da sky ova you guys jalike dat az iron, an I goin make da groun unda you guys hard jalike az bronze metal.
26.20: You guys goin work hard fo notting, cuz yoa land no goin grow notting, an da trees on top yoa land no goin give fruit
26.21: âIf you guys still yet goin stay agains me, an no like lissen me, I goin make mo trouble fo you guys, seven times mo worse, cuz a all da bad kine stuff you guys do.
26.22: I goin send wild kine animals agains you guys. Dey goin kill yoa kids, an wipe out yoa cows. Dey goin make you guys come ony litto bit peopo, den no mo nobody goin go walk on top da roads inside yoa lan
26.23: âBut if still yet, you guys no lissen wen I punish you, an stay nuha wit me,
26.24: den fo shua I da one goin stay nuha wit you guys. I goin punish you guys seven times mo cuz a da bad kine stuff you guys do.
26.25: An I goin bring army guys wit swords agains you guys. Dass how I goin pay back you guys, cuz you guys wen broke da deal I wen make wit you guys. Wen you guys go back inside yoa big towns, I goin send bad kine sick on top you guys. An da guys dat stay agains you guys goin take ova.
26.26: Wen I take away da food from you guys, ony goin get one oven fo ten wahines bake litto bit bread fo dea ohana. Dey goin bring back da bread fo you guys an weigh um so erybody get same. You guys goin eat, but you no goin get nuf
26.27: âAn if you guys still yet no lissen me, but stay nuha wit me,
26.28: den I goin get real mad wit you guys. I goin punish you guys cuz a da bad kine stuff you guys stay do, seven times mo worsa.
26.29: You guys goin eat yoa own boys an yoa own girls.
26.30: I goin broke down yoa sacrifice places fo da idol kine gods on top da hills, an cut down da altars you guys make fo burn incense dea. I goin put big stack a yoa mahke bodies on top da wood blocks dat you call yoa idol kine gods, dat no stay alive. An I goin hate you guys.
26.31: I goin make yoa big towns come all bus up, an wipe out da places you make spesho fo yoa gods. I no goin feel good inside notting from da nice smell you guys make wit yoa sacrifices.
26.32: I goin bus up yoa land, so dat da guys dat stay agains you guys no goin feel good wen dey go dea fo take ova.
26.33: I goin make you guys go all ova da place wea all kine peopos stay. I goin take out my sword an go afta you guys. You guys land goin come good fo notting, an yoa big towns, all bus up.
26.34: Den da land goin stay good, cuz goin res jalike inside da Res Years. Goin res all da time stay good fo notting, all da time you guys stay inside da land a da guys dat stay agains you guys. Dass da time da land goin res, an goin stay good inside cuz now get da Res Years.
26.35: All da time da land stay good fo notting, da land stay res. Wen you guys wen stay dea, da land neva re
26.36: âAn fo all you peopo dat still yet stay alive dea, you guys goin stay inside da lands a da peopo dat stay agains you guys, an I goin make you guys stay scared ova dea. Wen da wind blow one leaf, an you guys hear um, goin make you guys so scared, you goin run away. You goin run jalike somebody chasing you wit one sword, an you goin fall down, even nobody stay chase you.
26.37: You goin fall down on top each odda, jalike you running away from guys wit swords, no matta nobody stay chase afta you. An you guys no get da powa fo even stand up in front da guys dat stay agains you guys.
26.38: You guys goin mahke inside da lands a da diffren peopos wea you stay. Da peopo dat stay agains you guys, jalike dea land goin eat you guys up.
26.39: You peopo dat still yet stay alive, I goin punish you an make you come sick an weak inside da lands a da guys dat stay agains you guys. Cuz a da bad kine stuff you guys an yoa ancesta guys wen do, az why you guys goin come lida
26.40: âBut if dey tell dat was wrong, all da bad kine stuff dem an dea ancesta guys wen do, an if dey tell az was wrong fo broke my rules an no stay tight wit me, an if dey tell az wrong fo dem stay nuha wit me,
26.41: an me, fo shua all dat wen make me stay nuha wit dem too. Az why I wen send dem inside da land a da peopo dat stay agains dem. Dey neva like lissen me. But wen dey start fo tink dey notting, an dey can tell az okay fo me punish dem cuz a da bad kine stuff dey wen do,
26.42: den I no goin foget da deal I wen make wit dea ancesta guys Jacob, an Isaac, an Abraham, an I no goin foget da promise I wen make bout da land.
26.43: No mo nobody goin stay dea on da land, cuz dey all go way from dea. Now, jalike da land goin feel good inside, cuz get da Res Years he suppose to get. Dey goin tell, az okay fo me punish dem cuz a da bad kine stuff dey wen do, cuz dey no like wen I make diffren kine to da good peopo an da bad peopo, an cuz dey no like wen I tell um wat dey suppose to do.
26.44: But no matta all dat. Wen dey stay inside da land a da peopo dat stay agains dem, I no goin make like dey no good, fo wipe um out all da way. I no goin broke da deal I wen make wit dem. Cuz I Yahweh dea God.
26.45: Cuz a dem I no goin foget da deal I wen make befo time wit dea ancesta guys. I wen bring dem outa Egypt fo be dea God, in front all da diffren peopos. I Yahweh.â
26.46: Dis da rules, an how fo make to da good peopo an da bad peopo, an how fo teach, dat Yahweh tell Moses on top Mount Sinai, fo tell da Israel peop

27.2: fo tell da Israel peopo dis: âIf somebody make one spesho strong promise to me, Yahweh, fo give somebody to me, den you, Moses, you gotta figga da right pound silva fo dem pay da pries guys so dey no gotta come one slave, cuz ony da Levi ohana guys can work fo me.
27.3: You figga fifty piece silva, da way da pries guys weigh silva, fo pay fo one guy twenty to sixty years ol.
27.4: But if az one wahine twenty to sixty years ol, you ony pay thirty piece silva, da way da pries guys weigh silva.
27.5: If az one guy five to twenty years ol, pay twenty piece silva. If az one girl five to twenty years old, you ony pay ten piece silva.
27.6: If one bebe boy ony one month to five years ol, you ony pay five piece silva. If one girl ony one month to five years ol, pay three piece silva.
27.7: If az one guy sixty years ol o moa, pay ony fifteen piece silva. But if one wahine, pay ony ten piece silva.
27.8: If anybody dat stay make one strong promise, but dey ony get litto bit fo pay, den dey goin bring da one dey wen promise fo give to God in front da pries guy. Da pries guy goin figga how plenny da guy gotta pay, from wat he get fo pa
27.9: âIf somebody make one strong promise fo give one animal, an az da right kine fo one sacrifice, dat animal come spesho fo me, Yahweh.
27.10: Da guy no can change um o give one good animal fo one bad animal, o one bad animal fo one good animal. If he make lidat, da animal he say he goin give, an da odda one he give fo um, dey goin come spesho fo me, Yahweh.
27.11: If somebody make one strong promise fo give one animal, da kine dey no can use fo make sacrifice, cuz me, Yahweh, I no take dat kine animal, dey gotta give da animal to da pries guy.
27.12: Da pries goin tell if da animal stay good o no good. Wateva da pries guy figga fo um, dass wat da guy gotta pay.
27.13: If da guy goin like buy back da animal, he gotta pay twenty percent mo fo buy um bac
27.14: âIf somebody make dea house spesho fo me, Yahweh, da pries guy goin tell if da house good o bad. Wateva da pries guys tell da house stay worth, den az how much dat goin be.
27.15: If somebody make dea house spesho fo me, Yahweh, an den like buy um back, dey gotta pay twenty percent mo. Den da house goin come his agai
27.16: âIf somebody like make some a da ohana land dat he own, spesho fo me, Yahweh, dey gotta figga how much bag seed dey need fo plant dea, fifty silva piece fo one piece land dat need two gunny bag barley seed fo plant.
27.17: If dey make dea land spesho fo me, Yahweh, inside da spesho Year Fo Give Back numba fifty, dey still gotta pay da fifty piece silva.
27.18: But if dey make dea land spesho fo me, Yahweh, afta da spesho Year Fo Give Back come, da pries guy goin figga how plenny dey suppose to pay fo buy back da land, from how plenny years still stay till da nex spesho Year Fo Give Back come, so dey no need pay so plenny silva fo get um back.
27.19: If da guy wen make da land spesho fo me, Yahweh, an like buy um back again, he gotta pay twenty percent moa, an da land come his property again.
27.20: But if da one dat make his land spesho fo me an no like buy um back, o if he wen sell um to anodda guy, den he no can buy um back eva.
27.21: An wen time fo da land go back to da owna inside da spesho Year Fo Give Back numba fifty, from dat time, da field goin be fo me, Yahweh. Den no mo nobody can buy um, eva. Da pries guys goin own u
27.22: âIf somebody make one field he wen buy spesho fo me, Yahweh, an da field az not part a his ohana land,
27.23: da pries guy goin figga how plenny da owna gotta pay fo buy back da land till da spesho Year Fo Give Back, an da guy gotta pay wateva da land cost dat same day, cuz az spesho fo me, Yahweh.
27.24: Wen da spesho Year Fo Give Back come, da land no goin go back fo da guy dat wen buy da land and make um spesho fo me. Goin go back fo da guy dat wen own um befo, cuz az his ohana land, but he wen sell um.
27.25: Dey goin figga how plenny gotta pay fo buy back da land, da way da pries guys weigh da silva. (Twenny gerah, az one piece silva
27.26: âIf get one firs animal fo born from da mudda, no mo nobody can make um spesho fo me, Yahweh. Az cuz da firs animal born, awready stay spesho fo me, no matta az one cow o one sheep. Az awready fo me, Yahweh.
27.27: But if da animal dat born firs, da kine dey no can use fo make sacrifice, da guy can buy um back fo wat da pries guy figga, an pay twenty percent mo fo um. If da guy no like buy um back, da pries guys can sell um fo wat dat kine animal cos
27.28: âBut wateva somebody own dat stay foeva ony fo me, Yahweh, no matta az one guy, o one animal, o da ohana land, no can sell um o buy um back. Da whole ting stay foeva ony fo me, Yahwe
27.29: âNo mo nobody can buy back somebody dat stay foeva ony fo me, Yahweh. Gotta kill u
27.30: âTen percent from eryting dat grow up from da land, no matta da wheat o barley from da dirt o da fruits from da trees, az fo me, Yahweh. All dat stay stay spesho fo me.
27.31: If somebody like buy back some a da ten percent a da wheat o barley o fruits he wen give me, dey gotta pay da pries guys twenty percent mo den wat goin cost him fo um.
27.32: From ery ten animals from da cows an sheeps an goats, wen da farma guy count um, da numba ten one he count stay spesho fo me, Yahweh.
27.33: He he no can pick out da good one from da bad one, an no change one animal fo anodda animal. If he change one fo da odda, den da two animals goin come spesho fo me, Yahweh, an nobody can buy um back.â
27.34: Dese all da rules Yahweh wen tell Moses on top Mount Sinai, fo him tell da Israel peop

1.1: Dis, wat Moses wen tell all da Israel peopo. Dat time, dey all wen stay inside da boonies on da east side da Jordan Riva, inside da Jordan Valley. Dass across Suf, wit Paran on one side an Tofel, Laban, Hazerot, an Dizahab on da odda side.
1.2: You know, fo go Mount Sinai to Kadesh Barnea, take eleven days, even if you go da long way on da Mount Se`ir roa
1.3: But dat time, was 40 year afta da Israel peopo come outa Egypt, an was winta time, wen Moses tell da Israel peopo eryting Yahweh tell him he suppose to tell dem.
1.4: Moses tell um dis afta dey wen win ova Sihon, da king fo da Amor peopo dat stay inside Heshbon, an afta dey win ova Og, da king fo da Bashan peopo dat stay inside Ashtarot an Edre
1.5: From da east side a da Jordan Riva inside Moab, Moses start fo make God's rules mo easy fo da peopo undastand. He tell:
1.6: âWen us guys stay Mount Sinai side, oua God Yahweh wen tell us, âYou guys stay ova hea by dis mountain long time awready.
1.7: Take all yoa stuffs an go up inside da hills wea da Amor peopo stay. Den go wea da peopo dat live nea dem stay, inside da Jordan Valley, an da small hills on da west side, an da Negev boonies sout side, an da Mediterranean Sea coast. Go wea da Canaan peopo stay, den go nort side to da Lebanon mountains, den go east side all da way to da big Eufrates Riva.
1.8: Yahweh tell, âLook, I give you guys all dis land awready. Go inside dea an use da land, cuz I wen make one strong promise to yoa ancesta guys Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob, an to dea kids an grankids an you guys.â
1.9: âBefo us guys leave Mount Sinai, I Moses wen tell you guys, az too hard fo me stay in charge all you guys by myself.
1.10: Yoa God Yahweh wen make you guys come plenny peopo awready. Az why today you guys stay plenny jalike da stars inside da sky.
1.11: I like Yahweh, da God fo yoa ancestas, make you guys come one tousand times mo plenny, an do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys, jalike he wen make promise fo do befo time.
1.12: But I no can take care all you guys problems all by myself, an wit all da stuff you guys worry bout, an da stuff you guys squawk bout, wit nobody fo help me.
1.13: So you guys pick some guys dat you know dey know wat fo do erytime, an dat undastan plenny stuff, an peopo get plenny respeck fo dem. Pick some fo ery one a da twelve ohanas. Den I goin make dem yoa leada
1.14: âSo you guys tell me, âAz good, do wat you tell.â
1.15: âDen I take da leada guys from yoa ohanas, guys dat know wat fo do erytime an you guys get respeck fo dem. I make dem stay in charge a you guys. Some a dem stay in charge a one tousand peopo, some in charge a one hundred peopo, some in charge a fifty, an some in charge a ten. Dey da main guys fo all da twelve ohanas.
1.16: Dat time, I wen tell yoa judge guys wat dey gotta do: Dey gotta lissen good wat da peopo say wen dey make argue wit each odda, an do wass right fo dem, no matta dey make argue wit anodda Israel guy, o wit somebody dass not one Israel guy.
1.17: No make to one guy mo betta den to anodda guy. Lissen, no matta if he one importan guy o one guy dass not importan. No scared dem, cuz God da one goin help you figga wass right, an you stay do um fo him. If you donno wat fo do, den bring dem by me Moses, an I goin lissen.
1.18: Mount Sinai time, I wen tell you guys eryting you guys gotta d
1.19: âDen, jalike wat oua God Yahweh wen tell us, we go from Mount Sinai to da hills inside da Amor peopo's land. We go thru da big an scary boonies dat you guys wen see. Den we reach Kadesh Barnea.
1.20: So I tell you guys, âAll us guys stay come by da hills inside da Amor peopo's land. Dis, da land oua God Yahweh start fo give us.
1.21: Look! Right dea, dass da land dat oua God Yahweh stay give you guys awready! Go take um ova, jalike Yahweh, da God oua ancesta guys wen pray to, wen tell you guys. No scared. No lose fight.â
1.22: Den all you guys come by me an tell, âSend some guys dea firs fo look da land, an den come back an tell us da way we goin go up, an da towns we goin go inside.â
1.23: âDat wen sound good to me, so I pick twelve guys fo go, one guy from ery big ohana.
1.24: Da guys wen go up country, all da way to da Eshkol Gulch, an check um out wat stay ova dea.
1.25: Dey take some a da stuff dat grow ova dea, an bring um back by us. Dey tell us, âAz good, da land dat oua God Yahweh start fo give us.â
1.26: âBut you guys, you neva like go dea. You guys go agains wat yoa God Yahweh tell you guys fo do.
1.27: You guys sit inside yoa tents an grumble. You guys tell, âAz cuz Yahweh hate us! He wen take us outa Egypt fo turn us ova to da Amor peopo, so dey can wipe us out!
1.28: Wea we goin go, aah?! Oua bruddas dat wen go look da land make us lose fight. Dey tell, âDa peopo mo big an mo tall den us. Dea towns stay big. Dey get big wall dat go up inside da sky. We even see giant guys ova dea -- da ones dat come from Anak!â-â
1.29: âDen I tell you guys, âNo need shake and stay scared a dem!
1.30: Oua God Yahweh, he da One goin go in front you guys. He da One goin fight fo you guys, jalike he wen fight fo you guys inside Egypt. You guys wen see dat awready.
1.31: An inside da boonies, you guys wen see yoa God Yahweh take care you guys, like one fadda carry his boy inside his arms. He bring you guys all da way to dis plac
1.32: âNo matta oua God Yahweh do all dat, still yet you guys no trus him.
1.33: Yahweh wen go in front you guys inside one fire nite time, an inside one cloud day time. He even find place wea you guys can make camp nite time! Az how he show you guys wea fo g
1.34: âBut Yahweh hear wat you guys tell, an he come huhu, an he make one strong promise.
1.35: He tell, âNo mo nobody from dis bad peopo dat stay alive now, goin see da good land I wen promise fo give yoa ancestas.
1.36: Ony Caleb, Jefunneh's boy, he stay tight wit me, Yahweh, all da way. Cuz a dat, he goin go inside dat land. An I goin give him an his kids, da ones dat come from him, da land wea he wen walk on top.â
1.37: Cuz a you guys, Yahweh come huhu wit me, Moses, too. He tell me, âNot even you goin go inside da land.
1.38: But yoa helpa guy, Joshua, Nun's boy, he goin go inside dea. Talk to him, give him good kine words, cuz he goin lead da Israel peopo fo take ova da land I goin give dem.â
1.39: An Yahweh tell da peopo, âYou guys even tell dat odda guys goin make yoa litto kids prisonas, no matta dose kids still yet donno wass good an wass bad. But dose kids goin go inside da land. I goin give um to dem, an dey goin own um.
1.40: But you guys, turn aroun an go back inside da boonies on top da road fo go by da Red Sea.â
1.41: âDen you guys tell me, âFo shua, us guys wen do someting bad agains Yahweh! Now we goin go up fight, jalike oua God Yahweh tell us fo do!â So all you guys wen take yoa stuffs fo fight, an tink az not hard fo go up dea inside da hill
1.42: âBut Yahweh tell me, âTell dem, no go up dea fight, cuz I no goin go wit dem. Da guys dat stay agains dem goin win ova dem.â
1.43: âSo I wen tell you guys, but you guys no like lissen. You guys go agains wat Yahweh tell you. You guys get big head an you go up inside da hills.
1.44: But da Amor peopo dat live inside dose hills wen come out fight you guys, an dey make you guys run away, jalike dey plenny bees. Dey bus up you guys all da way from da Se`ir Range to Hormah town.
1.45: Den you guys come back cry in front Yahweh. But he no lissen wen you guys cry, he ony make deaf ear to you guys.
1.46: Az why you guys stay dea Kadesh town long tim

2.1: âDen we turn aroun an go back inside da boonies on top da road fo go by da Red Sea, jalike Yahweh wen tell me. Long time we stay go dis side an dat side aroun da Se`ir [Mountains / Range].
2.2: Den Yahweh tell me,
2.3: âYou guys stay go aroun dis mountain range long time awready. Now, you go turn aroun an go north side.
2.4: Tell da peopo wat dey gotta do: âYou guys, almos you goin go pass da land wea yoa brudda guys stay, da peopo dat get Esau fo dea ancesta. Dey live inside da Se`ir [Mountain / Range]. Dey goin come scared a you guys. So take care plenny so notting happen.
2.5: No make like you tink you goin make war wit dem. Cuz I no goin give you guys dea land, notting. You guys no goin even get nuff land dea fo put yoa feets on top um. Cuz I awready wen give da Esau ohana da Se`ir [Mountains / Range].
2.6: Us guys goin buy da food us guys eat and da watta us guys drink, an pay dem wit silva.â-â
2.7: An Moses tell, âCuz oua God Yahweh wen do plenny good stuff fo us guys, an make eryting us guys make, come out good. He wen take care us guys inside da big boonies. He wen stay wit us guys fo all dis forty years, an neva need notting eva.â
2.8: âSo us guys go pass our bruddas, da Esau ohana peopo, dat live inside da Se`ir [Mountains / Range]. We turn from da Arabah road dat come up da Arabah Valley from Elat an Ezion Geber, an go by da Moab road inside da boonie
2.9: âDen Yahweh tell me, âNo bodda da Moab peopo an make hard time an make dem like make war wit you guys. Cuz I no goin give you guys notting from dea land. I awready give dea main town Ar to da Moab peopo dat get Lot fo dea ancesta.â
2.10: â(Da Em peopo live ova dea befo time too. Dey strong an dey plenny peopo, an dey tall jalike da Anak giants.
2.11: Some peopo call dem da Refa peopo, jalike da Anak peopo, but da Moab peopo call dem da Em peopo.
2.12: Da Hor peopo live inside da Se`ir [Mountains / Range] befo time too, but da Esau ohana peopo get dem outa dea. Dey wipe out da Hor peopo an take ova dea land, jalike us Israel peopo make da Canaan peopos get outa inside da land Yahweh give us fo come oua property
2.13: Moses tell da peopo: âDen Yahweh tell me, âNow, go da odda side da Zered Stream.â So we go da odda side, to da Moab lan
2.14: Az was thirty-eight years afta we go way from Kadesh Barnea da firs time, dat we go da odda side da Zered Stream. Dat time, all da fighta guys dat wen stay alive befo, awready mahke, jalike Yahweh wen make strong promise fo do to dem.
2.15: Yahweh wen stay agains dose guys, till he wipe dem out from da peopo all da wa
2.16: âAfta all dose guys dat can fight mahke,
2.17: Yahweh tell me,
2.18: âToday you guys goin pass Moab, an leave dea land nea Ar town.
2.19: You guys go pass da land wea da Ammon peopo stay. No bodda dem an no make dem like fight you guys. Cuz I no goin give you guys da Ammon peopo's land, notting. I awready give dat land to dem, cuz dey da Lot ohana peopo.â
2.20: (Some peopo tink dat land was fo da Refa peopo too, cuz dey wen live dea befo time, but da Ammon peopo call dem da Zamzum peopo.
2.21: Dey was strong peopo, an get plenny a dem. Dey tall jalike da Anak giants. Yahweh wen let da Ammon peopo wipe out da Refa peopo, an take ova dea land. Den da Ammon peopo live inside dat land, an not da Refa peopo.
2.22: Yahweh do da same ting fo da Esau ohana peopo, dat stay live inside da Se`ir Mountains, cuz he wen wipe out da Hor peopo dat stay dea befo da Esau peopo. Da Esau ohana take ova dea land an stay live dea till now.
2.23: An da Av peopo dat live inside da small towns all da way by Gaza, da Filisha peopo dat come dea from Crete Island wen wipe dem out, an stay live dat land now
2.24: âYahweh tell, âGo da odda side da Arnon Stream now. Look, I give you guys da powa fo fight Sihon awready, da king fo Heshbon town wea da Amor peopo stay, an take ova his land. Start now fo take ova da land an fight King Sihon dem.
2.25: From today, I goin make all da diffren peopos unda da sky come real scared a you guys. Dey goin hear bout you guys an come scared an shake, an worry plenny cuz a you guys.â
2.26: Moses tell: âFrom da boonies Kedemot side, I wen send some messenja guys fo tell dem fo go by Sihon, da king inside Heshbon, dat us guys like make good wit him. I tell,
2.27: âPlease, let us guys go pass thru yoa land. We goin stay on top da main road. We no goin go da right side o da left side.
2.28: Us guys like buy food an watta fo eat an drink, an us guys goin pay wit silva. Ony let us walk thru dea.
2.29: Da Esau ohana peopo dat live inside da Se`ir [Mountain / Range], an da Moab peopo dat live Ar town, dey wen let us guys pass thru dea land and buy food. So us guys like fo you do dat too, till we go da odda side da Jordan Riva an go inside da land oua God Yahweh start fo give us.â
2.30: But Sihon, da king fo Heshbon town, no like let us go thru dea. Az cuz oua God Yahweh wen make him hard head, fo give you guys da powa fo take him. An now, God wen let you guys wi
2.31: âDen Yahweh tell me, âLook, I start awready fo give you Sihon an his land. Now you guys can start fo make his land yoa property.â
2.32: âDen Sihon an all his army guys wen come outside da town fo fight us guys [by] Jahaz side,
2.33: But oua God Yahweh give him to us an we bus um up, him an his boys, an all his army guys.
2.34: Dat time, we take ova all his towns an wipe um all out jalike we stay make one big sacrifice fo God: guys, wahines, an kids. We no let nobody stay alive.
2.35: But all dea stuffs an da animals from da towns, we wen take um away fo ourself.
2.36: From Aroer town wea can look down inside da Arnon Canyon, an da odda town inside da canyon, all da way nort side to Gilead, no even get one town dat get big wall dat stay too big fo us guys. Oua God Yahweh give us all dem.
2.37: But jalike oua God Yahweh tell us guys fo do, we neva bodda da Ammon peopo, o da land by da Jabbok Riva, o da towns inside da hill

3.1: Afta dat we turn go nort side by da road dat go Bashan. Og, da king fo da Bashan peopo an all his army guys come out fo fight us by Edrei.
3.2: Yahweh tell me, âNo come scared King Og, cuz I goin give you guys da powa fo take all his army guys an his land. Make jalike you guys wen make to Sihon, da king fo da Amor peopo, dat was king Heshbon town.â
3.3: So, oua God Yahweh wen give us powa ova Og, da king fo da Bashan peopo, an all his army guys too. We wipe dem all out. No mo nobody stay alive dea.
3.4: Dat time, we take ova all his big towns. From da sixty towns Argob side, all ova wea Og stay king inside Bashan, neva have one town dat us guy no take ova.
3.5: All dose big towns get tall walls dat nobody can broke down, an gates wit bars on top um. An get plenny odda town dat no mo wall too.
3.6: We wipe um all out, jalike we stay make one big sacrifice fo God. We do same ting fo Sihon, da king inside Heshbon: we wipe out guys, wahines, an kids.
3.7: But all dea animals an stuffs we take um away fo oursel
3.8: Dat time, we take ova da land from da two Amor kings -- da land da east side da Jordan Riva from da Arnon Canyon to Mount Hermon.
3.9: (Da Sidon peopo call Hermon âSirionâ, an da Amor peopo call um âSenirâ.)
3.10: We take all da towns up country an all Gilead, an all Bashan to Salekah, an Edrei, da towns wea Og wen stay king inside da Bashan land.
3.11: (Ony Og, da king fo Bashan, stay dea from da odda Refa peopo, wen he mahke. Og get one iron pune`e thirteen feet long an six feet wide. Dat pune`e still yet stay dea inside Rabbah town wea da Ammon peopo live
3.12: From da land we take ova dat time, I give da Reuben an da Gad ohanas da land on da nort side Aroer by da Arnon Canyon, an half da up country an da towns inside Gilead.
3.13: Da odda land inside Gilead an all da land inside Bashan, wea Og was king befo time, I give um to half da Manasseh ohana. (You know, all da Argob land inside Bashan, befo time da peopo call um da Refa peopo's land.
3.14: Ja`ir from da Manasseh ohana take da land inside Argob, all da way to wea da Geshur peopo an da Ma`acah peopo stay. Today da peopo still yet call Bashan âJa`ir Townsâ.)
3.15: An I give Gilead to da peopo dat come from Makir, Manasseh boy.
3.16: But I give da land from Gilead to da Arnon Canyon to da Reuben an Gad ohanas, from da middo a da Arnon Canyon to da Jabbok Riva, wea da Ammon peopo stay.
3.17: On da west side get da Jordan Riva inside da Arabah Valley, from da Kinneret Lake to da big lake inside da Arabah Valley (az da Big Salt Lake), unda Mount Pisgah, da eas sid
3.18: Dat time, I wen tell you Reuben, Gad, an Manasseh guys dat goin stay east a da Jordan Riva, wat you gotta do: âYoa God Yahweh wen give you guys da land dis side fo come yoa property. So all yoa guys dat can fight, gotta take dea bows an arrows an swords, an go da odda side da Jordan Riva in front da odda Israel peopo fo help fight dem firs.
3.19: But yoa wifes, yoa kids, an all da animals you get, can stay inside da towns I wen give you guys ova hea. (I know you guys get plenny animals.)
3.20: Afta yoa brudda guys pau fight, an dey take ova da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give dem da odda side da Jordan Riva too, Yahweh goin let dem res. Den all you guys can come back da land I wen awready give you guys ova hea.â

12.32: âMake shua you guys do eryting I stay tell you guys. No add notting to um, an no take notting awa

13.1: âIf get somebody dat tell you guys dey talk fo God, o somebody dat say dey can dream fo tell you wat goin happen bumbye, take care! If one a dem tell dat dey get proof dat one awesome miracle goin happen fo show God's powa,
13.2: an maybe wat dey wen tell, happen fo real. But den dey tell, âCome! Us goin stick wit odda gods, an work fo dem!â An you guys neva know dose gods befo.
13.3: If dass how dey talk, den you guys betta not lissen to dat talka guy o da guy dat dream. Cuz yoa God Yahweh, da One stay give you guys one test fo find out if az fo real you get love an aloha fo him wit eryting how you tink, an wit eryting dat stay inside you.
13.4: Az yoa God Yahweh you guys gotta follow, an stay scared a him an get respeck fo him. Do wat he tell you guys fo do, an lissen to him. Work ony fo him, an stay tight wit him.

13.6: âIf yoa own brudda, yoa mudda o fadda's boy, o yoa boy o girl, o yoa wife dat you love, o yoa mos good friend talk to you wea nobody can hear an like try make you like do wat you not suppose to do, an tell, âEh! Us go down in front odda gods,â no lissen dem. You guys an yoa ancestas neva know dose gods befo.

13.8: No do wat dey tell. No lissen dem. No pity dem. No give dem chance. No try hide dem o wat dey do.
13.9: You gotta kill dem fo shua. You gotta be da firs one fo kill um, an den all da odda peopo do da same ting.
13.10: Throw stones at dem fo kill um, cuz dey try turn you guys away from yoa God Yahweh, dat wen bring you guys outa Egypt, wea you guys was slaves.
13.11: Den all da Israel peopo goin hear bout um an come scared, an nobody from you guys goin do dat kine bad ting agai

13.13: get no good guys from yoa peopo, dat stay try turn da peopo from dat town away from Yahweh to odda gods. Dey tell, âUs go down in front odda gods an show respeck fo dem.â But you guys neva know dose gods befo.
13.14: If you guys hear dat, den you guys gotta aks good, fo find out fo shua if eryting dass happening, az true. If az true an you guys know fo shua dat dey wen do dis pilau kine ting inside yoa land,
13.15: den you guys gotta kill all da peopo inside dat town wit yoa swords. Wipe dem all out, da peopo an da animals, jalike dey one sacrifice dat stay foeva fo me ony, Yahweh.
13.16: Take away all dea stuffs an put um all inside da middle a da town. Den burn up da whole town an all da stuffs. Az goin be jalike one sacrifice fo yoa God Yahweh. Da town goin stay one rubbish pile foeva. Nobody goin build dea again.
13.17: You guys betta not carry away anyting from dat town dat you was suppose to wipe out fo God. So den, yoa God Yahweh no goin stay huhu no moa. He goin show pity fo you guys, an give you chance, an he goin make you guys come mo plenny peopo, jalike he wen make strong promise to yoa ancestas fo do.
13.18: Yoa God Yahweh goin do all dis wen you guys lissen to him, an do eryting he tell you guys fo do, dat I stay telling you guys today, fo do wass right da way yoa God Yahweh see u

14.1: âYou guys da kids fo yoa God Yahweh. So no go cut yoaself o shave da front a yoa head wen somebody mahke.
14.2: Cuz you guys, one peopo dat stay spesho fo yoa God Yahweh. He wen pick you guys from all da peopos on top da earth fo come his spesho peopo dat stay ony fo hi
14.3: âNo eat no pilau kine ting, notting.
14.4: Dis da kine animals you guys can eat: cows, sheeps, an goats,
14.5: deers, gazelle kine deers, red deers, wild goats, da ibex kine deer, da antelope kine deer, an da mountain sheep.
14.6: You guys can eat any kine animal dat get split in da hoof all da way, an dat chew da food ova an ova.
14.7: But from da animals dat no mo split in da hoof all da way, no matta dey chew da food ova an ova, you guys no can eat da camel, da rabbit, o da rock badger. No matta dey chew da food ova an ova, dey no mo da split in da hoof all da way, so dey can make you guys so you no can come in front God if you eat um.
14.8: Same ting fo da pig, make you so you no can come in front God too if you eat um, even if get split in da hoof all da way, cuz no chew da food ova an ova. You guys no can eat dea meat o touch dea body wen dey mahk
14.9: âFrom all da animals living inside da watta, you guys can eat wateva animal get fins an scales.
14.10: But wateva animal dat no mo fins o scales, you guys no can eat um, cuz dey make you guys so you no can come in front Go
14.11: âYou guys can eat any bird dat no make you stay so you no can come in front God.
14.12: But dis kine bird, you guys no can eat: da eagle, da scavenja bird, da fish eagle,
14.13: da kite, da hawk, an any kine falcon bird,
14.15: da ostrich, da nite hawk, da seagull,
14.16: da small owl, da big owl, da white owl,
14.17: da pelican, da odda kine scavenja bird, da cormorant,
14.18: da stork, any kine heron, da hoopoe bird, an da ba
14.19: âAll da bugs dat fly togedda make you guys so you no can come in front God. No eat dem.
14.20: But odda kine bugs dat get wings you guys can eat, dat no make you so you no can come in front Go
14.21: âNo eat notting dat you guys find dat awready stay mahke. You guys can give um to one guy from odda place dat live inside yoa town, o sell um to one guy from odda place dat go thru yoa town, an dey can eat um. But you guys stay spesho fo yoa God Yahweh, so no eat u
14.22: âYou guys gotta put on da side, ten percent a da food you cut from inside yoa field ery year.
14.23: Take da ten percent a yoa wheat an barley, yoa new wine, yoa olive oil, an da firs one fo born from yoa cows, sheeps, an goats, to da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick so peopo can go dea find out wat kine God him. Eat um dea in front Yahweh. Dass how you guys goin learn fo get respeck fo yoa God Yahweh all da time.
14.24: But if dat place Yahweh goin pick stay too far, an yoa God Yahweh wen do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys, so if you no can carry all da stuff to da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick, so peopo can go dea find out wat kine God him,
14.25: den change God's ten percent a yoa stuff fo silva, an take da silva an go da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick.
14.26: Use da silva fo buy wateva you like: cows, sheeps, wine o beer, o anyting you like. Den you an yoa ohana goin eat um ova dea in front yoa God Yahweh an stay good inside.
14.27: Make shua you guys no foget da Levi ohana peopo dat stay inside yoa towns, cuz dey no mo land o odda property from Yahwe
14.28: Afta ery three years, take all da ten percent from da food you guys grow inside yoa field dat year, an put um inside da store house inside yoa towns.
14.29: So dat da Levi ohana peopo dat no mo land o odda property from Yahweh, da peopo from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, an da wahines dat no mo husban, dat live inside yoa town, dey can come an get plenny fo eat. Den yoa God Yahweh goin do plenny good stuff fo you guys, wateva you start fo d

15.1: Afta ery seven years, wateva peopo owe you, you guys gotta let um go an no make dem pay you back.
15.2: Dis how you goin do um. Erybody gotta foget [bout] wat dey wen lend to anodda Israel guy. Dey no goin aks da odda Israel guy fo pay um back, cuz az jalike dea brudda, you know, an az da time wen Yahweh tell erybody fo no need pay um back.
15.3: You guys can aks one guy from odda place pay you back, but you gotta foget wateva yoa Israel brudda owe yo
15.4: âNo goin get peopo dat no mo notting wit you guys. Cuz inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys cuz you his kids, he goin do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys.
15.5: But yoa God Yahweh goin do dis, ony if you guys take care plenny fo do all dis stuff he wen tell you guys fo do, an I stay tell you guys today.
15.6: Cuz yoa God Yahweh goin do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys, jalike he wen make promise fo do. You guys goin let plenny peopos borrow stuff from you, but you guys no need borrow stuff from nobody. You guys goin stay in charge a plenny peopos, but nobody goin stay in charge a you guy
15.7: âIf get bruddas o sistas dat no mo notting inside yoa towns, inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, no come hard head an come stingy bout dem.
15.8: Mo betta fo open yoa heart an let um borrow wateva dey need.
15.9: Take care you guys no tink dis kine no good kine ting, âDa year numba seven stay come nea, wen we gotta foget wateva somebody owe us an let um go!â No good you tink lidat an come mean an no give yoa brudda guys notting wen dey no mo notting. If you make lidat, dey can aks Yahweh fo help dem agains you, an you goin get da blame fo do wass bad.
15.10: Make shua you give yoa brudda wat he need, an no tink stingy kine bout wat you give him. Den, cuz you give to him, yoa God Yahweh goin do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys erytime, wateva you guys stay do.
15.11: Erytime, goin get some peopo dat no mo notting inside da land. Az why I tell you guys fo open yoa heart fo give stuff to yoa brudda guys wen dey no mo powa an dey need plenny inside yoa lan
15.12: âIf one Hebrew guy o wahine sell demself to you, an work fo you fo six year, you gotta let um go wen da numba seven year start.
15.13: An wen you let dem go, no send dem away wit notting.
15.14: Give um plenny from yoa animals, yoa wheat an barley, an yoa wine. Give um, jalike yoa God Yahweh wen give plenny to you guys.
15.15: Rememba, you guys was slaves too Egypt side, an yoa God Yahweh wen do wat he gotta do fo get you guys outa dea. Az why I tell you guys today, fo make lidat fo da slave guys wen you let um g
15.16: âBut if yoa slave guy tell you, âI no like go way from you! Cuz I get love an aloha fo you an yoa ohana, an eryting stay good fo me hea wit you!â
15.17: Den take one spike an push um thru da bottom a his ear lobe in one door an take um out. He goin come yoa slave guy all da time he stay alive. An do da same ting fo yoa slave if az one wahine.
15.18: No tink az too hard fo let yoa slave guy go, cuz wat he do fo you fo six years was two times mo den wat one guy dat you pay do. Den Yahweh goin make wateva you do come good fo you guy
15.19: âEry year put on da side fo yoa God Yahweh, ery boy kine animal dat born firs from yoa cows an sheeps an goats. No make da firs boy kine cow dat born work fo you, an no cut da wool from da firs boy kine sheep dat wen born too.
15.20: Ery year you an yoa ohana goin eat um in front yoa God Yahweh by da place he goin pick.
15.21: If da animal get someting wrong wit um, if no can walk good, o no can see, o some odda bad kine ting, no kill um fo make sacrifice fo yoa God Yahweh.
15.22: You can eat um inside yoa own towns. Even da peopo dat no can come in front God can eat um, an da peopo dat can come in front God too, jalike dey stay eat one deer.
15.23: But you guys no can eat da blood. Pour um on top da groun jalike watt

16.1: âMake spesho da Abib month ery year spring time, an make da Passova time fo yoa God Yahweh, cuz az was da month wen he wen bring you guys outa Egypt nite time.
16.2: Make sacrifice -- one animal from yoa sheeps, goats, o cows fo da Passova fo yoa God Yahweh. Do um by da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick so peopo can go dea find out wat kine God him.

16.12: No foget, you guys was slaves inside Egypt, so take care fo do all dese tings you guys gotta d

16.14: Dance an sing fo da spesho religious time -- you, yoa boys an girls, yoa slave guys an wahines, da Levi ohana peopo, da peopo from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, da wahines dat no mo husban, erybody dat stay inside yoa town.
16.15: Make da spesho religious time fo seven days, by da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick. Cuz he goin do plenny good kine stuff fo you guys, for da stuff you guys grow, an da stuff you make wit yoa hands. Fo shua, you guys goin stay real good inside cuz a da
16.16: Three times ery year, all da guys gotta show up in front yoa God Yahweh by da place he goin pick fo da Spesho Religious Time Fo Da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast, fo da Spesho Religious Time Fo Cut Food, an fo da Spesho Religious Time Fo Live In Shacks. 16.18: âPick judge guys an leada guys fo all da ohanas inside ery town dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys. Dey goin judge da peopo, an do um da right way.
16.19: No judge da wrong way, an no make mo spesho fo some peopo. No take money from peopo so you do tings fo dem. Cuz dat make da peopo dat know wat fo do erytime jalike dey no can see, an make da peopo dat do wass right erytime jalike dey donno notting.
16.20: Do da right kine stuff, an ony dat! Cuz den you guys goin take ova da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, an live de

16.22: an no put up big kine kapu stones fo da odda gods, cuz yoa God Yahweh hate de

17.1: Moses tell da Israel peopo: âNo make sacrifice fo yoa God Yahweh wit cows o sheeps dat get someting wrong wit um, cuz az pilau dat kine animal, da way Yahweh see u
17.2: âWen you live inside one a da towns dat yoa God Yahweh goin give you guys, maybe goin get one guy o one wahine dat live dea wit you guys, an dey stay do bad kine stuff da way yoa God Yahweh see um, an go way from da deal he wen make wit you guys.
17.3: An dat mean, dey go broke his rules, cuz dey go bow down in front odda gods an show respeck to dem, o to da sun, da moon, o da stars.
17.4: An somebody come tell you guys bout um, den you gotta go find out if az true fo real kine. If get proof dat dis pilau kine stuff wen happen wit da Israel peopo, den you know az true fo real kine.
17.5: Den go take da guy o da wahine dat wen do dis bad kine ting outside da gate fo da town, an erybody throw stones at dem fo kill dem.
17.6: If get two o three peopo wen see wat happen tell da same ting, den stay true fo real kine, an you guys gotta kill da guy o da wahine. But you no can kill one guy o one wahine if ony one guy tell dat he wen see dem do someting bad.
17.7: Da ones dat tell wat dey wen see da guy o da wahine do, dey da ones gotta throw da stones firs fo kill um, den da odda peopo can throw afta. Az how you guys gotta clean out da bad kine stuff from yoa town
17.8: âIf get stuff, da local judge guy donno wat fo do bout um -- wat kine ting wen happen wen somebody go kill anodda guy, o who get wat kine rights, o why somebody bus up anodda guy. Take dat kine question by da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick.
17.9: Go by da pries guys from da Levi ohana, an by da guy who stay da main judge dat time. Aks dem, an dey goin tell you guys wat you gotta do.
17.10: Den, da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick, you guys gotta do wat dey wen tell you. Take care dat you guys do eryting dey tell you fo do.
17.11: Do eryting da rules teach you fo do, an wateva dey tell you guys stay right fo do. No turn away from wat dey tell you, to da right side o da left side.
17.12: Whoeva ack like dey no care wat da main judge o da pries guy dat work ova dea fo yoa God Yahweh tell, an dey no lissen, gotta kill dem. You guys gotta clean out da bad kine stuff from da Israel land.
17.13: Den all da peopo goin hear bout dat an come scared, an dey goin make shua fo lissen da judge o da pries nex tim
17.14: Moses tell: âWen da time fo you guys go inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you, fo take ova an live dea, bumbye you guys goin tink, âWe like get one king fo stay in charge a us, jalike all da odda peopos aroun us get.â
17.15: If you tink lidat, make shua you guys make king, ony da guy dat yoa God Yahweh pick. He gotta be one a yoa own brudda guys. No go pick one guy from some odda place, dat not one Israel guy.
17.16: Ony rememba: da king no can get plenny horses fo himself, o make da peopo go back Egypt side fo get mo horses. Cuz Yahweh, he wen tell you guys, âNo go back Egypt side no moa!â
17.17: He betta not get plenny wifes, cuz dey goin make him tink diffren bout Yahweh. He betta not pile up plenny silva an gol
17.18: âWen he come king, he gotta write one copy a all dese rules fo himself. He goin copy um on top one roll up kine book, from da copy da pries guys get, from da Levi ohana.
17.19: Dat book goin stay wit him, an he gotta read da rules ery day he stay alive. Dass how he goin learn fo get plenny respeck fo his God Yahweh, an take care fo do eryting Yahweh tell um he suppose to do.
17.20: If he stay read um an do wat da rules tell, den he no goin tink he mo betta den da odda Israel guys, an he no goin turn away from wat God tell um fo do even litto bit to da right side o da lef side. Den him an da ones dat come from him goin stay king ova da Israel peopo long tim

18.1: âDa pries guys, from da Levi ohana guys, all da Levi ohana peopos, no goin get land an odda property from Yahweh, da way da odda Israel peopo get um. Da Levi ohana peopo goin eat da meat from da sacrifices da Israel peopo make wit fire fo Yahweh. Dass da kine property dey goin get.
18.2: Cuz dey no goin get land from Yahweh jalike dea brudda guys. Wat dey goin get, is da right fo be da pries guys fo Yahweh, jalike he wen make promise to de
18.3: âDis wat da pries guys get da right fo get from da peopo: Weneva da peopo make sacrifice wit cows o sheeps o goats, dey give da pries guys da shoulder meat, da jaw meat, an da parts inside da opu.
18.4: You guys goin give dem da firs wheat an barley dat you cut, da new wine, an da firs olive oil dat you press, an da firs wool from yoa sheeps wen you cut um.
18.5: Az cuz yoa God Yahweh wen pick da Levi ohana, all da guys dat goin come from Levi, outa all da odda Israel ohanas, fo stand in front Yahweh an do religious kine stuff fo him foeva, cuz he wen pick dem
18.6: If one Levi guy from any town inside Israel wea he stay live, an he come da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick cuz he really like work dea fo Yahweh,
18.7: he can work dea fo his God Yahweh cuz he God's guy, jalike all da odda Levi ohana guys dat work ova dea in front Yahweh erytime.
18.8: He goin get da same ting wit dem fo eat from wat da peopo bring fo da Levi ohana guys, no matta he awready get someting from wen he sell his ohana stuff
18.9: âWen you guys go inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, no do da kine pilau stuff dat da peopos dat live ova dea do, cuz Yahweh hate dat.
18.10: No good if even one a you guys throw yoa boy o girl inside da fire fo make sacrifice. No go find out from da spirits wat goin happen. No tell fortune. No tink da tings you see is da kine sign fo you tell peopo wat goin happen. No put kahuna.
18.11: No use special kine words fo make peopo so dey no can do notting. No try talk to da spirits, da obake, o da mahke guys.
18.12: Anybody go make lidat, az pilau, da way Yahweh see um. Da odda peopos make lidat, az why yoa God Yahweh goin push dem outa dea land in front you guys.
18.13: Still yet, you guys gotta be perfeck, no mo blame fo anyting, da way you gotta be wit yoa God Yahwe
18.14: âDa peopo you guys goin push out, dey lissen to da peopo dat tell fortune an try find out from da spirits wat goin happen. But yoa God Yahweh neva let you guys make lidat.
18.15: But yoa God Yahweh goin bring one guy from yoa own peopo, dat talk fo him to you guys, jalike me. Him, da one you guys betta lissen to.
18.16: Cuz az wat you guys wen aks yoa God Yahweh fo do, dat time Mount Sinai side wen you guys stay all togedda. You guys tell, âNo let us hear da voice from oua God Yahweh, o see dis big fire no moa! Bumbye we goin mahke!â
18.17: âWen dey say dat, Yahweh tell me, âWat dey say stay good.
