18.18: I goin bring one guy from yoa own peopo, dat talk fo me to da Israel peopo, jalike you, Moses. I goin tell dat guy wat fo say, an he goin tell dem eryting I tell him.
18.19: Anybody no like lissen wat my talka guy tell cuz he my guy, I goin poin finga dat guy.
18.20: But anybody dat tell he stay talk fo me, but tell dem stuff dat I neva tell him fo say, o any guy dat talk fo odda gods, you guys gotta kill dem.â
18.21: â Maybe you guys goin tink, âHow us guys can know if one guy tell he talk fo Yahweh, but az not was Yahweh tell um fo say dat?â
18.22: If one talka guy tell dat he talk fo Yahweh, but wat he tell no happen, den az neva come from Yahweh. Dat talka guy ack big head, but he neva take care fo lissen wat Yahweh tell fo real kine. No come scared a hi

19.1: âYoa God Yahweh goin wipe out da peopos dat live inside da land he stay give you guys. Wen you guys go push dem out an live inside dea towns an houses,
19.2: den you guys go pick three towns in da middle a da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo take um ova.
19.3: Build roads fo go dea, an broke da land in three districk, da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa property. Make three districk wit one town inside ery one. So dat whoeva kill somebody, dey can run away de
19.4: âDis da rule fo whoeva kill somebody an run away to one a dose towns fo stay alive. If dey neva make plan befo time fo kill da guy, dey can run away ova dea inside da town, an nobody get da right fo kill dem.
19.5: Jalike if somebody go inside one place wit his friend fo cut one tree fo wood, an wen he swing da ax fo cut down da tree, da head fly off an kill his friend. Dat kine guy can run to one a dese towns wea somebody can go if dey wen kill somebody, but no make plan fo kill um befo time, an nobody get da right fo go kill um.
19.6: If not, den one ohana guy dat get da right fo pay um back goin come huhu, go chase um, catch um up if da town stay far, an kill um, no matta da guy dat run away no mo da blame fo kill da odda guy, cuz he neva hate da guy befo time.
19.7: Az why I stay tell you guys fo pick three towns fo da
19.8: âBumbye, yoa God Yahweh goin give you guys mo plenny land, jalike he wen make strong promise to yoa ancesta guys, an he goin give you guys da whole land dat he wen promise dem.
19.9: Den, if you guys make shua you do eryting dat da rules I tell you guys today tell you fo do -- love yoa God Yahweh, an erytime live da way he like -- den you guys gotta pick three odda towns too.
19.10: Do dat so you guys no go kill somebody dat neva do notting bad inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa property. Cuz if you guys go kill somebody dat neva do notting bad, den da blame fo kill dem come to you guy
19.11: âBut if somebody hate anodda guy, an wait fo him so he can jump um, bus um up, an kill um, an den da killa guy run to one a dose towns,
19.12: da older leadas from his own town goin send peopo fo bring da guy back from da safe town, an give him to da guy from da mahke guy ohana dat get da right fo kill him, cuz he gotta mahke.
19.13: No show him pity notting. You guys gotta clean out from da Israel peopo da blame fo kill somebody dat neva do notting wrong, so dat eryting can go good fo you guy
19.14: âWen you guys go inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo take ova fo come yoa property, no go move da stone dat show wea da land stay fo da guy dat live nea you. Da peopo dat wen stay dea befo you guys wen put dat stone dea.â
19.15: Den Moses tell: âIf ony get one guy dat see someting happen, dass not nuff fo tell dat somebody wen do someting bad o do someting wrong. Ony can make proof wit two o three peopo dat see um do u
19.16: âIf one bad guy poin finga anodda guy fo tell dat he wen see um do something wrong, but he bulai,
19.17: den da two guys dat make argue wit each odda gotta stand in front Yahweh an da prieses an da judge guys dat stay work inside da office dat time.
19.18: Da judges gotta aks plenny questions ab check out eryting real good an find out if da guy stay bulai. If da guy bulai bout his brudda,
19.19: den you guys gotta make to da bulaia guy jalike how he wen like make to his brudda. You guys gotta clean out da real bad kine stuff from you guys.
19.20: Den da odda peopo goin hear bout dat, an come scared, an no do dis kine bad kine ting no mo, eva.
19.21: No show pity fo dat kine guy! One life fo anodda life, one eye fo anodda eye, one tooth fo anodda tooth, one hand fo anodda hand, one foot fo anodda foo

20.1: âWen you guys go fight one war wit da peopo dat stay agains you, an you guys see dey get horses an war wagons, an one army wit mo plenny guys den you, no scared dem. Cuz yoa God Yahweh, he goin stay wit you guys. He da One wen bring you guys hea from Egypt.
20.2: Wen you guys almos ready fo fight dem, da pries guy goin come in front yoa army guys fo talk.
20.3: He goin tell, âLissen you Israel guys! Today you guys stay ready fo go fight da peopo dat stay agains you. No lose fight. No scared dem. No come scared an shaking cuz a dem.
20.4: Cuz yoa God Yahweh, he da One stay go wit you guys an fight fo you guys. He goin fight da peopo dat stay agains you guys. Az how you guys goin win ova dem.â
20.5: âDen da main army officers goin tell da army guys, âAnybody hea jus wen build one house, an no make party fo start live inside still yet? Dey can go home, cuz if dey mahke bumbye wen dey stay fighting, den some odda guy goin start fo live inside dat house.
20.6: Get anybody hea dat jus wen plant one grape farm, an no cut da grapes yet? Dey can go home, cuz if dey mahke wen dey stay fighting, den some odda guy goin cut da grapes.
20.7: Get anybody hea dat wen make promise to one wahine dat he goin marry her, but neva marry her still yet? He can go home, cuz if he mahke wen he stay fighting, den some odda guy goin marry her.â
20.8: Den da army leadas goin tell da army guys dis too, âAnybody hea dat stay lose fight an donno how fo make up his mind, he can go home, cuz bumbye his brudda guys goin lose fight jalike him.â
20.9: Wen da main army officers pau tell da guys all dis, dey goin put main army leadas fo da war in charge a da army guy
20.10: âWen you go up fo go fight in one big town, tell da peopo dea you no like fight, so make one deal wit dem fo no go fight.
20.11: Den if dey say az good wat you tell, an den open da gates fo da town, den you goin make all da peopo dea work fo you guys.
20.12: But if dey say dey no like wat you tell dem, an like fight you guys, den put army guys all aroun da town so nobody can go inside o come outside.
20.13: Wen yoa God Yahweh give dem to you guys, kill all da guys ova dea wit swords.
20.14: You guys can take da wahines, da kids, da animals, an all da odda stuff inside da town fo yoaself an you can use um. Az how yoa God Yahweh tell you guys fo make to da guys dat stay agains you.
20.15: Az how you guys can make to all da towns dat stay far from you guys, but not if az towns fo da peopos dat stay live nea you guy
20.16: âInside da towns a da peopos dat stay live nea you guys, dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa property, no leave nobody alive, not even da animals.
20.17: You guys gotta wipe um all out, jalike you make one big sacrifice fo Yahweh -- da Het peopo, da Amor peopo, da Canaan peopo, da Periz peopo, da Hiv peopo, an da Jebus peopo, jalike yoa God Yahweh wen tell you guys fo do.
20.18: If you no wipe um out lidat, bumbye dey goin teach you guys fo do same kine real pilau kine stuff dey do wen dey go down in front dea gods. You goin do bad kine stuff agains yoa God Yahwe
20.19: âWen you guys put yoa army guys all aroun one town fo long time so you can take um ova, no cut down dea trees wit ax, cuz you guys can eat da fruit from da trees. Eh! Da trees, dey not peopo, you know, dat you guys gotta fight dem.
20.20: Da ony kine trees you guys can cut down, dey da trees dat you know dey no give fruit. Cuz den you guys can use da wood fo make ladder an tower fo go up ova da top a dea wall, till you make um give u

21.1: âIf you find somebody dat stay mahke awready dat stay inside one field inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo take ova, an nobody know who wen kill um,
21.2: den yoa older leadas an judges goin go out an measure how far da body stay to da towns dat stay nea.
21.3: Den da older leadas from da town dat stay mo nea, goin take one young girl cow dat neva work yet, an no wear one yoke yet,
21.4: an take um inside one valley dat nobody wen plow o plant, an get one stream dat run all da time. Inside da valley dey goin broke da young cow's neck.
21.5: Den da pries guys from da Levi ohana, goin come in front, cuz yoa God Yahweh wen pick dem fo work fo him, an fo tell Yahweh dey like he do good stuff fo da peopo cuz dey Yahweh guys, an fo figga out wass right an wass wrong wen peopo make argue o bus up each odda.
21.6: Den all da older leadas from da mos nea town wea da guy wen mahke, goin wash dea hands ova da young cow, da one dat dey broke da neck, inside da valley nea da town,
21.7: an dey goin talk fo dea peopo, an tell, âUs guys neva make dis guy bleed an mahke, an we neva see wat wen happen.
21.8: Please Yahweh, take wat we do hea fo you let go yoa Israel peopo an let dem stay da same side wit you. You wen pay da price fo hemo da blame from dem. Please no blame dem cuz somebody wen kill dis guy dat neva do notting wrong.â
21.9: Az how you guys goin make yoaself come clean from da blame fo kill dis guy dat neva do notting wrong, cuz you guys wen do wat stay right da way Yahweh see you guy
21.10: âWen you guys go fight one war agains da peopo dat stay agains you guys, an yoa God Yahweh let you guys win ova dem, an you guys make some a dem prisnas,
21.11: den if you see one a dem dass one good looking wahine, an like her, you can take her fo come yoa wife.
21.12: Bring her inside yoa house, an tell her fo cut off all her hair fo show eryting goin be diffren now, an cut her finganails,
21.13: an throw way da clotheses she was wearing wen dey make her prisna. Afta she live inside yoa house, an cry fo one month cuz she no goin see her fadda an mudda again, den you can sleep wit her an come her husban, an she goin come yoa wife.
21.14: But den, if you no like her, you can let her go. She can go wea eva she like. But you no can sell her o make her jalike she one slave, cuz you wen make her shame awread
21.15: âIf one guy get two wifes, an he get love fo one but not fo da odda, an da two wifes born boys fo him, but da firs boy come from da wife he no love,
21.16: den wen he make one will fo give his land to his boys, he no can give mo plenny land to da boy from da wife he love, but not to da boy dat born firs dat come from da wife he no love. Cuz da boy dat born firs from da wife he no love get da right fo own mo land den da odda one.
21.17: He gotta make um clear, dat da boy dat come from da wife he no love, he da one wen born firs, an his fadda gotta give him two times mo stuff den da odda boy. Cuz da firs boy goinshow how strong his fadda stay, dass why he get da rights fo da firs one fo bor
21.18: âIf one guy get one boy dat stay hard head an no like do wat anybody tell um fo do, an no lissen to his fadda an mudda, an no matta dey punish him he still no goin do wat dey tell,
21.19: his fadda an mudda gotta take him an bring him in front da older leaders by da gate fo da town.
21.20: Dey goin tell da older leadas, âDis boy, our boy, he hard head an no like do wat anybody tell um fo do. He no lissen to us guys. He make any kine, an drink plenny.â
21.21: Den all da guys from wea he come from goin throw stones at him an kill him. You guys gotta clean out all da real bad kine stuff from you guys. Den all da Israel peopo goin hear bout dat an come scare
21.22: âIf one guy go do someting real bad dat he gotta mahke, an da peopo kill him, an hang his mahke body on top one tree o pos,
21.23: you guys no can let his body stay hang dea till da nex morning. Make shua you guys bury him dat same day. Cuz if you let his body hang dea, God goin put kahuna on top da land. An you guys betta not make pilau da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa propert

22.1: âIf you see dat yoa brudda's cow, sheep, o goat come out from da fence, no ack like you no see um. You gotta bring um back by yoa brudda.
22.2: If da owna no live nea you an you donno who own da animal, take um home wit you an keep um till da owna come fo try find um. Den give um back to da owna.
22.3: Do da same ting if you find yoa brudda's donkey, o his clotheses, o wateva he lose. No ack like you no see u
22.4: âIf you find yoa brudda's donkey o cow dat wen fall down on top da road, help yoa brudda make um stan up again. No ack like you no see u
22.5: One wahine no can wear one guy kine clotheses, an one guy no can wear one wahine kine clotheses. Fo yoa God Yahweh, all dat kine stuff pilau fo him.
22.6: âIf you find one bird nest by da side a da road, inside one tree o on top da groun, wit bebe birds o eggs inside, an da mudda stay sitting on top da bebes o da eggs, no take da mudda wit da bebes.
22.7: You gotta let da mudda go, but you can take da bebes. Dass so eryting goin go good fo you, an you goin live long tim
22.8: âIf you build one new house, make one fence aroun da flat roof. No good somebody fall down from on top dea an you get da blame fo kill somebod
22.9: âNo plant anodda kine seeds inside da rows a yoa grape field. Cuz if you do dat, den da food from da seeds you wen plant an da grapes from da field, all dat goin come spesho fo Yahweh. You no can eat u
22.10: âNo plow wit one cow an one donkey togedda unda one yok
22.11: âNo wear clotheses dat get wool an linen togedda inside da same clot
22.12: âTie togedda strings fo make four bunch fo make um jalike tassels, an put um on da four corners a da clotheses you wea
22.13: âWen one guy marry one wife, an afta dey sleep togedda, maybe he start fo no like her.
22.14: So he bulai bout her an give her bad name, an he tell, âI wen marry dis wahine, but wen I sleep wit her, I no find proof dat she neva sleep wit one nodda guy befo!â
22.15: Den her fadda an mudda goin take da sheet wit blood fo show proof to da older leadas by da town gate dat she neva sleep wit one guy befo.
22.16: Da girl's fadda goin tell da leada guys, âI wen give my girl to dis guy fo marry, but he no like her.
22.17: Now he bulai bout her an tell, âI no find proof dat yoa daughta neva sleep wit one guy befo.â But I get proof dat she neva sleep wit one guy befo.â Den her fadda an mudda goin show da cloth in front da older leada guys fo da town.
22.18: Den da older leadas goin take da guy an punish him.
22.19: Dey goin make him pay two an one half pounds silva to da girl's fadda, cuz dis guy wen give one Israel girl bad name. An she still goin stay his wife. He no can get da right fo leave her all da time she stay aliv
22.20: âBut if wat da guy say, stay true, an dey no can show proof dat she neva sleep wit one guy befo,
22.21: dey goin take her by da door a her fadda's house, an ova dea da guys from her town goin throw stones at her so she mahke. Az cuz she wen make stink wit da Israel peopo, wen she fool aroun wen she still stay inside her fadda's house. You guys gotta clean out all da bad kine stuff from yo
22.22: âIf peopo find one guy sleeping wit anodda guy's wife, da guy dat sleep wit her an da wahine gotta mahke. You guys gotta clean out da bad kine stuff from da Israel peop
22.23: âIf one guy meet one wahine inside one town, an her fadda an mudda wen promise awready fo give her fo marry one nodda guy, an she neva sleep wit no guy befo, but dat guy wen sleep wit her inside da town,
22.24: you guys gotta take da guy an da wahine by da gate fo da town an throw stones at dem fo kill dem. Da wahine get da blame cuz she stay inside one town, but she no yell fo help. Da guy get da blame too cuz he wen sleep wit one wahine dat her fadda an mudda already wen promise to anodda guy. You guys gotta clean out da bad kine stuff from you guy
22.25: âBut if one guy meet one wahine outside da town, dat her fadda an mudda wen promise fo her marry anodda guy, but da guy dat see her ova dea rape her, den ony da guy gotta mahke.
22.26: No do notting to da wahine, cuz she neva do notting wrong an no need kill her. (Dis jalike wen somebody go bus up an kill anodda guy.)
22.27: Cuz da guy wen find da wahine outside da town, dat her fadda an mudda wen promise fo her marry anodda guy. No matta she yell, no mo nobody dea fo help he
22.28: âAn if one guy find one wahine dat neva sleep with one guy, an her mudda an fadda neva promise her to anodda guy still yet, an he grab her an rape her, an somebody find dem togedda,
22.29: da guy dat rape her gotta pay da fadda one an one quarta pound silva. He gotta marry her an she goin stay his wife. Cuz he wen make her shame, he no mo da right fo leave her, all da time he stay aliv
22.30: âOne guy no can marry his fadda's wife, cuz no good he make shame fo his fadd

23.1: âWen da peopo come togedda fo Yahweh, nobody can come wit dem if dea privates stay hurt cuz somebody wen smash o cut u
23.2: âAn whoeva born wen da fadda an mudda no stay marry, dea kids an grankids no can come one a Yahweh's peopo fo ten generatio
23.3: âNobody from Ammon o Moab o dea kids an grankids can come one a Yahweh's peopo, even if dey wait ten generation.
23.4: Cuz wen you guys was coming outa Egypt, da Ammon peopo neva come out fo meet you guys wit bread an watta. An da Moab guys wen pay Baalam, Beor's boy from Petor inside Aram Naharaim fo put kahuna on top you guys.
23.5: But yoa God Yahweh get love an aloha fo you guys. Az why he no lissen Balaam. He change da kahuna kine stuff fo come good stuff fo you guy
23.6: No make deal fo come friends wit da Ammon o da Moab peopo, fo do good tings fo dem, all da time you guys stay aliv
23.7: âNo ack to da Edom peopo jalike dey pilau, cuz dey da Esau ohana, yoa bruddas. No ack to da Egypt peopo jalike dey pilau, cuz you guys wen live inside dea land, no matta you guys come from odda place.
23.8: Da Edom an da Egypt peopo's grankids can come Yahweh's peopo wen you Israel peopo come togedd
23.9: âWen you guys make camp fo go fight da peopo dat stay agains you, no go nea notting pilau.
23.10: If one guy no can go in front Yahweh cuz nite time he get wet dream o make shishi, he gotta go outside da camp an stay dea all day.
23.11: But wen da sun almos go down, he gotta wash himself wit watta. Den wen da sun go down, he can go back inside da cam
23.12: âMake one place outside da camp an put sign fo one place wea you guys can go fo make shishi an kukae.
23.13: Take someting so you can dig one puka, an wen you pau make kukae inside da puka, cova um up afta wit dirt.
23.14: Cuz yoa God Yahweh move aroun inside yoa camp fo take care you guys, so you guys can win agains da peopo dat stay agains you. Yoa camp gotta stay spesho fo Yahweh, so he no see notting dat not okay ova dea, an turn away from you guy
23.15: âIf one slave guy run away from anodda country an come by you, no give him back to his owna.
23.16: Let him live wit you guys inside wateva place he like inside one a yoa towns he like. No give him hard tim
23.17: âDa guys an wahines from da Israel peopo no can fool aroun fo pay inside da temple fo one idol kine god, jalike da Canaan peopo do cuz dey tink az goin make da land grow plenny an da animals get plenny bebe.
23.18: You guys betta not bring da pay dat one guy o wahine get, dat fool aroun fo pay inside one Canaan kine temple, an bring um inside yoa God Yahweh's house, fo pay fo one strong promise you wen make to him, cuz all dat stay pilau, da way yoa God Yahweh see u
23.19: âNo make yoa brudda pay interes wen you let him borrow silva o food, o wateva odda ting peopo pay interes fo.
23.20: You can make one guy from odda country pay interes, but not one brudda from Israel. Cuz you like yoa God Yahweh do good stuff fo you guys, wateva you do, inside da land he stay give you guys fo take ov
23.21: âIf you make one strong promise to yoa God Yahweh, no be slow fo do um, cuz he goin make shua you do um. An if you no do um, you goin get da blame fo do bad ting.
23.22: But if you neva make promise, you no goin get blame.
23.23: Wateva you tell, you gotta make shua fo do, cuz you wen make one strong promise to yoa God Yahweh wit yoa own mout, an nobody wen give you presha fo do da
23.24: âIf you go inside da grape farm dat anodda guy own, you can eat all da grapes you like, but you no can put um inside yoa basket.
23.25: If you go inside da field dat get wheat o barley dat anodda guy own, you can pick litto bit wheat o barley wit yoa hands, but you no can use one sickle fo cut da wheat o barle

24.1: âGet some time wen one guy marry one wahine, an den afta dat he no like her, cuz he find out she wen do someting no good. Den he write one divorce paypa an give um to her, den send her away.
24.2: Den, afta she go away from him an marry one nodda guy,
24.3: an dat husban no like her too, he write her one divorce paypa, give um to her, an send her away from him. Ony afta dat, da secon husban mahke.
24.4: Den her firs husban dat wen divorce her no can marry her again afta she already wen come pilau cuz she sleep wit anodda guy. Az why she no can come in front Yahweh. Cuz da way Yahweh see um, she stay pilau. No go bring da blame fo bad kine stuff on top da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa propert
24.5: âIf one guy jus wen marry, no can send him fo fight one war, o do govmen kine work. Fo one year he can stay home wit his wife dat he jus wen marry, an make her stay good insid
24.6: âNo take da two roun stones from one mill fo make flour, o even da top one, from one guy dat own da stones an owe you someting an you no give um back till he pay. Cuz dat take away da ting he need fo make bread fo stay aliv
24.7: âIf you catch one guy dat wen steal anodda Israel guy fo make him one slave, o try sell him, da guy dat steal um, gotta mahke. You guys gotta clean out da real bad kine stuff from you guy
24.8: âWen one guy skin get da kine bad sick dat odda guys can get um, take care you do eryting da prieses from da Levi ohana tell you guys fo do. Make shua you guys do eryting I wen tell dem.
24.9: No foget wat yoa God Yahweh wen do to Miriam afta you guys wen come outa Egypt an you stay going on da roa
24.10: âWen you lend someting to one Israel guy, no go inside his house fo get wat he like give you fo make shua he goin pay you back.
24.11: Stay outside da house, an wait till da guy bring you someting fo show dat fo shua he goin pay you back, an bring um outside fo you.
24.12: If da guy no mo notting, an he ony can give you his coat, no go sleep wen you get da coat wit you still yet.
24.13: Give him back his coat befo da sun go down ery day, so he can sleep inside um. Den he goin tell you âGod goin do good tings fo you,â an yoa God Yahweh goin know dat you wen do someting goo
24.14: âIf one guy work fo you an he no mo notting, an need stuff, no make him wait fo you pay him. No matta he one Israel guy, o he not one Israel guy, but he live inside yoa town,
24.pay: him wat you owe him fo wat he wen do ery day befo da sun go down, cuz he no mo notting an he need um fo live. If you no pay him, he goin call to Yahweh agains you, an you goin get da blame fo do someting ba
24.16: âNo kill da faddas fo punish um fo someting dea kids wen do. An no kill da kids fo punish dem fo someting dea faddas wen do. Erybody gotta mahke fo dea own bad kine stuf
24.17: âMake shua you guys do da right ting fo da peopo from odda place, an fo da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda. No take away da coat from one wahine dat no mo husban an keep um till she pay you back wat she owe you.
24.18: No foget dat you guys was slaves Egypt side, an yoa God Yahweh wen pay da price fo bring you guys hea from ova dea. Az why I tell you guys fo do dis kine stuf
24.19: âWen you guys stay cut wheat o barley inside yoa field, an you foget take home one bunch wheat o barley, no go back get um. Leave um dea fo da guys from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, o da wahines dat no mo husban. Den yoa God Yahweh goin do good tings fo you guys in eryting you guys do.
24.20: Wen you guys shake da olive trees fo make da olives fall down, no go back do um da nex day. Leave da olives dat still stay on top da tree, fo da guys from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, an da wahines dat no mo husban.
24.21: Wen you cut da grapes from yoa grape plant, no go back cut da ones you wen miss da firs time. Leave da grapes dat stay dea fo da guys from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, an da wahines dat no mo husban.
24.22: No foget, you guys was slaves Egypt side. Az why I tell you guys fo do dis kine stuf

25.1: âWen Israel peopo make argue wit each odda, dey gotta take um to da judge. Da judge goin tell wat guy do wass right an wat guy get da blame, cuz he wen do wrong.
25.2: If dey gotta beat da guy dat get da blame, den da judge tell da guy fo lay down. Da judge helpa guys goin beat um wit one whip in front da judge, how many times da judge tell dem, fo show how bad da ting he wen do.
25.3: But dey no can hit one Israel guy wit da whip mo den forty times. If dey beat him mo den dat, dey goin make him shame in front da peop
25.4: âNo go tie up one cow's mout so he no can eat da wheat o barley wen he stay working fo smash da wheat o barley so you can take out da junk
25.5: âIf get brudda guys dat stay live togedda, an one a dem mahke, but he no mo boy, da widow no can marry some guy from outside da mahke guy ohana. Her brudda in law gotta marry her, fo get one boy, an he gotta do wat he suppose to do cuz he her brudda in law.
25.6: Da firs boy she born goin carry da mahke brudda's name, so dat da brudda blood line goin still stay okay fo da Israel peop
25.7: âBut if da brudda guy no like marry his mahke brudda's wife, she goin go by da older leadas by da town gate an tell dem, âMy husban's brudda no like marry me jalike he suppose to do, fo give me one boy fo carry his brudda's name inside Israel!â
25.8: Den da older leaders fo da guy town goin tell um fo come, an dey goin talk wit him. If he still yet tell, âI no like marry her,â
25.9: den da brudda's widow goin go by him in front da older leadas, take off one a his slippas, spit in his face, an tell, âDis wat oua peopo do to one guy dat no do notting fo his brudda guy blood line!â
25.10: An da Israel peopo goin call da guy an his kids, âDa ohana from da guy dat dey wen take away his slippa.â
25.11: âIf two guys stay fighting, an da wife fo one a dem come fo pull her husban outa dea so da odda guy no can hit um, an she grab da odda guy by his privates,
25.12: you guys gotta cut off her hand. No go pity he
25.13: âWen you sell stuff, no go rip off somebody wit differen kine weight so you can make some stuff look mo heavy an some stuff mo light.
25.14: An no rip off somebody wit differen kine basket so you can make some stuff look mo big an odda stuff look small.
25.15: You guys gotta weigh an measure stuff da right way, jalike all da odda peopo. Dat way, you goin live long time inside da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you.
25.16: Cuz yoa God Yahweh tell, az no good, wen somebody do like dat an no do da right kine tin
25.17: âNo foget wat da Amalek peopo wen do to you guys wen you stay come outa Egypt.
25.18: Wen you guys was tired an worn out, da Amalek guys wen attack you guys, an wipe out da peopo dat no can walk good, dat was behind da oddas. Da Amalek peopo, dey not scared a God.
25.19: Wen yoa God Yahweh let you guys res from all da peopo aroun you guys dat stay agains you guys, inside da land dat he stay give you guys fo come yoa property, you guys goin wipe out da name a da Amalek peopo, so no mo nobody unda da sky goin rememba dem. No foget da

26.1: Moses tell: âWen you guys goin go inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys fo come yoa property, an you guys goin take um ova an live dea,
26.2: den wen you start fo bring in food from da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, take some a da firs tings you guys cut from ery kine food, an put um inside one basket. Den go by da place yoa God Yahweh goin pick fo his name stay dea.
26.3: Tell da guy who stay da pries guy ova dea dat time, âToday I goin tell Yahweh, da God you work fo, dat now I come live inside da land he wen make strong promise to our ancesta guys, dat he goin give to us guys.â
26.4: Da pries guy goin take da basket from yoa hands, an put um down in front da altar fo yoa God Yahweh.
26.5: Den you goin tell da pries guy in front oua God Yahweh, âMy ancesta guy wen come from da Aram land an move house all ova da place. He go Egypt side wit ony litto bit peopo, an stay ova dea. Bumbye dey come one importan nation, wit plenny peopo, an dey come strong.
26.6: But da Egypt peopo wen make any kine to us guys, an make us suffa an work real hard.
26.7: Den we wen call Yahweh, da God fo our ancesta guys, fo help us. He hear us an see da trouble an hard work an hard time we get.
26.8: But den, Yahweh wen do real scary kine stuff, an real plenny awesome tings so erybody can see, fo show who him. Az how he get us outa Egypt, cuz he use his strong powa.
26.9: Yahweh bring us guys to dis place, an give us dis land, dat ery place get plenny milk an honey.
26.10: Look, Yahweh! Now I bring you da firs stuff dat wen grow on top da land dat you wen give me.â Den, put da stuff down in front yoa God Yahweh, an go down in front him.
26.11: Den you, an da Levi ohana guys, an da peopo from odda place dat stay live wit you guys, you all goin stay good inside cuz a all da good kine stuff yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys an yoa ohan
26.12: âDa year numba three dat you live inside da land, dat goin be da year fo da ten percent. Dat mean, wen you pau put on da side da ten percent from all da stuff you wen grow, den you goin give da ten percent to da Levi ohana peopo, da peopo from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, an da wahines dat no mo husban. Dass how dey goin get plenny food so dey can eat um ova dea inside yoa towns.
26.13: Den go in front yoa God Yahweh an tell him, âI wen bring outa my house da ten percent a wat I wen grow dat stay spesho fo Yahweh, an give um to da Levi ohana peopo, da peopo from odda place, da kids dat no mo fadda o mudda, an da wahines dat no mo husban, jalike you wen tell me fo do. I neva mess up wat you tell me fo do, an I neva foget notting.
26.14: I neva eat notting from da ten percent dat stay spesho fo you wen I stay sore inside cuz somebody mahke, an I no take notting from da ten percent outside da house wen I no can go in front you fo pray. I no give notting from dat fo do someting fo one mahke guy. I wen lissen to you, my God Yahweh, an do eryting you wen tell me fo do.
26.15: Look down from da place dat stay spesho fo you inside da sky, wea you stay, an do good kine stuff fo yoa Israel peopo, an fo da land you wen give us, jalike you wen make strong promise to our ancesta guys you goin do. Dis land, ery place get plenny milk an honey.â
26.16: Den Moses tell: âOua God Yahweh tell you guys today fo stick wit wat he tell you fo do, an wit dese rules he give you guys, an fo make diffren kine to da good peopo an da bad peopo. Take care fo do um all wit all yoa heart an eryting inside you guys.
26.17: You guys tell today in front erybody, dat Yahweh, he da God fo you guys, an you goin live da way he tell, do wat his rules tell, an wat he tell you gotta do, make diffren kine to da good peopo an da bad peopo, an lissen to wat he tell.
26.18: An Yahweh tell today in front erybody, dat you his spesho peopo jalike he wen promise, an dat you goin do eryting he tell you guys fo do.
26.19: An he tell dat he goin make you guys come mo importan den all da odda peopos he wen make. He goin tell good tings bout you guys, an show respeck fo you guys, an give you guys good name! Dass how you guys goin come one peopo dat stay spesho fo yoa God Yahweh, jalike he wen promise.â

27.1: Moses an da older leadas fo da Israel peopo wen tell da peopo: âDo all da tings we tell you guys today fo d
27.2: Da same day you guys go da odda side da Jordan Riva, an go inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, put some big stones up, an cover um wit white plasta.
27.3: Den, ova dea da odda side da riva, inside da land yoa God Yahweh stay give you guys, da land dat ery place get plenny milk an honey, write on top da stones eryting da rules tell. Yoa God Yahweh wen make promise fo give dat land to you guys.
27.4: Wen you go ova da odda side da Jordan Riva, you goin put up dese stones on top Mount Ebal ova dea. Den cova da stones wit white plaster, jalike I tell you guys today fo do.
27.5: By da same place ova dea, make one altar wit stones fo yoa God Yahweh. But no use iron tool fo shape da stones.
27.6: Make da altar fo yoa God Yahweh wit stones jalike dey stay, an make burn up kine sacrifices on top da altar fo yoa God Yahweh.
27.7: Make da kine sacrifice fo show dat eryting stay good wit you guys an Yahweh, an eat um ova dea, an stay good inside in front yoa God Yahweh.
27.8: Do good job fo write all dis teaching on top da stones, so da words stay real easy fo read.â
27.9: Den Moses an da pries guys from da Levi ohana tell all da Israel peopo dis: âYou Israel peopo, no make noise! Lissen! Today, you guys stay come da peopo fo yoa God Yahweh.
27.10: Do wat yoa God Yahweh tell you guys fo do, an stick wit his rules an da stuff I tell you guys today.â
27.11: Dat same day Moses tell da peop
27.12: âAfta you guys go da odda side da Jordan Riva, dese ohana peopo goin go stand on top Mount Gerazim fo tell da good kine tings God goin do fo da peopo: da Simeon ohana, Levi ohana, Judah ohana, Issakar ohana, Joseph ohana, an Benjamin ohana.
27.13: An dese odda ohana peopo goin stand on top Mount Ebal fo tell da bad kine tings dat goin happen wen God put kahuna on top da peopo: da Reuben ohana, Gad ohana, Asher ohana, Zebulun ohana, Dan ohana, an Naftali ohan
27.14: Da Levi ohana goin yell to all da Israel peopo in one loud an high voic
27.15: âGod goin punish anybody dat make one idol kine god, no matta he make um wit wood an cut um wit one knife o melt metal fo make um, an den he put up da idol secret kine. Az pilau, da way Yahweh see um, cuz az ony someting one guy wen make!â
27.16: Den da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat no mo respeck fo dea fadda an mudda!â
27.17: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat move one stone dat show wea anodda guy's land stay!â
27.18: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat make one guy dat no can see, go da wrong way on top da road!â
27.19: Da Levi guys goin tell dem: âGod goin punish whoeva no make right in front da judge to one guy from some odda place, one kid dat no mo fadda o mudda, o one wahine dat no mo husban.â
27.20: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat sleep wit his fadda's wife, cuz he goin make shame fo his fadda!â
27.21: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat make sex wit one animal!â
27.22: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish any guy dat make sex wit his sista, no matta her his fadda's girl o his mudda's gir
27.23: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish da guy dat make sex wit his mudda-in-law!â
27.24: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat kill one guy an nobody know he kill um!â
27.25: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish anybody dat take money unda da table fo kill somebody dat neva do notting bad!â
27.26: Da Levi guys goin tell: âGod goin punish da guy dat no show respeck fo all dese rules cuz he no do eryting wat dese rules tell!â

28.1: Moses tell: âIf you guys lissen fo real kine to oua God Yahweh, an take care fo do eryting I stay telling you today fo do, den he goin make you guys come mo importan den all da odda peopos on top da earth.
28.2: All dis good kine stuff goin come by you guys, an stay wit you guys, if you lissen yoa God Yahwe
28.6: âGood kine stuff goin happen wen you come inside an go outsid
28.7: âYahweh goin make you guys win ova da guys dat stay agains you guys, wen dey come fo attack you. Dey goin come fo you guys from one side, but dey goin run away to seven places wen you chase u
28.8: âYoa God Yahweh goin say da ting, fo make good tings happen to yoa storehouse, an fo eryting you guys do. He goin make good tings happen all ova da land he stay give you guy
28.9: âYahweh goin do jalike he wen make strong promise fo do -- he goin make you guys come real good fo come da peopo dat stay spesho fo him, if you guys make shua you stick wit his rules an live da way he tell you fo make.
28.10: Den all da diffren peopos on top da earth goin see dat Yahweh stay own you guys, an dey goin stay scared a you guys.
28.11: Yahweh goin make eryting come plenny fo you guys, yoa kids, da bebes from yoa animals, an da food you grow from yoa groun, inside da land he wen make strong promise to yoa ancestas he goin give you guy
28.12: Yahweh goin open up da sky wea he keep plenny good stuffs, fo send rain on top yoa land da right time, an make eryting you guys do, come out good. Plenny peopos goin borrow stuff from you, but you guys no goin need borrow from nobody.
28.13: Yahweh goin make you guys come jalike da head, jalike da mos importan peopo fo eryting, not jalike da tail, da peopo dat not importan. If you guys lissen wat yoa God Yahweh tell you fo do, jalike I stay tell you guys today fo do, so you take care fo do um, den you guys erytime goin come on top, an no stay down da bottom.
28.14: No turn away from all dis stuff I stay tell you guys today fo do, an no even go litto bit on da right side o da left side, an no follow odda gods an work fo de
28.15: âBut all da kahuna goin go on top you, if you guys no lissen wat yoa God Yahweh tell, if you no take care fo stick wit all da stuff an da rules I tell you guys today fo do. If you no do um, den all dis bad kine stuff goin come on top you guys an make you guys lose figh
28.16: âGod goin put kahuna on top you guys inside da towns an outside da town
28.17: âGod goin put kahuna on top you guys wen you go get food an make yoa brea
28.18: âGod goin put kahuna on top you guys wen you born kids, wen you cut da food you grow, an wen yoa cows an sheeps born bebe
28.19: âGod goin put kahuna on top you guys wen you come inside an wen you go outsid
28.20: âYahweh goin bring bad kine stuff on top you guys cuz you get kahuna on top you. Az why you goin come all mix up, an peopo goin tell you guys dat you wrong no matta wat you guys do. Az how you guys goin wipe out quick time, if you guys do bad kine stuff an go way from Yahweh.
28.21: Yahweh goin make you guys come real sick till he wipe out you guys from da land wea you come an he stay give you da right fo take um ova.
28.22: He goin give you guys wit real bad kine sick. You guys goin get high fever an swelling. He goin make da land real hot, an no mo rain. He goin make da plants dry up wit da sick an wit mildew. Da sick goin stay till you guys mahke.
28.23: Da sky ova yoa head goin come dry jalike da bronze metal, da groun unda yoa feets goin come real hard jalike da iron.
28.24: Yahweh goin make da rain come down jalike dust an jalike powda. Goin come down from da sky till you guys all wipe ou
28.25: âYahweh goin make da peopo dat stay agains you guys win ova you. You goin go fo attack dem from one place, but run away from dem to seven places. Peopo in all da diffren countries on top da earth goin bum out wen dey tink bout you guys.
28.26: Wen you guys mahke, yoa mahke bodies goin come food fo all da birds inside da sky an da animals on top da earth, an no mo nobody goin chase um so dey go way.
28.27: Yahweh goin give you guys boils jalike he wen do to da Egypt peopo. He goin give you bad kine lumps, bad kine sores, an da itch. An no mo nobody can make um come mo betta.
28.28: He goin make you guys come pupule. You no goin can see, an you goin come all mix up an no can tink.
28.29: Even noon time, you guys goin feel aroun fo go some place, jalike one guy dat no can see notting cuz fo him, eryting stay dark. Eryting goin go bad fo you guys. Fo shua, erytime peopo goin give you guys hard time, an steal yoa stuffs. No mo nobody goin help you guy
28.30: âIf you make promise fo marry one wahine, anodda guy goin take her an rape her. If you go build one house, you no goin live inside um. If you goin plant one grape farm, you no goin start fo eat um an feel good bout um.
28.31: Da guys dat take ova yoa land goin kill yoa cows in front yoa eyes, but you no goin eat da meat. Dey goin make you give up yoa donkeys, but dey no goin bring um back. Dey goin give yoa sheeps an goats to da peopo dat stay agains you guys, an no mo nobody goin get um back fo you.
28.32: You goin see da guys dat stay agains you give yoa boys an yoa girls to anodda peopo fo come slaves, an you goin come tired ery day looking fo dem come back, but you no can do notting.
28.33: One peopo dat you donno, goin eat da food from yoa land dat you wen work hard fo grow. You guys no goin get notting fo keep, you ony goin get hard time erytime.
28.34: Da sights you guys see goin make you guys come pupule.
28.35: Yahweh goin make yoa knees an legs get boils dat come real sore, an no mo nobody can make um come good. Dey goin go from unda yoa feets to da top a yoa hea
28.36: âYahweh goin make you an da king you wen put ova you, go by anodda nation dat you guys an yoa ancestas neva know befo. Ova dea, you guys goin go down in front odda gods dat peopo make from wood an stone.
28.37: All da peopos ova dea wea Yahweh make you guys go, no goin believe cuz a wat happen to you. Dey goin talk bout you guys fo make dea own peopo tink plenny, an dey goin make fun a you guy
28.38: âYou guys goin take plenny seeds fo plant inside yoa field, but you ony goin cut litto bit food, cuz da grasshoppas goin eat um up.
28.39: You guys goin plant grape farms an take care um, but you no goin bring in da grapes o drink da wine, cuz da worms goin eat um.
28.40: You guys goin get olive trees all ova yoa land, but you no goin use da olive oil, cuz da olives goin fall down from da trees.
28.41: You guys goin get boys an girls, but you no goin keep dem fo stay wit you guys, cuz odda peopo goin make dem prisonas an take dem away.
28.42: Plenny crickets goin take ova all yoa trees an eat da food from yoa lan
28.43: âDa peopo from odda place dat live wit you guys goin come da bosses ova you guys mo an moa, an you guys no goin come importan mo an moa.
28.44: Dey goin let you guys borrow stuff from dem, but dey no need borrow stuff from you. Dey goin be jalike da head, an you guys goin be jalike da tai
28.45: âAll dis bad kine stuff goin come on top you guys cuz you get kahuna. Jalike da bad kine stuff goin chase you guys, an take ova you guys, till you guys wipe out. Az cuz you guys no like lissen yoa God Yahweh, an stick wit da rules an da stuff he tell you guys you gotta do.
28.46: Da bad kine stuff goin come, jalike az one sign from God dat show you guys an yoa kids wat can happen foeva.
28.47: All dat goin happen cuz you guys no stay real good inside wen you work fo yoa God Yahweh, an even wen eryting was plenny good fo you guys.
28.48: So den you guys goin work fo da peopo dat stay agains you guys, not fo Yahweh. He goin send dem agains you guys, an you goin get notting fo eat, an come thirsty, wit no mo clotheses on, an no mo notting. Jalike he goin put one iron yoke on top yoa neck, till he wipe out you guy
28.49: âYahweh goin bring one peopo agains you guys from one far place, from da mos far part a da earth. Dey goin come real quick, jalike one eagle dat fly down real fas fo grab one small animal. You no goin undastan dea language.
28.50: You guys goin come scared wen you see dem cuz dey look real scary. Dey no mo respeck fo da ol peopo, an dey not nice to da young guys.
28.51: Dey goin eat all yoa bebe animals an da food dat you guys wen plant, till dey wipe out you guys. Dey no goin leave you guys wheat o barley, new wine, new olive oil, bebe cows, o bebe sheeps. Dey goin wipe you guys out till you no mo notting!
28.52: Dey goin put army guys all aroun da big towns inside yoa land, so nobody can go inside o come outside, till da tall strong walls aroun da towns fall down, da ones you guys wen trus fo help you. Dey goin put dea army guys aroun all da towns inside da land dat yoa God Yahweh stay give you guy
28.53: Cuz a dat, you even goin eat yoa own kids -- da meat from da bodies a yoa boys an girls dat yoa God Yahweh wen give you guys. Cuz da peopo dat stay agains you guys goin put dea army guys all aroun you guys, an you guys goin suffa plenny.
28.54: Even da mos easy an nice guy wit you guys dat get plenny aloha, he goin come greedy an no share food wit his own brudda o his own wife dat he love, an his kids dat stay still yet.
28.55: He no goin give even one a dem da meat from his own mahke kids fo eat, da one he stay eating. Goin be az all he get, cuz da peopo dat hate you guys goin make you guys suffa plenny, wen dey put army guys aroun all yoa big towns.
28.56: Even da mos easy an nice wahine wit you guys dat get plenny aloha, dat she no even let da bottom a her feet touch da groun, she goin be too greedy fo give to her husband dat she love, o her own boy an girl.
28.57: Even da stuff dat come out wen she born one bebe, an eat her bebe dat she born, an she goin eat um so nobody know, wen da peopo dat stay agains you guys goin make you guys suffa plenny, wen dey put army guys all aroun yoa big town
28.58: âIf you guys no take care fo stay do eryting wat inside dese rules stay write inside dis book, an no show respeck fo wat kine God, yoa awesome God Yahweh,
28.59: he goin send real bad kine sick fo punish you guys an yoa kids, wit real long hard time, an real bad kine sick dat stay long time.
28.60: He goin bring all da diffren kine sick dat he wen bring to da Egypt peopo on top you guys, da ones dat you guys stay scared um, an dey goin stick wit you guys.
28.61: Yahweh goin bring all kine sick an hard time too, da kine stuff dat dis book wit da rules no even tell bout, till you guys come wipe out.
28.62: You guys was real plenny peopo, jalike da stars inside da sky, but you guys goin come ony litto bit peopo, cuz you neva lissen yoa God Yahweh.
28.63: Jalike Yahweh stay good inside befo time, wen he wen make eryting come good fo you guys, an make you guys come plenny peopo, bumbye he goin come good inside wen he goin wipe you guys out. He goin take you guys outa da land dat you goin go inside now fo take um ov
28.64: âDen Yahweh goin make you guys go all ova wea diffren peopos stay, from one side a da earth to da odda side. Wen you go dea, you guys goin go down in front odda gods, da kine gods dey make from wood an stone. You guys an yoa ancestas neva know dat kine gods befo.
28.65: Ova dea wit dose peopos you guys no can res. You no goin find one place fo rest da bottom a yoa feets. Yahweh goin make you guys stay shaking inside plenny, yoa eyes goin come tired from waiting, an you goin lose fight inside yoa heart.
28.66: You guys erytime donno wat goin happen. You goin stay scared nite time an day time. You no goin know fo shua if you goin stay alive.
28.67: Morning time you guys goin say, âI like nite time fo come!â Nite time you guys goin say, âI like morning time fo come!â Cuz you guys stay real scared inside, an you goin see real bad kine stuff happen.
28.68: Yahweh goin send you guys back Egypt side inside boats wit sail, no matta I wen tell you guys dat you no goin go dat way again, eva. Ova dea you guys an wahines goin try selling yoaself to da peopo dat stay agains you guys, fo come dea slaves. But nobody goin like buy you guy

29.1: All dis, az wat da deal say, dat Yahweh tell Moses fo make wit da Israel peopo Moab side, an da deal he wen make wit dem befo Mount Sinai sid
29.2: Den lata, Moses tell all da Israel peopo fo come, an he tell de
29.3: âWit yoa own eyes you guys wen see all da bad kine stuff, an da awesome an all kine stuff he do fo show who him.
29.4: But still yet today Yahweh no make you guys undastan, da eyes fo see, o da ears fo hear all dat.â
29.5: Moses tell dat Yahweh say, âAll da time fo forty years dat I Yahweh wen lead you guys inside da boonies, yoa clotheses an yoa slippas neva come ol.
29.6: You guys neva eat bread, but I give you guys da manna fo eat, an you no drink wine o beer. I Yahweh do all dis so you guys goin know inside dat me, Yahweh, I yoa God fo real kine.â
29.7: âWen we reach dis place, Sihon da king fo Heshbon, an Og da king fo Bashan an dea peopo come out fo fight wit us, but we fight um an win ova dem.
29.8: We take dea land an give um to da Reuben ohana, da Gad ohana, an half da Manasseh ohana, fo come dea propert
29.9: âTake care fo do eryting dis deal say, so den eryting come good fo you guys, wateva you stay doing.
29.10: All you guys stay standing today in front yoa God Yahweh -- yoa leadas, da head guys, da older leadas, da officers, an all da odda guys hea from da Israel peopo,
29.11: yoa kids, yoa wifes, da peopo from odda place dat live inside yoa camp dat chop yoa wood an carry yoa watta.
29.12: You guys stay standing hea fo take dis deal wit yoa God Yahweh today, so dat he goin make um good wit one [strong / spesho] promise.
29.13: He make solid wit you guys dat you guys his peopo, an dat he yoa God, jalike he wen make promise to you guys an our ancesta guys, Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob.
29.14: Yahweh stay make dis deal wit one [strong / spesho] promise, not ony wit you guys
29.15: dat stay standing hea wit us today in front oua God Yahweh, but wit da oddas dat no stay hea toda
29.16: âYou guys know how we wen live inside Egypt, an how we wen pass da odda countries wen we stay coming ova hea.
29.17: You guys wen see dey had dea pilau kine idol kine gods dat dey make from wood an stone, silva an gold.
29.18: Make shua no mo any guy o wahine, o ohana wit you guys, who goin turn away from oua God Yahweh, an go down an show respeck to da idol kine gods from dose peopos. Make shua no mo notting get with you, dat make eryting come pila
29.19: âWen dat kine guy hear wat dis [strong / spesho] promise say, he aks fo good kine stuff fo himself from Yahweh. Cuz a dat he tink, âI goin be okay, no matta I still yet do wat I like.â Cuz he tink lidat, God goin wipe out da land dat get watta, an da dry land too.
29.20: Yahweh no goin eva let dat kine guy go. Yahweh no take dat kine stuff. All da bad kine stuff dis book tell, goin come to dat kine guy, an Yahweh goin take his name out from unda da sky.
29.21: Yahweh goin take dat guy from all da ohanas inside da Israel peopo, jalike dis book tell bout all da real bad kine tings dat goin happen to da peopo dat no do all dat da rules tell inside dis dea
29.22: âYoa kids dat goin come lata on, an da peopo from far place, goin see all da bad kine stuff dat stay come on top da land, an da kine sick dat Yahweh give um.
29.23: Da whole land goin stay jalike was burn up from salt an sulfur. Nobody goin plant notting dea. No can make notting grow dea. No mo notting green come up. Goin be jalike wen Sodom an Gomorrah towns wen wipe out, an wen Yahweh wen bus up Admah an Zeboiim towns cuz he real mad wit dem.
29.24: All da odda peopos goin aks, âHow come Yahweh do dis to dis land? How come he so plenny huhu?â
29.25: âAn some odda peopo goin tell, âAz cuz da peopo dea no like take da deal dat Yahweh, da God fo dea ancesta guys, wen make wit dem wen he bring dem outa Egypt.
29.26: Dey wen go off an work fo odda gods, an show dem respeck, idol kine gods dey donno befo, dat God neva give dem da right fo pray to.
29.27: Az why Yahweh stay real huhu wit dis land an da peopo inside. So he bring on top dem all da bad kine stuff he wen tell dem he goin bring cuz dey get kahuna, jalike stay write inside dis book.
29.28: Yahweh stay real huhu, an he no like wat dey stay do. Az why he take dem outa dea land an throw dem inside one nodda land, an dass how dey stay now.â-â
29.29: Moses tell: âDa tings dat oua God Yahweh no show us, he know um, but he no show us guys. But da tings he stay show, dass da kuleana fo us guys an our kids foeva. So den we gotta follow all da rules he teach us fo do.â

30.1: âWen all dis good kine stuff an bad kine stuff dat I put in front you guys, come on top you guys, afta yoa God Yahweh send you guys all ova da earth fo make you live wit diffren peopos, den maybe you guys goin tink real good ova dea bout wat God wen tell you.
30.2: An wen you an yoa kids come back by yoa God Yahweh, an lissen him wit all yoa heart an wit eryting inside you, jalike I wen tell you guys today fo do,
30.3: den wen you guys come back, yoa God Yahweh goin make tings come good again fo you guys, an get love an pity fo you guys. He goin bring you guys back togedda from all da diffren countries he wen send you guys go.
30.4: Even if God make you guys go mo far place unda da sky, from dea yoa God Yahweh goin bring you guys back togedda from ova dea.
30.5: He goin bring you guys back inside da land dat oua ancesta guys wen own befo time, an you goin take um ova. He goin make good tings happen to you guys, mo den oua ancesta guys, an make you guys come mo plenny peopo den dem.
30.6: Yoa God Yahweh goin make you and da peopo dat going come from you bumbye, an like come his peopo, jalike he goin put one mark on top yoa hearts an yoa kids hearts fo show dat you his peopo. Den you guys goin get love an aloha fo him wit all yoa hearts, an wit eryting inside you guys, so you guys goin live fo real kine.
30.7: Yoa God Yahweh goin put all dis bad kahuna kine stuff I wen tell you bout, on top da peopo dat hate you guys an stay give you guys hard time.
30.8: But you guys, you goin lissen Yahweh again, an do eryting he tell you guys fo do, jalike wat I stay tell you guys today.
30.9: Den Yahweh goin do mo plenny good kine stuff fo you guys, wateva you guys stay do, an give you guys plenny kids, an plenny bebe animals, an plenny food dat you guys grow from yoa land. He goin stay feel real good inside again wen he tink bout you guys, an make good tings happen to you guys, jalike he wen feel good inside bout yoa ancesta guys.
30.10: He goin do dat wen you guys lissen him, an stick wit his rules an do da tings he tell you gotta do, dat I wen write inside da book wit da rules, afta you guys come back by yoa God Yahweh wit all yoa heart, an wit eryting inside yo
30.11: âWat I stay telling you guys fo do now, az not too hard fo you guys, an not too far from you guys.
30.12: Wat I telling you fo do, no stay up dea inside da sky, so you guys gotta aks, âWho goin go up dea fo get um, an tell us guys, so we can lissen?â
30.13: No even stay da odda side da ocean, so you guys gotta aks, âWho goin go ova dea fo get um fo us, an tell us, so we can do um?â
30.14: Nah! All dis stuff stay nea, right hea by you guys awready. Stay inside yoa mout, an inside yoa heart, so you guys can lissen an do u
30.15: âLook! Today I put in front you guys two ways you guys can do: you guys can live an good kine stuff happen, o bad kine stuff can happen an you guys mahke.
30.16: Me, I tell you guys today wat fo do: get love an aloha fo yoa God Yahweh, live da way he tell you guys fo live. Make shua you stay do wat he tell you fo do -- eryting you gotta do, an eryting da rules he give you tell you wat fo do. Den you guys goin live an come mo plenny peopo, an yoa God Yahweh goin do good kine stuff fo you guys inside da land wea you guys going go fo make um come yoa propert
30.17: âBut if yoa heart turn away from Yahweh, so you guys no lissen, an if odda peopo like you guys go da wrong way so you guys go down in front odda gods an show respeck fo dem,
30.18: I tell you guys today, dat you goin wipe out fo shua. You guys no goin stay long time inside da land da odda side da Jordan Riva, wea you goin go inside fo take ova an make um yoa propert
30.19: âToday I call all da powers inside da sky an da earth fo tell me wat dey see you guys doing. Cuz I put in front you guys two ways you guys can do: you guys can live o you guys can mahke. You guys can get good kine stuff, o you guys can get real bad kine stuff. Now take life! So den you an yoa kids goin live.
30.20: Den you guys goin get love an aloha fo yoa God Yahweh, an lissen to him, an stay tight wit him. Cuz Yahweh, he da One make you live fo real kine, an let you guys stay plenny years on top da land he wen make strong promise fo give to yoa ancesta guys, Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob.â-â

31.1: Den Moses go out an tell dis to all da Israel peopo:
31.2: âMe, I one hundred twenty years ol now, an I no can go hea an dea no moa. Yahweh wen tell me, âYou no goin go da odda side da Jordan Riva!â
31.3: Yoa God Yahweh, he da One goin go da odda side in front you guys. He goin wipe out da peopos in front you guys, an you guys goin take ova dea land. Joshua, he goin go ova in front you guys too, jalike Yahweh wen tell.
31.4: Yahweh goin make to dem guys jalike he wen do to Sihon an Og, da kings fo da Amor peopo. He wen wipe out da peopo an dea land.
31.5: Yahweh goin give dem to you guys, an you gotta make to dem eryting I wen tell you guys fo do.
31.6: Make strong an no bum out. No come scared an shaking cuz dey look tough, cuz yoa God Yahweh, he da One go wit you guys. He no goin let you guys go by yoaself, o bag from you!â
31.7: Den Moses tell Joshua fo come by him. He tell um in front all da Israel peopo, âMake strong an no bum out, cuz you goin go wit dis peopo inside da land dat Yahweh make one spesho promise to our ancesta guys dat he goin give dem da land. You da one goin tell da ohana wat land az deas, fo come dea property.
31.8: Yahweh, he da One goin go in front you guys, an he goin stay wit you guys. He no goin let you guys go by yoaself, o bag from you guys! No scared! No lose fight!â
31.9: So Moses wen write down dese rules an give um to da pries guys from da Levi ohana, dat [wen] carry da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit Yahweh, an he give um to all da older leadas fo da Israel peopo.
31.10: Den Moses tell dem, âAfta ery seven years, erybody no need pay wat dey owe odda peopo. Same time, erybody make Da Spesho Religious Time Fo Live Inside Shacks.
31.11: Dass da time wen all da Israel peopo come fo stand in front oua God Yahweh, by da place he goin pick. Dat time, you goin read dese rules to dem so dey all can hear you.
31.12: Call all da peopo togedda -- da guys, da wahines, an da kids, an guys from odda place dat live inside yoa towns, so dey can lissen an learn so dey stay scared a oua God Yahweh, an so dey stay do eryting dese rules tell um fo do.
31.13: Dea kids who donno dese rules, dey gotta hear um an learn so dey stay scared a oua God Yahweh, all da time you guys stay live inside da land dat you guys goin go da odda side da Jordan Riva fo take ova.â
31.14: Yahweh tell Moses, âNow, da time stay nea wen you goin mahke. Call Joshua, an go stand togedda inside da Tent Fo Come Togedda Wit Me. I goin make him da one in charge a da Israel peopo from now on.â So Moses an Joshua go Da Tent Fo Come Togedda Wit Yahwe
31.15: Den Yahweh come inside da tent an dey can see him, inside one cloud dat go from da groun to da sky. Dat cloud stay ova da door fo da tent.
31.16: Yahweh tell Moses, âLitto bit mo time, an you goin go res wit yoa ancesta guys. But dese peopo, dey goin go down in front da odda gods dat da diffren peopos pray to ova dea inside da land dey goin go inside fo take ova. Dey goin do tings wit dose gods, jalike wen peopo go fool aroun behin dea husban o wife back. Dey goin leave me, an broke da deal I wen make wit dem.
31.17: Dat time wen dat happen, I goin come huhu wit dem, an leave dem behind. I goin hide my face from dem, an I goin wipe dem out. Plenny trouble an hard time goin happen to dem. Dat time, dey goin tell, âFo shua, us guys get all dis bad kine stuff happen cuz oua God no stay wit us, yeah?â
31.18: Den I goin hide my face from dem dat time fo shua, cuz a all da bad kine stuff dey do wen dey bag from me an start fo pray to odda god
31.19: âNow you an Joshua, write down dis song fo yoaself. Den you, Moses, you teach um to da Israel peopo, so dey can sing um. Cuz dis song goin tell wat I wen see um do, fo judge dem.
31.20: Wen I bring dem inside da land wea get plenny milk an honey erytime, da land I wen make spesho promise to dea ancestas fo give dem, dey goin eat all dey like an come full, an eryting goin go good fo dem. Den dey goin turn away an go down in front odda gods, an work fo dem. Dey goin go agains me, an broke da deal I wen make wit dem.
31.21: Lata, wen plenny bad kine stuff an hard time come on top dem, dis song goin tell wat I wen see um do, fo judge dem, cuz dea kids no goin foget da song, an dey goin sing um. I know wat dey stay tink wat dey like do, even now befo I bring dem inside da land dat I wen make spesho promise fo give to dem.â
31.22: So Moses wen write dis song dat same day, an teach um to da Israel peop
31.23: Dis, how Yahweh wen tell Joshua, Nun's boy, wat he gotta do: âStay real strong, wit plenny powa! Cuz you goin bring da Israel peopo inside da land I wen make spesho promise fo give dem. An me, I da One goin stay wit you.â
31.24: Afta Moses pau write inside one book wat dese rules tell, from da start to da end,
31.25: he tell dis rule to da Levi ohana guys dat carry da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit Yahweh:
31.26: âTake dis book wit da rules inside, an put um by da side a da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit Yahweh. Da book goin stay dea fo tell wat I wen see da Israel peopo do, fo judge dem.
31.27: Cuz I know how you guys wen go agains me, an dat you guys hard head. I know you guys wen go agains Yahweh wen I still yet stay hea wit you guys, an I know dat you guys goin go agains him even mo plenny afta I mahke!â
31.28: Bring togedda by me, all da older leadas from yoa ohanas, an da officer guys, so I can tell dem dis so dey hear. I goin call all da powers inside da sky an on top da earth fo tell wat dey wen see da peopo do, fo judge dem.
31.29: Cuz I know dat afta I mahke, you guys goin real mess up eryting an make um come pilau. You guys goin turn away from me an no do wat I tell you guys fo do. An lata, plenny bad kine stuff goin come on top you guys, cuz you guys goin do da kine stuff dass bad, da way Yahweh see you guys doing. You guys goin make him come huhu cuz a da tings you guys make wit yoa hands.â
31.30: Den Moses tell wat dis song say from da start to da end so all da Israel peopo dat stay dea togedda 2chcan hear u

32.44: Moses wen come wit Joshua, Nun's boy, an tell eryting dis song say so da peopo can hear um.
32.45: Wen Moses pau tell da Israel peopo eryting bout dis song,
32.46: den he tell dem, âTink plenny bout all dis importan stuff dat I wen tell you guys today, so you guys goin tell yoa kids dey gotta lissen an do eryting dese rules tell.
32.47: Dis, az not stuff dat no mean notting fo you. Dis, az yoa life! If you lissen dis stuff I tell you, you guys goin live long time inside da land da odda side da Jordan Riva dat you going take ova.â
32.48: Dat same day, Yahweh tell Moses,
32.49: âGo up inside da Abarim mountains to Mount Nebo inside da Moab land, dat stay across Jericho, an den look all ova Canaan, da land I goin give da Israel peopo fo come dea property.
32.50: Afta you climb up da top a dat mountain, you goin mahke an go back to yoa peopo, jalike yoa brudda Aaron wen mahke on top Mount Hor.
32.51: Dis cuz you two guys neva do wat I wen tell you guys fo do, in front da Israel peopo by da Meribah watta place nea Kadesh town, inside da Zin boonies, da time you neva show respeck fo me in front dem. You neva show dat I da God dat stay good an spesho, dat time.
32.52: Az why you ony goin see da land from dis side da riva. You no goin go inside da land dat I stay give da Israel peopo.â

33.1: Dis da good tings dat Moses, da guy dat know God, wen tell wat he like God do fo da Israel peopo, befo Moses mahke.
33.7: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Judah ohan
33.8: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Levi ohan
33.12: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Benjamin ohan
33.13: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Joseph ohan
33.18: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Zebulun an Issakar ohan
33.20: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Gad ohan
33.22: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Dan ohan
33.23: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Naftali ohan
33.24: Dis wat Moses tell bout da Asher ohan

34.1: Den Moses wen climb up from da flat country inside Moab to Mount Nebo, up da top a da Pisgah ridge, across Jericho. Ova dea Yahweh show him da whole land, from Gilead to Dan,
34.2: all da Naftali land, da land fo Efraim an Manasseh, all da land fo Judah to da Mediterranean Sea west side,
34.3: da Negev country sout side, an all da land from da Jericho Valley (az Palm Tree Town), all da way to Zoar town.
34.4: Den Yahweh tell him, âDis, da land I wen make spesho promise fo give to Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob. I wen tell um. âI goin give dis land to da peopo dat come from you guys.â I stay let you see um wit yoa own eyes, but you no goin go da odda side da Jordan Riva fo go dea inside um.â
34.5: Den Moses, da guy dat work fo Yahweh, he mahke ova dea Moab side, jalike Yahweh wen tell him.
34.6: Yahweh wen bury Moses inside Moab, inside da valley in front Beth Peor town. But even today, no mo nobody know wea he stay bury.
34.7: Moses was one hundred an twenty year ol wen he mahke, but his eyes still see good an he still yet stay strong.
34.8: Da Israel peopo wen stay inside da flat country place Moab side thirty days, cuz dey stay sore inside an cry plenny afta Moses mahke, till da time fo dat pa
34.9: Den God spirit take ova Joshua, Nun's boy, an make um know wat fo do erytime. Cuz befo Moses mahke, he wen put his hands on top Joshua fo show he da one goin lead da peopo afta him. So da Israel peopo lissen Joshua, an do wat Yahweh tell Moses dey gotta d
34.10: From dat time no mo nobody talk fo God like Moses talk to da Israel peopo. Yahweh wen know Joshua, jalike wen one guy stay talking wit his friend.
34.11: Moses wen do all da awesome an unreal tings inside Egypt fo show to Pharaoh, all his leada guys, an all da peopo inside da land.
34.12: Cuz no mo nobody eva wen show all da strong powa an all da scary kine tings dat Moses wen do in front all da Israel peop

1.1-2: Dis one story dat wen happen long time befo, da time wen ony da local leada guys was in charge a da Israel peopo. Had one guy from Betlehem town inside da Judah ohana land. Da guy, his name Elimelek, an his wife, Na`omi. Dey get two boys, Mahlon an Kilion. Dey from da Efrata ohana. Dat time, Judah side, long time no mo rain, so no mo notting fo ea
1.3: But wen dey stay Moab side, Elimelek mahke. So den Na`omi, she stay stuck dea wit her two boys.
1.4: Da two boys, Mahlon an Kilion, dey wen grow up an marry two wahines from da Moab peopo. Mahlon marry Rut, an Kilion marry Orpah. Afta dey stay dea bout ten year,
1.5: da boys Mahlon an Kilion, dey mahke too. So Na`omi, she stay dea alone. No mo husban, an no mo boys o grankid
1.6: Na`omi stay Moab side still yet, but den she hear dat Yahweh wen tink time now fo help his peopo Judah side, an he give food to dem. So Na`omi an her two daughta-in-laws make ready fo go way from da Moab land an go back da place Na`omi wen come from.
1.7: Na`omi an Rut an Orpah, dey start togedda fo go way from da place Na`omi wen live, an go da road back to da Judah lan
1.8: But wen dey going, Na`omi tell her two daughta-in-laws, âEh! Mo betta you guys go back by yoa mudda guys, you know. I like fo Yahweh fo stick wit you guys, jalike you guys wen stick wit yoa husban guys befo dey wen mahke, an wit me.
1.9: I like Yahweh fo help you guys find good, solid guys ova dea fo come yoa new husbans!â Den Na`omi kiss Rut an Orpah fo tell um aloha, an dey start fo cry plenn
1.10: But da wahines tell Na`omi, âNo way! Us guys, we going stick wit you, an go by yoa peopo!â
1.11: Na`omi tell Rut an Orpah, âMo betta you guys go back! No good you go wit me. You guys tink I young still yet, so you tink I goin stick wit da way my people do um an get married fo get mo baby boys dat goin come big an den come yoa husbans bumbye? No way!
1.12: You guys, you jalike my daughtas, but mo betta you go back home. I too old fo marry. If I wen get chance fo marry somebody tonite, an get boy kine babies, wat you tink?
1.13: You guys tink you goin wait long time fo dem come big, an you no goin like marry odda guys firs? No way, my daughtas! I know you guys stay plenny sore inside, but fo me, eryting mo sore still yet, cuz was Yahweh Up Dea Inside Da Sky dat wen make me suffa.â
1.14: Den Rut an Orpah start fo cry one mo time. Orpah, she kiss her mudda-in-law fo tell her aloha, an she go back home. But Rut, she like stick wit Na`omi.
1.15: Na`omi tell her, âEh look! Yoa sista-in-law, she wen go back awready by her peopo an da god she pray to. Mo betta you go do same ting.â
1.16: An Rut tell Na`om
1.18: So, wen Na`omi undastan dat Rut no goin change her mind, an she going wit her, Na`omi stop talkin
1.19: So da two wahines go togedda Betlehem tow
1.20: Na`omi, she tell u
1.22: Dass wat wen happen wen Na`omi come back from da Moab land with her daughta-in-law Rut, da Moab wahine. Da time dey come back Betlehem, dass da same time da farma guys start fo cut da barley fo foo

2.1: Betlehem town, had one importan rich guy name Boaz. He come from da same blood jalike Elimelek, da guy dat was Na`omi husban befo time. So fo dea peopo, he jalike Na`omi brudda-in-la
2.2: One time, da Moab wahine Rut tell Na`omi, âEh please, I like go da fields fo go behind da worka guys an pick up da extra barley dat dey no pick up. Maybe get somebody dat make nice to me an let me do dat, cuz God's Rules say az good.â
2.3: So Rut [wen] go ova dea inside one field an pick up da extra barley dat da worka guys no pick up afta dey cut um. An you know wat? Da same field wea she stay pick up da extra barley, da owna guy was Boaz. Him an Rut mahke fadda-in-law Elimelek, dey da same bloo
2.4: Same time Rut stay picking up da extra barley, Boaz come ova dea from Betlehem town. He tell da guys dat stay cutting da barley, âAloha! I like Yahweh stay wit you guys!â
2.5: Boaz aks da luna guy dat stay in charge a da worka guys, âEh! Dat young wahine ova dea, wat ohana her?â
2.6: Da luna guy tell, âHer, da Moab wahine dat wen come hea wit Na`omi, da time Na`omi come back from ova dea.
2.7: Morning time, she wen aks me, âPlease, okay fo me go ova dea wea dey tie up da barley, an pick up da extra barley dat da worka guys no pick up, fo take um home?â I tell her, âOkayâ She stay work all da time from den till now. Ony short time she go fo res ova dea by da shack.â
2.8: Den Boaz, he go ova dea wea Rut stay an tell her, âEh, sista! Nobody tell you wat fo do, o wat? You can stay hea wit us guys wen you pick up da extra barley. No need go find one nodda field. Stick wit my worka wahines ova hea.
2.9: Go see wea dey stay cutting da barley, den go dea afta dem fo pick up da extra stuff. I wen tell da guys awready, no bodda you. Wen you thirsty, you go ova dea an drink da watta dat da guys bring from da puka wea da watta come ou
2.10: Rut, she go down quick by Boaz feet wit her face on top da groun fo show um respeck. She tell um, âEh mista, mahalo plenny! How come you stay good to me an even talk to me? I ony one wahine from one nodda country, you know.â
2.11: Boaz tell, âYeah, I know. But erybody stay tell me bout all da good tings you wen do fo yoa mudda-in-law, afta yoa husban mahke. I know dat you wen go way from yoa fadda-mudda guys an from da land wea yoa ohana stay, an come hea wea get peopo you donno befo tim
2.13: Rut tell Boaz, âEh boss! You stay real good to me! You wen give me good kine words an you talk to me wit good heart. Jalike I one a yoa worka wahines, no matta I not, an no can come one a dem.â
2.14: Lunch time, Boaz tell Rut, âEh! Come ova hea! Eat wit us! Take some a da bread fo eat, an if you like, put litto bit inside dat sour wine ova dea.â So Rut wen go sit down nea da peopo dat work fo cut da barley an eat lunch wit dem. Boaz, he pass some roast barley to her. So she eat all she like, an still yet, get mo plenny den she can ea
2.15: Afta Rut stand up fo go pick up some mo barley, Boaz tell his worka guys, âLet her pick up da extra barley, even ova dea wea you guys tie up da barley plants afta you cut um. No make her shame notting.
2.16: An den wen you guys tie up da barley, make shua you pull out litto bit fo her an leave um ova dea fo her pick up. No go scold her notting!â
2.17: All day, Rut pick up da extra barley. Wen da sun stay going down, she wack da barley dat she wen pick up fo make da part you eat fall off, an she get togedda bout 20 pound barley.
2.18: She take da food back Betlehem town. Her mudda-in-law see how plenny she wen pick up. Rut give her da stuff from lunch time too dat she no can eat.
2.19: Na`omi aks Rut, âEh! Wea you wen pick up da extra barley today? Wat side you wen go work? I like Yahweh do plenny good tings fo da guy dat wen see you an help you!â
2.20: Na`omi tell her daughta-in-law, âI like Yahweh do plenny good tings fo Boaz! Yahweh stay stick wit us guys dat stay alive, an he goin take care oua mahke husban guys, same time. Cuz you know, Boaz from oua ohana. An fo oua peopo, he one a da guys from oua ohana dat get da right fo marry you, so you can get kids dat goin carry yoa mahke husban's name!â
2.21: Rut tell, âAn you know wat? Boaz even wen tell me, âCome back tomorrow. You can stay wit my worka guys till dey pau cut all da barley I get.â-â
2.22: Na`omi tell Rut, âAz good, Rut! Go work wit his worka wahines, till dey pau. You go some odda field, bumbye da guys make you any kine, but wit Boaz, nobody goin bodda you.â
2.23: So Rut stay work fo pick up da extra barley wit da wahines dat work fo Boaz, till dat work pau. Den she do same ting wen dey cut da wheat. She still yet live dea wit her mudda-in-law Na`om

3.1: Na`omi talk to her daughta-in-law Rut. She say, âEh Rut! Time fo me find you one place fo live, wea dey goin take good care you, yeah?
3.2: You know da guy Boaz? He oua ohana, you know. He wen make to you jalike you one a da girls dat work fo him, so you can pick up da extra barley an wheat afta de
3.3: So den, you go bafe, an put perfume, an wear yoa nicest clothes. Go da place wea dey take da junks outa da wheat. But no let Boaz know you dea, till afta he pau eat.
3.4: Watch so you know wea he go lay down fo sleep. Afta he go sleep, go ova dea wea he stay sleep, an take da blanket off his feets, an lay down dea by his feets. Boaz, he know how oua peopo do, an he goin tell you wat you gotta do so he can take care you.â
3.5: Rut say, âOkay, I go do um, jalike you tell me!â
3.6: So, Rut go da place wea dey take da junks outa da wheat. She do jalike her mudda-in-law wen tell her.
3.7: Boaz, he wen eat an feel plenny good. Den he go lay down one side da place wea dey pile up da barley an go sleep. Lata, Rut go ova dea real quick an no make noise, an take da blanket off Boaz feets, an lay down dea.
3.8: Bout midnite time, someting scare Boaz litto bit, an he wake up an turn ova. An eh! had one wahine, laying dea by his feet
3.9: So he tell, âEh! Who you?â
3.10: Dat wen blow Boaz mind. He tell, âEh Rut! Yahweh, he do plenny good tings fo you! You wen do good too, cuz you wen stick wit yoa mahke husban ohana wen you wen come hea. An da ting you doing right now, show mo plenny still yet dat you get respeck fo da ohana, cuz you no stay trying fo marry one a da younga guys, no matta no matta dey rich o no mo notting!
3.11: So, no scared! I goin do jalike you wen tell me fo do fo you. No pilikia, cuz all da older leada guys fo my peopo know dat you one wahine dat stay strong insid
3.12: âOny one ting now. Fo shua, I one a da guys from da Elimelek ohana dat get da right fo marry you so you can get kids fo yoa mahke husban, cuz I jalike one cousin fo him. But you know, get one nodda guy dat mo nea yoa husban den me, so he get mo right fo marry you, mo den me.
3.13: So, stay hea tonite. Morning time, I go talk to him. If he like, kay den, he da one goin marry you. But if he no like do dat fo da ohana, den I make dis promise to you, jalike I shua Yahweh stay alive, I shua too dat I goin marry you. Now, lay down ova dea till morning time.â
3.14: So Rut lay dea by Boaz feets till morning time. She get up early, befo get light, befo anybody can see who her. Cuz Boaz tinking, âNo good da peopo know dat dis wahine wen come hea wea dey take da junks outa da wheat!â
3.15: He tell Rut, âCome! Bring yoa shawl ova hea an hold um out.â He dump wheat inside da shawl six times, an help put um on top her back fo take home. An den Boaz go back Betlehem town to
3.16: Wen Rut go back by Na`omi, her mudda-in-law, Na`omi aks, âSo. Wat he wen do, Rut?â
3.17: An she tell, âHe wen give me all dis wheat too, cuz he tell, âNo good you go back by yoa mudda-in-law an no mo notting fo her.â-â
3.18: Na`omi tell, âNow, my girl, jus wait till you find out wat goin happen. Cuz Boaz, he no goin wait notting. He goin do eryting today!â

4.1: Den Boaz go ova dea by da big gate fo da town, da place wea da town leadas come togedda fo talk. He sit down dea wit da odda leada guys. Right den an dea, da odda guy from his ohana, da one Boaz wen talk bout, dat get da right fo marry Rut mo den Boaz get, he walk by dem. Boaz yell to him an use his name. Boaz say, âHui! Come ova hea! Sit down! I like talk to you.â So dat guy come an sit down ova dea.
4.2: Den Boaz go tell ten a da older leada guys fo da town fo come lissen. He tell um, âSit down ova hea.â Dey sit down to
4.3: Boaz tell da guy dat get da right fo buy da ohana land an marry Rut, âEh, you know dat piece land dat oua ohana guy Elimelek wen own? He wen mahke ova dea Moab side. Now, his widow Na`omi come back from dea, and her like sell dat piece land.
4.4: Me, I tinking lidis: I gotta tell you bout dat piece land, cuz you get da right fo buy um, if you like. Dass cuz you an Elimelek da same blood. So, if you like buy um so dat da land stay wit da ohana, den buy um in front all dese peopo dat stay hea, dese leada guys fo my peopo. But if you no like, den tell me in front all dis guys so I know, cuz I like buy um. You get da main right fo buy um fo da ohana, but I get da right afta you, if you no like [um].â
4.5: Den Boaz tell da odda guy, âYou know, wen you buy dis piece land from Na`omi, dat mean you gotta take da Moab wahine Rut same time, cuz she wen marry Elimelek boy, da one dat wen mahke too. You da one dat gotta marry her, fo get kids wit her mahke husban's name. Dat way, da Elimelek line no goin come pau, an his land goin stay wit da ohana.
4.6: Da guy dat get da right fo buy da land say, âEh, if dass how stay, den I no can. Cuz if I buy um, my land go fo da Elimelek line, an no go fo help my own kids. Mo betta I give you my right fo buy dat piece land fo da ohana, cuz no way I can buy da land an take da wahine too!â
4.7: (Dat time, dass how da Israel peopo make proof dat one deal stay for real, dey wen do um lidis: Wen anybody use da right fo buy someting, dey take off dea slippa an give um to da odda guy dey make deal wit. Dass how erybody know wat kine deal dey make.)
4.8: So wen da guy dat get da right fo buy da land tell Boaz, âYou buy um,â Boaz take off his slippa an give um to da guy in front erybod
