4.9: Den Boaz tell da older leada guys an da odda people dat was dea, âAll you guys, you wen see wat wen happen hea today. I goin buy from Na`omi, all da land dat Elimelek and his boys Mahlon an Kilion wen get befo time.
4.10: An not jus da land -- da wahine Rut from Moab, dat wen marry Mahlon befo he mahke, I buying da right fo make her my wife. Dass so she can get one boy dat goin keep his mudda's mahke husban's name wit da land he get cuz his mudda was Mahlon's wife. Den all da ohana an all da leada guys fo Mahlon's town no goin foget who him. An all you guys, you gotta tell erybody wat wen happen dis day.â
4.11: Da older leada guys fo da town, an all da peopo dat stay by da main gate wea da peopo stay come togedda, dey tell, âDass right! All us guys wen see wat wen happen, an we gotta tell erybod
4.13: Dass how Boaz wen marry Rut an she come his wife. Wen dey sleep togedda, Yahweh let her come hapai. She born one boy.
4.14: Da Betlehem wahines tell Na`omi, âGood, us guys tell good tings bout Yahweh! He no let you stay now widout nobody dat get da right fo carry da name fo yoa ohana! We like all da Israel peopo know bout dis beb
4.16: Na`omi, she wen carry da baby close an take care him jalike she da mudda.
4.17: Da neighba wahines say, âNow, Na`omi get one boy[ again]!â An dey give him da name Obed. Obed, lata he [come] Jesse fadda an King David granfadd
4.18: Dis da ohana line from Pere

1.1: King David, he come real ol. He stay cold all da time, no can come warm, no matta get plenny blanket on top him.
1.2: So da palace guys tell um, âEh King, you oua boss! Us guys tink, if us guys go look fo one young wahine dat neva sleep wit one guy, she can stay wit you an help you. So wen you come cold, she can lay down wit you so you come warm.â
1.3: Da King tink dass good too. So dey wen go look all ova da Israel land fo one good looking wahine. Dey find Abishag from Shunam, an bring her to da King.
1.4: Da girl was one real good looking wahine. She stay wit da king an help him. But da king neva have sex wit he
1.5: Dat time, King David boy Adonijah (Haggit his mudda) wen go aroun ack big fo come King. He talk: âI goin come King!â So he go get war wagons an army guys dat ride horse. He go get fifty guys fo run in front him wen he come inside da street, so erybody know Adonijah stay coming.
1.6: From small kid time, weneva Adonijah do bad kine stuff, King David no bodda. King David neva aks âHow come you stay do dat?!â cuz David neva like make his boy feel bad. Adonijah one real good looking guy too. He da nex boy dat was born afta Absalom.
1.7: Adonijah wen go talk wit General Joab (Zeruiah boy) an Abiatar da pries guy, an dey say dey goin help him fo come King.
1.8: But Zadok da pries guy, an Colonel Benaiah (Jehoiada boy), an Nathan da guy dat stay talk fo God, an Shimei, an Rei, an da military leada guys dat was King David army guys, dey neva help Adonija
1.9: Adonijah go make plenny sacrifice, wit sheeps, an boy kine cows, an da kine cows peopo wen feed plenny fo come fat. He do dat right outside Jerusalem, by da big stone dey call Zohelet nea da En-rogel puka fo watta. He tell all his brudda guys, King David boys, fo come, an all da guys from da Judah ohana dat stay work fo da King.
1.10: But he neva tell Nathan da talka fo God, o Colonel Benaiah, o da odda army guys, fo come. An he neva tell his brudda Solomon fo com
1.11: Den Nathan go tell Bathsheba, Solomon mudda, âYou neva hear dis, o wat?! Adonijah, da one dat Haggit wen born fo David, he come King awready. An oua boss David, he donno yet wass happening!
1.12: So now, lissen! I goin tell you wat you gotta do. Cuz if you no do notting, you an yoa boy Solomon goin mahke.
1.13: Hurry up an go inside! Talk to King David now! Tell him: âYou da King, an you da boss fo me, an I jalike yoa slave wahine. But you wen make one strong promise to me befo time, you know. You wen tell me, âYoa boy Solomon goin come da nex king afta me. He goin sit on top my throne.â Dass wat you wen tell me. So, how come Adonijah stay da king now?!â
1.14: Befo you pau talk to da King, I goin come inside too, an I goin tell da same ting jalike you.â
1.15: Bathsheba go by da King, inside da room wea he sleep. Da King, he real ol, an Abishag da Shunam girl stay dea take care him.
1.16: Bathsheba go down on top da groun fo show respeck fo da King. Da King tell, âWat you like?â
1.17: Bathsheba tell da King, âEh, you da boss fo me! You wen make one strong promise to me, an you wen aks yoa God Yahweh fo make shua you do wat you wen promise. Dis wat you wen tell me dat time: âYoa boy Solomon, he da one dat goin come da King afta I mahke. Goin be him dat stay sit on top my throne.â
1.18: But you know wat?! I wen jus hear, Adonijah come King awready, an no matta you da real King, you donno dat!
1.19: He wen kill plenny boy kine cows, an cows peopo wen feed plenny fo come fat, an sheeps, fo make sacrifice. He wen tell all da King's boys, an Abiatar da pries guy, an Joab da general fo da army, fo come by him. Ony yoa boy Solomon, Adonijah neva tell fo come.
1.20: But you my boss, da King. Az why you da one dat all da Israel peopo stay watch. You gotta tell erybody, who da one goin sit on top yoa throne afta you mahke.
1.21: If you no tell da peopo notting, den afta you mahke an go by yoa ancesta guys, erybody goin go afta me an my boy Solomon, an make jalike us bad guys.â
1.22: Right den an dea, wen Batsheba stay talking wit da King, Nathan da guy dat talk fo God come inside dea.
1.23: Da palace guys tell da King, âLook! Nathan, da guy dat talk fo God, stay hea.â Nathan come in front da King, an go down wit his face on top da groun fo show um respeck.
1.24: Nathan tell da king, âEh, my boss da King! Az true, o wat, dat you wen tell, âAdonijah goin be da king afta me, an he goin sit on top my throneâ?!
1.25: Cuz today, Adonijah wen make sacrifice wit plenny boy kine cows, an cows dat peopo make um fat, an sheeps too. He wen tell all da King's boys, an General Joab dat stay in charge a da army, an Abiatar da pries guy, fo come by him. An you know wat? Right now, dey stay dea in front him, an dey eating and drinking plenny. Dey tell, âWe like King Adonijah live long time!â
1.26: But Adonijah neva tell me fo go by him, cuz I work fo you. He neva tell Zadok da pries guy, an Colonel Benaiah Jehoiadah boy fo come. An he neva tell Solomon, da guy dat work fo you, fo come by him too.
1.27: You da boss fo me, an you da King. Az true, o wat, dat you wen do all dis? How come you neva let us guys dat stay work fo you know, who goin be da one fo sit on top yoa throne an be da King after you mahke?â
1.28: King David tell Nathan, âTell Bathsheba fo come inside hea.â Den Nathan tell Bathsheba fo come, an she come stand dea in front da King.
1.29: King David make one strong promise to her. He tell, âDa promise I wen make to you, you can trus fo shua. Jalike I stay shua dat Yahweh stay alive, an erytime I get big trouble, he da one fix up eryting fo me. An jalike I stay shua bout dat,
1.30: I make dis strong promise fo you one mo time, jalike I wen make um to you befo time in front Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo. I wen tell you dat time: âYoa boy Solomon, he goin come da nex King afta me. He goin be da one dat sit on top my throne, an not me.â Dass da promise I wen make dat time, an now today, I goin do wat I wen promise.â
1.31: Bathsheba go down wit her face on top da groun fo show respeck fo da King. Den she tell, âKing David, you my boss! I like you live foeva!â
1.32: King David tell his guys, âGo tell Zadok da pries guy, an Nathan da guy dat talk fo God, an Colonel Benaiah Jehoiada boy, fo come hea.â Wen dey come in front da King,
1.33: da king tell um, âI da boss fo you guys, an I like you guys do dis: Go get all da odda guys dat work fo me. Den put my boy Solomon on top my spesho mule, an make parade fo take him down dea outside Jerusalem, by da Gihon watta place.
1.34: Wen he come dea, I like fo Zadok da pries guy an Nathan da talka fo God, put olive oil on top his head fo show he goin be da King fo da Israel peopo. Den, tell my guys fo blow da trumpets, an tell erybody fo say dis, âWe like King Solomon live long time!â
1.35: Den tell Solomon fo go up to da palace, an all you guys go wit him. Den he goin go inside da palace an sit down on top my throne. He goin come da King afta me, cuz I wen tell erybody, he da one goin stay in charge a da Israel peopo an da Judah ohana!â
1.36: Benaiah Jehoiada boy tell da King, âRight on! I like fo Yahweh, make all dat happen. He da God dat my boss da King stay pray to!
1.37: Jalike Yahweh wen stay tight wit you, I like Yahweh stay tight with Solomon, an make dis country even mo awesome den stay now, wen you stay da King.â
1.38: So Zadok da pries guy, an Nathan da talka fo God, and Colonel Benaiah Jehoiada boy, an da guard guys from da Keret an Pelet peopos, dey all wen go outa da palace. Dey go fo put Solomon on top da mule dat stay spesho fo King David, an dey take Solomon down to da Gihon watta plac
1.39: Wen dey get dea, Zadok da pries guy take one horn olive oil inside, dat he wen get from da Tent Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit God, an he put da oil on top Solomon head. Den da peopo start fo blow trumpets, an erybody yell, âWe like King Solomon live long time!â
1.40: Den Solomon go up to da palace, an all da peopo go wit him, playing flute an telling erybody dey stay plenny good inside. Dey make big noise, da groun shak
1.41: Adonijah an all da peopo dat stay making party wit him, almos pau eat, an dey hea da noise. General Joab, he hear da trumpet noise, an he tell, âEh! How come erybody inside dis town stay make big noise an yelling?!â
1.42: Befo Joab pau say dat, Jonathan come dea. (His fadda, Abiatar da pries.) Adonijah tell um, âCome inside! You one importan guy, an fo shua you get good stuff fo tell.â
1.43: Jonathan tell Adonijah, âNo, not good stuff! Oua boss King David wen make Solomon da King, not you.
1.44: Da King wen send Zadok da pries guy, an Nathan da talka fo God, an Colonel Benaiah Jehoiada boy, an da guard guys from da Keret an Pelet peopos. Dey wen put Solomon on top da mule dat stay spesho fo da King.
1.45: Zadok da pries guy, an Nathan da talka guy fo God, dey wen go da Gihon watta place. Ova dea dey put da spesho olive oil on top Solomon head fo show he da one dat come King. Den dey wen go from dea up to da palace, an dey all stay good inside. Erybody in dis town stay amping out! Dass da noise you hear.
1.46: So now, Solomon stay sit on top da throne, an he da Kin
1.47: âAn you know wat?! Da guys dat stay work fo oua boss King David, dey all go by King David an tell um, âWe like fo God make Solomon get even mo big name den you! We like God make dis country even mo awesome den stay now, wen you stay da King!â
1.48: Den he pray to God lidis: âI like tell good tings bout you, cuz you Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo. Today, you wen let one a my boys take ova da throne from me, an you wen let me see all dat happen!â-â
1.49: Den, all da peopo dat was making party wit Adonijah stay shaking cuz dey scared. Den dey all stand up an go home.
1.50: Adonijah, he scared a Solomon too. He go by da big altar an grab da tings jalike horns dat stick out, so nobody can kill him.
1.51: Somebody tell Solomon, âAdonijah, he scared a you, King Solomon. An you know wat? Adonijah stay put his hands on top da horns dat stay stick outa da big altar, an he tell, âI like fo King Solomon make one strong promise to me, dat he no goin tell nobody fo kill me wit one sword. I goin be his worka guy!â-â
1.52: Solomon tell, âGo tell Adonijah, âIf you come one guy I can trus, I no goin do notting fo make even one hair from yoa head fall on top da groun cuz a me. But if I hear anyting bad bout you, you goin mahke.â-â
1.53: Den King Solomon send one guy fo go get Adonijah down from da altar an bring um to da palace. Adonijah come, an he go down in front King Solomon fo show him respeck. Solomon tell um, âGo home.â

2.1: Wen almos time fo David mahke, he tell his boy Solomon wat fo do. He tell:
2.2: âYou know, erybody inside dis world, gotta mahke. An me, I goin mahke pretty soon. So you gotta be strong an show you no scared notting.
2.3: Do wateva yoa God Yahweh tell you, you gotta do. Live da way he tell you. Wateva job God give you, you betta do um. He da Judge, so wen he say someting, do um. Eryting God teach, dat Moses wen write inside da Rules, do um. Den, no matta wat you do, an wea you go, eryting goin come out good fo you.
2.4: Wen you do all dat, den Yahweh goin make happen, wat he tell bout me befo time, âDa king guys dat come born from yoa blood bumbye, dey gotta watch how dey ack. Cuz I goin see how dey live. If dey do eryting wit all dea heart, an wit eryting dey get inside, I know I can trus dem. Den me, Yahweh, I no goin wipe out yoa blood line eva. Erytime goin get one guy dat come from yoa blood line, dat goin be da King fo sit on top da throne fo da Israel peopo.â Dass wat Yahweh wen tell bout m
2.5: âOne mo ting. You know wat Joab, my sista Zeruiah boy, wen do to me. He wen go kill da two guys dat was da generals fo da Israel army, Abner Ner boy an Amasa Jether boy. Joab do dat afta pau all da fight. An he ack jalike still get war. So now, jalike get blood all ova his army clothes an stuff an all ova his shoes.
2.6: You know wat fo do erytime, so go do wateva you gotta do. But no matta Joab come ol an get white hair, wen he mahke, no let him mahke an go down to da Mahke Peopo Place easy kine, jalike he neva do notting ba
2.7: âStick wit da Barzillai guys from Gilead side. Make dem some a da guys dat you take care an eat wit you at yoa table. Cuz you know, dey da guys dat wen stick wit me an bring me food, da time I wen run away from yoa brudda Absalo
2.8: âAn no foget, you get wit you dis guy Shimei, Gera boy, from da Benjamin ohana Bahurim side. Da bugga wen put kahuna on top me fo hurt me plenny, da time I go Mahanaim. Lata, Shimei wen come down to da Jordan Riva fo talk to me, an I wen make one strong promise to him. I wen aks Yahweh fo help me. I tell um, âI no goin kill you wit my sword.â
2.9: But now, no need ack like da guy neva do notting bad. You one guy dat know wat fo do erytime, so you know wat fo do bout Shimei. He stay ol an get white hair, but make um bleed befo you send him down to da Mahke Peopo Place!â
2.10: Den David mahke an go wit his ancesta guys. Da peopo bury him inside Jerusalem, dat get da name âDavid [Big] Town.â
2.11: All da time dat David was da King fo da Israel peopo, was forty year. Firs part, he live Hebron town seven year, an den Jerusalem town, 33 year.
2.12: Den King Solomon take ova from his fadda David, an sit on top da same throne. An erybody know, dat Solomon da King fo real kin
2.13: Lata, Solomon's half brudda Adonijah go by Solomon mudda Batsheba (Adonijah mudda, Haggit). Batsheba aks Adonijah, âYou come hea fo make trouble, o eryting okay?!â
2.16: An now, I like aks you fo do one ting for me. No tell me no.â
2.17: So Adonijah tell, âGo talk to King Solomon, cuz he no goin tell you no. Aks him fo give me Abishag da Shunam wahine fo come my wife.â
2.20: She tell, âI get one small ting I like aks you fo do. Can do um fo me, o wat?â
2.23: Den King Solomon wen make one strong promise to Yahweh. He tell, âIf I no go do wat I say now, I like God kill me, o do mo worse tings! Dis Adonijah guy goin mahke, cuz he tell you fo come tell me dat!
2.24: I stay shua dat Yahweh stay alive, an dat he da one make me strong, an make me sit down on top da same throne jalike my fadda David. An I stay shua dat he wen make me one promise dat da Kings fo da Israel peopo goin come from my blood. An cuz I stay shua bout all dat, I know, Adonijah goin mahke, today!â
2.25: So King Solomon send Benaiah, Jehoiada boy, fo kill Adonijah, an Adonijah wen mahk
2.26: Da King tell Abiatar da pries guy, âGo back Anatot side, wea you get land. You suppose to mahke. But I no goin kill you today, cuz you wen help carry da Box Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit My Boss Yahweh in front David my fadda, an cuz you wen suffa all da time my fadda wen suffa.â
2.27: Den Solomon throw out Abiatar, an no let um be one pries fo Yahweh. All dis wen happen jalike wat Yahweh wen tell befo time bout da pries guys from da Eli ohana, Shiloh sid
2.28: Joab wen hear wat wen happen. (Befo time, Joab wen push Adonijah fo come King, but he neva push Absalom.) Joab run to da Tent Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit Yahweh, an he grab da tings jalike horns dat stick out from da four corner a da altar.
2.29: Somebody tell King Solomon, âJoab wen run to da Tent Fo Rememba Da Deal Wit Yahweh. Now he stay by da altar so nobody can go kill him!â
2.31: Da King tell Benaiah, âGo kill Joab, jalike he tell, an bury him, so dat nobody goin blame me an my fadda peopo. Cuz Joab wen make plenny peopo bleed an mahke, fo no reason.
2.32: Cuz Joab wen make peopo bleed an mahke, now Yahweh pay back Joab. Joab wen go attack an kill two guys, an my fadda neva know wat Joab do till afta. One guy Abner, Ner's boy, da general fo da Israel army, an da odda, Amasa, Jeter boy, da general fo da Judah army. Dey mo betta guys den Joab, an dey stay do da right ting mo den Joab.
2.33: Dese two guys mahke, an Joab get da blame fo dat, an erybody dat come from him, get da blame too. But fo David an da peopo dat come from him, an his ohana, an fo da kings dat goin come from David, Yahweh goin make eryting come good fo dem, foeva.â
2.35: Den da King wen make Benaiah, Jehoiada boy, da general in charge a da army afta Joab. Da king make Zadok da main pries afta Abiatar to
2.36: Den da King send one guy fo tell Shimei fo come by him. Da King tell Shimei, âGo build one house fo yoaself ova hea inside Jerusalem. But you no go outside Jerusalem fo go anodda place.
2.37: Dis da deal: If you go out, an go cross da Kidron Stream, you know fo shua dat da same day, you goin mahke, an ony you goin get da blame fo dat.â
2.38: Shimei tell da King, âI goin live jalike how you say. You da King, an you my boss, an I yoa worka guy, an dass wat I goin do.â Shimei wen stay inside Jerusalem town long tim
2.39: But afta three year, two guys dat was slaves fo Shimei wen run away. Dey go Gat side, by King Akish, Ma`akah boy. Somebody tell Shimei, âYoa slave guys, dey stay Gat side.â
2.40: So Shimei put saddle on top his donkey an get ready fo go. He go Gat side by King Akish, fo look fo his slaves. Den he bring um back from Ga
2.41: Somebody tell King Solomon dat Shimei wen go outside Jerusalem to Gat, an now he come back.
2.42: Da King send somebody fo tell Shimei fo come by him. King Solomon tell Shimei, âWass up?! I wen make you, make one strong promise in front Yahweh, an I wen tell you, âFo shua, I goin do wat I tell you. If you go outside Jerusalem town, no matta wat place you go, da same day, you goin mahke.â
2.43: You wen make one strong promise to Yahweh. How come you no do wat you wen promise, aah? I wen tell you wat you gotta do. How come you neva do um, aah?â
2.44: Da King tell Shimei dis too: âInside yoa heart, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do to King David my fadda. Now, Yahweh stay bring all dat bad stuff back to you.
2.45: But Yahweh goin do good tings fo me, King Solomon. Fo shua, kings from David blood goin sit on top King David throne in front Yahweh, foeva.â

3.1: King Solomon wen let da Pharaoh guy, da King fo Egypt, make one deal wit him. Fo set up da deal, Solomon wen take da Pharaoh guy daughta an marry her. He bring her David Town, az Jerusalem. She stay inside Jerusalem long time, till King Solomon pau build his own palace, an da Temple Fo Yahweh, an da wall aroun da tow
3.2: Ony one ting -- dat time, all da peopo still stay making sacrifice on top da hills, cuz dey still yet no build one temple fo Yahweh, fo show erybody wat kine God hi

3.21: âMorning time, I get up fo breas feed my boy. I see dat he mahke awready. But den wen I look him good inside da light -- eh, he not da same bebe I wen born!â

3.23: Da King tell dem: âOne tell, âDis bebe dass alive, az my boy, an yoa boy, mahke!â Da odda one tell, âNot! Yoa boy, da mahke one, an my boy da one dat stay alive!â-â

My fadda wen lick you guys wit regula kine whip, but I goin lick you guys wit scorpions!â Dass wat we gotta tell um.â
12.12: Day numba three, Jeroboam an all da odda peopo come back by King Rehoboam, jalike he wen tell um fo do.
12.13: Da king talk real hard to da peopo. He no lissen to wat da older leadas tell um az good fo do.
12.14: He talk to dem da way da young guys wen tell um fo talk. He tell, âMy fadda wen put jalike one heavy yoke, da kine dey use fo da cow, on top you guys fo make you work. Me, I goin make da yoke mo heavy den dat! My fadda wen lick you guys wit regula kine whip, an I goin whip you guys wit scorpions!â
12.15: An dass how was. Da king guy no lissen to da peopo. But was Yahweh wen make um happen lidat. Cuz az da ting Yahweh wen tell Ahijah da Shiloh guy fo tell Jeroboam, Nebat boy, long time bef
12.16: Wen all da Israel peopo see dat King Rehoboam no stay lissen to dem, dey talk back to him. Dey tell u
12.17: Cuz a dis, Rehoboam ony stay da king fo da Israel peopo dat live inside da Judah town
12.18: Den King Rehoboam send Adoniram to da country side for talk to da peopo. Adoniram da leada boss fo all da guys dat go work hard fo Rehoboam an no mo pay. But all da Israel peopo throw rock an kill Adoniram. But King Rehoboam, he strong nuff fo jump real quick inside his war wagon an run away from dea to Jerusalem.
12.19: Az why still yet today, all da North Israel peopo stay fight agains da David ohana, an no let um come dea kin
12.20: Wen all da odda North Israel peopo find out dat Jeroboam come back from Egypt, dey send somebody fo tell um, âCome meet wit us!â Dey make him da king fo all da North Israel peopo. Da Judah ohana was da ony ones dat stick wit da David kine king guy
12.21: Wen Rehoboam come back Jerusalem, he tell all da guys from da Judah an Benjamin ohanas fo come by him fo make army. He get 180,000 guys from dem, ready fo make war wit da Israel ohanas, so Rehoboam, Solomon's boy, can come king again fo erybod
12.22: But had one message from God fo Shemaiah, one guy dat know God fo real kine, fo say dis:
12.23: âTalk to Rehoboam, Solomon's boy, da king fo da Judah peopo, an to all da Judah an Benjamin peopo, an all da oddas too.
12.24: Tell um dis: âDis wat Yahweh tell. No go ova dea fight wit yoa brudda guys da Israel ohana peopo. Go home, all you guys! Cuz I da One dat stay make all dis happen right now!â-â Da peopo lissen to wat Yahweh tell um, an dey go back home, jalike Yahweh tell um fo d
12.25: Den, Jeroboam wen make strong da walls fo Shekem town, up country Efraim side. He go dea fo live. From dea, he go ova Peniel side an make strong da walls fo dat town too.
12.26: Cuz Jeroboam tink, âIf I no do notting, bumbye da David ohana peopo from da Judah ohana, an dea king, goin take ova again.
12.27: Ery year, dis peopo go Jerusalem town fo make sacrifice inside da Temple Fo Yahweh. Bumbye, dey goin tink fo take da Judah king, Rehoboam, fo be dea boss one mo time. An if dey do dat, dey goin kill me an go back to him!â
12.28: So King Jeroboam aks his helpa guys wat fo do. Den he tell his worka guys, âMake two idol kine gods outa gold, da kine dat look like bebe cows.â
12.29: Jeroboam put up one a da idol kine gods Bethel side nea da border wit Judah, an da odda one in da north, Dan ohana side.
12.30: Cuz Jeroboam wen do dis, make plenny peopo do wat dey not suppose to do. Dey even wen go all da way Dan side fo pray to da idol kine god ova de
12.31: Jeroboam wen build small kine house by da sacrifice places on top da hills fo pray. He take any kine peopo fo come prieses, even if dey not from da Levi ohana.
12.32: Den Jeroboam tell da peopo dey gotta make one spesho religious time ery year Octoba, same time jalike da spesho time wen da Judah peopo go live inside shack. An Jeroboam make sacrifice on top da altar he wen build. He do dat Bethel side, fo make sacrifice fo da idol kine gods he wen make, dat look jalike bebe cows. He get da peopo fo come prieses fo all da small kine sacrifice house he wen build on top da hills fo pray to da odda gods too.
12.33: Octoba was da time Jeroboam wen go pick fo be da spesho religious time. He neva get dat time from God. Dat time, Jeroboam go da altar he wen build Bethel side. Dass how he make his own spesho religious time fo da Israel peopo all come togedda, an he da one, not da pries guys, go to da altar an make da sacrific

13.1: Dat time, Yahweh wen tell one guy dat come from da Judah land an know God, fo go Bethel town. He come right den, wen Jeroboam stay stand by da altar fo burn up da sacrifice.
13.2: Da guy yell jalike he talking stink to da altar, cuz Yahweh wen tell um wat fo say. He tell, âEh you! Da altar! Dis wat Yahweh tell: âBumbye one bebe boy goin born from da David ohana. His name goin be Josiah. On top dis altar, Josiah goin make sacrifice. Firs ting, he goin kill da pries guys fo da places on top da hills wea da peopo make sacrifice. He goin kill dose dat burn sacrifice on top dis altar too. Den he goin burn bones from mahke peopo dea, so dis altar no goin be good no moa!â
13.3: Dat same day, da guy dat know God give da peopo one sign. He tell, âOne awesome ting goin happen, one sign from Yahweh. Wen you see dis altar broke in two piece, an da ash from burn fat dat stay on top da altar spill out, you goin know az fo shua wat Yahweh tell.â
13.4: King Jeroboam hear wat da guy dat know God tell. He hear um yelling bout da Bethel altar. From right dea by da altar Jeroboam put out his hand an point at da guy, an tell, âGrab dat guy!â But da arm he put out fo tell dis, come stiff, so he no can pull um back!
13.5: Da altar wen broke in two piece an da ash from da sacrifice fat spill out, jalike da sign dat da guy dat know God wen give cuz Yahweh wen tell u
13.6: King Jeroboam tell da guy dat know God, âAks yoa God Yahweh fo make good to me! Pray fo me, so my arm come back okay!â So da guy dat know God aks God fo make good to da king. Da king arm come back okay again, jalike how was befo tim
13.7: Den King Jeroboam tell da guy dat know God, âCome my house, an go eat. I goin give you one present.â
13.8: But da guy dat know God tell da king, âNo matta you give me half da stuffs you get, I no goin go wit you. No way I goin eat bread o drink watta hea.
13.9: Cuz dis wat Yahweh wen tell me I gotta do: âNo eat bread, no drink watta, no go back da same road you wen come.â-â
13.10: Den da guy go one diffren way den da way he come Bethel sid
13.11: Had one ol guy dat talk fo God. He live Bethel town. His boys come tell him da whole story. Dey tell dea fadda da tings da guy dat know God wen do dat day, an wat da guy wen tell King Jeroboam too.
13.12: Da fadda aks his boys, âWat road he go?â Da boys show da road dat da guy from Judah side dat know God wen go.
13.13: So he tell his boys, âPut saddle on top da donkey fo me.â Dey do um, an da ol guy go on top da donkey
13.14: an follow da guy dat know Go
13.15: Da ol talka fo God tell um, âCome my house an we go eat.â
13.16: Da guy dat know God tell, âNo, I no can go back dea wit you. I no can eat food o drink watta wit you in dis place.
13.17: Cuz Yahweh wen tell me. He tell: âNo eat food o drink watta Bethel side, an no come back da same way.â-â
13.18: Da ol talka fo God tell um, âI one talka fo God too, jalike you. An one angel messenja guy wen tell me wat Yahweh tell. He tell, âBring da guy back wit you yoa house fo eat and drink.â-â (But da ol talka fo God, he bulai.)
13.19: So da guy dat know God go back wit da ol talka fo God, an he eat food an drink watta inside da ol guy hous
13.20: Wen dey stay sit by da table, da ol talka fo God dat make da guy come back, get message from Yahweh right den an dea.
13.21: He talk real loud to da guy from Judah dat know God, âDis wat Yahweh tell: âYou, you wen go agains wat Yahweh tell you! You no do wat yoa God Yahweh tell you fo do!
13.22: You wen come back, eat and drink, inside da place wea God wen tell you fo no go eat an drink, an no come back hea. So, wen you mahke, yoa body no goin stay inside da place wea yoa ancesta guys stay bury!â-â
13.23: Afta da guy dat know God pau eat an drink, da ol talka guys fo God dat wen make um come back Bethel side, put saddle on top da Judah guy donkey fo him.
13.24: Den da guy dat know God stay go. One lion see um on top da road an kill um. Da lion throw down da mahke guy body on top da road. Da donkey an da lion stand dea nea da bod
13.25: Bumbye, some guys pass by dea. Dey see da body da lion wen throw down on top da road. Dey see da lion stay stand nea da body. Wen dey reach da town wea da ol talka fo God live, dey tell wat wen happe
13.26: Da talka fo God dat wen make da guy come back hear all dat. He tell, âDass da guy dat know God! Da one no lissen wat Yahweh tell um fo do! Yahweh wen turn um ova to da lion, an he bus up da guy an kill um, jalike Yahweh wen tell um goin happen.â
13.27: Den da talka fo God tell his boys, âPut saddle on top da donkey fo me!â Dey do um.
13.28: Da talka fo God go out, an he find da guy body on top da road, an da donkey an da lion stay stand nea da body. Da lion neva eat da body, an he neva bus up da donkey.
13.29: Da ol talka fo God pick up da body a da guy dat know God an lay um on top da donkey. He bring um back Bethel town wea da ol talka fo God live, so he can cry plenny fo him, an bury um dea.
13.30: Den he put da body inside da tomb he wen make fo himself fo wen he mahke, an he cry real hard fo him, âAuwe, my brudda!â
13.31: Afta he bury da guy, he tell his boys, âWen I mahke, you guys bury me inside da same tomb wea da guy dat know God stay bury. Lay my bones nex to his bones.
13.32: Cuz da ting Yahweh wen tell him fo tell, goin happen fo shua! He tell erybody real loud bout da altar dat stay Bethel town, an bout all da small temples on top da hills wea peopo make sacrifice to odda gods inside da Samaria towns.â
13.33: No matta all dis tings happen, Jeroboam still no ack diffren, he still do bad kine stuff. He still go make anybody from any kine place come pries guys fo da sacrifice places on top da hills. Anybody dat like come one pries, Jeroboam make um come pries fo da places on top da hills wea dey make sacrifice to odda gods.
13.34: Cuz Jeroboam wen make lidis, him an his ohana get blame fo do all kine bad stuff. Az why da Jeroboam ohana king guys wen wipe out, an no any mo his ohana inside dis worl

14.1: Dat time, King Jeroboam boy Abijah come sick.
14.2: Jeroboam tell his wife, âUs gotta do someting! Go put on diffren kine clothes, so nobody know you my wife. Den go Shiloh side. Get one talka fo God ova dea. His name, Ahijah. He da one wen tell me I goin come king fo dis peopo.
14.3: Take ten flat kine breads, some sweet kine cake, an one small bottle honey. Go by him an give him da present. He goin tell you wat goin happen wit da boy.â
14.4: So dass wat Jeroboam wife wen do. She start fo go Shiloh side, to Ahijah house. Ahijah, he no can see cuz he real ol.
14.5: Befo she reach Shiloh, Yahweh tell Ahijah awready, âJeroboam wife goin come hea fo aks you fo tell her one ting. She goin aks you bout her boy, cuz he stay sick. An you goin tell her some stuff. Wen she come, she goin get diffren kine clotheses on, so nobody know az her.â
14.6: Ahijah hear her coming by da door. He tell her, âCome inside! You Jeroboam wife, yeah? So, how come you put on diffren kine clotheses so nobody know az you?! God wen tell me awready, fo tell you some stuff dat goin make you bum out.
14.7: Wen you go home, tell Jeroboam, dis wat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, tell: âWas me wen make you come mo importan den all da peopo aroun you, an I wen make you da leada fo my peopo, da Israel peopo.
14.8: David was da king, an da odda kings was goin come from his ohana. But I wen take away da right fo da David ohana guys come king, an give you da right fo be king. But you, you no ack like David, cuz he wen work fo me, an you, you no do notting fo me. Wen I tell him he gotta do someting, he do um. He wen stay tight wit me wit one good heart. He ony do da kine stuff dat I see stay right.
14.9: You wen do mo plenny bad kine stuff den all da peopo dat wen come befo time. You go make idol kine gods dat not fo you, dat you melt metal fo make. You make me come mad and walk away from m
14.10: â âCuz you do all dat, dis wat I goin do. I goin make bad kine stuff happen to all da Jeroboam ohana. I goin wipe out ery man from da Jeroboam ohana inside da Israel land, no matta dey slaves o dey not slaves. I goin burn up all da Jeroboam ohana peopo, jalike peopo burn up all da rubbish, till no mo nobody [dea].
14.11: Anybody from da Jeroboam ohana dat mahke inside da towns, da dogs goin eat um. Any a dem mahke outside da country side, da birds goin eat dem. I, Yahweh, an I telling you dis!â
14.12: âAn fo you, Mrs. Jeroboam, go home now. Wen you go inside yoa town, yoa boy goin mahke.
14.13: All da Israel peopo going cry plenny fo him an bury him. But him, he da ony one from da Jeroboam ohana dat goin get grave, cuz him da ony one from da Jeroboam ohana dat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, see dat he one good gu
14.14: âYahweh goin make one nodda guy come king fo da Israel peopo, an do wat Yahweh like. Dat guy goin wipe out all da Jeroboam ohana. An you know wen he goin do dat? Goin be today! An wat Yahweh goin do afta dat?
14.15: Yahweh goin smash all da Israel peopo so dey no goin stand up strait, jalike wen you smash one plant dat grow inside one riva. He goin pull out da Israel peopo from dis good land he wen give to dea ancesta guys, jalike wen you pull one plant outa da groun wit da roots. He goin throw dem all ova da place, da odda side da Eufrates Riva. Az cuz dey wen put up pos fo pray to da wahine god Asherah, an dat make Yahweh come plenny huhu.
14.16: Yahweh goin give up on da Israel peopo, cuz a all da bad kine stuff Jeroboam wen do, an cuz Jeroboam wen make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff too!â
14.17: So Jeroboam wife get up an go home Tirzah side. Da same time she step inside her door, her boy mahke.
14.18: Da peopo bury da boy, an all da Israel peopo cry plenny fo him, jalike wat Yahweh wen tell his worka guy Ahijah dat talk fo him, fo tel
14.19: All da odda stuff Jeroboam wen do, how he make war an how he lead da peopo, all dat stay write down inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
14.20: Jeroboam was king 22 year. Den he mahke an go sleep wit his ancesta guys. Jeroboam boy Nadab come king afta hi
14.21: Ova dea Judah side, Solomon boy Rehoboam stay king dat time. Wen he 41 year ol, he come king, an he stay king 17 year Jerusalem side. (Rehoboam mudda name Naamah, from da Ammon peopo.) Jerusalem, az da big town Yahweh wen pick from all da Israel ohanas, fo build da Temple so da peopo can come fo find out wat kine God hi
14.22: But da Judah peopo, dey do da stuff Yahweh say az bad. Da bad kine stuff dey wen do, was mo bad den da stuff dea ancesta guys wen do. Cuz a dat, dey make Yahweh come real huhu an jealous, cuz dey suppose to live fo him an [dey] no make lidat.
14.23: Dem guys make spesho kine place on top da high part a da hills fo make sacrifice, an dey stand up big stone fo make place for pray, an put pos fo pray to da wahine god Asherah, on top da high part a ery hill an unda ery big tree dat get plenny leaf.
14.24: Dey even get guys inside da land dat stay spesho fo da odda gods. Dey go take da wahines fo do bad kine stuff, an da wahines pay dem, an all da pay dey get, go to da places wea da peopo pray to da odda gods. Da peopo stay do all kine pilau kine stuff jalike how da odda peopos wen do, da same peopos dat Yahweh wen get um outa da land wen da Israel peopo come de
14.25: Afta Rehoboam was king five year, Shishak da king fo da Egypt peopo wen come attack Jerusalem.
14.26: He take all da stuff from inside da Temple Fo Yahweh an inside King Rehoboam palace. He take eryting, even da gold shields da Solomon guys make.
14.27: So King Rehoboam tell his guys fo go make shields outa bronze metal, fo put um wea da gold shields stay befo time. He make da officer guys, da ones dat guard da door fo da king's palace, [put on / take care] da bronze shields.
14.28: Erytime da king go inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, da guard guys carry da shields. Afta he leave, dey take um back to da room wea dey sta
14.29: Odda stuff dat wen happen wen Rehoboam stay king, all da tings he wen do, stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah.
14.30: An all da time, Rehoboam an Jeroboam make war wit each odda.
14.31: Den Rehoboam mahke jalike his ancesta guys. Dey bury him wit dem inside David Town, az Jerusalem. (Rehoboam's mudda name was Naamah, from da Ammon peopo.) Den Rehoboam boy Abijam come da nex kin

15.1: Da numba 18 year dat Jeroboam, Nebat boy, was king Israel side, Abijam wen come da king Judah side.
15.2: He stay da king inside Jerusalem town three year. His mudda name Maacah, Absalom girl.
15.3: King Abijam do any kine bad kine stuff, jalike his fadda Rehoboam wen do befo time. Az cuz inside his heart, Abijam neva get um right wit his God Yahweh. He no ack like his ancesta guy David, dat wen stay tight wit God.
15.4: But cuz King Abijam's God Yahweh get plenny respeck fo David, God wen give da David ohana somebody fo lead da Jerusalem peopo, jalike one oil lamp dat stay burn long time. Dat mean, Yahweh give da peopo one guy dat get David fo his ancesta, fo make da Jerusalem govmen stay strong.
15.5: (David, da way Yahweh see um, he wen do da right kine stuff. David do eryting Yahweh tell um fo do, till he mahke. He ony mess up da time he set up Uriah da Het guy fo mahke.)
15.6: An all da time Abijam stay live, da Rehoboam an da Jeroboam ohanas still stay make war wit each odda.
15.7: Odda stuff dat happen wen Abijam stay king, an all da tings he wen do, stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah. An Abijam an Jeroboam stay make war wit each odda too.
15.8: Den Abijam mahke, an dey bury him by his ancesta guys inside David Town, az Jerusalem. Abijam boy Asa come da nex kin
15.9: Da numba 20 year Jeroboam stay king Israel side, Asa come king fo da Judah peopo.
15.10: He stay da king Jerusalem side 41 year. His granmudda, Maacah, her fadda Absalom.
15.11: Asa wen do all da right kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um, jalike his ancesta guy Davi
15.12: Had guys go take da wahines fo make sex, an da wahines pay dem, an all da pay dey get, go to da places wea da peopo pray to da odda gods. Asa throw all dem guys outa da country. An he throw out all da idol kine gods dat his ancesta guys wen make.
15.13: He even kick out his granmudda Maacah an no give her respeck fo be da ol queen, cuz she wen make one real pilau kine pole fo pray to da wahine god Asherah. Asa cut down da pole an burn um by da Kidron Stream.
15.14: But da places on top da mos high part a da hills wea da peopo make sacrifice fo da odda gods, dey still stay. Cuz inside, Asa stay tight wit Yahweh all da time he stay alive.
15.15: Asa put inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, da silva an da gold an tings da pries guys use, dat him an his fadda wen make spesho fo God befo tim
15.16: All da time dey stay king, King Asa an King Ba`asha from Israel side make war wit each odda.
15.17: King Ba`asha wen go agains da Judah peopo. He wen build Ramah town real strong, fo make shua nobody from his peopo can go by King Asa, Judah side, an nobody can come from King Asa lan
15.18: So King Asa take out all da silva an gold dat stay inside da storage rooms fo da Temple Fo Yahweh, an fo da king palace. He give um all to his helpa guys, an tell um fo take um Damascus side, to Ben-Hadad, Tavrimmon boy an Hezion grankid, dat was king fo da Aram peopo, wit dis message fo Ben-Hada
15.19: âYoa fadda an my fadda wen make one deal fo help each odda. So now, az good me an you make da same kine deal. Look -- I stay send you one present, silva an gold. I like you fo go broke da deal you get wit Ba`asha, da king fo da Israel peopo, so he no fight wit me.â
15.20: Ben-Hadad, he lissen to King Asa. He send his bestes military guys fo go agains da Israel towns. He take ova Ijon, Dan, Abel Bet Maacah, an da land aroun Lake Kinneret all da way to da Naftali lan
15.21: Wen Ba`asha hear wass happening, he stop building Ramah side, an he go stay inside Tirzah town.
15.22: Den King Asa tell all da Judah peopo fo come. No mo nobody can stay home. Dey take away from Ramah all da big stones an da wood dat King Ba`asha use fo build ova dea. King Asa use all dat stuff fo build up Geba town mo strong Benjamin side, an Mizpah town to
15.23: Odda stuff dat happen wen Asa stay king, an all da tings he wen do, all da powa he get, an all da towns he wen build, stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah. But wen Asa come ol, his feets come real sick.
15.24: Den Asa mahke. Dey bury him wit his ancesta guys inside David Town, az Jerusalem. An Asa boy Jehoshafat come da nex kin
15.25: Jeroboam boy Nadab come king fo da Israel peopo, da numba two year dat Asa was king fo Judah. He stay king, two year.
15.26: Da way Yahweh see um, Nadab do da kine stuff dat Yahweh say az bad. He do da same kine stuff his fadda Jeroboam wen do, an he make da Israel peopo do da same kine bad stuff dat his fadda guy wen make um do.
15.27: Ba`asha, Ahijah boy from da Issakar ohana, wen make plan wit some odda guys fo kill Nadab. Wen Nadab an all da Israel army guys stay circle aroun Gibbeton town fo take um ova from da Filisha guys, Ba`asha wen kill Nadab.
15.28: Was da numba three year Asa stay king Judah side, wen Ba`asha kill Nadab fo take ova from Nadab fo come kin
15.29: Firs ting Ba`asha do wen he come king, he kill erybody from da Jeroboam ohana. He no leave nobody alive. He wipe um all out, jalike Yahweh wen tell befo time to Ahijah, da Shiloh guy dat work fo him.
15.30: God do dat, cuz a all da bad kine stuff Jeroboam wen do, an all da bad kine stuff he make da Israel peopo do, an cuz Jeroboam make Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, mad.
15.31: Had odda stuff wen happen wen Nadab stay king. All da tings he wen do, stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah.
15.32: An all da time King Asa an King Ba`asha from Israel stay kings, dey stay make war wit each odd
15.33: Was da numba three year dat Asa stay king Judah side, Ahijah boy Ba`asha come da king fo all da Israel peopo, Tirzah town. He stay king 24 year.
15.34: Yahweh see Ba`asha do plenny bad kine stuff. He make jalike Jeroboam, an do da same kine bad stuff jalike Jeroboam, an make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff to

16.1: One time, Yahweh give Jehu, Hanani boy, dis message fo King Ba`ash
16.2: âBefo time, you was notting. I wen pick you up from da dirt. I wen make you leada guy fo my peopo, da Israel peopo. But you wen go make jalike King Jeroboam. You make my Israel peopo cuz go do bad kine stuff. Cuz a you, an da bad tings dey do, dey piss me off!
16.3: So, I goin wipe out you an all yoa ohana, King Ba`asha. I goin make yoa ohana come jalike da ohana dat come from Jeroboam, Nebat boy, all pau.
16.4: Anybody from yoa ohana mahke inside one town, da dogs goin eat um. If dey stay mahke inside da country side, da scavenja birds goin eat um.â
16.5: All da odda stuff dat stay happen wen Ba`asha stay king, an all da tings he wen do, an all da powa he get, stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
16.6: Den Ba`asha mahke. Da peopo bury him wit his ancesta guys inside Tirzah town. An Ba`asha boy Elah come da nex kin
16.7: All da time Ba`asha was king, he make any kine fo piss off Yahweh. He ack jalike da Jeroboam ohana. Yahweh even give Jehu, Hanani boy, da talka fo God, da message fo King Ba`asha an his ohana. Jehu tell um all da kine stuff Yahweh see Ba`asha stay do, jalike da Jeroboam ohana guys do. An cuz a dat, God go afta Ba`asha to
16.8: Da numba 26 year dat Asa stay king Judah side, Elah, Ba`asha boy, come king fo da Israel peopo. He stay king Tirzah town, two year.
16.9: One guy Zimri, dat one a da palace guys fo Elah an stay in charge a half da war wagons, make plan fo kill Elah. Dat time, Elah go Tirzah side, Arza house, da guy dat stay in charge a da Tirzah palace, an he stay drink an come drunk ova dea.
16.10: Zimri go ova dea an hit Elah an kill um. Den Zimri take ova an come king afta Elah. Dat time was numba 27 year dat Asa stay king Judah sid
16.11: Wen Zimri take ova da throne fo come king, he go kill all da guys from da Ba`asha ohana, an even Ba`asha's odda ohana guys an dea friends.
16.12: Dass how Zimri wen wipe out all da Ba`asha ohana peopo. Dis happen jalike Yahweh wen tell his talka guy Jehu fo tell Ba`asha.
16.13: Yahweh make dis happen cuz a all da bad kine stuff Ba`asha an his boy Elah wen do, an all da bad kine tings dey wen make da Israel peopo do, fo make dea God Yahweh come huhu, cuz Ba`asha an Elah wen stick to da idol kine gods dat no can do notting.
16.14: Da odda stuff dat happen wen Elah stay king, an all da tings he wen do, stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israe
16.15: Da numba 27 year wen Asa stay king fo da Judah peopo, Zimri wen come king Tirzah town -- but ony seven days. Dat time, da Israel army guys stay camp in tents fo make ready fo fight da Filisha peopo dat live Gibbeton town.
16.16: Wen da Israel army guys inside da camp find out dat Zimri wen make plan an kill King Ba`asha, dat same day da Israel guys wen make da general fo dea army, Omri, da king fo Israel, right dea inside da camp.
16.17: Den Omri an all da Israel guys wit him wen go way from Gibbeton town, an go all aroun outside Tirzah town fo attack um.
16.18: Wen Zimri see da Israel army goin take ova Tirzah town, he go inside da place wit real strong wall inside da palace, an burn down da palace on top him. Dass how he wen mahke,
16.19: cuz a da kine tings Zimri wen do, dat stay bad da way Yahweh see um. Da way Zimri do bad kine stuff, an da way he make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff too, he make jalike Jeroboam wen do.
16.20: Da odda stuff dat happen wen Zimri stay king, an how he make plan fo kill King Elah, all dat stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israe
16.21: Dat time, da Israel peopo wen go take sides. Half a dem like Tibni, Ginat boy, fo come king, an da oddas like Omri stay king.
16.22: But da peopo dat stick wit Omri mo strong den da peopo wit Tibni, Ginat boy. Az why Tibni mahke, an Omri stay da kin
16.23: Was da numba 31 year dat Asa stay king Judah side, wen Omri come king fo da Israel peopo. He stay king twelve year. Da firs six year, he stay Tirzah town.
16.24: Den Omri buy da hill dey call Samaria now. He buy um from Shemer, an he pay Shemer 150 pound silva. On top dat hill, he build one town. He give da town da name Samaria, fo no foget da name Shemer, da guy dat own da hill befo time.
16.25: But Omri, he do bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um. Omri wen do mo plenny bad kine stuff den all da king befo him.
16.26: Omri wen do all da same kine bad stuff jalike Jeroboam, Nebat boy, wen do. He make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff too. Az how Omri make Yahweh come huhu, da God Fo Da Israel Peopo, cuz Omri pray to da idol kine gods dat no can do notting.
16.27: Odda stuff wen happen wen Omri stay king, an all da tings he wen do, an all da powa he get, stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
16.28: Den Omri mahke jalike his ancesta guys. Da peopo bury him inside Samaria town. An Omri boy Ahab come da nex kin
16.29: Ahab, Omri boy, come da nex king fo da Israel peopo, da numba 38 year dat Asa stay king fo da Judah peopo. Ahab stay king fo da Israel peopo inside Samaria town 22 year.
16.30: Ahab, Omri boy, he do plenny bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um, mo bad den all da odda king guys befo him.
16.31: Fo Ahab, az no big ting fo him do da same kine bad kine stuff jalike Jeroboam, Nebat boy. He wen marry Jezebel, her fadda Etba`al, da king fo da Sidon peopo. He wen start fo make da god Ba`al be his god, an go down an show um respeck.
16.32: He build one temple fo Ba`al Samaria side, an he put one altar dea fo make sacrifice to Ba`al.
16.33: An he put up one pos dea fo pray to da wahine god Asherah too. He do plenny fo make Yahweh, da God Fo Da Israel Peopo, come huhu, mo den all da odda kings fo da Israel peopo dat come befo hi
16.34: Da time Ahab stay king, one guy Hiel from Bethel town wen go build Jericho town one mo time. Wen he make da foundation, his numba one boy Abiram mahke. Wen he put up da big town gate, his mos young boy Segub mahke. Dass wat Joshua, Nun boy, tell befo time, cuz Yahweh tell um fo say da

17.1: Get one guy Elijah from Tishbe town, Gilead side. He tell King Ahab, âI stay shua dat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, stay alive, an he da God I stay work fo. An I shua bout dis: From now, no goin get rain fo long time. No even goin get watta on top da groun morning time. Da ony rain goin come, goin be wen I say come!â
17.3: âNo stay hea! Go da east side an go hide up dea inside da Kerit Gulch, mauka da Jordan Riva.
17.4: Da Kerit Stream goin be wea you get watta fo drink. I wen tell da scavenja birds awready, fo go bring food fo feed you ova dea.â
17.5: Elijah go an do wat Yahweh wen tell um fo do. He go da Kerit Gulch, mauka da Jordan Riva, an stay dea.
17.6: Ery day morning time, an ery day befo nite time, da scavenja birds bring him food an meat, an he drink watta outa da Kerit Stream.
17.7: Den eryting wen change. Da stream all come dry, cuz no mo rain all ova da lan
17.9: âGo Zarefat town now, nea Sidon town. Stay dea. I awready wen tell one widow wahine ova dea fo give you food.â
17.10: So Elijah go Zarefat side. Wen he come by da gate fo da town, one widow wahine ova dea stay pick up sticks fo make fire. He call her, âHui! Can bring me litto bit watta inside one cup, fo me drink?â
17.11: Wen she go fo get um, he call her again, an tell, âCan bring litto bit bread too?â
17.12: She tell, âJalike you stay shua yoa God Yahweh stay alive, I shua dat I no mo even one pancake. I ony get one handful flour inside one box, an litto bit olive oil inside one jar -- dass it! An me, I ova hea fo pick up two-three stick. Den I go home cook da flour an da oil fo me an my boy. Us goin eat um, den wen us pau, us mahke!â
17.13: Elijah tell her, âEh, no scared! Go home. Make da bread jalike you wen tell you goin do. But da firs ting I like you fo do, go make one small roun bread from wat you get fo me. Bring um out hea. Den, make da res fo you an yoa boy.
17.14: Cuz dis wat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, tell: Dat box flour no goin come empty, an erytime goin get olive oil inside da jar, till da time wen Yahweh send rain on top da groun.â
17.15: Da wahine go do jalike Elijah tell. An Elijah, an da wahine, an her boy get food fo ery day fo long time.
17.16: Da box flour neva come empty, an da jar erytime get olive oil inside. Dis happen jalike wat Yahweh tell Elijah fo tell da wahin
17.17: Afta all dat wen happen, da wahine dat own da house, her boy come sick. He come mo an mo sick, till da boy no can breave an stop breaving.
17.18: She tell Elijah, âYou one guy dat know God! How come you go agains me, aah?! Fo shua, you wen come hea fo make me tink bout all da bad kine stuff I wen do, an make my boy mahke!â
17.19: Elijah tell her, âGive me yoa boy.â He take da boy from her arm an take him upstairs, to da room on top da flat roof wea he stay. He lay da boy on top his pune`e.
17.20: Den Elijah call to Yahweh fo help him. He tell um, âYahweh, you da God fo me fo shua! I stay dis widow wahine's house now. How come you wen make dis bad ting happen to her now, making her boy mahke?!â
17.21: Den three times, Elijah go lay down on top da boy. He call out to Yahweh, âEh Yahweh! You da God fo me fo shua! Bring back dis boy's life to his body!â
17.22: Den Yahweh hear Elijah. Da life come back to da boy body, an he come aliv
17.23: Den Elijah pick up da boy an carry him back down from da room wea he stay an bring him inside da house. He give da boy to his mudda an tell, âLook! Yoa boy, stay alive!â
17.24: Da wahine tell Elijah, âNow, I know fo shua, dat you one guy dat know God fo real kine! Wen Yahweh tell you fo say someting, az true wat you tell!â

18.1: Long time afta dat, da numba three year dat no mo rain, one message come from Yahweh fo Elijah: âGo talk to King Ahab. Cuz now, I goin make rain come down on top da groun.â
18.2: So Elijah go back Israel side, so Ahab can see him an know dat he dea awread
18.3: Wen Elijah stay on da road fo go Samaria side, King Ahab tell his worka guy Obadiah fo come by him. (Obadiah stay in charge a Ahab palace, an he one guy dat get plenny respeck fo Yahweh.
18.4: Befo time, wen Jezebel stay kill da guys dat talk fo Yahweh, Obadiah wen take one hundred a dem an hide um, fifty inside one big cave, an fifty mo inside one nodda cave, an he make shua dey get food an watta.)
18.5: Ahab tell Obadiah, âGo all ova da land. Check out all da pukas get watta come outa da groun, an all da valleys dat get stream wit watta. Maybe can find some grass fo da horse an mule so dey stay alive an we no need kill any a da animals.â
18.6: Ahab an Obadiah half half da place dey gotta go. Ahab go one side, an Obadiah go da odda side, dey no go togedd
18.7: So Obadiah walk down da road. Elijah meet him. Obadiah see Elijah an know dass him. So Obadiah go down on top da groun fo show respeck, an he tell Elijah, âEh, az you fo real, my boss, Elijah?!â
18.8: Elijah tell, âYeah, dis me! Go tell yoa boss, âElijah stay come awready!â-â
18.9: Obadiah tell, âWat I wen do wrong, fo me gotta do dis?! Cuz if I do wat you tell me fo do, az jalike you set me up so my boss Ahab goin kill me fo shua!
18.10: I shua dat yoa God Yahweh stay alive, an I shua bout dis too: my boss Ahab wen send peopo to ery country an ery king fo look fo you! An wen dey tell, âElijah no stay hea,â den Ahab make da king say fo real in front God, dat dey no can find you.
18.11: An now, you tell me go tell my boss, âElijah stay hea awready!â.
18.12: But me, afta I leave you, I donno wat place God Spirit goin pick you up an take you. If I go tell Ahab dat you stay hea, an he no can find you hea, he goin kill me! No matta I yoa slave guy, an I get plenny respeck fo Yahweh from small kid time.
18.13: Maybe nobody tell you, boss, wat I wen do befo time, da time Jezebel stay kill da guys dat talk fo Yahweh. I wen take hundred a dem an hide um inside two big cave, an make shua dey get food an watta.
18.14: But now, you telling me fo go tell my boss, âElijah, he hea awready!â He goin kill me fo shua!â
18.15: Elijah tell, âJalike I shua dat Yahweh, Da God Ova All Da Armies, stay alive, I shua I goin stand in front Ahab today, an I goin let him see me!â
18.16: Den Obadiah go fo meet Ahab. He tell Ahab wat wen happen. Den Ahab go fo meet Elijah.
18.17: Wen Ahab see Elijah, he tell um, âSo! You, da guy dat stay make trouble fo all da Israel peopo!â
18.18: Elijah tell, âNo ways! I neva make trouble fo da Israel peopo. You an yoa fadda guy ohana wen make trouble, cuz you guys neva do da tings Yahweh tell you fo do, an you pray to da Ba`al kine god
18.19: âSo now, go send peopo all ova da Israel land fo bring togedda all da peopo by me on top Mount Carmel. An bring da 450 talkas fo da Ba`al god, an da 400 talkas fo da Asherah god, dat Jezebel stay give food from her palace!â
18.20: So Ahab send guys fo go by all da Israel peopo, an fo tell da talka guys fo dea gods come togedda Mount Carme
18.21: On top Mount Carmel, Elijah go in front all da peopo. He tell, âYou guys gotta make up yoa mind right now, one way o da odda way! If Yahweh stay God fo real kine, go wit him! But if Ba`al stay God fo real kine, go wit him!â Da peopo, dey no say nottin
18.22: Den Elijah tell da peopo, âMe, I da ony talka fo Yahweh dat neva mahke. But Ba`al, he get 450 guys dat talk fo him.
18.23: Go get two boy kine cows, one fo me an one fo dem. Dey can pick da one dey like. Den dey goin kill um an cut um up an put da pieces on top da wood, but no put fire. Me, I goin do same ting wit da odda cow, an put da pieces on top da wood, but I no goin put fire, too.
18.24: Den, you guys call yoa god's name, an I goin use Yahweh name fo call him. Wateva god send da fire fo show dat he stay lissen, dass da God dat stay fo real!â
18.25: Elijah tell da talka guys fo Ba`al, âGet plenny a you guys, so go do um firs. Pick one a da boy kine cows an make um ready. Den call yoa god name, but no light da fire.â
18.26: Da talka guys fo Ba`al take da cow Elijah wen give um an kill um fo make ready da sacrifice. Den dey go use Ba`al name fo call him. Dey do dat from morning time till noon time. Dey yell, âEh, Ba`al, lissen to us guys an do someting!â But dey no hear notting from Ba`al. Nobody answer dem. Den dey go dance all ova da altar dey wen build.
18.27: Wen come noon time, Elijah start fo mout off at dem. He tell, âYell mo loud! Cuz Ba`al one god. Maybe he stay tink real hard bout someting, o maybe he stay inside da lua, o he go holoholo. Maybe he stay sleep, an gotta wait till he wake up!â
18.28: So den dey wen yell mo loud, an cut demself wit sword an spear, cuz dass wat dey do, till da blood come out.
18.29: Aftanoon time, dey do same ting. Dey making like da talkas fo Ba`al suppose to make, spazzing out, till evening time, wen time fo make da regula kine sacrifice. But Ba`al no do notting, nobody answa dem, nobody lissen de
18.30: Den Elijah tell all da peopo, âCome ova hea by me!â Dey all come. He fix da altar fo make sacrifice fo Yahweh, dat stay broke.
18.31: Elijah go get twelve stone, one stone for ery one a da twelve ohanas dat come from Jacob. (An Jacob, he da guy long time ago get message from God, âFrom now, yoa name goin be âIsrael.â-â)
18.32: Elijah use da stones fo build up da altar one mo time, fo show wat kine God Yahweh. He dig one big ditch aroun da altar, nuff fo plant two box seed.
18.33: He fix da firewood jus right, an cut up da cow an put da pieces on top da wood.
18.34: Den Elijah tell da peopo, âGo fill up four big pots wit watta, an pour um on top da sacrifice meat an on top da wood.â Afta dey do dat, he tell um âOne mo time, same ting,â an dey go do um again. He tell um, âOne mo time,â an dey do um, three time.
18.35: Da watta go all ova da altar an fill up da ditch too.
18.36: Wen time fo make da sacrifice, Elijah da talka fo God go by da altar an pray lidis: âYahweh, you da God fo Abraham an Isaac an Israel. Today, I like erybody know, dat you da God fo da Israel peopo, an you da boss fo me. An all dese tings I do, I do um cuz dass wat you tell me fo do.
18.37: Yahweh, do someting fo show you lissen to me, so den dis peopo goin know dat you Yahweh, you da God dass fo real, an dat you stay make dea heart come back by you.â
18.38: Right den an dea, fire from Yahweh wen come down outa da sky. Da fire burn up da sacrifice, an da wood, an da stones an da dirt, an even da watta inside da ditc
18.39: Wen all da peopo see dis, dey go down wit dea face on top da groun, an dey yell, âYahweh, he da God fo real kine! Yahweh, he da God fo real kine!â
18.40: Den Elijah tell da peopo, âGrab da guys dat talk fo Ba`al! No let even one a dem run away!â Da peopo grab dem. Elijah tell da peopo go take um down by da Kishon Stream, an he kill um all de
18.41: Den Elijah tell King Ahab, âYou go home now, fo eat an drink. Cuz sound jalike goin get heavy rain!â
18.42: Ahab go home fo eat an drink. Elijah, he go back up Mount Carmel to da top. He bend down to da groun, an put his face on his knees.
18.43: Elijah tell da guy dat work fo him, âGo ova dea an look makai side.â
18.44: Da numba seven time, da worka guy tell, âEh! Get cloud, small kine. Look like one hand. Stay come up outa da ocean.â
18.45: An mo an moa, da sky come dark wit clouds an wind. Den start fo rain hard. Ahab ride his war wagon fo reach Jezreel town.
18.46: Yahweh [wen] make Elijah come strong. So he pull up his robe an tie um wit his belt, den he run in front Ahab all da way to da place peopo go inside Jezreel tow

19.1: Ahab tell Jezebel eryting Elijah wen do, an how Elijah wen tell da peopo fo kill all da talka guys fo da Ba`al god wit dea swords.
19.2: So Jezebel wen send one messenja guy by Elijah fo tell him, âBefo dis time tomorrow, I goin make you jalike you make da guys you wen kill! An if I no do dat, I like my gods do da same kine ting to me, an even mo worsa!â
19.3: Elijah come scared. He no wase time, an he run away quick from dea, so he no mahke. Wen he reach Beersheba, Judah side, he tell da guy dat work fo him fo stay dea.
19.4: But Elijah take one mo day fo go mo inside da boonies. He come by one broom tree an sit down undaneat, an he aks God fo let um mahke. He tell Yahweh, âI no can handle no moa! Let me mahke awready! No way I one betta man den my ancesta guys!â
19.5: Den he lay down unda da tree an go sleep. Den one angel messenja guy come touch him an tell him, âGet up! Eat someting!â
19.6: Elijah look aroun, an right dea by his head, get one roun flat bread, da kine dey bake on top da hot rocks, an one bottle watta. He eat da bread an drink da watta, den he lay down agai
19.7: Da messenja guy from Yahweh come back again. He touch Elijah, an tell um, âGet up. Eat some moa. Cuz fo go wea you gotta go, goin be mo den you can handle.â
19.8: So Elijah get up, eat and drink. Dat food make him strong again, an he go forty day, day time an nite time, till he reach Mount Sinai, da mountain wea God sta
19.9: Wen Elijah reach Mount Sinai, he go inside da cave dat get dea, an stay all nit
19.10: Elijah tell, âI wen go all out fo you, Yahweh, Da God Ova All Da Armies! Cuz da Israel peopo, dey no like da deal you wen make wit dem. Dey wen broke down all da altar places fo make sacrifice fo you. Dey wen kill da guys dat talk fo you wit dea swords. An now, I da ony talka fo you dat still stay, an dey stay look fo me fo kill me too!â
19.11: Yahweh tell, âGo outside da cave. Stand on top dis mountain, in front me, Yahweh.â Befo Yahweh pass by dea, get one strong wind dat make da stone come down from da mountain an broke da cliffs. But Yahweh, he no come wit da wind. Afta da wind, get eartquake, but Yahweh, he no come wit da eartquake.
19.12: Afta da eartquake, get fire, but Yahweh, he no come wit da fire. An afta da fire, get one small noise dat almos no can hear, jalike somebody whispa.
19.13: Wen Elijah hear dat, he pull his blanket ova his face. He go litto bit outside da cav
19.14: Elijah tell, âI wen go all out fo you, Yahweh, Da God Ova All Da Armies! Cuz da Israel peopo, dey no like da deal you wen make wit dem. Dey wen broke down all da altar places fo make sacrifice fo you. Dey wen kill da guys dat talk fo you wit dea swords. An now, I da ony talka fo you dat still stay, an dey stay look fo me fo kill me too!â
19.15: Yahweh tell Elijah, âGo back, da same way you wen come. From dea, go inside da boonies nea Damascus town. Wen you reach dea, put olive oil on top Haza`el head, fo show I stay pick him fo come king fo da Aram peopo.
19.16: An put olive oil on top Jehu, Nimshi boy, fo show I wen pick him fo come king fo da North Israel peopo. An same ting fo Elisha, Shafat boy from Abel-Meholah town. Put olive oil on top his head fo show I wen pick him fo come one talka guy fo me, fo take ova yoa work.
19.17: Haza`el goin kill plenny peopo wit his sword, an da ones he no kill, Jehu goin kill dem. An da ones Jehu no kill wit his sword, Elisha goin kill dem.
19.18: But I still get 7,000 Israel guys dat neva go down on top dea knee in front da Ba`al god an neva kiss da Ba`al statue!â
19.19: Den Elijah leave Mount Sinai. He go find Elisha Shafat boy firs. Elisha stay inside one big field wit eleven odda guys. Dey all plowing, ery guy wit two cow fo pull da plow. Elisha too stay plow, he da las guy. Elijah go inside da field by Elisha an put his blanket aroun Elisha.
19.20: Den Elisha leave da cows wit da plow an run fo catch up Elijah. He tell Elijah, âLet me go kiss my fadda an mudda an tell um goodbye. Den I come wit you.â
19.21: Den Elisha leave Elijah an go home. He take da two cow an kill um fo make sacrifice. Da wood pieces from da plow, he burn um fo cook da sacrifice meat. He give da meat to da peopo, an dey eat um. Den Elisha leave home for go wit Elijah an be his helpa gu

20.1: Den Ben-Hadad, da king fo da Aram peopo, tell all his army guys fo come togedda. He get 32 odda king guys with dea armies, wit dea horse an war wagon. Dey go Samaria town an put army guys all aroun da town, so nobody can go inside da town o get outa da town. Den dey attack.
20.2: Ben-Hadad send messenja guys inside da town fo go by King Ahab, da Israel king. Dey tell um, âLissen up. Dis wat Ben-Hadad tell:
20.3: âYoa silva an yoa gold, dey mines now. An yoa bestes wifes an kids, dey mines now.â-â
20.4: Da king fo da Israel peopo answa him, âJalike you tell, you da king, an you da boss fo me. Dis jalike I yoa slave guy, an eryting I get, yoas.â
20.5: Da messenja guys come again by Ahab. Dey tell um, âLissen up. Dis wat Ben-Hadad tell: âI wen send my guys awready fo tell you give me all yoa silva an gold, an yoa wifes an yoa kids.
20.6: Dis da deal. Same time tomorrow, I goin send my palace guys by you. Dey goin check out eryting inside yoa palace, an eryting inside yoa palace guys houses too. Dey goin take eryting dat cost plenny an stay real nice, an take um away.â-â
20.7: Den da Israel king call all da older leadas from da land an he tell, âYou guys, wat you tink bout dis?! Dis guy looking fo make trouble, an how he do bad kine tings to us! Wen he send messenjas fo tell me gotta give him my wifes an kids an silva an gold, I neva tell him no.â
20.8: Den all da older leadas an all da peopo tell da king, âNo lissen him! No tell um you goin make how he like!â
20.9: King Ahab tell da messenja guys from Ben-Hadad, âGo back tell my boss King Ben-Hadad, âEryting yoa messenja guys wen tell me da firs time dat I gotta do cuz you da boss, I goin do um. But dis ting you tell me today, I no can do dat!â-â So da messenja guys go back tell Ben-Hadad di
20.10: Den Ben-Hadad send back da messenja guys fo tell Ahab, âI make dis promise: I goin bus up da Samaria town! No goin get nuff dirt ova dea fo all my army guys pick up even one hand full. If I no bus up Samaria town, den I like da gods bus me up even mo den dat!â
20.11: Den da Israel king tell da messenja guys, âTell yoa king dis: âNo talk big now! Wait till afta you pau fight, not befo!â-â
20.12: Wen Ben-Hadad hear dis, him an da odda king guys stay drinking inside dea tents. Right den an dea he tell his officer guys, âMake ready fo attack!â So dey make ready fo attack Samaria tow
20.13: Dat same time, one talka fo God go by King Ahab an tell um, âLissen up. Dis wat Yahweh tell: âYou see all da plenny army guys outside dea? Dis wat I goin do. I goin give you da powa fo win ova dem today. Den you goin know fo shua, dat I Yahweh!â-â
20.14: Ahab aks um, âWho you goin use fo do dis?â
20.15: Firs ting, Ahab tell da 232 young guys dat work unda da officer guys from da odda districks fo make ready fo fight. Den he tell da 7,000 odda Israel army guys fo make ready too.
20.16: Noon time, da Israel army guys go outside da town. Same time, Ben-Hadad stay inside one tent drinking an getting pilute wit da odda 32 king guys dat stay help him.
20.17: Da young guys dat work unda da officer guys from da districks go out firs. Ben-Hadad get guys he wen send fo watch da town, an dey tell um, âGet guys coming outside from Samaria town!â
20.18: Ben-Hadad tell, âIf dey stay come fo make deal fo no fight, grab um an no kill um. If dey stay come fo make war, grab um an no kill um too.â
20.19: Da young guys dat work unda da officer guys from da districks stay come outside da town, wit da army behind dem.
20.20: Ery one a da Israel guys pick one Aram guy in front him an kill him. Den da odda Aram guys run away, an da Israel guys chase um. Da Aram king, Ben-Hadad, he run away on top his horse, an some a da horse rida guys do da same ting.
20.21: Da Israel king an his army guys keep going an wack up da Aram horses an war wagons, an kill plenny Aram guy
20.22: Lata, da guy dat talk fo God go by da Israel king an tell um dis: âYou gotta make yoa army strong, an make plan watevas you goin do. Cuz nex year same time, da Aram king goin come back an attack you one mo time!â
20.23: Da govmen guys dat work fo da Aram king tell um, âYou know, da gods dat da Israel guys pray to, dey hill kine gods. Az why dey mo strong den us. But nex time, we goin fight um wea da groun stay flat. Den fo shua we goin be mo strong den dem.
20.24: Dis wat you gotta do: No let da odda king guys stay in charge a dea own army guys! Mo betta put real kine officers ova dea army guys!
20.25: Dis yoa job, you gotta put togedda one nodda army jalike da one you wen lose. Go get da same numba horse an da same numba war wagon jalike befo time. Den we goin fight da Israel guys on da flat groun. Den fo shua, we goin be mo strong den dem!â Da king lissen to dem an do how dey tel
20.26: So da nex year, same time, Ben-Hadad put togedda da Aram army. Dey go Afek town fo fight da Israel guys.
20.27: Da Israel guys, dey come togedda too, an get ready nuff food fo da fight. Den dey go Afek side fo fight da Aram army guys. On one side, da Israel guys make camp two place, but dey no mo plenny guys. Dey look jalike two small bunch goats ova dea. Da odda side, da Aram guys make camp all ova da land, an dey get plenny guy
20.28: Da guy dat know God fo real kine come by da Israel king again. He tell um, âLissen up. Dis wat Yahweh tell: âDa Aram peopo tink dat me, Yahweh, I ony one hill kine god, an dat I no stay da god fo da valleys too. Cuz dey tink lidat, I goin make you win ova all dat big army ova dea. Den all you guys goin know fo shua, dat I Yahweh!â-â
20.29: Da two armies stay camp in front each odda, seven days. Den, da numba seven day, dey start fo fight. Da Israel guys wen wipe out hundred tousan a da Aram infantry guys, ony one day.
20.30: Da guys dat no get wipe out, run away Afek town. But ova dea, da town wall fall down on top 27,000 a dem. An Ben-Hadad, he run away to one place inside da town dat get strong wall, an he hide inside one room inside one hous
20.31: Da guys dat work fo da king tell um, âYou know wat? Us guys hear, can trus da Israel kings fo do good kine stuff fo peopo. So, good us guys put burmbag kine clotheses aroun da waist, an ropes aroun oua head. Den we go da Israel king. Maybe he let you live.â
20.32: Den Ben-Hadad guys put burmbag kine cloth aroun dea waist an ropes on top dea head. Dey go by da Israel king an tell, âBen-Hadad tell, now you da boss. He tell, âLet me live!â-â
20.33: Ben-Hadad guys figga, az good how da king talk. So dey make like him, an dey tell, âFo shua, he yoa brudda, Ben-Hadad!â
20.34: Ben-Hadad tell Ahab, âDa towns my fadda guy wen take away from yoa fadda, I give um back to you. You can put yoa open market places inside Damascus town, jalike my fadda wen put inside Samaria town.â
20.35: One a da guys dat hang out wit da talkas fo God tell anodda talka, âGod wen give me one spesho message fo you. You gotta wack me.â
20.36: Da talka fo God tell, âCuz you no wack me like how Yahweh tell, wen you go way from hea, one lion goin kill you.â An afta da guy go way litto bit, one lion find da guy an kill u
20.37: Den da talka fo God find one nodda guy an tell um, âWack me.â Da guy wack um an da blood come ou
20.38: Den da talka fo God go stand by da road wait fo da king. He put bandage ova his eye, so nobody know who him.
20.39: Wen da king come by dea, da talka fo God yell to him. He tell, âEh boss! I wen go inside da middo wea dey stay fight. One guy come by me wit one Aram prisna. He tell, âWatch dis guy real good! If he run away, you goin pay wit yoa life, o you pay fine 75 pound silva!â
20.40: But lata, wen I stay doing some odda stuff, da Aram guy wen bag!â
20.41: Right den an dea, da talka fo God hemo da bandage from his eye. Da Israel king know who him den. He one a da talkas for God.
20.42: He tell King Ahab, âLissen up. Dis wat Yahweh tell: âYou let one prisna guy go, no matta I Yahweh say you gotta wipe him out! So den, you goin pay wit yoa life cuz you wen let da Aram king go! An you goin lose yoa own peopo, cuz you let him go back to his peopo!â
20.43: Den da Israel king come real mad an his face hang. He go home Samaria sid

21.1: Lata, one mo ting happen wit Ahab, da king fo da Samaria peopo. Had one guy Nabot from Jezreel. He get one grape farm dea. Da grape farm stay nea one palace wea da king get ova dea.
21.2: One time Ahab tell Nabot, âEh, give me yoa grape farm so can make one vegetable garden ova dea, cuz stay nea my palace. I can give you one mo betta grape farm. O if you like, I can pay you plenny fo da land.â
21.3: Nabot tell Ahab, âYahweh no goin let me sell um to you! Cuz dat land stay wit my ohana from my ancesta time till now!â
21.4: Den Ahab go home. He look real mad, cuz Nabot da Jezreel guy tell um, âI no goin sell um to you! Dat land, stay wit my ohana from my ancesta time till now.â So Ahab go lay down on top his pune`e. His face look at da wall, an he no eat notting cuz he all piss of
21.5: Ahab wife Jezebel come inside by him. She aks, âWassa matta you, aah?! You get mad face, an you no eat notting!â
21.6: He tell her wat happen: âI wen tell Nabot da Jezreel guy, âSell me yoa grape farm, o if you like, I give you anodda one.â But he tell me, âNo! I no goin sell you my grape farm!â-â
21.7: Jezebel his wife tell um, âHo! How come you no ack like da king fo da Israel peopo?! Get up an eat! No worry, brah, I take care dat fo you. I goin get da grape farm from Nabot da Jezreel guy!â
21.8: So Jezebel write some lettas, an she use Ahab name. Den she use Ahab seal fo ery letta so erybody know dey come from da king. She send um to da older leada guys an da town council guys dat live in Nabot town wit him.
21.11: So da older leada guys an da town council guys dat live Nabot town, dey do jalike wat Jezebel tell um fo do inside da lettas she wen write to dem.
21.12: Dey make one day fo no eat so can pray, an dey give Nabot da bestes place in front all da peopo.
21.13: Den da two no good guys come dea. Dey sit down right in front Nabot. Dey poin finga at Nabot in front all da peopo. Dey tell, âDis Nabot, he tell he like bad tings happen to God, an to da king!â Den dey all take Nabot outside da town. Dey all throw stone at him, an he mahk
21.14: Den da leada guys send somebody by Jezebel fo tell, âDa peopo throw stone at Nabot, an he mahke awready.â
21.15: Wen Jezebel hear dat dey wen all throw stone an kill Nabot, she tell Ahab, âGet up. Go take ova da grape farm, da one Nabot da Jezreel guy no like sell um to you. Cuz Nabot, he no stay no moa. He mahke awready.â
21.16: Wen Ahab find out dat Nabot mahke, he go down take ova Nabot grape far
21.17: Den Yahweh give dis message fo Elijah da Tishbe guy:
21.18: âGo down fo meet Ahab, da king fo da Israel peopo. He live Samaria side, but right now, he stay inside da grape farm dat Nabot wen own Jezreel side. Ahab wen go down dea fo take ova da grape farm.
21.19: Tell dis to Ahab: âDis, wat Yahweh tell: Fo shua, you wen kill one guy, an den you take ova his farm!â
21.20: Elijah go dea, an Ahab tell, âYou da guy dat stay agains me, an now, you find me!â
21.21: An now, Yahweh tell, âDis me, da one dat goin make real bad kine stuff happen to you! I goin cut off all da peopo dat goin come from you. I goin wipe out ery guy from da Israel peopo dat get yoa blood, no matta dey slave o dey not slave.
21.22: I goin make da same ting happen fo yoa ohana, dat I wen make happen fo da ohana dat come from Jeroboam Nebat boy, an same ting I wen make happen fo da ohana dat come from Ba`asha Ahijah boy. Az cuz you wen piss me off, an you wen make da Israel peopo do real bad kine stuff.â
21.23: âAn az fo Jezebel, Yahweh tell dis: âDa dogs goin eat up Jezebel by da Jezreel town wall.â
21.24: Da dogs goin eat da Ahab peopo dat mahke inside da town. Da ones dat mahke da country side, da scavenja birds goin eat dem.â
21.25: (Neva have anodda guy like Ahab. He go sell out fo do real bad kine stuff dat Yahweh say fo no do. His wife Jezebel, she push him fo make lidat.
21.26: Ahab wen go do real pilau kine stuff, cuz he go all out fo da idol kine gods, jalike da Amor peopo wen do. Az why Yahweh wen throw dem outa da land wen da Israel peopo come dea
21.27: But wen Ahab hear dis message from God, he go broke off his clotheses an put on burm bag cloth nex to his skin fo show erybody he stay feel sore inside, an he no eat so he can pray. He even wear burm bag kine cloth wen he lay down sleep. Den he make real quiet wen he go arou
21.28: Den dis message come from Yahweh fo Elijah da Tishbe guy:
21.29: âYou see how Ahab make himself come notting in front me? Cuz he do dat, I no goin make all da real bad kine stuff happen till afta Ahab mahke. But eryting I tell goin happen to da Ahab ohana afta his boy come da king.â

22.1: Had three year, da Aram peopo an da Israel peopo neva make war.
22.2: Den, afta three year no mo war, King Jehoshafat from Judah side go fo see King Ahab, Israel side.
22.3: Wen Jehoshafat stay Israel side, Ahab an his helpa guys talk. He tell, âYou guys know, da town Ramot Gilead, dass oua land. But da king fo da Aram peopo, he wen take um away from us befo time. An us guys no do notting fo get um back from him!â
22.4: Den he aks Jehoshafat, âYou go wit me fo make war Ramot Gilead side?â
22.5: But Jehoshafat tell Ahab dis: âFirs ting, us guys gotta aks Yahweh if az good fo go make war, o not.â
22.6: So King Ahab tell all da guys dat talk fo his god Ba`al fo come togedda. Get bout 400 dem. He aks dem, âI can go make war agains Ramot Gilead town, o not?â
22.7: But Jehoshafat tell, âOva hea, no mo one talka fo Yahweh, fo us find out wat Yahweh tink?â
22.8: King Ahab tell, âStill get one guy I can aks um wat Yahweh tink. But I hate da bugga! Weneva he talk fo Yahweh, he no tell me notting good! He erytime tell bad tings goin happen to me! His name, Mikaiah, Imlah boy.â
22.9: So da Israel king, Ahab, tell one a his palace guys fo come. Ahab tell um, âQuick! Go tell Mikaiah, Imlah boy, fo come right now.â
22.10: Da two king guys, Ahab da king fo da Israel peopo an Jehoshafat da king fo da Judah peopo, wear dea king kine robes. Dey sit on top two throne, wea you go inside da Samaria town gate. Get one wide open place dea wea da peopo come fo take da junks outa da wheat, afta dey cut da wheat down. Dis time, inside dis wide place, all da guys dat talk for dea gods stay in front da two kings, an tell wat dea gods sa
22.11: Had one a da talkas fo dea gods name Zedekiah, Kena`anah boy, wen make tings dat look like cow horn outa iron. He tell, âDis wat Yahweh tell. You use dis horns fo bus up da Aram army guys, till you wipe um out!â
22.12: All da odda talkas fo dea gods, dey stay tell same ting too. Dey tell, âGo attack Ramot Gilead an win da war! Cuz Yahweh goin give da town to oua king!â
22.13: Da messenja guy dat go fo tell Mikaiah fo come by da king, he tell Mikaiah, âYou see how all da guys dat talk fo da odda gods tell da same ting, dat da king goin win da war?! So, good you tell da same ting jalike dem!â
22.14: But Mikaiah tell, âJalike I stay shua dat Yahweh stay alive, I stay shua too bout da only ting I goin tell him, is wat Yahweh tell me!â
