22.15: Den Mikaiah come by King Ahab. Da king aks him, âMikaiah! We goin go attack Ramot Gilead town? O we no do notting?â
22.16: Da king tell um, âHow many times I gotta make you promise fo tell me ony da trut, wen you talk fo Yahweh?!â
22.18: Da Israel king tell King Jehoshafat, âJalike I wen tell you, dis Mikaiah guy, weneva he talk fo Yahweh, he no tell me someting good goin happen to me. Ony bad kine stuff!â
22.19: Den Mikaiah tell some moa: âAz why you betta lissen dis ting wat Yahweh tel
22.20: âYahweh aks, âWho can go bulai King Ahab, so he go attack Ramot Gilead town, an mahke dea?â Somebody tell one ting, an oddas tell odda ting
22.21: âDen one spirit come an stand in front Yahweh, an tell, âMe, I goin bulai him.â
22.22: âDa spirit tell, âI goin go ova dea, be one spirit dat make all da talka guys fo his gods bulai him wen dey talk.â
22.23: âAn dass wat you see stay happen right now. Yahweh wen send one spirit fo make all dese guys dat talk fo yoa gods, bulai wen dey open dea mout. Az cuz Yahweh tell, someting real bad goin happen to you!â
22.24: Den Zedekiah, Kana`anah's boy, go ova dea an slap Mikaiah's head. He tell, âSo! How da spirit from Yahweh can leave me, fo go ova dea talk to you, aah?!â
22.25: Mikaiah tell Zedekiah, âFo you, you goin know I tell da trut fo real kine, wen you goin run inside one room inside one house fo hide!â
22.26: Den da king fo da Israel peopo tell his guys, âTake Mikaiah back by Amon, da Samaria mayor guy, an by my boy Joash.
22.27: Tell um, âDis wat da king tell: Put dis guy in jail. Give um ony jail kine bread an watta, till I come back da winna.â
22.28: But Mikaiah tell da king, âFo shua, if bumbye you come back an you okay, dat mean, Yahweh neva give me notting fo tell!â An Mikaiah tell da peopo, âEh, all you peopo! No foget wat you wen hear!â
22.29: So, Ahab da king fo da Israel peopo an Jehoshafat da king fo da Judah peopo go togedda fo attack Ramot Gilead.
22.30: Ahab tell Jehoshafat, âBefo I go fight, I goin dress so nobody know who me. But you, wear yoa regula kine king robe.â So da Israel king dress so nobody know who him, an go figh
22.31: Befo dey start fight, da king fo da Aram peopo tell da 32 officer guys dat in charge a his war wagons, wat dey gotta do. He tell um, âNo need fight da regula army guys o da officer guys. Jus make shua you kill da one guy, Ahab da Israel king!â
22.32: So wen da officer guys in charge a da war wagons see Jehoshafat get da king kine robe, dey tink, âAz him! Da Israel king!â So dey turn da war wagons fo go attack him. But den Jehoshafat yell who him,
22.33: an da officer guys in charge a da war wagons see he not da Israel king, so dey turn away an stop chasing him.
22.34: But one a da Aram army guys wen shoot one mo arrow, ony fo shoot. Da arrow wen hit Ahab da Israel king in da puka wea da front part a da body armor come togedda wit da side part. Da king tell da army guy dat drive his war wagon, âTurn aroun quick! Get me away from da fighting! I hit!â
22.35: All day, da two armies stay fight. Da king helpa guys put King Ahab inside his war wagon so he can sit dea an see da Aram army. But Ahab stay bleed plenny, so get blood all ova da bottom a da war wagon. Late aftanoon, Ahab mahke.
22.36: Wen da sun almos go down, da Israel army guys all start fo yell, âErybody go back yoa town! Erybody go back yoa land!â
22.37: Dass how King Ahab mahke. Da army guys bring his body back Samaria town, an dey bury him dea.
22.38: Da king's guys take da king's war wagon by one watta place Samaria side, wea da wahines dat fool aroun fo money go fo bafe. Da guys wash down da war wagon dea, an da dogs suck up da king's blood, jalike da message from Yahweh wen tell befo tim
22.39: Had odda stuff happen wen Ahab stay king. All da tings he wen do -- da palace he wen build wit ivory kine decoration, da towns he wen put strong wall aroun -- all dat stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
22.40: Dey bury Ahab by his ancesta guys. Ahab boy Ahaziah come da nex kin
22.41: Now, dis, da story fo Jehoshafat, Asa boy. He come king fo da Judah peopo, da numba four year dat Ahab stay king fo da Israel peopo.
22.42: Jehoshafat was 35 year ol wen he come king, an he stay king Jerusalem side 25 year. His mudda name Azubah, an her fadda Shilhi.
22.43: Eryting Jehoshafat do, he do um jalike his fadda Asa. He neva go da wrong way, he ony do da kine stuff Yahweh say stay right. Still yet, all da sacrifice place on da top a da hills still stay dea. Da peopo still stay make sacrifice fo da odda gods an burn incense dea.
22.44: Jehoshafat an Ahab da Israel king, dey neva fight each odd
22.45: Had odda stuff happen wen Jehoshafat stay king too. All da tings he wen do -- how him an his army guys fight da odda kings -- all dat stay write inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah.
22.46: Had guys dat fool aroun wahines fo get money fo da temples fo da odda gods, an dey still stay do dat even afta Asa was da king. Jehoshafat throw out all dem guys outa his land.
22.47: Dat time, da Edom peopo no mo king. Ony had one territorial govna from Jehoshafat stay in charge ova de
22.48: Jehoshafat wen do anodda ting, he tell his guys fo build plenny big boat, fo carry plenny stuffs far away. He like dem go Yemen side fo Ofir kine gold dat come from ova dea. But da boats neva go dea, dey all sink Ezion-Geber side.
22.49: Befo da boats go out, King Ahaziah, Ahab boy, tell Jehoshafat, âLet my saila guys go wit yoa saila guys inside da big boats.â But Jehoshafat neva like, so dey no go.
22.50: Den Jehoshafat mahke, an dey bury him by his ancesta guys inside David Town, az Jerusalem, cuz he come from King David. Jehoshafat boy Jehoram come da nex kin
22.51: Da numba 17 year Jehoshafat was king Judah side, Ahaziah, Ahab boy, come da king fo da Israel peopo Samaria side. He da king fo da Israel peopo two year.
22.52: He do stuff Yahweh say az bad, cuz he do jalike his fadda an his mudda. He ack jalike Jeroboam, Nebat boy, ack befo time, da guy dat wen make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff.
22.53: Ahaziah get da Ba`al god fo his boss. He go down in front Ba`al an pray to him. He make Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, real mad, cuz Ahaziah ack jalike his fadda Aha

1.1: Afta King Ahab mahke, da Moab peopo make war fo throw out da Israel peopo an dea govmen dat stay ova de
1.2: Dat time, King Ahaziah stay inside his upstairs room inside da Samaria palace, an he fall down an broke da criss-cross kine sticks ova da window. Dat make um fall down thru da window an hit da groun. He feel real sore. He tell some messenja guys fo go Ekron side an find out from Ba`al-Zebub, da god fo da Ekron peopo, if he goin feel good again, o he goin mahke cuz a da hur
1.3: But one angel from Yahweh tell Elijah from Tishbe town, âGo up meet da messenja guys from da Samaria king, an aks dem, âWot?! No mo God inside Israel, o wat?! Az why you gotta go Ekron side fo aks dea god Ba`al-Zebub wat goin happen?!â
1.4: Cuz you do dis, dis wat Yahweh tell: âKing Ahaziah, you no goin stan up again from da pune`e wea you stay lay down. Fo shua, you goin mahke!â-â
1.5: Wen da messenja guys come back by da king, he aks dem, âHow come you guys come back awready?!â
1.6: Dey tell him, âOne guy come meet us, an he tell us fo go back by you dat wen send us guys, an tell you, âDis wat Yahweh tell: Wot?! No mo God inside Israel, o wat? Az why you guys gotta go Ekron side fo aks dea god Ba`al-Zebub wat goin happen?! Az why you no goin stan up again from da pune`e wea you stay lay down. Fo shua you goin mahke!â-â
1.7: Da king aks dem, âWat kine guy wen come meet you guys an tell you dat?â
1.8: Dey tell, âOne guy wit plenny hair, wit one leadda belt aroun his middo.â
1.9: Den he send one captain wit fifty guys by Elijah. Elijah, he stay sitting da top a one hill. Da captain go up by Elijah, an tell, âDa king tell, âYou one guy dat stay tight wit God. But dat no matta, da king tell you gotta come down hea!â-â
1.10: Elijah tell da captain, âIf fo real I one guy dat stay tight wit God, I like fire come down from da sky, an burn up you an yoa fifty guys!â Right den an dea, da fire come down from da sky, an burn um all u
1.11: Den da king send anodda captain an his fifty guys by Elijah. Da captain tell Elijah, âDa king tell, âYou one guy dat stay tight wit God. But dat no matta, da king tell you gotta come down hea now!â-â
1.12: Elijah tell, âIf fo real I one guy dat stay tight wit God, I like fire come down from da sky, an burn up you an yoa fifty guys!â Right den an dea, da fire from God come down from da sky an burn up dat captain an his fifty guys to
1.13: Den da king send da captain numba three an his fifty guys. Dis captain go all da way up by Elijah, an go down on top his knees. He beg Elijah fo no hurt him. He tell, âYou da guy dat stay tight wit God! Give us chance, me an dese fifty guys hea! Let us live!
1.14: Look! Da fire wen come down from da sky an burn up da firs two captains an all dea guys. So make jalike my life stay worth someting to you, an no make us mahke!â
1.15: Den da angel from Yahweh tell Elijah, âNo scared dis guy. Go down dea wit him.â So Elijah stand up an go down wit da captain, by da kin
1.16: Wen Elijah see da king, he tell um, âDis wat Yahweh tell: You tink no mo God inside Israel fo aks him wat fo do, so you send guys Ekron side fo aks dea god Ba`al-Zebub wat fo do? Cuz you wen make lidat, you no goin get off da pune'e you stay laying on top. Fo shua you goin mahke!â
1.17: So King Ahaziah mahke, jalike Yahweh wen tell Elija
1.18: Had odda stuff wen happen wen Ahaziah stay king. All dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israe

2.1: Da time come fo Yahweh take up Elijah inside da sky inside one whirlwind. Az wen Elijah an Elisha stay leave Gilgal.
2.2: Elijah tell Elisha, âYou stay ova hea. Cuz Yahweh wen tell me fo go Bethel side.â
2.3: All da guys Bethel side dat stay learn how fo talk fo God, come outa da town by Elisha. Dey tell Elisha, âYou know Yahweh goin take away yoa boss Elijah from you today?â
2.4: Den Elijah tell Elisha, âElisha, you stay ova hea. Cuz Yahweh tell me now fo go Jericho side.â
2.5: All da guys Jericho side dat stay learn how fo talk fo God, go by Elisha. Dey aks him, âYou know Yahweh goin take away yoa boss Elijah from you today?â
2.6: Den Elijah tell Elisha, âYou, stay ova hea. Cuz Yahweh tell me now fo go da Jordan Riva.â
2.7: Get fifty guys Jericho side dat stay learn how fo talk fo God, an dey go too. But dey stop, an no go nea da place wea Elijah an Elisha stay stand by da Jordan River, cuz dey like see wat goin happen.
2.8: Elijah take off his robe, roll um up, an hit da watta wit um. Da watta open up to da right side an da lef side, an da two guys go da odda side on top da dry grou
2.9: Afta dey go da odda side, Elijah tell Elisha, âBefo Yahweh take me up inside da sky an away from you, tell me wat you like me do fo you.â
2.10: Elijah tell, âDass real hard, wat you aks fo! But if you see me wen Yahweh take me up, you goin get mo plenny powa. But if you no see me, you no goin get um.â
2.11: Wen dey stay walking an talking togedda, right den an dea one war wagon on fire an horses on fire show up, an make da two guys go apart. Den Elijah go up inside da sky inside one whirlwind.
2.12: Elisha see wat wen happen, an he yell cuz he sore inside, âMy fadda! My fadda! Az was da war wagon an da horse driva guys, all from Israel!â Elisha no see um no moa. Den he broke up his clotheses, an make two piece, fo show he stay sore insid
2.13: He pick up da robe dat wen fall down from Elijah, an go back da Jordan River, an stand up on da dry groun.
2.14: Den he take da robe dat wen fall down from Elijah, an hit da watta wit um. He tell, âYahweh, you stay by me, o wat? You da God Elijah wen pray to!â Wen Elisha hit da watta, da riva wen open up to da right side an da lef side, an he walk ova da odda sid
2.15: All da guys from Jericho dat stay learn how fo talk fo God wen see dis. Dey tell, âDa same kine spirit dat wen stay in charge a Elijah, stay take ova Elisha awready!â An dey go meet him, an go down on top da groun in front him fo show respeck.
2.16: Dey tell, âLook. Us guys stay yoa worka guys, an we get fifty strong guys hea. Try let um go an look fo yoa boss. Maybe da Spirit from Yahweh wen pick him up, an put him down on top one mountain, o inside one gulch.â
2.17: Dey stay tell âBut gotta make shua he no stay!â till Elisha come shame fo tell um no one mo tim
2.18: Elisha go stay inside Jericho town. Wen dey come back by him, he tell um, âI wen tell you guys no go.â
2.19: One time, da Jericho guys tell Elisha, âEh boss, our town stay one good place, jalike you can see. But da watta stay bad, an da land no can grow food notting.â
2.20: Elisha tell, âBring me one new bowl, an put salt inside um.â So dey bring um by hi
2.21: Den he go out by da place wea da watta come outa da groun, an he throw da salt inside da watta. He tell, âDis wat Yahweh tell: âI wen make dis watta come good. No goin make nobody mahke again. An da land goin start fo give plenny food.â-â
2.22: So dis how da watta stay good till today, cuz a wat Elisha wen tel
2.23: From dea, Elisha go up Bethel town. Wen he stay walking, some young guys come outa dea town, an make fun a him. Dey tell, âNo come ova hea, you bolohead!â
2.24: He turn aroun, an look at dem, an he tell Yahweh put kahuna on top dem, cuz he Yahweh guy. Den two bears come out from da fores, an attack da young guys an hurt forty-two a dem.
2.25: Den Elisha go on from dea Mount Carmel side, an from ova dea he go back Samaria tow

3.1: Joram, Ahab's boy, come king fo da Israel peopo an live Samaria town, wen Jehoshafat stay king fo da Judah peopo eighteen year. An Joram stay da king inside Israel fo twelve year.
3.2: He do bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um, but not real bad den, da way his fadda an mudda wen do. He wen take away da kapu stone fo da Ba`al god dat his fadda wen put.
3.3: But still yet, he stay stick wit da same bad kine stuff dat King Jeroboam, Nebat's boy, wen do. He make da Israel peopo do um too, an he no turn away from all da
3.4: Befo time, Mesha, da Moab king, know how fo breed da sheeps spesho kine, fo get plenny sheep. Ery year, he gotta pay tax to da Israel king. He gotta give um one hundred tousan bebe sheep, an da wool from one hundred tousan boy kine sheep.
3.5: But afta Ahab mahke, Mesha da Moab king make war agains da Israel king, fo throw out da Israel territorial govmen.
3.6: So dat time, King Joram go out from Samaria town, an bring togedda all da Israel army guys fo fight agains Moab.
3.7: Wen he stay going, he send messenja guys by Jehoshafat, da king fo Judah, fo tell him, âDa Moab king make war agains me, fo throw out da Israel territorial govmen. I like you go wit me fo fight da Moab guys.â
3.8: Jehoshafat aks, âWich way we goin go afta dem?â
3.9: So da Israel king go out wit da Judah king an da Edom king. Dey march aroun da Big Salt Lake sout, den east, den nort. Afta dey stay march seven days, da army guys an da animals dey get wit dem, no mo watta fo drin
3.10: Da Israel king tell, âWot! Fo shua Yahweh tell us three kings come all da way ova hea, so dat da Moab king can catch us guys!â
3.11: But Jehoshafat aks, âNo mo nobody dat talk fo Yahweh ova hea, o wat? so dat us guys can aks Yahweh wat fo do!â
3.12: Jehoshafat tell, âFo us know wat Yahweh tell, Elisha can tell us.â So da king fo Israel, an Jehoshafat, an da Edom king go talk to Elish
3.13: Elisha tell da Israel king, âMo betta you go by da guys dat talk fo da gods yoa fadda an mudda wen pray to! How come you tink me an you, stay da same side?!â
3.14: Elisha tell, âI know dis fo shua: Yahweh, he da God Ova All Da Armies. An he stay alive, an I work fo him. If I neva get respeck fo Jehoshafat, da king fo da Judah peopo, I no even goin look at you, King Joram, o see you.
3.15: But you know what? Bring me one music guy ova hea fo make me ready fo go lissen to Yahweh.â
3.16: An he tell, âDis wat Yahweh tell: âGoin get plenny watta all ova dis dry valley.â
3.17: Cuz dis wat Yahweh tell: âYou guys no goin see wind o rain, but dis dry valley goin come full wit watta. An you guys, yoa cows, an yoa odda animals goin drink from um.
3.18: Dis, az one easy kine ting da way Yahweh see um. Den he goin give you guys da powa fo take ova da Moab peopo.
3.19: You guys goin bus up all da bestes towns, even if get strong walls. You goin cut down all da good kine trees, make da watta no come outa all da pukas, an put stone all ova da good fields so no can grow food.â
3.20: An da nex morning, wen time fo make da morning sacrifice, get plenny watta running down from Edom side! An dass how da land get plenny watta all ova da plac
3.21: All da Moab peopo know da kings stay come fo fight dem. So dey call ery guy dat can fight, da young an makule guys, an dey go wea dea land meet da Edom land, all ready fo fight dea.
3.22: Da nex day, wen dey get up early morning time, da sun come up shining on top da watta. Da way da Moab peopo see um from dea side, da watta look red, jalike blood.
3.23: Dey yell, âAz blood! Fo shua, da kings army guys awready wen fight an wipe out each odda! Come on, you Moab guys, us go rip off dea stuffs!â
3.24: But wen da Moab guys reach da Israel army camp fo go rip off dea stuffs, da Israel guys was ready an attack dem till dey run away. Den da Israel army guys go attack da Moab land, an kill da Moab guys.
3.25: Dey bus up all da towns, an ery guy throw one stone on top all da good field till get stone all ova um. Dey make da pukas fo watta so dat da watta no can come out, an cut down all da good trees. Ony Kir Hareset town stay neva get bus up. But da Israel guys put guys wit slings fo throw stone all aroun Kir Hareset, an attack dat place to
3.26: Da Moab king see dat his army guys stay get bus up. He take seven hundred mo army guys wit swords fo try fo fight da Edom king all togedda so dey can get outa da fighting, but dis neva work.
3.27: Den da Moab king take his numba one boy dat was goin come king afta him, an kill him and burn up da body on top da town wall, fo make sacrifice to his gods. Yahweh come real huhu wit da Israel peopo cuz da Moab king gotta do dat. Da Israel peopo see dis, an figga az wase time fo fight. So dey go back dea own lan

4.1: Had one wahine dat befo time stay marry one talka fo God, but he mahke awready. She go by Elisha an tell um, âMy husband, yoa worka guy, he wen mahke, you know. An you know he was da kine guy dat get plenny respeck fo Yahweh. But he owe money to one guy. An now dat guy come fo take my two boys fo come his slave, fo pay wat my mahke husban owe him.â
4.2: Elisha tell her, âWat I can do fo help you? Tell me, wat you get inside yoa house?â
4.3: Elisha tell, âGo aroun aks all da peopo dat live nea you fo give you empty jars. No aks fo ony litto bit jars, aks fo plenny.
4.4: Den go inside yoa house wit yoa boys an shut da door behin you so you guys stay alone. Pour oil from yoa small jar inside all da jars, an wen you fill ery one, put um one side.â
4.5: She go way from Elisha. Wen she get da jars, she shut da door so ony her an her boys stay inside. Da boys bring da jars by her, an she stay pour da oil in um.
4.6: Wen all da jars stay full, she tell her boy, âBring me one mo jar.â
4.7: She go by Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, an tell um wat wen happen. An he tell, âGo sell da oil, fo pay da guy wat you owe him. Den you an yoa boys can live off wat you get fo da res a da oil.â
4.8: Had one nodda time, Elisha go pass thru Shunem town. An had one rich wahine dat live dea. She tell him fo stay eat wit her an her husban. So from dat time, weneva he go by Shunem town, he go stop by her house fo ea
4.9: One time she tell her husban, âI know dis guy dat eat wit us plenny time, he one guy dat stay spesho fo God an stay tight wit God.
4.10: You know wat? We go make one small room on top da flat roof, an put one bed, one table, one chair, an one lamp inside da room fo him. Den he can stay dea weneva he come by us guys.â So dey do u
4.11: Den one time wen Elisha come dea, he go up inside da room an res dea.
4.12: Den he tell his worka guy Gehazi, âTell da Shunem wahine I like talk to her.â So Gehazi call her, an she come stand in front Gehazi.
4.13: Elisha tell Gehazi, âTell her, âYou wen work hard fo make all dis stuff fo us guys. Get someting I can do fo you, o wat? Get someting I can tell da king o da main army guy, fo help you, o wat?â-â
4.14: Den Elisha aks Gehazi, âWat I can do fo her?â
4.15: Den Elisha tell, âTell her fo come up hea.â So he call her, an she come stand by da open door.
4.16: Elisha tell, âDis same time nex year, you goin carry yoa own bebe boy inside yoa arms.â
4.17: But lata da wahine come hapai, an da nex year bout dat same time she born one boy, jalike Elisha wen tell he
4.18: Da kid grow, an one day he go out by his fadda, who stay wit da guys cutting da food.
4.19: He tell his fadda, âMy head sore!â
4.20: Afta da worka guy pick up da boy an carry him by his mudda, she put him on top her lap till noon time. But den he mahke.
4.21: She go up in da room on top da roof an lay him down on top da bed wea Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, sleep wen he dea. Den she shut da door an go outsid
4.22: Den she send somebody fo tell her husban, âTry tell one worka guy wit one donkey fo come by me, so I can go quick by da guy dat stay tight wit God an come back.â
4.23: Her husban aks, âHow come you like go by him today? Dis not da sacrifice time fo da New Moon o da Res Day.â
4.24: She put da saddle on top da donkey, an tell her worka guy, âUs go! Make shua da donkey go fas! No go slow fo me! Ony if I tell you, go slow!â
4.25: So she start fo go, an come by da guy dat stay tight wit God, Mount Carmel sid
4.26: Run go meet her, an aks her if she stay okay, if her husban stay okay, an if her boy okay.â Den Gehazi g
4.27: But wen she come by da guy dat stay tight wit God on top Mount Carmel, she go down fo show um respeck, an grab his feets. Gehazi come ova fo push her away, but Elisha tell,âLeave um alone! She stay real bum out. An Yahweh no tell me notting yet.â
4.28: She tell Elisha, âBoss, no was me wen aks you fo one boy! I wen tell you, âNo make me wait fo someting no goin happen!â-â
4.29: Elisha tell Gehazi, âPut yoa long shirt inside yoa belt, take my walking stick inside yoa hand, an run. If you meet somebody, no tell um howzit, an if somebody tell you howzit, no answa dem. Den put my stick on top da boy's face.â
4.30: But da boy's mudda tell, âI stay shua dat Yahweh stay alive, an you stay alive. Same ting, I stay shua I no goin go away from you.â So Elisha stan up an go wit he
4.31: Gehazi go in front a dem, an put da stick on top da boy's face, but da boy no talk o move. So Gehazi go back meet Elisha. He tell him, âDa boy no wake up.â
4.32: Wen Elisha come by da house, da mahke boy stay lay wea his mudda wen put um on top his pune`e.
4.33: Elisha go inside, shut da door so jus him an da mahke boy dea, an pray to Yahweh.
4.34: Den he go on top da bed an lay down on top da boy, wit his mout on top da boy's mout, an his eyes on top da boy's eyes, an his hands on top da boy's hands. Wen he lay on top da boy lidat, da boy's body start fo come warm!
4.35: Elisha stand up, an walk up an down da room, den lay down on top da bed an da boy again one mo time. Den da boy sneeze seven time, an open his ey
4.36: Den Elisha call Gehazi, an tell, âTell da Shunem wahine come hea!â So he tell he
4.37: So she come inside da room an go down on top da floor by Elisha feet fo show him respeck. Den she take her boy, an go ou
4.38: Elisha go back Gilgal town. Dat time, no mo food ova dea. Had one time, da guys dat stay learn how fo talk fo God come togedda an sit in front him. Elisha tell his helpa guy, âPut da big pot on top da fire an cook some stew fo dese guys.â
4.39: One a dem go inside field fo get vegetable kine stuff, an he find one wild vine. He take some a da wild calabash from da vine, an cut plenny an carry um inside his robe. Wen he come back, he cut um up an put um inside da stew pot. Nobody know wat kine vine dat was.
4.40: Dey pour out da stew fo da guys eat. But wen dey start fo eat um, dey yell, âEh you! Da guy dat stay tight wit God! Da stew get poison!â An dey no can eat da ste
4.41: Den Elisha tell, âBring some flour.â He put um inside da pot, an tell, âNow pour um out fo da guys eat.â An den no mo notting bad inside da po
4.42: Had one guy dat wen come by Elisha from Ba`al Shalishah. Fo da guy dat stay tight wit God, he bring twenny barley breads dey make from da first barley dat dey cut, an some new barley dat dey jus cut. Elisha tell, âGive um to da guys fo eat.â
4.43: Elisha helpa guy aks, âWot?! How I goin feed one hundred guys wit ony dis?!â
4.44: Den da helpa guy put da breads in front dem, an dey eat, an get lefovas, jalike Yahweh wen tel

5.1: Had one guy name Naaman, da main leada guy fo da Aram king army guys. He one importan guy fo his boss da king. Da king tell, Naaman, az his Numba One guy. Da Aram guys win all dea wars cuz Yahweh help Naaman. He know how fo fight real good. But he get one bad kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catc
5.2: Had army guys from Aram dat go aroun bus up da peopos dat da Aram army wen take ova. Befo time, dey wen steal one young girl from Israel, an she come one slave fo Naaman's wife.
5.3: Da slave girl tell her boss Naaman's wife, âGood, if Naaman go see da guy dat talk fo Yahweh, dat live Samaria town. Dat guy fo shua can make my boss Naaman skin come good from dat kine sick!â
5.4: Wen Naaman hea dat, he go by his boss da Aram king, an tell him wat he hear da slave girl from Israel wen tell.
5.5: Da Aram king tell, âShua, you gotta go. I goin give you one letta fo da Israel king.â So Naaman go, an take 750 poun silva, 150 poun gold, an fancy kine clotheses fo ten peopo.
5.6: Da letta dat he take fo da Israel king tell: âWen you get dis letta, az cuz I stay send my worka guy Naaman by you, so you can make him come good from da bad kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catch.â
5.7: Wen da Israel king read da letta, he come real bum out. He broke his clotheses fo show dat. He tell, âWot! Dis guy tink me God, o wat?! He tink I can kill somebody an make um come back alive, o wat?! How come dis guy send somebody by me fo me make him come good from dat kine sick?! Fo shua you guys can see, he like make beef wit me!â
5.8: Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, hear da Israel king wen come bum out an broke his clotheses. So Elisha send one messenja guy by da king fo tell: âHow come you broke yoa clotheses, aah?! Mo betta da guy come by me, so he can find out dat get one guy inside da Israel land, dat talk fo God fo real kine.â
5.9: So Naaman go wit his horses an war wagons, an stop in front Elisha's house by da door.
5.10: Elisha send one messenja guy outside fo tell: âGo, wash yoaself seven times inside da Jordan River. Den yoa body goin come good jalike befo time, an come clean.â
5.11: But Naaman come all huhu, an go way from dea. He tinking, âGarans he come out hea by me, an stand dea, an use da name fo his god Yahweh, fo call to him fo help cuz he know wat kine god him! I tink garans he wave his hand ova da place wea I get da kine sick, an make um come good!
5.12: Da kine rivas inside Damascus, Abana an Farpar, mo betta den all da watta inside Israel! How come I no can wash inside dem an come clean?!â So he turn aroun an go, an he real huh
5.13: But Naaman's officer guys go by him an tell um, âEh boss! If da guy dat talk fo God wen tell you fo do someting real big, fo shua you go do um, yeah? So den, if you ony gotta do one manini kine ting, like âGo wash an come good,â mo betta jus do um!â
5.14: So Naaman go down inside da Jordan River seven time, jalike Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, wen tell him fo do. Den his body come good, jalike one young boy body, an no mo da sic
5.15: Den Naaman an all his army guys go back by Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God. He stand in front Elisha, an tell, âFo shua, now I know, dat no mo odda God inside da whole world dat stay fo real kine! Ony get da one inside Israel. So boss, try let me do someting good fo you.â
5.16: Elisha tell him, âNo need do notting fo me! Fo shua, Yahweh stay alive, an I work fo him! I no goin take notting!â Naaman still try fo make him take someting, but he no take u
5.17: Den Naaman tell, âKay den, if you no goin take notting, let me, yoa worka guy, take back some dirt from hea, nuff dirt dat need two mules fo carry um. Cuz now, no way I goin make burn up kine sacrifice, o odda kine sacrifice, fo no odda gods, but ony fo Yahweh.
5.18: But get dis one ting I like Yahweh do fo me. I like him fo let me go fo one ting I gotta do bumbye: Wen my boss da king go inside da temple fo da god Rimmon, fo go down dea an pray to Rimmon, an da king lean on top my arm, I gotta go down wit him too. I like Yahweh let me go fo dis.â
5.19: Elisha tell, âGo, an I like Yahweh take care eryting fo you.â So Naaman go, but he no go far ye
5.20: Gehazi, he work fo Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God. Gehazi tink, âBummas! My boss no like take notting from all da stuff dat Naaman da Aram guy like give him. Jalike I stay shua Yahweh stay alive, so I stay shua I goin go run afta Naaman, an try get someting from him.â
5.21: So Gehazi stay run afta Naaman. Wen Naaman see Gehazi running afta him, he get down from da war wagon fo go meet him. He tell, âEryting stay okay, yeah?â
5.22: Gehazi tell, âEryting stay okay. My boss wen send me fo tell, âYou know, jus now two young guys come by me from up country Efraim side. Dey da kine guys dat stay learn fo talk fo Yahweh too. So please, give dem two 75 pound silva an two sets clotheses.â-â
5.23: Naaman tell, âOkay! Take 150 pound silva.â He make Gehazi take um. He tie up da 150 pound silva inside two bag, an clotheses fo two guys. He give da two bag to his worka guys, an dey carry um in front Gehaz
5.24: Wen Gehazi come up da hill inside Samaria town, he take da bags from da worka guys, an stash um inside da house. Den he tell da worka guys dey can go, an dey go.
5.25: Den he go inside da house an stand in front his boss Elisha. Elisha aks, âGehazi, wea you wen go?â
5.26: Elisha tell, âWen da guy turn aroun an come down outa his war wagon fo meet you, inside me I know wass up awready, jalike I wen go wit you ova dea! Dis not da right time fo take silva, o clotheses, olive trees, grape farms, sheeps an goats, cows, o guys an wahines fo work fo you!
5.27: Az why Naaman's bad kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catch, goin go on top you an yoa kids foeva!â Den Gehazi go away from Elisha, an he get da kine sick. From dat time, he stay all white, jalike da sno

6.1: One nodda time, da guys dat stay learn how fo talk fo God tell Elisha, âYou know wat?! Dis place too small, wea we stay live wit you.
6.2: Mo betta us go y da Jordan River, wea erybody can cut one beam fo build one place ova dea fo us guys live.â
6.3: Den one a dem tell, âWe like you come wit us guys, yeah? cuz you oua boss.â
6.4: So he go wit de
6.5: Had one guy stay cut down one beam, but da iron part fo da ax fall down inside da watta. Da guy yell, âHo, boss! I wen borrow um from one nodda guy! Cost plenny, you know!â
6.6: Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, aks, âWea da iron part wen fall down?â He show Elisha da place. Elisha cut one stick an throw um inside da watta right dea. Dass how he make da iron part come up on top da watt
6.7: Den Elisha tell, âGo pick um up.â So da guy put out his hand an grab u
6.8: One nodda time, one king fo da Aram peopo stay make war wit da Israel peopo. Da king talk wit his main officer guys fo da army, fo make plan wat dey goin do. He tell, âI goin go dis place, o dat place, fo make my war camp.â
6.9: Erytime da Aram king do dat, Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, send one messenja guy by da Israel king fo tell him, âWatch out! wen you go pass by dat place, cuz dass wea da Aram army guys goin go fo make dea war camp.â
6.10: So da Israel king send messenja guys fo go tell da peopo inside da place Elisha tell him wass up. Mo den one time, Elisha tell da Israel king fo watch out, so da king make shua da peopo nea dat place stay read
6.11: Dis make da Aram king come real huhu bout dis. So he tell his army officer guys fo come, an tell um, âYou guys betta tell me, who from us guys squealing to da Israel king guy!â
6.12: One a his officer guys tell, âNo, my boss da king -- no mo nobody squealing to dem. Elisha, da guy dat talk fo God, dat stay inside Israel, he da one stay tell da Israel king da words you tell inside yoa bedroom.â
6.13: Den da king tell, âGo find out wea he stay. I goin send guys fo catch him.â
6.14: Den da Aram king send horses an war wagons ova dea, an plenny army guys. Dey come dea nite time an go all aroun da tow
6.15: Da nex morning early, wen da guy dat work fo Elisha get up an go outside, he see da army guys wit horses an war wagons all aroun da town. Da worka guy tell Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, âBoss! Wat we goin do?!â
6.16: Elisha tell, âNo scared! Get mo plenny guys hea on oua side den wit dem on dea side.â
6.17: Den Elisha pray lidis: âYahweh, open my worka guy eyes so he can see.â Den Yahweh open da worka guy eyes. He look, an he see all ova da hills aroun da town, get real plenny fire kine horses an war wagons, all aroun Elish
6.18: Wen da Aram army guys start come down by Elisha, he pray to Yahweh lidis: âWack dese guys from odda place wit one strong light, so dey no can see notting!â So Yahweh make dem so dey no can see notting, jalike Elisha wen tel
6.19: Den Elisha tell da army guys, âEh! Dis not da right road. An dis not da right town. Come wit me, an I goin take you by da guy you stay looking fo.â An he take dem inside Samaria tow
6.20: Wen dey go inside Samaria town, Elisha tell, âYahweh, open dese guys eyes so dey can see.â Den Yahweh open dea eyes, an dey look, an dea dey stay, inside Samaria tow
6.21: Wen da Israel king see dem, he tell Elisha, âMy fadda, you like me kill dem, o wat?â
6.22: Elisha tell, âNo kill dem. You not da kine guy dat go kill guys dat you wen go catch fo make prisona wit yoa sword o bow. Give dem food an watta so dey can eat an drink. Den let um go back by dea boss guys.â
6.23: So da king make one big lu`au fo dem, an afta dey pau eat an drink, he send dem away fo go back by dea boss guys. So den da army guys from Aram pau come inside da Israel land fo steal stuf
6.24: Lata, wen Ben-Hadad come da Aram king, he bring togedda all his army guys, an go agains Samaria town fo take um ova. He put da army guys all aroun da town, so nobody can go inside o come outside.
6.25: Cuz a dat, no mo food inside Samaria, so stay real hard fo dem. Da Aram army guys make camp outside Samaria long time, so da head from one donkey fo eat can cost two pound silva, an one small cup a kukae from one pigeon fo eat can cost bout two ounce silv
6.26: One time, wen da Israel king stay walk on top da town wall, an one Samaria wahine yell to him, âMy boss da king, help me get outa trouble!â
6.27: Da king tell, âIf Yahweh no stay help you, wea I goin find somebody fo help you?! From da place wea dey hemo da junks from da wheat? From da place wea dey step da grapes fo make wine? No ways!â
6.28: Den he aks her, âWat kine problem you get?â
6.29: So we cook my boy an eat him. Da nex day I tell her, âGive me yoa boy so we can eat um.â But she wen hide um awready!â
6.30: Wen da king hear wat da wahine tell him, he broke his clotheses fo show he all bum out. Wen he go by da peopo on top da town wall, dey look at him, an dey can see he wear burmbag kine cloth undaneat, on top his skin.
6.31: He tell, âElisha gotta mahke today! If not, I like God do someting even mo bad to me!â
6.32: Elisha, he stay sitting inside his house, an da older leada guys fo da Israel peopo stay sitting dea wit him too. Da king send one a his guys fo go kill Elisha. But befo da killa guy come dea, Elisha tell da older leadas, âFo shua, you guys can see dis king like killa me! He stay send one killa guy fo cut off my head! Lissen up -- befo da killa guy come, shut da door, an hold um agains him so he no can come inside! You can hear his boss, da king, dat stay come behind him awready.â
6.33: Befo Elisha pau tell um dis, da killa guy come by da doo

7.1: Elisha tell, âYou guys, lissen up, wat Yahweh tell. Dis, da message from Yahweh: âBout dis time tomorra, seven quart a da bestes kine wheat flour goin cost ony half ounce silva by da Samaria town gate. An fourteen quart a barley goin cost ony half ounce silva too.â-â
7.2: Da officer dat come wit da Israel king tell Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, âWot! You tink Yahweh goin open up windows inside da sky an make food come down jalike rain?! No way!â
7.3: Da same time, had four guys wit one kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catch. Dey stay outside da gate fo go inside Samaria town. Dey tell, âEh! No good, we stay hea till we mahke!
7.4: If we go inside Samaria town, no mo food inside dea, so we goin mahke dea. An if we stay hea, we goin mahke too. So, we go ova dea by da camp fo da Aram army guys, an give up. If dey let us stay alive, den we stay alive. If dey kill us, den we mahke.â
7.5: Wen start fo come dark, dey stan up fo go by da Aram camp. Wen dey come jus outside da camp, dey no see nobody ova dea!
7.6: Az cuz da same time da sick guys leave Samaria town, da Boss wen make da Aram army guys hear plenny noise from plenny war wagons an horses, an one big army. Da army guys tell each odda, âEh! Da Israel king wen pay da kings fo da Het peopo an da Egypt peopo fo come attack us guys!â
7.7: So befo come real dark, dey all get up an run away. Dey leave dea tents, horses, an donkeys right dea, da whole camp. Dey run fast fo stay aliv
7.8: Da guys dat get da kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catch, dey come da edge a da camp, an go inside one tent. Dey eat an drink, an carry away da silva, da gold, an da clotheses from dea. Den dey go hide da stuff. Dey come back, go inside anodda tent, carry away mo stuff, an hide dat to
7.9: Den dey tell each odda, âWat us guys stay do, az not right! Dis, da time fo tell oua peopo all dis good stuff, an we no stay tell um. Us no can wait till da light come, cuz den us get da blame fo no tell notting! Mo betta we go right now, an tell da guys inside da king's palace wat we wen see.â
7.10: So dey go yell to da guys dat watch da gates, an tell dem, âWe wen go by da Aram camp. An you know wat?! No mo nobody stay ova dea! No can hear nobody talking. Ony get da horses an donkeys dat dey wen tie up. An da tents stay jalike dey wen leave um.â
7.11: Da guys dat watch da gates yell wat da guys wit da skin kine sick wen tell, an somebody tell da peopo inside da king's palac
7.12: Da king hear dis an get up nite time. He tell his officer guys, âI goin tell you wat da Aram guys stay do to us. Dey know we no mo food, so dey leave dea camp an dey hiding inside da country side. Dey tink, âFo shua da Samaria guys goin come outside da town, an den, we can grab um wen dey stay alive, an go inside dea big town.â-â
7.13: One a da officer guys tell, âTell some guys fo take five a da horses dat stay inside da town still yet. Maybe dey not goin mahke! At least, all da odda Israel army guys dat stay hea, not goin mahke. An maybe da guys we send get wipe out, jalike all da odda Israel army guys dat still stay hea, goin get wipe out. So we go send dem fo find out wat wen happen.â
7.14: So dey pick two war wagon wit horse, an da king send dem afta da Aram army guys. He tell da guys dat stay in charge da war wagons, âGo find out wat wen happen!â
7.15: Dey go afta da Aram army guys all da way by da Jordan River. Dey see dat all ova da road, get da Aram guys clotheses an stuffs all ova da place dat da Aram guys wen throw way wen dey come scared an run away! So da messenja guys come back an tell da king.
7.16: Den da Samaria peopo go out an rip off da stuffs from da Aram army camp. So seven quart a da bestes kine flour cost ony half ounce silva, an fourteen quart barley cost ony half ounce silva too, jalike Yahweh wen tel
7.17: Da king wen put da officer dat come wit him in charge a da town gate, but da peopo no care. Dey run outa da town an knock down da officer, walk ova him, an he mahke, jalike Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, wen tell wen da king go by Elish
7.18: All dis wen happen jalike Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, wen tell da king, âDis same time tomorra, fourteen quart a barley goin cost ony half ounce a silva, an seven quart a da bestes kine flour goin cost ony half ounce a silva too, by da Samaria town gate.â
7.19: Da officer wen tell Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, âYou tink Yahweh goin open up windows inside da sky an make food come down jalike rain?! No way!â An Elisha tell da officer guy, âYou goin see um happen wit yoa own eyes, jalike I wen tell. But you, you no goin eat notting from dat!â
7.20: An az jus wat wen happen fo da officer guy, cuz da peopo walk all ova him inside da gate, an he mahk

8.1: One nodda time, Elisha talk wit da wahine dat he wen go make her boy come back alive again. He tell, âTake yoa husban an yoa boy, an go some odda place live, any place you can stay long time. Cuz Yahweh tell, no goin get food inside dis land fo seven year. An stay start awready.â
8.2: So da wahine do wat Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, tell. Her an her ohana go way an stay inside da land wea da Filisha peopo live, fo seven yea
8.3: Wen da seven year pau, her an her ohana come back from da Filisha land. Den she go by da king, fo beg him fo help her get back her house an land.
8.4: Wen she go by da king, da king stay talk story wit Gehazi, da guy dat work fo Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God. Da king tell, âTell me some mo bout all da good kine stuff dat Elisha wen do.â
8.5: Jus wen Gehazi stay tell da king bout how Elisha wen make da mahke boy come alive again, right den an dea da boy's mudda stay dea begging da king fo help her bout her house an lan
8.6: Da king aks da wahine bout um, an she tell him da story wat wen happe
8.7: Anodda time, wen Elisha go Damascus, Ben-Hadad, da Aram king, stay sick. Somebody tell da king, âElisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, stay come all da way ova hea.â
8.8: Da king tell Hazael, âTake one present wit you, an go meet da guy dat stay tight wit God. Go find out from him wat Yahweh tell. Aks him if I goin come good from dis sick, o wat?â
8.9: Hazael go meet Elisha, an take all da bestes kine stuff inside Damascus fo present, wit forty camel fo carry da load. Hazael go by Elisha an stand in front him, an tell, âBen-Hadad, da Aram king, he tink bout you jalike you his fadda. He wen send me fo aks you , âI goin stay alive afta dis sick, o wat?â-â
8.10: Elisha tell Hazael, âGo tell Ben-Hadad, âFo shua you goin live.â But Yahweh wen show me dis too, dat Ben-Hadad goin mahke fo shua.â
8.11: Den Elisha jus stand dea in front Hazael an look at him long time, till bodda Hazael. Den Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, start fo cr
8.12: Hazael aks, âBoss, how come you stay crying?â
8.13: Hazael tell, âEh boss! Me, I nobody spesho, you know! How come I can do big kine stuff lidat?!â
8.14: Den Hazael go way from Elisha, an go back by his boss. Ben-Hadad aks, âWat Elisha tell you?â
8.15: But da nex day, Hazael take one thick cloth, put um inside da watta, an cova da king's face. An da king mahke. Az how Hazael come da nex kin
8.16: Wen Joram, Ahab's boy, stay king fo da Israel peopo five year nort side, an Jehoshafat was da king fo da Judah peopo sout side, den Jehoshafat's boy Jehoram start fo be king fo da Judah peopo, wit his fadda.
8.17: Jehoram was thirty-two year ol wen he come king, an he stay king inside Jerusalem town eight year.
8.18: He make jalike da Israel kings make, jalike da Ahab ohana wen do. Az cuz he wen marry Ahab's girl, an he stay do da kine stuff dat stay bad, da way Yahweh see um.
8.19: But cuz Jehoram ancesta guy King David wen work fo Yahweh, Yahweh no like wipe out all da Judah peopo. Yahweh make promise befo time, fo let guys dat come from David's blood be kings foeva, jalike dey one light fo show peopo da way fo g
8.20: One time wen Jehoram stay king, da Edom peopo go make war an throw out da Judah territorial govmen inside Edom, den take one a dea guys fo be da king.
8.21: So Jehoram go across da Jordan Riva to Zair town wit all his war wagons. Da Edom guys come all aroun Jehoram an his war wagon officer guys, but nite time, Jehoram an his war wagon guys broke thru da Edom army guys. But Jehoram's infantry guys, dey run away an go back dea own place.
8.22: Da Edom guys wen throw out da Judah govmen from da Edom land, an dass how stay till now. Den da Libnah town peopo, dey go throw out da Judah govmen dea town too, da same tim
8.23: Get odda stuff wen happen wen Jehoram stay king too. All da tings he wen do, stay inside da Records Fo Da Judah Kings.
8.24: Jehoram wen mahke, an dey bury him by his ancesta guys, inside David's big town Jerusalem. An Ahaziah, Jehoram's boy, come king afta hi
8.25: So, wen Joram, Ahab's boy, stay king fo da Israel peopo fo twelve year, Jehoram's boy Ahaziah come king fo da Judah peopo same time.
8.26: Ahaziah was twenny-two year ol wen he come king. He stay da king Jerusalem side fo one year. His mudda was Ataliah, an her granfadda was Omri, one a da king guys fo Israel.
8.27: Ahaziah make jalike da Ahab ohana wen do. He do bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um, jalike da Ahab ohana king guys wen do. His wife from da Ahab ohan
8.28: One time Ahaziah go Ramot-Gilead town wit Joram, Ahab's boy, fo fight Hazael, da Aram king. An da Aram guys wen hurt Joram.
8.29: So King Joram go back Jezreel town fo come good afta da Aram guys wen hurt him by Ramot town, wen he fight wit Hazael, da Aram kin

9.1: Elisha, da guy dat talk fo God, call one a da guys dat like come one talka fo God. He tell um, âGet ready fo run. Take dis small bottle olive oil wit you, an go Ramot-Gilead town.
9.2: Wen you get dea, look fo Jehu, Jehoshafat boy an Nimshi grankid. Go by him, an take him inside one empty room inside da house, so da odda officer guys no can hear wat you tell.
9.3: Den take da small bottle olive oil an pour um on top his head. Tell um, âDis wat Yahweh tell: I pick you awready fo come king fo da Israel peopo.â Den open da door an run! No wait!â
9.4: So da young guy dat talk fo God go Ramot-Gilead town.
9.5: Wen he get dea, he see da army officer guys stay all sit togedda. He tell, âWho da main officer guy hea? I get someting fo tell you.â
9.6: Jehu get up an go inside da house. Den da guy dat talk fo God pour da olive oil on top Jehu head, an tell, âDis wat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, tell: âI stay pick you fo come da king ova da peopo dat get me, Yahweh, for dea God, dass da Israel peopo.
9.7: You goin wipe out da ohana dat come from yoa boss King Ahab. I goin pay um back cuz dey wen kill my helpa guys dat wen talk fo me, Yahweh, an all my odda peopo dat Queen Jezebel wen kill.
9.8: All da Ahab ohana, I goin wipe um out. I goin kill ery guy inside da Ahab ohana, no matta dey slave guys o not slave guys.
9.9: I goin wipe out da Ahab ohana, jalike I wen wipe out da ohana dat come from Jeroboam, Nebat's boy, an jalike da ohana dat wen come from Ba`asha, Ahijah's boy.
9.10: An fo Queen Jezebel, da dogs goin eat her mahke body on top da land inside Jezreel town, an nobody goin bury her.â Den da talka guy open da door, an run awa
9.11: Wen Jehu go outa da room an go back by da odda army officer guys dat work fo his boss, one a dem aks, âEryting stay okay? How come dat guy come hea talk pupule kine to you?â
9.12: Dey tell, âNo bulai us! Tell us strait!â
9.13: Right den an dea, ery one a dem take off dea robes an spread dem in front him on top da steps. Den dey blow da sheep horn trumpet an yell, âJehu, da king!â
9.14: So Jehu, Jehoshafat boy an Nimshi grankid, make plan wit his frenz fo attack Joram. (Dat time, King Joram an all da Israel guys stay fight so Hazael, da Aram king, no take ova Ramot-Gilead town.
9.15: But King Joram wen go back Jezreel town fo come good, afta da Aram army guys wen hurt him plenny wen he fight wit Hazael.) Jehu tell his friends, âIf az wat you guys tink, no let nobody go outside dis town, fo go tell dis stuff inside Jezreel wat we goin do.â
9.16: Den Jehu take his war wagon an go Jezreel town, cuz az da place wea Joram stay on top his bed ova dea. Az da same time dat Ahaziah, da Judah king, wen go dea fo see Jora
9.17: Wen da guy dat stay on top da Jezreel tower fo watch da roads, see Jehu army guys stay coming, he yell, âEh, get real plenny army guys I see ova dea!â
9.18: Da horse rida guy ride fo meet Jehu, an tell, âDis wat da king tell, âYou guys come fo fight us, o wat?â-â
9.19: So King Joram send anodda messenja guy on top one horse. Wen he come by Jehu guys, he tell dem, âDis wat da king tell, âYou guys come fo fight us, o wat?â-â
9.20: Den da watcha guy tell Joram guys, âDa messenja guy reach dem, but he no turn aroun come back too. An ony get one guy dat drive war wagon any kine lidat. Dat gotta be Jehu, Nimshi grankid!â
9.21: Joram tell, âMake ready my war wagon.â An wen stay ready, Joram, da Israel king, an Ahaziah, da Judah king, ride out, inside dea two war wagon fo go fo meet Jehu. Dey meet him on top da land dat Nabot, da guy from Jezreel, wen own befo Ahab take um ov
9.22: Wen Joram see Jehu, he aks, âEh Jehu, you come hea fo fight us guys, o eryting stay okay?â
9.23: Den Joram turn aroun his war wagon an get outa dea fas. He yell to Ahaziah, âAhaziah, dat bugga wen set us up!â
9.24: Den Jehu take his bow an arrow an shoot Joram in da middle a his back. Da arrow go all da way inside Joram heart, an he go down inside his war wagon.
9.25: Jehu tell Bidkar, da officer dat help drive his war wagon, âPick up his mahke body, an throw um on top da field dat Nabot, da guy from Jezreel, wen own um befo Ahab take um away. Rememba how me an you wen ride togedda inside two war wagons in back a Ahab, Joram fadda, wen Yahweh give dis word bout Ahab:
9.26: âBefo time, I wen see you make Nabot an his boys bleed an mahke. An fo shua I goin pay you back fo wat you wen do to Nabot, on top dis same piece land. Dat word come from me, Yahweh.â So now, go pick up Joram mahke body an throw um down on top dat land, jalike Yahweh wen tell goin happen.â
9.27: Wen Ahaziah, da Judah king, see wat wen happen, he run away up da road to Bet-Haggan. Jehu chase him, an yell, âKill him too!â Dey shoot him inside his war wagon on da way fo go up to Gur nea Ibleam, but he ony stay hurt, an he run away Megiddo town an mahke ova dea.
9.28: His helpa guys take his mahke body inside one war wagon, to Jerusalem town. Dey bury him dea wit his ancesta guys inside dea ohana tomb inside David's big town.
9.29: (Was da year numba eleven wen Joram, Ahab's boy, stay da Israel king, dat Ahaziah wen come da Judah king
9.30: Den Jehu go Jezreel town. Wen Jezebel hear bout dis, she go make nice her eye wit paint, fix her hair nice, an look down from one window.
9.31: Wen Jehu go inside da town gate, she aks, âYou come hea fo attack us guys, o wat?! Fo shua, you come hea jalike Zimri, da guy dat wen go kill his own boss!â
9.32: Jehu look up da window, an tell, âGet anybody up dea on my side, o wat?!â Two o three a da palace guys look down at him.
9.33: Jehu tell dem, âThrow her down hea.â So dey throw her down, an some a her blood go all ova da wall an da horses. Den Jehu make da horses walk all ova her mahke bod
9.34: Jehu go inside an eat an drink, an tell, âDo wateva you gotta do fo dat wahine dat get kahuna on top her. But bury her, cuz her fadda one king.
9.35: But wen dey go outside fo bury her, dey no find notting. Ony her skull, her feets, an da inside part a her two hands.
9.36: Dey go back tell Jehu. An he tell, âAz wat Yahweh wen tell, da time Elijah da Tishbe guy talk fo him: On top da groun Jezreel side, da dogs goin eat Jezebel body.
9.37: Her mahke body goin come dog doodoo on top da groun Jezreel side, so nobody goin know az Jezebel.â

10.1: King Ahab get seventy boys all live Samaria town. So Jehu write lettas an tell somebody take um Samaria town, to da main leadas inside Jezreel valley an da older leadas, an to da guys dat get da job fo take care Ahab's kids. Jehu tell,
10.2: âYou guys get yoa boss's boys by you. You get war wagons too, an horses, one big town wit strong walls, an all da stuff fo fight. So now, wen you get dis letta,
10.3: go figga out who da bestes boy from all yoa boss's boys, dat can do good job. Den go make him come da king dat goin sit on top his fadda's throne. Afta dat, you gotta fight me fo keep yoa king line!â
10.4: Wen da guys get da letta, dey come real scared. Dey tell, âIf two kings no can fight agains dis Jehu guy, how us can fight um? No way!â
10.5: So da guy dat stay in charge a da palace, da mayor fo da big town, da older leada guys, an da guys dat take care a da Ahab boys, send messenjas fo go tell Jehu, âWe stay yoa helpa guys now. We goin do wateva you tell us we gotta do. We no goin make nobody king. You do wateva you tink az good.â
10.6: Den Jehu write anodda letter to dem. He tell, âIf you guys stay my side, an goin do wat I tell, cut off da heads from yoa boss Ahab's boys, an bring um by me inside Jezreel town dis same time tomorrow.â
10.7: Wen da numba two letta come, da leada guys go get da boys an kill all seventy a dem. Dey put dea heads inside clay pots, an send dem by Jehu inside Jezreel.
10.8: Wen da messenja guy come from da leada guys, he tell Jehu, âDey wen bring da King Ahab boys heads.â
10.9: Da nex morning Jehu go outside da gate. He stand in front all da peopo an tell dem, âYou guys go figga if dis ting right o not. Try tink bout dis: I da guy dat wen make plan wit my guys, fo go agains my boss, an kill him. But who wen kill all dese boys?
10.10: So den, you guys gotta know: eryting Yahweh wen tell agains da Ahab ohana goin come true. Yahweh do wat he wen make promise fo do, jalike his worka guy Elijah wen tell.â
10.11: An dass da story, how Jehu kill erybody dat still yet stay alive inside Jezreel from da Ahab ohana, an Ahab's main worka guys, his good friends, an his pries guys. He neva pau kill dem, till no mo nobody from da Ahab peopo stay aliv
10.12: Den Jehu start fo go Samaria town. Befo he get dea, he come by Bet-Eked, wea da sheep farma guys stay.
10.13: He meet some ohana guys from Ahaziah, da Judah king, dea. He aks um, âWho you guys?â
10.14: Jehu tell his army guys, âGrab um, no kill um!â So dey grab dem an no kill um. But lata, dey kill da ohana guys an dump um inside one big hole wea dey keep watta, Bet-Eked side. Had 42 guys, an Jehu no leave nobody aliv
10.15: Afta Jehu leave dea, he come by Jehonadab, Rekab's boy, dat stay come fo meet him. Jehu tell him, âI like God go do good tings fo you!â Den Jehu aks him, âYou stay real tight wit me, jalike I stay real tight wit you, o wat?â
10.16: Jehu tell, âCome wit me, an see how I go all out fo Yahweh.â Den he let Jehonadab ride wit him inside his war wago
10.17: Wen Jehu come by Samaria town, he kill erybody dat still yet stay dea from Ahab's ohana. He kill all dem, jalike Yahweh da Boss wen tell Elija
10.18: Den Jehu bring all da peopo togedda an tell um, âAhab wen work fo Ba`al litto bit. But me, Jehu, I goin work fo Ba`al mo plenny!
10.19: Now go tell all da guys dat talk fo Ba`al, all da guys dat do stuff fo him, an all his pries guys, fo come hea by me. Make shua erybody come. Cuz I goin make one big sacrifice fo Ba`al. Anybody no come, dey no goin live no moa.â But Jehu ony was making one sly kine plan so dat he can wipe out da guys dat work fo Ba`a
10.20: Jehu tell, âMake one spesho religious day fo show respeck fo Ba`al. Tell all da peopo fo come.â So da guys dat do stuff fo Ba`al, dey tell da peopo dis.
10.21: Den Jehu send messenja guys all ova Israel, an all da guys dat do stuff fo Ba`al come. No mo nobody stay home, dey all come. Dey all go inside da temple fo Ba`al, so stay full from one side to da odda sid
10.22: Den Jehu tell da guy dat stay in charge a da clotheses fo bring robes fo all da guys dat do stuff fo Ba`al. So dey bring out robes fo all a de
10.23: Den Jehu an Jehonadab, Rekab's boy, go inside da temple fo Ba`al. Jehu tell da guys dat do stuff fo Ba`al, âLook aroun, an make shua no mo guys dat do stuff fo Yahweh inside hea wit you guys, ony guys dat do stuff fo Ba`al.
10.24: So erybody go inside fo make plenny sacrifice, regula kine an burn up kin
10.25: So wen Jehu pau make da burn up kine sacrifice, he tell da guards an da officer guys fo his army: âGo inside, kill all dem. No let nobody get outa dea.â So dey kill all dem wit dea sword. The guard guys an da officer guys throw da bodies outside. Den dey go inside da mos spesho part a da temple fo Ba`al.
10.26: Dey bring da kapu poses outa da temple fo Ba`al, an burn um.
10.27: Dey broke down da kapu poses fo Ba`al, an bus up da temple fo Ba`al. Den peopo start fo use da place fo one lua, an dass how stay still ye
10.28: Dass how Jehu stop da peopo from go down in front da god Ba`al. From dat time, nobody go down in front Ba`al fo pray no mo inside Israe
10.29: But Jehu, he neva turn away from da bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam, Nebat's boy, wen make da Israel peopo do. Da Israel peopo still stay go down in front da gold kine bebe cows dat Jeroboam put Bethel side an Dan sid
10.30: Yahweh tell Jehu, âGood, wat you wen do! You wen do wat stay right da way I see um. You wen do to da Ahab ohana eryting I wen like do to dem! Cuz a dat, yoa kids goin sit on top da Israel throne fo four generation.â
10.31: But Jehu neva go do all wat da rules tell, dat Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, wen give um. He neva turn away from da bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam wen do, an dat Jeroboam wen make da Israel peopo d
10.32: Dat was da time Yahweh start fo make da Israel nation come mo small. Hazael da Syria king army guys wen come make sneak attack all ova da Israel land,
10.33: east a da Jordan River, an inside all da Gilead land wea da Gad, Reuben, an Manasseh peopo stay, from Aroer by da Arnon Canyon, thru Gilead, an all da way to Basha
10.34: All da odda stuff dat Jehu wen do wen he stay king, an how strong he stay, stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israe
10.35: Den Jehu mahke. Dey bury him inside Samaria wit his ancesta guys. An Jehoahaz, his boy, come da nex king.
10.36: Da time Jehu stay king fo da Israel peopo was twenny-eight year inside Samaria tow

11.1: Wen Ataliah, Ahaziah mudda, see dat her boy Ahaziah mahke, she start fo wipe out all da Judah king ohana.
11.2: But Jehosheba, King Jehoram girl an Ahaziah sista, she go wea all Jehoram's kids stay. She steal Joash, Ahaziah boy, from dea, cuz she know dey all goin mahke. She put Joash an da wahine dat give him milk inside one bedroom fo hide him from Ataliah. Dass how Joash still stay live.
11.3: He stay hide wit da wahine dat give him milk, inside da Temple Fo Yahweh fo six year, an Ataliah stay in charge a da land all dat tim
11.4: Year numba seven, da pries guy Jehoiada send messenja guys fo tell da army captain guys, an da guys from Caria side dat guard da king, an da army messenja runna guys, fo tell all dem fo come by him inside da Temple Fo Yahweh. He make one deal wit dem, an tell dem, âYou gotta make one strong promise fo stay tight wit me, right hea inside da Temple Fo Yahweh.â Den he show dem da king boy.
11.5: He tell dem, âDis wat you guys gotta do. You guys get three team dat suppose to show up fo work on da Res Day, yeah? One team goin guard da king's palace.
11.6: Da nex team, go by da Sur Gate. Da odda team, go by da gate in back a da army messenja runna guys. Dass how all you guys goin take turn guard da temple.
11.7: Same ting, you guys get two odda team dat no go work on da Res Day. You guys from dose teams, all gotta take care guard da temple too, fo make shua da king no get hurt.
11.8: Stay nea aroun da king. Make shua erybody carry sword an odda fighting stuff in yoa hand. Anybody come wea you guys stay line up, kill um. Stay nea aroun da king wea eva he go.â
11.9: Da army captain guys do eryting Jehoiada da pries guy tell um fo do. Erybody bring dea army guys, da ones dat start fo work on da Res Day, an da odda guys dat no work dat day, an come by Jehoiada da pries guy.
11.10: Jehoiada give da army captain guys da spears an shields dat King David guys wen use befo time, dat stay inside da Temple Fo Yahweh.
11.11: All da army messenja guys get dea tings fo fight inside dea hand too. Dey all make line aroun da king, an all aroun da altar an da temple, from da south side to da north side. So now, nobody can come insid
11.12: Jehoiada bring da king's boy outside in da yard, an put da king kine crown on top his head. He give da boy one copy a da Rules From God, so he no foget da deal wit Yahweh bumbye. Da peopo make him king. Dey put olive oil on top his head fo show dey pick him, an da peopo all clap dea hands, an yell, âWe like da king live long time!â
11.13: Wen Ataliah hear all da noise da army messenja runna guys an da peopo make, she go by da peopo dat stay stand aroun da Temple Fo Yahweh.
11.14: She look ova dea wea all da noise stay, an her jaw drop, cuz da king stay stand ova dea by da big pos, wea da king guys stand erytime. Da main leadas fo da army an da guys dat blow da trumpets stay dea by da king side, an all da peopo inside da land stay happy an blowing trumpet. Den Ataliah broke her clotheses, an yell, âDey wen stab us in da back!â
11.15: Jehoiada tell da captain guys dat get all dea army guys dea wit um: âPut Ataliah inside da middo a da army guys, an take her outside da Temple. Kill anybody dat like go wit her wit yoa swords!â Cuz Jehoiada wen tell, âNo good, kill her inside da Temple Fo Yahweh.â
11.16: So dey grab her an take her by da place wea da horses go inside da palace yard, an dey kill her ova de
11.17: Den Jehoiada da pries guy make strong kine promise to Yahweh, from da king an da peopo, dat dey goin come Yahweh peopo. An he make da king make promise to da peopo, an da peopo make promise to da king.
11.18: Den all da peopo inside da land go by da Temple Fo Ba`al, an bus um up. Dey smash da altars an da idol kine god statues real small. Dey kill Mattan, da pries guy fo Ba`al, in front da altar
11.19: He take da army captain guys wit him, da guys from Caria dat guard da king, da messenja runna guys, an all da odda peopo inside da land. All dem bring da king down from da Temple Fo Yahweh, an go inside da palace by da gate fo da messenja runna guys. Den da king take his place on top da throne wea all da king guys sit.
11.20: Cuz a dis, all da peopo inside da land wen dance an sing cuz dey stay good inside. An Jerusalem town stay quiet, cuz da army guys wen kill Ataliah wit dea swords inside da palac
11.21: Joash stay seven year ol wen he come kin

12.1: Wen Jehu stay Israel king seven year, den Joash come da Judah king. Joash stay da king inside Jerusalem fo forty year. Joash mudda, Zibiah from Beersheba.
12.2: Joash wen do da right kine ting all da time he stay king, da way Yahweh see him do, jalike Jehoiada da pries guy wen teach him fo do.
12.3: But still yet, da altars still stay on da top a da hills fo make sacrifice fo da idol kine gods. Da peopo still stay make sacrifice an burn incense ova de
12.4: Had one time, Joash tell da pries guys, âYou know, da peopo bring plenny silva inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, fo make da silva spesho fo God. Ery guy gotta pay da Temple guys wit silva ery year. Wen da govment count how much peopo get inside ery house, dey gotta pay wit silva fo dat. An get odda kine silva dat peopo bring cuz dey like give um. Go get all dat silva.
12.5: Weneva somebody bring silva to da Temple, da guys in charge a da silva suppose to give um to da pries guys. An da pries guys gotta use some a dat silva fo fix wateva dey find dat need fo fix inside da Temple.â
12.6: But afta Joash stay king fo twenny-three year, still yet da pries guys neva fix da Temple.
12.7: Az why King Joash tell Jehoiada da main pries an da odda pries guys fo come by him. He tell um, âEh! How come you guys no fix da stuff inside da Temple dat need fo fix? From now, weneva da guys in charge a da silva give you silva, no take um fo yoaself. You gotta give um to da guys dat goin fix da Temple!â
12.8: Da pries guys tell, âKay den. Us no goin take da silva from da peopo, an us no goin fix da Temple ouaself.â
12.9: Den Jehoiada da pries guy take one box, an make one puka on da top. He put um by da altar, on da right side wen you go inside da Temple Fo Yahweh. Da pries guys dat guard da door fo go inside da Temple yard, put all da silva dat da peopo bring inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, inside da box.
12.10: Den, weneva dey see dat get plenny silva inside da box, da king secretary an da main pries guy come, count da money dat get inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, an put um inside bags.
12.11: Wen dey pau weigh eryting, dey give da silva to da luna guys fo da guys dat do da work, da guys dat stay in charge a da work fo da Temple Fo Yahweh, so dey can pay da worka guys -- da carpenta guys, an da builda guys dat work inside da Temple Fo Yahweh,
12.12: da guys dat cut da stone block, an da guys dat put togedda da blocks. Dey use da silva dey get fo dat, fo buy wood, stone block, an wateva odda stuff dey need fo fix da Temple Fo Yahwe
12.13: But da silva dat da peopo bring inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, dey no use um fo make silva basins, tings fo pio da olive oil lamps, bowls fo sprinkle blood, metal trumpets, o odda tings dey make from gold o silva fo da Temple Fo Yahweh.
12.14: Az cuz dey use da silva fo pay da worka guys fo fix da Temple.
12.15: Dey no worry how da Temple luna guys use da silva fo pay da worka guys, cuz dey know da Temple luna guys stay solid an can trus um.
12.16: But da silva da peopo bring cuz dey wen broke God's rules, o cuz dey wen do bad kine stuff, dey no bring dat silva inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, cuz az ony fo da pries guy
12.17: Bout da same time, Hazael da Aram king go up attack Gat an take ova da town. Den he turn aroun fo go afta Jerusalem.
12.18: But Joash da king fo Judah take all da tings dat his ancesta guys Jehoshafat, Jehoram, an Ahaziah, da Judah kings, wen make spesho fo Yahweh, an da gifs Joash wen make spesho fo Yahweh, an all da gold he find inside da storage places inside da Temple Fo Yahweh an da palace, an he send um to Hazael da Aram king. So Hazael neva go attack Jerusale
12.19: All da odda stuff dat Joash wen do wen he stay king, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Juda
12.20: But Joash palace guys wen come togedda an make plan fo kill him. Dey kill him Bet-Millo side, on top da road dat go down Silla side.
12.21: Was Jozabad Shimeat boy an Jehozabad, Shomer boy, da palace guys dat wen kill him. Da peopo bury Joash wit his ancesta guys inside David's big town. Amaziah, Joash boy, come da nex kin

13.1: Da numba 23 year wen Joash, Ahaziah's boy, stay da Judah king, Jehoahaz, Jehu's boy, come da Israel king inside Samaria town. Jehoahaz stay king fo seventeen year.
13.2: Jehoahaz do bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um. He stay do da same bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam, Nebat's boy, wen do. He make da Israel peopo do um too, an he no stop do da bad kine stuff.
13.3: Az why Yahweh come real huhu wit da Israel peopo. Fo long time he give Hazael, da Aram king, an his boy Ben-Hadad powa ova de
13.4: But den, Jehoahaz try make tings come litto bit mo betta wit Yahweh. Yahweh wen lissen Jehoahaz, cuz he see how plenny presha da Aram king put on top da Israel peopo.
13.5: Den Yahweh give da Israel peopo one guy fo get um outa trouble, so da Aram guys no mo powa ova dem. Cuz a dat, all da Israel peopo can go live inside dea own place, jalike befo time.
13.6: Still yet, dey no turn away from doing all da bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam an his ohana wen do befo time, an he make da Israel peopo do too. Dey stay go down in front da gold kine idol gods. An da kine pos da peopo put up Samaria town, fo pray to da wahine god Asherah, still stay de
13.7: Dat time, ony get litto bit army guys stay fo Jehoahaz. Ony get fifty horses an riders, ten war wagons, an ten tousan army guys. Cuz da Aram king wen wipe out all da oddas, an make um jalike da dirt dat fall down wen peopo hemo da junks from da whea
13.8: All da odda kine stuff dat Jehoahaz wen do wen he stay king, bout how strong him an wat he make, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
13.9: Jehoahaz mahke, an da peopo bury um wit his ancesta guys inside Samaria town. Jehoash, his boy, come king afta hi
13.10: Wen Joash stay da Judah king thirty-seven year, Jehoash, Jehoahaz boy, come da Israel king inside Samaria town. He stay king fo sixteen year.
13.11: Jehoash do bad kine stuff, da way Yahweh see um. He no turn away from all da bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam, Nebat's boy, wen do. Jeroboam make da Israel peopo do dat kine bad kine stuff, an Jehoash stay do um too.
13.12: All da odda stuff dat Jehoash wen do, an his war agains Amaziah, da Judah king, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
13.13: Wen Jehoash mahke, da peopo bury um wit his ancesta guys, inside Samaria town wit all da odda Israel kings. Jeroboam Numba Two come da nex king inside Samari
13.14: One time befo Jehoash mahke, Elisha come sick. Dis, da same sick goin make him mahke bumbye. Jehoash, da Israel king, go down see him, an cry ova him. He yell, âMy fadda! My fadda! Fo us Israel peopo, you jalike oua war wagons an horse rida guys!â
13.15: Elisha tell um, âGo get one bow an some arrows.â An Jehoash go get um.
13.16: Elisha tell da king, âTake da bow inside yoa hand.â Wen Jehoash do dis, Elisha put his hands on top da king hand
13.17: Elisha tell Jehoash, âOpen da east side window.â An he open um. Elisha tell, âShoot!â An he shoot. Elisha tell, âAz Yahweh's arrow fo show da winna, fo show you goin be da winna ova da Aram guys! You goin wipe dem out all da way, ova dea Afek town.â
13.18: Den Elisha tell, âGo take da arrows.â An da king take um. Elisha tell him, âHit da groun wit um.â Da king hit da groun three time, an den stop.
13.19: Elisha, da guy dat stay tight wit God, come huhu wit da king, an tell, âHow come you neva hit um five o six time, aah?! If you wen do dat, fo shua you goin win ova Aram all da way. But now, you ony goin win ova dem three time.â
13.20: Lata, Elisha mahke, an dey bury hi
13.21: One time wen some Israel guys stay burying one guy dat wen mahke, right den an dea dey see some a da steala gang guys, so dey throw da guy's body inside Elisha's tomb an go. Wen da body touch Elisha's bones, da guy come back alive one mo time, an he stand up on his feet
13.22: All da time Jehoahaz stay king, Hazael da Aram king put presha on top da Israel peopo.
13.23: But Yahweh get good heart fo da Israel peopo, an pity dem, an give dem chance, cuz a da deal he wen make wit Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob. Even till now Yahweh no like wipe um out o chase um away from wea he sta
13.24: Was aroun dat time, Hazael da Aram king mahke, an his boy Ben-Hadad come da nex king.
13.25: Den Jehoash, Jehoahaz boy, take back from Ben-Hadad, Hazael's boy, all da towns dat Hazael wen take ova from Jehoash fadda Jehoahaz befo time. Jehoash wen win ova him three time, an so he get back da Israel town

14.1: Wen Jehoash, Jehoahaz boy, stay Israel king fo two year, Amaziah, Joash boy, come da Judah king.
14.2: Amaziah, he twenny-five year ol wen he come king. He stay king inside Jerusalem twenny-nine year. His mudda name Jehoaddin, an she come from Jerusalem.
14.3: Amaziah do wat stay right da way Yahweh see um, but he no do jalike his ancesta David wen do. He stick wit da way his fadda Joash do bout eryting.
14.4: But da sacrifice places fo da idol kine gods still stay on top da hills. Da peopo stay make sacrifice an burn incense ova de
14.5: Afta Amaziah make shua nobody can take ova him fo be king, he kill da palace guys dat wen kill his fadda da king.
14.6: But he no kill da boys a da guys dat wen kill his fadda, jalike da Book wit da Rules dat Moses wen write tell: Yahweh wen make dis rule: âNo kill da faddas cuz a wat dea boys do, an no kill da boys cuz a wat dea faddas do. Anybody do bad kine stuff, dey da ony one gotta mahke.â
14.7: Amaziah, he da one wen win ova ten tousan Edom guys inside da Salt Valley. An he take ova dea big town Sela dat time. He call da place Jokteel, an dis da name stay lidat toda
14.8: Lata, Amaziah send messenja guys by da Israel king Jehoash, Jehoahaz boy an Jehu grankid. He give um dis message, âCome meet me face to face, so we can fight an see who win!â
14.9: But Jehoash, da Israel king, tell da messenja guys fo go back tell dis story to Amaziah, da Judah king: âYou, you jalike one small thorn bush on top da Lebanon mountains, dat send one message to one big Lebanon cedar tree, âGive yoa girl to my boy fo marry!â Right den an dea, one wild animal from da Lebanon mountains come by dea, an smash down da thorn bush.
14.10: Fo shua, you wen win ova da Edom guys, an now you get smart wit me! Let yoa peopo respeck you cuz you win, but no come hea ack big! No good you make lidat an lose da war, cuz den you goin mahke, you an da Judah peopo too!â
14.11: But Amaziah no like lissen. So Jehoash, da Israel king, attack. Him an Amaziah, da Judah king, meet each odda Bet Shemesh side inside Judah, an dea army guys fight.
14.12: Da Israel guys bus up da Judah guys, an all da Judah guys run away go home.
14.13: Jehoash, da Israel king, catch Amaziah, da Judah king, Joash boy an Ahaziah's grankid, Bet Shemesh side. Den Jehoash go Jerusalem broke down da town wall from da Ephraim Gate to da Corner Gate, one part bout six hundred feet long.
14.14: Jehoash take all da gold an silva, an all da cups an bowls an tings dat he find inside da Temple Fo Yahweh, an inside da king's palace he take all da gold an silva too. An he even take away importan peopo from Jerusalem an tell he goin kill um if da Judah peopo make war one mo time. Den he go back Samaria sid
14.15: All da odda stuff dat Jehoash wen do, da awesome way he fight, an his war agains Amaziah da Judah king, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
14.16: Jehoash mahke, an da peopo bury him by his ancesta guys inside Samaria, wit da Israel kings. An his boy, dat dey call Jeroboam Numba Two, come king afta hi
14.17: Da Judah king Amaziah, Joash boy, stay alive fifteen mo year afta Jehoash mahke.
14.18: An all da odda stuff dat Amaziah wen do, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Juda
14.19: Amaziah run away Lakish town, cuz some guys make plan fo kill um inside Jerusalem town. But dey send guys afta him Lakish side, an kill um ova dea.
14.20: Dey bring his mahke body back on top one horse, an dey bury him inside Jerusalem wit his ancesta guys, inside David's big tow
14.21: Den all da Judah peopo take Amaziah boy Azariah, who was sixteen year ol, an dey make him da nex king afta him.
14.22: Azariah, he da one dat wen build Elat town again, an take um back fo Judah afta Amaziah mahk
14.23: Wen Amaziah, Joash boy, stay king inside Judah fo fifteen year, Jeroboam Numba Two, Jehoash boy, come da Israel king inside Samaria town. An he stay king fo forty-one year.
14.24: Jeroboam Numba Two do bad kine stuff da way Yahweh see um, an no turn away notting from da bad kine tings dat Jeroboam Numba One, Nebat's boy, wen do. Jeroboam Numba One, he da one wen start fo make da Israel peopo do all kine bad stuff.
14.25: Jeroboam Numba Two, he da one dat take back da Israel land all da way from Lebo-Hamat nort side to da Arabah Lake dat dey call da Big Salt Lake, sout side, jalike was befo time. Dat happen jalike wat Jonah wen tell. He Amittai's boy from Gat-Hefer, dat wen talk fo Yahweh, da God fo da Israel peopo, befo time. Jonah wen work fo God, an he tell dat Israel goin get back dea lan
14.26: Yahweh wen see how erybody inside Israel stay suffa plenny, no matta dey slave guys o not slave guys. No mo nobody dea fo help dem.
14.27: Yahweh wen tell awready dat he no goin wipe out da Israel peopo so nobody unda da sky goin even rememba who dem. Cuz a dat, he give Jeroboam Numba Two, Jehoash boy, da powa fo get dem outa troubl
14.28: All da odda stuff dat Jeroboam Numba Two wen do, da awesome way he fight, how he give back Damascus town an Hamat town fo da Judah part a da Israel land, dat was Judah land befo time, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
14.29: Jeroboam Numba Two mahke, an dey bury him wit his ancesta guys, da Israel kings. An Zekariah his boy come da nex king afta hi

15.1: Wen Jeroboam Numba Two stay Israel king fo twenny-seven year, Amaziah's boy Azariah, (dat lata take da name Uzziah), come Judah king.
15.2: He sixteen year ol wen he come king, an he stay da king inside Jerusalem fo fifty-two year. His mudda Jecoliah, she from Jerusalem.
15.3: Uzziah do wass right, da way Yahweh see him, jalike his fadda Amaziah wen do.
15.4: But da sacrifice places on top da hills still stay dea. Da peopo still stay make sacrifice an burn incense fo odda gods ova de
15.5: Yahweh make King Uzziah get one kine sick all ova da skin dat odda guys can catch, till he mahke. Cuz a dat, he live inside one house wea nobody can come. Jotam, da king's boy, stay take charge da palace, an was da leada fo da peopo inside da lan
15.6: Had odda stuff happen wen Uzziah stay king. All da tings he wen do, stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Judah.
15.7: Uzziah (dass Azariah) wen mahke, an dey bury him by his ancesta guys, inside King David's big town. An Jotam, his boy, come da nex kin
15.8: Wen Azariah (dass Uzziah) stay Judah king fo thirty-eight year, Zekariah, Jeroboam Numba Two boy, come Israel king. He stay king fo six month inside Samaria town.
15.9: Da way Yahweh see Zekariah, he do bad kine stuff jalike his ancesta guys wen do. He no turn away from da bad kine stuff dat Jeroboam Numba One, Nebat's boy, do, wen he wen make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuf
15.10: Had one guy Shallum, Jabesh boy, make plan wit some odda guys fo kill Zekariah. Shallum attack Zekariah in front da peopo an kill um. So Shallum come da nex king afta Zekariah.
15.11: Da odda stuff dat Zekariah wen do, stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Israel.
15.12: Dis all happen da way Yahweh wen tell Jehu goin happen: âYou, yoa boy, yoa grankid, and yoa great grankid, goin sit on top da Israel throne, ony four a dem, den yoa line goin pau.â
15.13: Shallum, Jabesh boy, come Israel king wen Uzziah was da Judah king fo thirty-nine year. An Shallum stay da Israel king inside Samaria town fo ony one month.
15.14: Den Menahem, Gadi's boy, go up from Tirzah to Samaria. He attack Shallum, Jabesh boy, inside Samaria, an kill him. An Menahem come nex king afta hi
15.15: Da odda stuff dat Shallum wen do, an da plan he make fo kill King Zekariah, all dat stay inside da Record Book Fo Da Kings Fo Juda
15.16: Dat time, Menahem start from Tirzah town, an attack Tifsah town, an erybody dat live aroun dea, cuz dey no like open dea gates fo him. He bus up Tifsah an cut open all da hapai wahines de
