11.13: Az cuz da Syria king, north side, goin put togedda anodda army, mo big den da firs army. Plenny years lata, he goin go out wit one big army, wit all da stuffs dey need fo make wa
11.14: âDat time, plenny guys goin fight da Egypt king, south side. Eh Daniel, even some yoa Jewish guys dat like fight erytime, goin fight da Egypt king cuz yoa guys get one dream fo make dea own govmen. But dey no goin be strong nuff fo win.
11.15: Den da Syria king, north side, goin come pile up dirt fo go ova da wall fo one big town wit strong wall, Egypt side. He goin take ova da town. Da army fo da Egypt king, south side, no goin get nuff powa fo fight da Syria king. Even dea bestes guys from da Egypt army, no goin be strong nuff fo fight dem.
11.16: Da Syria king dat fight dem goin do wateva he like do. No goin get nobody from da Egypt army can fight da Syria army. Da Syria king goin take ova da Israel land, dat mo nice looking land. An he goin get da power fo wipe out dat whole land.
11.17: Da Syria king goin make up his mind fo go south side wit all da powa he get cuz he da king. He goin make one deal fo no fight da Egypt king. He goin give one Syria wahine fo da Egypt king marry. He do dis cuz he stay plan fo use her, fo wipe out da Egypt land. But da deal da Syria king stay make no goin work, an da plan no goin help him.
11.18: Lata, da Syria king goin start fo attack da peopos dat live by da ocean an on top da islands. He goin make plenny a dem prisona
11.19: So afta dis, da Syria king goin back to da strong walls inside his own land. But bumbye he goin come weak, so dat nobody goin worry bout him an no goin see um again no mo
11.20: âDa king guy dat goin take ova afta him goin send one guy all ova his land fo colleck tax fo make him still look good. He goin make real hard time fo da peopo. Cuz a dat, nobody goin get respeck fo da king, an afta two-three year, he goin lose powa. Da peopo goin kick um out, but not cuz dey huhu, o cuz dey fight hi
11.21: âDen, goin get one guy dat erybody know he no good. No mo nobody give him respeck, jalike he get da right fo be king fo real kine. But still yet, he goin take ova an come king. Wen erybody tink eryting stay okay fo dem, dis guy goin attack Syria. He goin bulai da peopo wit plenny nice kine promise, den he goin grab dem an take ova.
11.22: Den he goin wipe out one real big army, an take da powa from da pries guy dat stay in charge a da deal God wen make wit his peopo.
11.23: He goin make all kine promise to da peopo fo help dem, an dey goin make promise fo help him. But afta he do dat, he goin bulai dem. Az how he goin come mo an mo strong wit ony litto bit peopo fo help him.
11.24: Wen erybody tink eryting stay good, dis guy goin take ova da places inside da districk wea da bestes kine food grow. He goin take ova lands wat his fadda an ancesta guys neva do. He goin take all kine stuffs from ova dea, an give his friends all da rich kine stuffs dat he take away from da odda peopos. He goin make plan fo take ova plenny big towns wit strong walls, an he goin do um one by on
11.25: âWit one big army, dis Syria king nort side goin make his army strong an ready fo fight. Den he goin fight da Egypt king sout side. So da Egypt king goin make war wit his big strong army. But cuz da Syria king make sneaky plan agains da sout side, da Egypt king no goin win.
11.26: Da palace guys dat eat da fancy kine food da Egypt king give um, dey goin try fo wipe out da Egypt king. An da Syria army guys goin push his army guys back, jalike one flood. Plenny guys goin mahke wen dey make war.
11.27: Den da two king guys goin sit down by da same table an eat togedda. But inside dem, dey stay plan fo do bad kine stuff to each odda. Dey goin bulai each odda. But dea plans no goin come out good fo dem, cuz [ony God know da right time fo eryting happen / still yet all dis goin pau ony wen God say time fo pau].
11.28: Wen da Syria king start fo go back his own land, nort side, he goin bring back rich kine stuffs he wen take from Egypt side. But he make up his mind fo mess up da spesho deal God wen make wit his Jewish peopo. He goin do wat he like agains God's deal, an den go back his own lan
11.29: âDa time come wen God say, da Syria king goin go agains da sout again, but dis time, goin come out diffren den befo.
11.30: Da navy boats guys from da west side goin go agains him. An cuz a dat, da Syria king no goin like fight no moa, an go back home. He goin talk real stink agains God's spesho deal, an do any kine agains God. Wen he stay go home, he goin make nice an lissen to da peopo dat no like God's spesho dea
11.31: âArmy guys from da Syria king goin go inside da strong walls aroun da Temple Fo Yahweh. Dey no goin let da pries guys make sacrifices dey suppose to make ery day. Den dey goin put up one pilau idol kine statue inside da place dat stay spesho fo Yahweh, so nobody can pray to Yahweh dea no moa.
11.32: Da Syria king goin make nice to da peopo dat awready wen go agains God's deal, fo make dem come his side, an make um pilau inside. But da peopo dat know God fo real kine goin come strong an hang in dea, an dey goin figh
11.33: âDa leada guys dat undastan wass happening, dey goin teach plenny peopo fo help dem undastan too. But goin get one time, dey goin get plenny problem, cuz da Syria guys goin kill dose leada guys wit swords, o wit fire. Dey goin catch da leadas an throw um in jail, an goin take all dea stuffs.
11.34: Wen all dis stuff happen to da Jewish leada guys, goin get peopo dat help dem litto bit. Plenny odda peopo goin go wit dem an make promise fo help, but dey no goin do notting.
11.35: Some a da leada guys dat undastan how come all dis stay happen, dey goin suffa. Az goin be jalike one test fo da peopo, fo make um come clean inside, an no mo notting bad goin stay wit dem. Goin stay lidis all da way to jus da right time.â
11.36: âDa Syria king goin do anyting he like. He goin ack jalike he mo big den all da gods. He goin talk mo stink den da peopo eva hear befo, agains da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods. An eryting goin go good fo him, till da time wen God no pau stay huhu. Cuz wat God say gotta happen, goin happen fo shua.
11.37: Da king no goin show respeck fo da gods his ancesta guys wen pray to, o fo da god da wahines like. He no mo respeck fo all da gods. Az cuz he tink he mo big den all da gods.
11.38: Mo den dat, he goin show respeck fo da god fo da strong walls, one god his ancesta guys neva know. He goin show respeck fo dis god wit gold an silva, an da kine jewel stones dat cos plenny, an odda rich kine presents.
11.39: He goin attack da towns dat get da mos strong walls, an one god from odda place goin help him. He goin show plenny respeck fo da peopo dat say he da numba one guy. He goin put um in charge a plenny peopo. He goin give dem guys land if dey pay hi
11.40: âWen da time pau, da Egypt king sout side goin try fo push back da Syria king nort side. But da Syria king guys goin hit da Egypt king guys jalike one big hurricane, wit war wagons, an horse rida guys, an plenny boats. Dey goin attack plenny diffren lands, an go thru dem jalike one big flood.
11.41: He goin attack da Nice Looking Land too. He goin make plenny trouble in plenny lands an kill dea peopo, but Edom, Moab, an da leada guys inside Ammon, dey no goin come unda his powa.
11.42: He goin take ova plenny land. Da Egypt peopo goin run away from him.
11.43: He goin take ova da gold, da silva, an all da rich kine stuffs dat da Egypt peopo wen hide. Da Libya peopo an da Sudan peopo goin come unda him too.
11.44: But he goin hear stuff from da east an da north, an dat goin make him come real scared. So he goin go dea real huhu, an go out fo wipe out plenny peopo.
11.45: He goin put up his king kine tents wit da Mediterranean Sea makai side, an da nice looking mountain dat stay spesho fo God, mauka side. But den, he goin mahke, an no goin get nobody dea fo help hi

12.1: Da angel messenja guy tell me dis: âDat time, Michael, da importan angel prince, da one dat take care yoa peopo, he goin go by you guys fo take care you. Goin get one time get plenny trouble, mo den dey get from da time yoa peopo wen come one nation firs time, till dat time. But dass da time wen yoa peopo, da ones dat get dea name inside God's book, goin get outa trouble.
12.2: Plenny peopo dat stay mahke, jalike dey stay sleep unda da groun, dey goin come alive one mo time, jalike dey wake up. Some a dem goin come alive fo get da kine life dat stay foeva. Odda peopo goin come alive fo come shame foeva, an odda peopo goin feel pilau wen dey even tink bout dem.
12.3: Da ones dat know how come dese tings happen, dey goin shine jalike da sky get plenny light. An da ones dat help plenny peopo fo do da right kine tings, dey goin shine jalike da stars foeva an ev
12.4: But you, Daniel, put seal on top da roll up sheep skin, so eryting inside stay secret till da world pau. Plenny peopo goin run aroun dis side an dat side fo try find out mo plenny bout all dis stuff.â
12.5: Den me, Daniel, I look. Right dea in front me, two odda guys stay standing! One guy stay stand on top one side a da riva, an da odda guy stay stand on top da odda side a da riva.
12.6: One a dem tell da angel guy dat get da linen clotheses, dat stay ova da watta inside da river, âHow long goin be till all dis stuff happen, an make erybody's jaws drop?â
12.7: Da guy wit da linen kine clotheses, dat stay ova da watta inside da river, lift his two hands to da sky. I hear him make one strong promise in front God dat stay live foeva. He tell, âGoin be three an a half year till dat time come. Wen da one dat make big kine trouble, pau take away da power from da peopo dat stay spesho fo God, all da stuff I wen tell you goin pau too.â
12.8: Me, Daniel, I hear wat da guy tell, but I no undastan. So I tell, âBoss, wat goin happen afta all dis kine stuff pau?â
12.9: He tell, âDaniel, dass not yoa kuleana. Go awready. No aks mo question. Cuz all dis stuff stay secret till da world pa
12.11: âFrom da time da bad leada guy no let da peopo make sacrifices fo ery day, an put up da idol kine gods dat God hate plenny inside da Temple, an mess up eryting an make erybody go way from dea, goin be 1,290 days.
12.12: But da peopo dat can wait, an hang in dea till da end a da 1,335 days, dey goin stay good insid
12.13: An you, Daniel, go do yoa work till da time you mahke. Den you goin res. An wen da world pau, you goin come back alive an get yoa share a da good tings God get fo his peopo.â

1.1: Had one guy Jonah. His fadda, Amitai. One time, Yahweh wen tell Jonah fo talk fo him. An dis wat Yahweh wen tell Jonah:
1.2: âNo wait! Go Nineveh town now, da main town Assyria side. Tell all da peopo ova dea, I know awready, all da pilau kine stuff dey stay do.â
1.3: But Jonah, he neva lissen. He wen go da odda way from Yahweh fo go ova dea Tarshish side (dass Spain, you know). He go down Joppa boat harbor an find one big boat dat goin go Tarshish. He pay da money fo go, an he go on top da boat fo go Tarshish wit da saila guys. He tink he can go far way from Yahwe
1.4: Wen dey was going, Yahweh, he wen make one bite-hard wind come on top da sea. Da storm come on top da watta so strong, da boat litto mo bus up.
1.5: Da saila guys, dey plenny scared. Ery one a dem wen yell fo help to dea own gods. Dey wen throw out da stuffs from da boat fo make um not so heavy, so mo easy fo handle. All dat time, Jonah, he stay down inside da bottom part a da boat. He wen lay down inside dea an go pass out sleep.
1.6: Da captain go by Jonah an yell at him, âEh! Wassa matta you? How come you sleeping lidat?! Get up an tell yoa god fo help us! Den maybe yoa god goin tink fo help us guys, so we no wipe out!â
1.7: Da saila guys, dey tell each odda, âEh, good fo us if we can find out who da guy dat wen make one god mad, an make dis bad ting come to us guys. We go pull straw fo find out who him, yeah?â Dey wen pull straw, an Jonah, he da one wen los
1.8: Dey tell Jonah, âKay den. You da guy dat wen make dis bad ting come to us guys. So tell us, who you, an wat kine work you do? Wea you come from? Wat country you come from? Wat yoa peopo?â
1.9: Jonah tell um, âMe, I one Hebrew guy. I get love an respeck fo Yahweh, da God Up Dea Inside Da Sky. He da One wen make da sea an da land.
1.10: An I stay running away from him.â
1.11: Da waves, dey stay coming mo big erytime. So da saila guys tell Jonah, âEh! Wat we gotta do to you, so yoa god make da sea come quiet aroun us guys?â
1.12: Jonah tell um, âTake me ova dea an throw me inside da sea. Den da sea goin come quiet fo you guys. Cuz I know dis big storm wen come to you guys cuz a me.â
1.13: Da saila guys, dey try firs fo row da boat back to da land. But dey no can, cuz da storm stay coming mo big all aroun dem.
1.14: Den dey wen yell fo help to Jonah's god Yahweh. Dey say, âEh Yahweh! Please, no let us guys wipe out jus cuz we goin kill dis guy! If he neva do bad ting, an we kill um, please let go us guys! Cuz you Yahweh, an was you dat wen make all dis happen, not us guys. So no blame us!â
1.15: Den da saila guys wen pick up Jonah an throw him inside da sea. Right den an dea, da sea wen stop moving aroun an come quie
1.16: Da saila guys, dey real scared a Yahweh, cuz he fo real, an dey like show him plenny respeck. So dey wen kill one animal fo make sacrifice to him, an dey make plenny serious kine promise, wat dey goin do fo him bumby
1.17: Yahweh, he wen make ready one mangus fish fo swallow Jonah. An den Jonah stay inside da fish opu, three days an three nite

3.2: âNo wait! Go Nineveh town, da main town Assyria side. Tell da peopo ova dea all da tings I stay telling you now.â
3.3: So Jonah, right den an dea he wen go Nineveh, jalike Yahweh wen tell um fo d
3.4: Wen Jonah get dea, he start fo go hea an dea inside da town. He walk fo one whole day. He talk so erybody can hear: âOny get forty days mo from now, God goin wipe out Nineveh town!â
3.5: Da Nineveh peopo, dey believe wat God wen say. Dey tell everybody, âAuwe! All us guys betta no eat food so we can pray!â Da importan peopo an da regula kine peopo, everybody wen put on burm bag kine clotheses fo show dey stay sorry insid
3.6: Den da king fo Nineveh, he wen hear bout wat Jonah stay tell too. He stand up from his throne, take off his fancy king kine robe, an put on burm bag kine clotheses an go sit down on top da ashes, fo show he stay sorry inside.
3.7: Da king wen send guys all ova Nineveh town fo tell da peopo fo come togedda. Da animals no can eat grass o drink watta.
3.8: Erybody gotta put on burm bag kine clotheses, all da peopo an da animals, fo show dey stay sorry inside, same same. Erybody gotta go all out fo yell fo help to God. Erybody gotta pau do bad kine tings! Erybody gotta stop hurting odda peopo!
3.9: Nobody know if God goin change his mind bumbye. He no take da kine tings us guys stay doing, but maybe he goin show pity an change his mind so us guys no goin wipe out bumbye!â

4.1: Wen bodda Jonah plenny, cuz God wen change his mind. Jonah wen come real huhu wit God cuz a dat.
4.2: Jonah wen pray to Yahweh lidis: âAuwe, Yahweh! You know, all dis wen happen jalike I wen say wen I wen stay my own country! Dass why quick I wen run away fo go Tarshish side, you know. I know dat you da kine God dat like do good tings fo peopo an show pity fo dem. Take long time befo you come huhu. You stay tight wit yoa peopo long time an give um chance. Dass why you change yoa mind an no punish da bad kine stuff peopo do.
4.3: You, you Yahweh! Kill me now, cuz mo betta I mahke den stay alive!â
4.4: But Yahweh tell Jonah, âSo? You tink dass good fo you, fo stay huhu cuz da Nineveh peopo wen come sorry fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do, o wat?â
4.5: So, afta Jonah tell da Nineveh peopo wat God tell him, Jonah go outside Nineveh town, an he stay ova dea da east side. He wen build one shack ova dea, so he get shade an wait fo find out wat goin happen wit da peopo inside da town.
4.6: God Yahweh, he wen make one tall plant come up dea an make leaf go all ova Jonah's head fo make shade, so make um not too bad fo Jonah. An he stay plenny good inside cuz a da plant.
4.7: But da nex day, wen still yet litto bit dark jus befo da sun come up, God wen make one army worm go up da plant. Da army worm wen go afta da bush an make um come all poho.
4.8: Den, wen da sun come hot, God wen make one hot wind come from da east side. Da sun wen shine real strong on top Jonah's head, an he litto mo pass out. Jonah wen tell God, âWhy you no jus let me mahke?! Mo betta fo me mahke den stay alive!â
4.9: God, he tell Jonah, âSo! You tink dass good you stay huhu cuz da plant gone awrede?!â
4.10: But Yahweh wen tell Jonah: âKay den. One nite dat plant wen come up, an anodda nite, da plant wen come poho. You, you neva work notting fo make da plant come up, an you neva do notting fo make um grow. Still yet, you neva like see notting bad happen to dat plant, yea
4.11: âSo now, tink bout me. You tink dass good, o no good, cuz I no like see notting bad happen to all da peopo inside dat big town Nineveh?! Get mo den hundred twenny tousan peopo inside dea, you know, plus all dea animals. An da peopo dea, dey donno notting bout wass right an wass wrong, jalike dey donno wass dea right hand an wass dea left hand! An den!â

But me, I neva come fo tell da guys dat everytime do wat God say fo come by me fo be my guys, but I wen come fo da peopo dat get bad name.â

9.15: Jesus tell um, âWat you tink? You go one wedding an hang yoa face an cry wen da guy dat getting married stay dea? Not! Bumbye, da time goin come wen dey goin take away da guy dat getting married, an den, dat time, his friends goin skip foo
9.16: âFo fix up one old puka clothes, you no goin take one new piece cloth dat no shrink yet fo cover da puka. You do dat, den wen you go wash um, da new piece goin shrink an make one mo big puka, an you make da old clothes mo worse.
9.17: Same ting, you no goin put grape juice fo make wine inside one old kine leather bag an close um fo let um ferment. You do dat, da new wine goin ferment an bus da old wine bag, an da wine goin spill out. Da old leather no good no moa. Mo betta, you put da grape juice inside one new kine leather bag. Den da wine an da bag stay good.â
9.18: He stay talking to dem, an one leada guy wen go dea an go down in front Jesus, an say, âMy girl jus wen mahke. Try come an put yoa hand on top her. Den she goin come back alive.â
9.19: Jesus wen go wit him, an da guys he teaching wen go too.
9.20-21: An you know wat? Ova dea, had one wahine who stay bleeding twelve years. She tink, âIf I ony touch Jesus clotheses, I know I goin come good.â Dass why she go behind Jesus, an wen touch his clothese
9.22: Jesus wen turn aroun, an wen spock her behind him, an he say, âSista, make strong! You trus me, dass why you come good awready.â Right den an dea she wen come goo
9.23: Jesus wen come near da leada guy's house, an see da guys playing funeral kine music. Everybody stay making big noise an crying plenny.
9.24: He tell um, âEverybody go way! Da girl neva mahke, she ony sleeping.â But da peopo make fun a him.

9.26: Da peopo all ova da place ova dea hear bout di

9.28: Wen Jesus go inside his house, da blind guys go inside dea too. Jesus tell um, âFo real kine, you guys trus me, dat I can make you guys see?â
9.29: Den he touch dea eyes an say, âDa way you guys trus me, dass how goin be.â
9.30: An right den an dea dey wen see. Den Jesus tell um strait, âYou guys betta not tell nobody notting bout dis.â
9.31: But dey wen go all ova da place an tell everybod

9.33: Jesus make da bad kine spirit let um go, an den da guy can talk. All da peopo, wen blow dea minds. Dey say, âUs Israel peopo, we neva see dis kine stuff happen befo!â
9.34: But da Pharisee guys stay telling, âDis bugga stay tight wit da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, da Devil, you know. Dass why he can make um let go da peopo!â
9.35: Jesus go aroun all da big an small towns, an he teach inside da Jewish churches. He teach da Good Kine Stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an he make all da sick guys an da guys dat not strong come good.
9.36: He look all da peopo, an he get love an aloha an pity fo dem, cuz dey all worn out inside an no can help demself. Dey jalike da sheeps dat no mo one sheep farma fo take care de
9.37: So den he tell his guys, âEh! Da peopo jalike da crop. Get plenny crop fo bring inside, but no mo nuff worka guys fo do um.
9.38: Dass why you guys gotta aks da boss guy who own da crop fo send da worka guys fo bring um in.â

10.1: Jesus tell his twelve guys fo come togedda wit him, an he give um da power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo dat dey wen take ova, an fo make all kine sick peopo come good.
10.2: Dis da twelve guys he send all ova da place: Simon, da one dey name Peter, an Andrew his brudda; James, dass Zebedee boy, an John, dass James brudda;
10.3: Philip an Bartolomew; Thomas an Matthew, dass da guy befo time dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen; James, dass Alfeus boy, an Taddeus;
10.4: da odda guy name Simon, he from da Jewish sovereignty guys; an Judas Iscariot, dass da guy dat goin set up Jesus fo mahke bumby
10.5: Jesus send da twelve guys all ova, an he tell um, âNo go wea da peopo dat not Jews stay, an no go wea da Samaria peopo stay,
10.6: but go by da peopo from Israel ohana, cuz dey jalike sheeps dat stay lost.
10.7: An wen you guys go, teach lidis, âGod, da King from da sky, he stay King hea now.â
10.8: Make da sick guys come good, make da mahke guys come back alive again, make da lepa guys come good, an make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo. God give you guys plenny, an he no expeck notting back. So den, you guys give plenny too, an you guys no expeck notting back.
10.9: Gold, o silva, o copper money, no take um wit you guys.
10.10: No even take one bag fo da trip, o extra clothes, o slippas, o walking stick; cuz da peopo suppose to give da worka guy wat he nee
10.11: âWen you guys go inside one big o small town, look fo one guy dea dat da peopo get respeck fo, an stay his place till you go way from dea.
10.12: Wen you guys go inside da guy's house, tell um you dea fo bring aloha.
10.13: An if dat ohana give you guys respeck, den tell dem you like fo God make dea hearts rest inside. But if dey no give respeck, take back wat you aks God fo do fo dem.
10.14: If no mo nobody take you guys in, an dey no like hear wat you say, wen you go outa dea, dust da dust from yoa feet, fo show da peopo dea dat God no like, cuz dey no lissen.
10.15: Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: wen dey stand in front God da Judge, dey goin get mo hard time den da peopo from Sodom town an Gomorrah town, dat time God wen wipe um ou
10.16: âYou know, I sending you guys out jalike sheeps, an you guys goin go wea da wild wolfs stay. So you guys gotta tink, jalike da snakes, an no hurt nobody, jalike da doves.
10.17: Watch out fo da guys dat goin set you up in front da main leadas, an goin whip yoa back hard inside da Jewish churches.
10.18: Dey goin drag you guys in front governas an kings cuz you my guys. Den you guys goin tell wat you know bout me in front dem, an in front da peopos dat not Jews.
10.19: Wen dey set you guys up lidat, no worry wat you goin say o how you goin say um. Ony say wat yoa Fadda goin tell you right den.
10.20: Dat time goin be his Spirit talking, not you guy
10.21: âOne brudda goin set up his own brudda fo mahke, an one fadda his kid, an kids goin fight wit dea mudda an fadda, an dey goin set um up fo mahke.
10.22: Everybody goin hate you guys cuz you my guys. But da guy dat no give up till pau goin come out oka
10.23: âWen da guys inside one town make you guys suffa, go way from dea, den go one nodda town. Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I goin come back befo you guys even can go all da towns Israel sid
10.24: âDa teacha, he mo importan den da guy learning. Da boss, he mo importan den da worka.
10.25: Da guy learning goin feel good inside if bumbye he can come jalike his teacha, an da worka guy come jalike his boss. If dey call da head guy inside da house âDa Devil,â den dey goin call his ohana âDa Devil Guysâ an even mo worse ting
10.26: âNo scared dem. Da tings dey cover an hide, everybody goin know an see.
10.27: Wat I telling you guys in da dark, tell um wea get light too. An wat I wispa in yoa ear, stand on top da house an yell um out.
10.28: No scared da guys dat can make yoa body mahke, but no can make yoa spirit mahke. But you guys betta be scared God. He can make yoa body an yoa spirit get cut off from God inside Hell.
10.29: Dey sell two sparrow birds in da market fo one penny. But not even one sparrow bird goin fall down from da sky on top da groun if yoa Fadda no like.
10.30: Yoa Fadda, he even know how much hairs you get on top yoa head!
10.31: No scared! Cuz God know you guys worth mo den plenny sparrow bird
10.32: âIf get one guy dat tell in front all da peopo dat he know me, den I goin tell in front my Fadda in da sky dat I know him.
10.33: But if get one guy dat tell in front da peopo dat he donno me, den I goin tell in front my Fadda in da sky dat I donno hi
10.34: âNo tink dat I come hea to dis world fo make everybody come friends an no fight. I no come fo do dat, but fo make um turn agains each odda.
10.35: I come an I hea now, an jalike da Bible wen say from befo time, âDat goin make one guy turn agains his fadda, one girl agains her mudda, one daughta-in-law agains her mudda-in-law.
10.36: You goin get guys dat hate you inside yoa own ohana.â
10.37: âWhoeva get love fo his fadda o his mudda mo den he get love fo me, not good nuff fo be my guy. An whoeva get love fo his boy o his girl mo den he get love fo me, not good nuff fo be my guy.
10.38: Da guy dat not ready fo go wit me an be my guy, no matta dey even goin kill um on top one cross, he not good nuff fo be my guy.
10.39: If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do everyting you do fo me, an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kin
10.40: âAnybody take you guys in an make friends wit you guys, same guys, dey goin take me in, an I goin make friends wit dem. Anybody take me in an make friends wit me, same guys, dey goin take in da One dat wen send me, an he goin make friends wit dem.
10.41: Whoeva take in one guy dat talk fo God an make friends wit him, jus cuz he talk fo God, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo dem, jalike dey was God's talka guy too. Whoeva take in one good guy an make friends wit him, jus cuz he one good guy, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo dem, jalike dey was one good guy too.
10.42: Whoeva give one guy dat I teaching hea even one drink cold water, jus cuz he one guy I stay teaching, no matta he ony one regula guy, I tell you guys fo shua, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo him.â

11.1: Wen Jesus pau tell his twelve guys wat dey gotta do an wea dey gotta go, he send um all ova da place, an den he go way from ova dea fo go teach inside da odda town

11.11: âDass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: From all da peopo dat wen live befo time, no mo nobody mo importan den John Da Baptiza Guy. But den now, even da mostes small kine guy dat get God fo his King, he mo importan den Joh
11.12: âFrom da first time John Da Baptiza Guy wen start fo teach till now, da King's ohana stay coming mo an mo strong. An get guys dat like try beef, fo take um ova.

11.18: âSame ting, wen John Da Baptiza Guy show up, he no eat notting so he can pray plenny, an he no drink wine. Dass how come peopo say, âEh, he get one bad kine spirit in charge a him!â
11.19: Eh, but try go figga dis: Me, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I eat, I drink, an dey say, âYou know wat? Dis guy everytime eating an drinking! He friends wit da guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, an da odda kine peopo dat get bad name, jalike dem.â But eh! you know wat? Da guy who get da smarts from God, da tings he do, goin make proof dat he right.â
11.20: Den Jesus wen scold da peopo from all da towns wea he wen show his power, cuz dey not sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey doing, an dey no stop doing um.
11.21: He say, âAuwe, you guys from Korazin town, an you guys from Betsaida town! Eh, I neva show my power fo da Tyre an Sidon guys like I wen do um fo you guys. If I wen go do dat, awready dem guys wen come sorry from long time an stop doing um, an dey wen show dey shame fo all dat -- dey wen go put on one gunny bag, an go throw ash on top dea head, so everybody know dey sorry.
11.22: But I telling you guys now, bumbye goin be mo easy fo da Tyre an Sidon guys wen dey gotta stand in front God da Judge, den fo you guy
11.24: But I telling you guys, bumbye goin be mo easy fo da Sodom guys wen dey stand in front God da Judge, den fo you guys.â
11.25: Dat time Jesus say, âGod, you my Fadda. You da Boss all ova da sky an da world. Mahalo plenny, eh, cuz you show dis kine stuff to da kids an hide um from da smart guys dat know plenny.
11.26: Yeah, you my Fadda, an dass how you like um happen.â
11.27: Den he tell dem, âMy Fadda give me everyting, you know. I his Boy, dass why. Nobody know me like my Fadda know me. An nobody know my Fadda fo real kine, ony me, I know him, cuz I his Boy. An da peopo I like show my Fadda, dey can know him fo real kine to
11.28: âAll you guys dat stay tired from working hard, an stay trying fo handle all da heavy kine stuff dat da Rules say, come! Come ova hea by me. I make you guys rest now.
11.29: Jalike da oxes get yoke on top dem fo pull da load, you guys put my yoke on top you, an go learn fo do wat I teaching you. I stay gentle an I like take care peopo befo me, so yoa hearts goin rest inside.
11.30: Cuz my yoke real good, an my load real easy.â

12.1: Had one time, was da Jewish Rest Day, an Jesus an his guys wen walk thru da fields wea dey grow da wheat. His guys was real hungry. Dey wen pick litto bit wheat fo eat.
12.2: But had Pharisee guys ova dea dat wen see um do dat, an dey tell Jesus, âEh, how come! Dese guys, you teaching dem, but still yet dey stay doing da kine stuff dey not suppose to do on da Rest Day!â
12.3: Jesus tell um, âWot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat King David wen do, da time wen him an his guys was hungry?
12.4: He go inside God's spesho house, an eat da bread dass spesho fo God. But no can do dat kine, cuz God's Rules say dat ony da pries guys can eat um. But David, he eat um, an he give um to his guys too cuz dey hungry, an dass okay.
12.5: Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible how da pries guys inside da temple gotta do tings on da Rest Day dat go agains da God's Rules? But wen dey do um, dey no broke God's Rules.
12.6: I tell you strait, get one guy ova hea mo importan den dat temple. Dass me!
12.7: Da Bible say, âI like my peopo make good to each odda an give each odda chance. Dat mo betta den jus make sacrifice inside da temple.â If you guys wen know wat dis mean, den you guys no say dey wen broke God's Rules, cuz dey neva.
12.8: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I da one, da boss fo da Rest Day.â
12.9: Wen Jesus go way, he go inside da Jewish church.
12.10: An you know wat? Get one guy dea, his hand stay all any kine. Dey aks Jesus, âStay okay fo make um come good on da Rest Day, o wat?â Dey say dat cuz dey like bus u
12.11: He tell um, âIf one a you guys get one sheep dat fall down inside one hole on da Rest Day, you goin grab um an pull um out, yeah?
12.12: You tink one sheep mo importan den one guy? So, az okay fo do good kine stuff on da Rest Day.â
12.13: Den he tell da guy wit da hand dat stay all any kine, âStick out yoa hand.â An da guy stick um out, an da hand wen come good, jalike da odda hand.
12.14: But da Pharisee guys, dey go outside fo make plan togedda how dey goin kill Jesu
12.15: Jesus wen know wat dey talking bout, so he go way from ova dea. Choke peopo go wit him, an he make all da sick peopo come good.
12.16: He tell dem dey betta not tell da odda guys who him.
12.17: Wen he do dis, dat make um happen jalike Isaiah wen say. (He da guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago, you know.) He sa
12.22: Dey bring one guy dat get one bad kine spirit dat take ova him. Da guy no can see o talk, cuz da spirit no let um. An Jesus make da spirit let go da guy, an make da guy come good, so he can talk an see.
12.23: Da peopo, blow dea minds, an dey say, âEh, dis da guy from King David ohana dat da Bible wen talk bout befo time, o wat?â
12.24: Da Pharisee guys hear dat, an dey say, âNah! Was Beelzebul, da Devil. He da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, you know, an he da one wen give dis guy da power fo make da spirit let go da guy, az why!â
12.25: Jesus wen know wat dey tinking. He tell um, âDa country dat beef each odda, dey ony bus up dea own self. Da town o da ohana dat beef each odda, no can stay strong.

12.27: If dea boss give me power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, who give yoa guys dat kine power? Den wat? Yoa own guys goin show dat you guys stay wrong!
12.28: But if I make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo cuz I get power from God's Spirit, dat show dat God stay King, an he taking ova, ova hea no
12.29: How you tink one guy goin go bus inside one big moke house an rip off his stuffs? First, he gotta tie up da moke! Den can steal everyting.
12.30: If you no stay wit me, den you stay agains me. Da guy dat no work wit me, he ony work agains me.
12.31: Dass why I telling you guys, God can let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo all da kine bad stuff dey doing, no matta dey talk stink. But if dey talk stink bout God's Good an Spesho Spirit, he no goin let um go an hemo da shame fo dat.
12.32: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Whoeva talk agains me, God goin let um go an hemo da shame fo dat. But whoeva talk agains God's Good an Spesho Spirit, God no goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo dat, now o foev
12.33: âYou gotta figga lidis: Wen da tree good, den da fruit good. Wen da tree junk, den da fruit junk. Cuz da fruit goin show if da tree stay good o junk.

Cuz she wen come from far away fo lissen King Solomon an all da smart stuff he wen say. But you guys neva lissen. An one guy mo importan den Solomon stay ova hea wit you guys now. Dass m

13.1: Same day Jesus go outside da house, an sit down near da lake fo teach.
13.2: Plenny peopo come aroun him, so he go inside one small boat, an sit down dea. Da peopo, dey stay standing on top da beach.
13.3: He use plenny stories fo teach um. Dis wat he sa
13.4: He throw da seeds fo plant. Some fall down by da side a da trail, an da birds go eat um up.
13.5: Some fall down on top da rocks wea ony had litto bit dirt. But dey grow up fast, cuz ony litto bit dirt dea.
13.6: Wen da sun come up, da plants burn, an dry up, cuz no mo root.
13.7: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da kine bushes wit kukus. Da bushes wen grow. Dat wen choke da plants.
13.8: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey grow good, an come up plenny. Some seed, dey make thirty times mo seed, some odda seed make sixty times mo seed, an odda even make hundred times mo seed.â
13.9: Jesus say, âIf you guys hear dis, den tink bout um!â

13.11: He say, âGod let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King in da sky. But da odda guys, he no let dem know all dat kine stuff.
13.12: If you guys undastan all dat kine stuff, den God goin let you know moa, plenny moa. But if you guys no like know all dat stuff, den even da litto bit you know, he goin take um away.
13.13: Dass why use stories fo I teach um, c
13.14: Dey ack jalike da guys Isaiah wen talk bout befo time. He sa

13.17: Dass fo shua. An I like tell you guys dis too: Long time ago plenny guys who wen talk fo God an plenny guys who wen do da right tings like see da stuff you guys see, but neva see um. An dey like hear da stuff you guys hear, but neva hear u
13.18: âLissen! Dis wat da story bout da farma mean.

13.20: Da seed dat fall down on top da rocks, dass jalike one guy dat hear da good kine stuff, an he trus wat God tell him right den an dea, an he stay good inside.

26.1: Afta Jesus pau teach all dis stuff, he tell his guys,

26.3: Dat time, da main pries guys an da older leadas fo da peopo wen come togedda inside da Head Priest guy palace. Kaiafas, he da Head Priest dat time.
26.4: Dey say, âHow we goin trick Jesus so we can bus um? Den we can kill um.â
26.5: Dey say, âWe no can do um wen get da Passova time, cuz bumbye da peopo goin make big noise an fight.â
26.6: Jesus was Simon's house, inside Betany town. Simon, he was one lepa guy befo time.
26.7: Wen Jesus stay eating ova dea, had one wahine dat wen bring one fancy bottle made from alabaster rock. Inside had da kine fancy perfume dat cost plenny. She wen put da perfume on top his head wen he was eating.
26.8: Jesus guys wen see dat, an dey wen come all huhu. Dey say, âHow come she throw way her money lidat?
26.9: How come she neva sell dat perfume fo plenny money, an give um to da peopo dat no mo notting?â
26.10: Wen Jesus wen know wat dey saying, he tell um, âHow come you guys give dis wahine hard time? Eh! No bodda her! She wen do dis fo me wit plenny aloha.
26.11: Everytime goin get poor peopo stay wit you guys, but I no goin stay wit you guys everytime, you know.
26.12: Wen she wen put dis perfume on top me, dis wen make me ready fo wen dey goin bury me.
26.13: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: weaevas my guys goin teach da Good Kine Stuff Bout Me, all ova da whole world, dey goin tell wat dis wahine wen do, an da peopo goin rememba her.â
26.14: Den Judas Iscariot wen go talk to da main pries guys. He one a Jesus twelve guys.
26.15: He aks um, âEh, how much money you guys goin give me if I set him up fo you guys?â So dey make one deal an give him thirty silva coins.
26.16: From den Judas wen look fo one chance fo set Jesus u
26.17: Every year, get one week jus fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast. Dass da time wen dey no put yeast inside da bread fo make um come big. On da first day, Jesus guys wen go by him an aks um, âWea you like us make da stuff ready fo you fo eat da Passova kine food?â
26.18: He say, âGo by dis one guy inside town. Tell um, âDa Teacha say: Time awready fo me. I like eat da Passova food wit my guys inside yoa house.â-â
26.19: So da guys wen do jalike he wen tell um, an dey make da food ready fo da Passova dinn
26.20: Afta da sun go down, Jesus sit down fo eat wit his twelve guys.
26.21: Dey eating, an he say, âI tell you guys fo shua, one a you guys goin set me up.â
26.22: Dey come real sad, an each guy tell um, one afta da odda, âBoss, eh, fo shua you not talking bout me, yeah?â
26.23: Jesus say, âDa guy who wen put his piece bread inside da same sauce wit me, he da guy dat goin set me up.
26.24: I da Guy Who Fo Real. I goin mahke jalike da Bible wen say befo time. But auwe! Da guy who goin set me up goin get it! Mo betta he neva been born!â
26.25: Judas, da guy who goin set him up, he say, âTeacha, eh, fo shua you not talking bout me, yeah?â
26.26: Dey eating, an Jesus take one piece bread an tell God he good heart fo give peopo food. He broke da bread, an give um to his guys. He tell um, âTake dis an eat um. Dis hea, my body.â
26.27: Den Jesus wen take da cup, an tell God âMahalo plenny!â an give um to his guys. He say, âAll you guys, drink dis.
26.28: Dis hea, my blood fo make solid da new deal dat God making. Dey goin kill me, an my blood goin come out from my body jalike wen dey kill one sacrifice. Dat goin help plenny peopo, so God can let um go an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey do.
26.29: An I telling you guys, afta dis, I no goin drink dis kine wine, till da time come wen we all stay togedda wea my Fadda stay King. Dat time, I goin drink da new kine wine wit you guys.â
26.30: Jesus dem wen sing one song fo tell God âMahalo,â an wen go by Olive Ridg
26.31: Ova dea, Jesus tell um, âAll you guys goin bum out cuz you no can handle da shame fo wat goin happen to me tonite. Cuz God wen say befo time inside da Bible, âI goin kill da sheep farma, an all his sheeps goin run all ova da place.â
26.32: But I goin come back alive afta I mahke, an den, I going Galilee side. Den you guys goin go by me ova dea.â
26.33: Den Peter say, âEh, no way, Boss! No matta all da odda guys bum out an like go way from you, eh, no way I eva goin do dat!â
26.34: Jesus tell him, âYou tink so? I tell you dis: Befo da roosta make noise early today, three times you goin say dat you donno who me.â
26.35: But Peter tell him, âNo way! Not even! No matta I gotta mahke wit you, no way I goin say I donno who you!â An all da odda guys say same tin
26.36: Den Jesus dem go da place dey call Getsemane. He tell da guys, âSit down ova hea an wait. I going ova dea fo pray.â
26.37: He take Peter an da two Zebedee boys wit him. Den he wen come real sore inside, an he get plenny stress inside him.
26.38: He tell um, âEh, you know, my heart stay real sad, jalike I goin mahke. No go sleep -- stay ova hea wit me.â
26.39: He go mo down, an go down on top da groun, an talk to God lidis: âEh, God, you my Fadda. If you can, no let me suffa lidis. But if no can, dass okay. I like do um da way you like me do um.â
26.40: He go back by his guys, an dey stay sleeping. He tell Peter, âSo, wat? You guys no can stay up wit me fo ony one hour?
26.41: Hang in dea an aks God fo help you, so you no go do da bad kine stuff wen you get chance. You know, inside, I know you guys like do da right ting, but you guys no can do um, cuz you guys no stay strong inside.â
26.42: Den Jesus go talk to God one mo time, an say, âFadda, if dis kine suffa no can go way from me, ony if I take um, az okay, I still yet do um. I like do um da way you like me do um.â
26.43: Jesus come back, an his guys stay sleeping again, cuz dea eyes no can stay open.
26.44: So he go way from dem one mo time, an talk to God one mo time, an he say da same tings jalike bef

26.46: Get up! We go by dem now. Da guy who wen set me up stay hea now awready.â
26.47: Wen Jesus still talking, Judas, one a his twelve guys, wen come ova dea. Had plenny odda guys wit him. Dey carry swords an clubs. Da main pries guys, an da older leadas, dey da guys who wen send um.
26.48: Now, befo time, Judas wen tell um, âDa guy I goin kiss, az da guy. Grab um an tell da police guys fo take um!â
26.49: So Judas wen go by Jesus an say, âAloha, Teacha!â an wen kiss u
26.50: Jesus wen tell um, âMy friend, do wat you wen come ova hea fo do.â Den da odda guys come an grab Jesus an take u
26.51: An you know wat? One a Jesus guys wen grab his sword an hit one guy dat work fo da Head Priest, an cut off one a his ears.
26.52: Jesus tell him, âPut away yoa sword. Everybody who use his sword fo beef goin die from da sword.
26.53: Tink bout dis: right now I can aks my Fadda fo help, an he goin send me mo den twelve armies a angel guys.
26.54: But gotta happen dis way, so dat da tings da Bible wen say befo time, goin happen.â
26.55: Right den an dea he tell all da peopo, âYou guys tink I one crook, o wat? You guys tink you gotta come afta me wit swords an clubs fo bus me? Eh, I was wit you guys teaching inside da temple yard every day, an you neva bus me dat time.
26.56: But all dis gotta happen, jalike da guys dat wen talk fo God wen write inside da Bible.â Den all his guys wen bag, an he stay dea all by himsel
26.57: Da guys who wen bus Jesus wen bring um in front Kaiafas, da Head Priest guy. Ova dea da teacha guys who teach God's Rules an da older leadas fo da peopo wen come togedda.

26.59: Da main pries guys an all da main leadas wen try fo find guys fo bulai bout Jesus in front da judge, so da leada guys can kill Jesus.
26.60: Plenny guys come an try bulai bout Jesus, but still yet dey no can find nobody dat say wat da leada guys like. In da end two guys wen come.
26.61: Dey say, âEh, dis bugga wen tell peopo, âI can broke down God's temple, an den, befo three days pau, I goin build um up again.â-â
26.62: Den da Head Priest guy wen stand up an say, âEh, you no hear wat dese guys saying bout you? You no goin say notting, o wat?â
26.63: But Jesus no talk. So da Head Priest guy tell him, âEh, you! You gotta swear to God bout dis. Tell us in front da God who stay alive fo real kine! Tell us dat, if you da Christ guy dat God suppose to send. You God's Boy, o wat?â
26.64: Den Jesus tell um, âYou da guy wen jus say dat. I even telling you guys, bumbye you guys goin see me, sitting down on top da spesho place by da God Who Get All Da Power, right dea on his right side. An I goin come back on top da clouds inside da sky. Den you goin see me, I da Guy Who Fo Real.â
26.65: Den da Head Priest guy wen rip his own clothes cuz he wen come real mad, fo show dat he tink Jesus wen talk stink bout God. He say, âWat you guys tink now? No need mo plenny guys fo tell wat dey wen see an hear bout him, yeah? You guys wen hear da bad kine stuff he say bout God!
26.67: Den dey spit on top Jesus face, an punch him, an some guys slap his head wit dea hand.
26.68: Dey tell Jesus, âEh you, da Christ guy! If you one talka fo God, tell us who wen wack you!â
26.69: All dis time Peter stay sitting outside da house, inside da yard. Had one girl who work fo da Head Priest guy wen go by him, an say, âEh, you was wit Jesus too, yeah? da bugga from Galilee side, aah?â
26.70: But he tell everybody, âNo way! I donno wat you talking bout!â
26.71: Den he go ova dea by da gate, an had one nodda girl dat work ova dea, she wen spock him. She tell da guys who standing ova dea, âHey! Dis da bugga was wit Jesus, you know, da guy from Nazaret town!â
26.72: Den Peter say, âNot! I swear to God, I donno who dat!â
26.73: Den bumbye, da guys who was standing near Peter say, âYeah! You one a dem guys too! You talk jalike you from dat place!â
26.74: Peter swear real bad, an den he say, âGod punish me if I no tell you da trut: I donno who dat!â Right den an dea, da roosta wen make big nois
26.75: Den Peter rememba wat Jesus wen say, âBefo da roosta make noise, three times you goin say you donno who me.â So den he wen go outside an broke down an bus out cryin

27.4: He tell um, âEh, I wen do someting wrong! I wen set up one guy dat neva do notting!â

27.6: Den da main pries guys take da thirty silva coins. Dey say, âNo good we put dis money inside da place wea da peopo give money fo da temple, cuz dis wen pay fo somebody's blood.â
27.7: So dey figga dis: âWe go buy da land from da guy dat make clay pots, yeah? Den if somebody come from far away, an mahke, an nobody know who him, we can bury um ova dea inside dat field.â

27.9: Dis wen happen jalike Jeremiah wen say befo time. He da guy dat wen talk fo God, an he wen say, âHad some Israel peopo dat wen say, âWe give thirty silva coins fo dis guy.â
27.10: Dey talk wit da guy who make clay pots, an dey give him da coins fo his field, jalike da Boss wen tell me fo do.â Dass wat Jeremiah wen sa

27.14: An still yet Jesus neva say notting. So Pilate start fo try figga dis gu

27.17: So wen all da peopo come togedda, Pilate aks um, âWho you guys like me let go fo you? Barabbas, o Jesus da guy dey call da Christ guy, dat dey say God wen send um?â
27.18: Now, Pilate know dat da leada guys wen give Jesus to him cuz dey so mad at Jesus, cuz everybody lissen to him, not de

27.20: But da main pries guys an da older leadas wen presha da peopo fo say dis: âKill Jesus awready! We like Barabbas!â
27.21: Governa Pilate wen aks one mo time, âGet two guys ova hea. Which one you like me let go?â
27.22: So Pilate aks um, âDen wat I goin do wit Jesus, da Christ guy, dat dey say God wen send?â
27.23: But Pilate say, âHow come? Wat kine bad ting he wen do?â
27.24: Den Pilate know he no can make dem change dea minds, cuz da peopo was bussing up da place awready. So he take da water an wash his hands in front da peopo. He say, âYou guys no can blame me fo wateva you guys do to dis guy! Dass you guys problem!â

27.27: Den da army guys dat work fo da governa wen take Jesus inside da palace, an dey tell all da odda army guys fo come by dem.

27.30: An dey spit on top him, an take da stick an wack him on top his head plenny times.

27.48: One guy wen run an put one sponge inside da sour wine, an put um on top one bamboo, an try give um to Jesus fo drin

27.54: So da captain fo da army guys an da odda guys dat was guarding Jesus too, dey wen see da groun shaking, an everyting dat stay happening, an dey come real scared, an dey say, âFo real kine, dis was God's Boy!â

27.59: Joseph take down da body from da cross, an wrap um up inside one clean cloth,
27.60: an put um inside his own new tomb, da one dat was awready cut inside da rock. Dey push one big rock in front da hole fo close um. An dey go way.
27.61: Mary from Magdala an da odda Mary stay sitting ova dea on da odda side. Dass wea dey can see da tom
27.62: Da nex day, afta da Make Ready Day fo da Passova time, da main pries guys an da Pharisee guys come togedda in front Pilate.
27.63: Dey say, âEh Governa, us guys rememba, wen dat fake guy still alive, he tell, âAfta three days I goin come back alive again.â
27.64: So us guys tinking, try put some guards in front da tomb fo three days, so dat his guys no can come an steal his body. Cuz if dey do dat, den dey goin tell da peopo, âTry look! He wen come back alive from mahke.â An den dis fake ting goin be mo worse den da first fake ting, wen he wen tell he da Christ guy.â

28.1: Afta da Rest Day pau, was da first day in da week. An ony get litto bit light inside da sky. Dat time, Mary from Magdala an da odda Mary wen go da tomb fo loo
28.2: Right den an dea, da groun wen shake real hard all ova, cuz one angel messenja guy from da Boss come down from inside da sky. He push da big rock away from da opening part, an wen sit down on top da rock.
28.3: He look jalike da light from da lightning, an his clotheses was real white jalike da snow.
28.4: Da police guards stay so scared a da angel, dey stay shaking all ova, an dey look jalike mahke kine guy
28.5: Da angel guy tell da wahines, âEh, no scared! I know you guys looking fo Jesus, da guy dey wen kill on top da cross.
28.6: Eh, he no stay ova hea, cuz God wen make um come back alive, jalike Jesus wen say befo time. Come! Try look da place wea he wen lay.
28.7: Den eh, go hurry up! Tell da guys he wen teach, dat God wen make um come back alive from mahke awready. An you know, he going Galilee side first, den you guys suppose to go ova dea too. Dass da place wea you guys goin see him. So, dass it! Dass wat I suppose to tell you guys.â
28.8: Da wahines, dey wen run from da tomb fo tell his guys. Dey real scared, but same time, dey stay real good inside.
28.9: Right den Jesus wen meet um, an he say, âAloha!â Dey go by him, an go down, an touch his feet, an dey give him plenny love an respeck.
28.10: An Jesus tell um, âEh, no scared! Go tell my brudda guys fo go Galilee side. Dass da place wea dey goin see me.â
28.11: Wen da wahines going, same time some a da guys dat was guarding da tomb wen go back inside Jerusalem town an tell da main pries guys wat wen happen.
28.12: So da main pries guys all come togedda wit da older leadas, fo figga wat fo do. Den dey give plenny money to da guys dat was guarding da tomb.
28.13: Da pries guys tell um, âTell da peopo, âCome dark time, wen us guys sleeping, Jesus guys wen steal da body.â
28.14: If da governa hear bout dis ting, us guys goin tell um you guys okay, so you guys no need worry.â
28.15: So da guys dat was guarding da tomb wen take da money an do wat da leada guys wen tell um. An dass wat da Jewish peopo still yet stay telling toda
28.16: Den Jesus eleven guys go Galilee, to da mountain wea Jesus wen tell um fo go.
28.17: Wen dey wen see him ova dea, dey go down an give um plenny love an respeck. But still had guys dat still yet not shua wat stay happenin
28.18: Den Jesus go near dem an say, âGod wen give me all da power, so now I in charge a everyting all ova da world an inside da sky.
28.19: So you guys, go all ova da world an teach all da diffren peopos, so dey can learn bout me an come my guys. Baptize dem, an dey goin come tight wit my Fadda, an me his Boy, an God's Good an Spesho Spirit.
28.20: Teach um how fo do everyting dat I wen tell you guys fo do. An you know wat? I goin stick wit you guys all da way, till da world goin pau.â

1.1: You wen hear da story bout Jesus? He da Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He God's Boy. Dis da time da Good Kine Stuff Bout Christ wen start happenin
1.2: Isaiah, da guy who wen talk fo God long time ago, he wen write dis inside da Bibl
1.4: Dat time da guy John wen show up inside da boonies, baptizing da peopo. He stay teaching, âYou guys gotta come sorry an like pau do all da bad kine stuff you stay doing now, an no do um no moa. Den God goin let you guys go an hemo all yoa shame. Dass why I stay baptize peopo.â
1.5: All da peopo from Judea side an Jerusalem town, dey wen go da boonies fo hear John. Dey wen tell um strait out all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an he wen baptize um inside da Jordan Rive
1.6: You know, John's clotheses come from da camel hair. He wen make one rope outa leather fo belt. He eat grasshoppas, an he get honey from da bee
1.7: Dis wat he tell um, âAfta me, goin come one nodda guy. He get mo power den me. An you know wat? I not even importan nuff fo go down an help him hemo his slippa from his foot.
1.8: I baptizing you guys wit water, but da way he goin baptize you guys, he goin give you God's Good an Spesho Spirit fo take ova you.â
1.9: Dat time, Jesus come from Nazaret town, Galilee side, an John wen baptize him inside da Jordan River.
1.10: Right den Jesus wen come up outa da water. An you know wat? Jesus wen see da sky broke open, an wen spock God's Spirit coming down on top him, jalike one dove.
1.11: An wow! Had one voice from da sky wen say, âYou my boy! I really get love an aloha fo you, an I stay good inside cuz a you!â
1.12: Right afta dat, God's Spirit wen make Jesus go inside da boonies.
1.13: Had wild animals ova dea. Jesus, he wen stay dea forty days. Da Devil try presha him fo make him do bad kine stuff, but he neva. An had angel messenja guys from God dat wen come an take care hi
1.14: Latas, King Herod wen throw John Da Baptiza Guy inside da prison. Afta dat, Jesus go Galilee side, an he tell da peopo da Good Stuff From God.
1.15: He tell, âTime awready! God stay King hea now. You guys gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you guys doing, an no do um no moa. An da Good Stuff From God I telling you guys, you guys gotta believe um!â
1.16: Dat time Jesus stay walking by Galilee Lake, an he spock Simon an his brudda Andrew. Dey throwing dea net inside da water, cuz dey fisha guys.
1.17: Jesus tell um, âEh you guys! Come wit me! Be my guys! Da way you guys bring in da fish, I goin teach you guys how fo bring in peopo fo be my guys too!â
1.18: Right den an dea, dey wen leave dea nets an go wit hi
1.19: Going from dea, he spock James an his brudda John. Zebedee dea fadda. Dey inside da boat fixing dea nets.
1.20: Right den an dea he tell um fo come wit him. Dey go way from dea fadda Zebedee who stay inside da boat wit da workas, an dey go wit Jesu
1.21: Jesus an his guys, dey wen go Capernaum town. On da Jewish Rest Day, dey go inside da Jewish church. Jesus start fo teach da peopo.
1.22: Wat he teach um wen blow dea minds! Cuz he teach wit plenny power, not like da teacha guys dat teach God's Rules, an dem guys no mo powe
1.23: Get one guy inside da Jewish church wit one bad spirit dat wen take ova him. Right den an dea he wen yell,
1.24: âHo! You Jesus from Nazaret! Wat you like do to us? Why you wen come ova hea? Fo wipe us out? I know who you! You da Good An Spesho Guy from God!â
1.25: Jesus wen scold da spirit, âShut yoa mout! Let go da guy!â
1.26: Den da bad spirit wen shake up da guy plenny. Da spirit wen yell real loud, an let go da gu
1.27: Da peopo, wen blow dea minds. Dey tell each odda, âEh! Wass dis?! Wat kine new teaching dis? Dis guy, he get power! He even tell da bad kine spirits wat fo do, an dey do um!â
1.28: Right den an dea, da peopo wen go all ova Galilee side, fo tell everybody bout Jesu
1.29: Right den an dea Jesus dem wen go outside da Jewish church, an dey go inside Simon an Andrew's house. James an John go too.
1.30: Simon's mudda-in-law get feva. Simon dem tell Jesus, âEh, her sick, you know.â
1.31: Jesus go an take her by da hand an pull her up. Right den da feva wen pau, an her wen give dem foo
1.32: Wen da sun go down, an da Rest Day pau, da peopo bring all da sick peopo an da peopo who get bad spirits da wen take ova dem.
1.33: All da peopo from da town was jamming outside da house.
1.34: Jesus wen make plenny peopo who get all kine sick come good. He make all da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an he tell da spirits, âNo talk!â cuz dey know who hi
1.35: Early in da morning, wen starting fo get light, Jesus wen get up an go outa da house. He go one place wea neva have nobody, an pray ova dea.
1.36: Simon dem wen go look fo him.
1.37: Dey find him, an dey tell, âEh, everybody stay looking fo you, you know!â
1.38: But he say, âNeva mind! We gotta go da odda towns aroun hea, cuz I gotta teach dea too. Dass why I wen come.â
1.39: So, he teach inside all da Jewish churches all ova Galilee, an make all da bad kine spirits let go da peop
1.40: Had one lepa guy wen go by Jesus, an go down in front him an beg him. He say, âIf you like, you can make me come good so I can go wit da odda peopo fo pray, yeah?â
1.41: Jesus wen look at him, an he pity him. He touch da guy, an say, âOkay, I do um. Come good.â
1.42: Right den an dea da lepa guy come good. No mo lep
1.43-44: Jesus wen talk strong to da guy. He tell um, âEh! You betta not tell nobody bout dis! Go, let da pries guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside God's Rules. Den everybody goin know dat you stay good now.â Den he tell um fo go.
1.45: But da guy, he go outside an tell everybody wat wen happen to him. So, Jesus no can stay inside da towns, but he gotta stay outside inside da boonies. An da peopo, dey stay come from all ova da place fo hear hi

2.1: Afta couple days, Jesus wen go back Capernaum wea he wen stay befo. Da peopo wen hear dat Jesus stay home now.
2.2: So, plenny peopo wen come togedda an neva have room. No can even go near da door. An Jesus teach u
2.3: Some guys wen come by Jesus. Four a dem wen carry one guy dat no can move.
2.4: Get so plenny peopo, dey no can bring him near Jesus. So dey wen go up on top da flat roof, an make one big puka inside da roof, right ova da place wea Jesus stay. Dey put da guy on top his mat an put um down real slow in front Jesus.
2.5: Wen Jesus see dat, he wen tink, âEh, wow! Dis guys trus me fo real kine, dat I goin make dea friend come good!â Den he tell da guy, âEh, my boy, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do befo? I tell you now, da shame from all dat, pau awready!â
2.6: But get some teacha guys dea dat teach God's Rules. Dey stay tinking,
2.7: âEh! Who dis guy tink he is fo talk lidat! He talking stink bout God! Ony God can let da guy go an hemo da shame from da bad kine stuff!â
2.8: But right den Jesus wen know inside wat dey tinking. He say, âHow come you guys tinking bad kine stuff lidat?
2.9-10: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I like show proof you guys, dat I get da right inside dis world, fo let da peopo go an hemo da shame dey get fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout throwing out da shame -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one guy dat no can move, âEh, stand up an move aroun!â -- anybody can talk lidat. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy make strong.â
2.11: âEh, get up! Take yoa mat an go home awready!â
2.12: So da guy wen get up, pick up da mat an go outside in front all dem. Dat wen blow dea minds big time. Dey say, âDis unreal! Dis neva happen befo. Dis God, he awesome!â
2.13: Jesus wen go by da lake. Plenny peopo come by him, an he wen teach um.
2.14: He was walking, an he wen spock Levi. (Levi's fadda name Alfeus.) Levi stay by da tax place collecting money fo da govermen. Jesus tell him, âEh! Come wit me! Be my guy!â Levi get up, an go wit hi
2.15: Jesus wen go Levi's house fo eat. Had plenny guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen an odda guys dat get bad name jalike dem, dat like hang out wit Jesus. Dey all dea, eating wit Jesus an his guy
2.16: Had some Pharisee guys dea dat teach God's Rules. Dey see Jesus dea eating wit all da tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name jalike dem. So, dey aks Jesus guys, âEh, yoa teacha, how come he eating wit da tax guys an odda kine peopo dat get bad name?â
2.17: Jesus wen hear dat, an he tell dem, âDa peopo dat not sick, dey no need docta, ony da sick guys need. Me, I neva come fo tell da good kine peopo fo come by me fo be my guys, but da peopo dat get bad name.â
2.18: Now, John's guys an da Pharisee's guys was skipping food so dey can pray. Some peopo come aks Jesus, âHow come John Da Baptiza's guys an da Pharisee guys skip food so dey can pray, but da guys you teaching, dey no skip food, but still yet dey can pray?â
2.19: Jesus tell dem, âWat you tink? You go one wedding an skip food, wen da guy dat getting married stay dea? Nah!
2.20: Bumbye, da time goin come wen dey goin take away da guy dat getting married. An den, dass wen his friends goin skip foo
2.21: âFo fix up one old puka clothes, you no goin take one new piece cloth dat no shrink yet fo cover da puka. You go do dat, den wen you wash um, da new piece goin shrink plenny an make one mo bigga puka, an you make da old clothes mo wors
2.22: An same ting, you no put grape juice fo make wine inside one old kine leather bag, an close um fo let um ferment. You do dat, da new wine goin come mo big an bus da wine bag, an da wine goin spill out. Da old leather no good no moa. Mo betta, you put new wine inside new kine leather bag.â
2.23: Anodda time was da Jewish Rest Day. Jesus an his guys walk thru da wheat fields. Da guys pick litto bit wheat fo eat.
2.24: But had Pharisee guys ova dea dat wen tell Jesus, âHala! Dese guys, you teaching dem, but still yet dey stay doing da kine stuff dey not suppose to on da Rest Day!â
2.25: Jesus tell um, âWot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat King David wen do wen him an his guys was hungry?
2.26: Wen Abiatar was da Head Priest, David go inside God's house an eat da bread dass spesho fo God. But no can do dat kine, cuz God's Rules say dat ony da pries guys can eat dat bread. But David, he give um to his guys too, an nobody say notting.â
2.27: Den Jesus wen tell, âYou know, God neva make da peopo fo da Rest Day. He make da Rest Day fo da peopo.
2.28: Dass why I da One dat get da right fo say wat can do da Rest Day, cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real.â

3.1: One nodda time Jesus wen go inside da Jewish church. Had one guy dea, his hand stay all wasted.
3.2: Get some guys dea. Dey was checking out Jesus real good, if he go make da guy come good on da Rest Day, cuz dey like poin finga hi
3.3: So Jesus say to da guy wit da wasted hand, âEh, come hea in front everybody!â
3.4: Den Jesus say to da peopo, âSo, wat? Da Rules say you can do good kine stuff on da Rest Day, o you can do bad kine? Wat you suppose to do, kill peopo, o help um? Wat da Rules say, aah?â
3.5: Jesus look at all da peopo real good. He stay real huhu. Same time, he feel sad cuz dey hard head. Den he say to da guy, âStick out yoa hand.â An da guy stick um out, an da hand wen come goo
3.6: But da Pharisee guys, dey ony like stick wit dea rules. Dey wen go outside, an right den an dea dey go talk to King Herod guys, how dey goin kill Jesu
3.7: Den Jesus an his guys, dey wen go way, an stay by da lake. Plenny peopo from Galilee wen go wit him. An get peopo from Judea,
3.8: Jerusalem, Idumea, from da odda side da Jordan River, from Tyre side, an Sidon side. Dey all come cuz dey hear all da kine stuff Jesus stay doin
3.9: Get so plenny peopo, Jesus wen tell his guys fo make ready one boat, so he can go inside um an den da peopo no can squash him.
3.10: Jesus wen make plenny sick peopo come good. Dass why all da odda sick peopo dea, dey go all out fo touch him.
3.11: Had peopo ova dea wit bad kine spirits dat wen take ova dem. Weneva dey see Jesus, dey go down in front him, an yell, âYou God's Boy!â
3.12: But Jesus wen tell da spirits, âYou guys betta not tell nobody who meâ
3.13: Den Jesus wen go to da hills. He tell da guys he like pick, âEh, come!â An dey wen come.
3.14: He wen pick twelve guys. He say, âI like you guys stay by me. I like teach you guys. Latas I goin send you guys all ova da place, an den you guys goin teach da peopo.
3.15: An I goin give you guys power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo too.â
3.16: Dis da twelve guys he wen pick fo send all ova da plac
3.20: Den Jesus wen go home. Plenny peopo wen come, jalike befo time, so Jesus an his guys no can eat.
3.21: Wen Jesus ohana hear dat, dey wen go fo take him away. Dey say, âHe wen go pupule!â
3.22: Some teacha guys who teach God's Rules wen come from Jerusalem. Dey say, âDis guy, da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits wen take ova him fo shua! Beelzebul, you know! Dass why he can make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo!â
3.23: Jesus tell dem, âEh, you guys, come ova hea! I like teach you guys someting. You tink da Devil goin make his own guys let go da peopo, aah? No way!
3.24-25: Da ohana dat go agains each odda no can stay strong. Da country dat go agains each odda ony bus up itself.
3.26: If da Devil make his own guys let go da peopo, den he going agains himself! He no can stay strong. He goin wipe ou
3.27: So, no good how you guys tinking! How you tink one guy goin bus inside one big moke's house an rip off his stuffs, if he no tie up da moke first? Den can steal everytin
3.28: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: God can let da peopo go an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey doing, even if dey talk stink God.
3.29: But if dey talk stink God's Spesho Spirit, God no take dat. So if dey talk lidat, God no goin let um go an hemo dea shame fo dat, not now o eva!â
3.30: Jesus say all dat cuz da teacha guys wen say, âHe get one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him.â
3.31-32: Den Jesus mudda an bruddas come. Get plenny peopo sitting aroun him, so his mudda an bruddas stay outside. Dey wen send one guy inside fo get him. Da peopo tell him, âEh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas an sistas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.â
3.33: He tell um, âWat you guys tink? Who my mudda? Who my bruddas?â
3.34: He look all da guys sitting aroun him, an say, âLook! Hea, dese guys my mudda! An dese guys, dey my bruddas an sistas, fo real kine!
3.35: Whoeva do wat God like, dey my brudda an sista an mudda!â

4.1: Anodda time Jesus wen teach by da lake. Plenny peopo wen come aroun him, so he go inside one boat, an sit down dea. Da boat stay inside da lake. Da peopo, dey stay standing on da beach.
4.2: He use plenny stories fo teach um. Dis wat he sa
4.3: âLissen! You guys wen hear da story bout da farma guy?
4.4: He go throw seeds fo plant. Some fall down by da trail, an da birds go eat um up.
4.5: Some fall down on top da rocks wea had ony litto bit dirt. Da plants grow up fast, no matta ony litto bit dirt dea.
4.6: But wen da sun come up, da plants dry up, cuz no mo root.
4.7: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da kine bushes wit thorns. Da bushes grow up, an choke um, so no mo wheat.
4.8: Odda seed, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey grow up good, an come up plenny. Some seed, dey give back thirty times moa, some odda seed give back sixty times moa, an some seed even give back hundred times moa.â
4.9: Jesus say, âIf you guys hear dis, den lissen!â
4.10: Wen Jesus stay by himself wit da peopo who stay dea, an da twelve guys he was teaching, dey wen aks him wat da stories mean.
4.11: So he say, âGod let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King. But da odda peopo on da outside, I teach um wit storie
4.12: Dass fo make happen jalike Isaiah wen tell dat God sa
4.13: Jesus aks dem, âYou guys no undastan dis story? Den how you guys goin undastan da odda storie
4.14: âDa farma plant da seed. He jalike da guy dat tell wat God sa
4.15: âDa seed dat fall down by da trail, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say, an right den an dea da Devil come an make da guy so he no can rememba wat he wen hea
4.16: âDa seed dat fall down on top da rocks, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say, an right den an dea he stay plenny good inside.
4.17: But da guy, he jalike da plant dat no mo root inside him. He stick wit um fo litto wile. But wen get trouble, o wen da peopo make him suffa cuz he wen trus da stuff he wen hear, da guy give up right den an de
4.18: âDa seed dat fall down inside da kine bushes wit thorns, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say,
4.19: but bumbye da guy worry bout all da stuffs he need hea inside dis world. He like come rich, an all dat throw him off. So all dat stuff choke out all da tings God say dat was inside him. He no can do da right tings, jalike one wheat plant dat no can give wheat, growing inside da kine bushes wit thorn
4.20: âDa seed dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike wen one guy hear wat God say an trus um. He do da right tings, jalike da good plant dat give wheat. All da good stuff da guy do, he do um thirty times moa, some guys do um sixty times moa, an some odda guys hundred times moa.â
4.21: Den Jesus aks dem, âEh, try tell me dis. You bring da lamp fo put um unda one bowl? O you put um unda da bed? Nah! You goin put um on top da shelf so you can see, yeah?
4.22: Kay den, wateva you no undastan now, you goin undastan bumbye.
4.23: If you guys hear dis, den lissen!â
4.24: He tell um dis too: âTink real good bout wat you hear. If you do dat, God goin give you even mo fo know.
4.25: If you guys undastan all da kine stuff, den God goin tell you moa. But if you guys no like know all dat stuff, den God goin make you no rememba even da litto bit you know now.â
4.26: Jesus tell um anodda story. He say: âWen God stay King, dass jalike one farma dat throw da seed all ova da groun.
4.27: Nite an day, no matta he sleep o get up, da plant goin poke da head up from da groun an goin grow, even if da guy donno how.
4.28: Da dirt no need nobody fo help um make da wheat. First da stalk come, den da head, den da food inside da head.
4.29: Wen da wheat come ripe, da farma cut um wit da sickle, cuz dey stay ready.â
4.30: Jesus tell um anodda story. âGod, he stay King. Wat story I can tell you guys so you guys can undastan?
4.31: Wen God stay King, dass jalike one mustard seed. Dat seed mo small den all da odda seeds, you know. If get one guy plant um inside his field,
4.32: an da seed grow, da plant come mo big den all da odda plants in da garden. Da branches so big, da birds from da sky can sit on top um in da shade!â
4.33: Jesus teach da peopo wit plenny stories lidat. He ony tell dem stuff dey can undastan.
4.34: He neva teach dem odda stuff, ony wit stories. But every time he wen stay ony wit da guys he teaching, he tell dem wat da stories mea
4.35: Dat time afta da sun go down, Jesus wen tell his guys, âEh, we go da odda side da lake.â
4.36: Dey wen leave all da peopo, an Jesus guys take him inside da boat. Had odda boats dea too.
4.37: Den had one big storm ova dea, an da waves was bussing ova da boat, so da boat almos wen huli.
4.38: But Jesus still yet stay sleeping in da back on one pillow. His guys wen go wake him up, an tell him, âEh, Teacha! You no care we goin mahke, o wat?â
4.39: Jesus get up, an scold da wind an da waves. He say, âQuiet! No move aroun!â Den da wind wen pau an da waves wen come nice.
4.40: An he tell his guys, âHow come you guys scared? You guys no trus me, o wat?â
4.41: Dey so scared, dey wen tell each odda, âEh, wat kine guy dis? Even da wind an da waves do wat he tell um!â

5.1: Afta dat, Jesus dem go da odda side da lake wea da Gerasa peopo stay.
5.2: Wen Jesus was getting outa da boat, one guy dat get one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him wen come from da grave yard.
5.3: He everytime stay inside da grave yard. Da bad spirit wen make him so strong, nobody can tie him up, not even wit chains.
5.4: Befo, dey wen tie da guy's hand an feet plenny times wit da chains, but he wen bus um. Nobody stay strong nuff fo hold da guy down.
5.5: Nite an day, da guy everytime yelling from da grave yard, an da hills, an cutting himself wit stone
5.6: Wen he see Jesus far away, he wen run an go down in front him.
5.7-8: Jesus tell him, âLet go da guy, you bad kine spirit you!â Da guy wen yell real loud, âWat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, you his Boy! Promise to God you no goin make me suffa!â
5.9: Den Jesus wen aks him, âEh, wat yoa name?â An da bad kine spirit tell him, âMy name âArmy,â cuz us guys, we uku paila spirits!â
5.10: An da spirit beg Jesus plenny times, âEh, no send us outa dis place!â
5.11: On da odda side da hill, get one big pig farm, an da pigs was grinding.
5.12: Da bad kine spirits wen beg Jesus, âSend us inside da pigs! We like take ova dem.â
5.13: Jesus tell um, âGo!â So da bad spirits wen let go da guy, an go take ova da pigs. Had bout two tousand pigs ova dea. An you know wat? All da pigs wen run down one steep hill an fall ova da cliff inside da lake, an drown inside da wate
5.14: Den da pig farmas wen run, an go inside da town an all da place aroun dea, telling everybody wat wen happen. All da peopo from da town wen go fo se
5.15: Wen dey come by Jesus, dey spock da guy dat befo get da uku paila bad kine spirits dat wen take ova him. He look diffren now. He all dress up, an not pupule no moa. So da peopo real scared.
5.16: Da odda guys who wen see wat wen happen, dey tell da peopo wat wen happen to da guy wit da bad kine spirits an da pigs.
5.17: Den da peopo, dey start fo beg Jesus fo go way from de
5.18: Wen Jesus climb inside da boat, da guy dat da bad kine spirits wen take ova befo time, he say, âTry let me go wit you.â
5.19: But Jesus tell, âNo. Go home to yoa ohana, an tell um all da good kine stuff da Boss Up Dea wen do fo you. He wen pity you an give you chance.â
5.20: So da guy go way, an tell everybody in da Ten Towns wat Jesus wen do fo him. An wat he tell all da peopo, wen blow dea mind
5.21: So den, Jesus wen come back in da boat to da odda side da lake. An plenny peopo wen come aroun him wen he still near da lake.
5.22: One leada guy from da Jewish church name Jairus wen come dea. He spock Jesus, an wen go down on his knees by Jesus feet
5.23,42: an beg him plenny, âEh, my litto girl, her ony twelve years old, an her stay going mahke. Try come an put yoa hand on top her, so she can come good an stay alive!â
5.24: So Jesus wen go wit Jairus. An all da peopo wen go wit Jesus. Dey so plenny, dey wen push aroun hi
5.25: Get one wahine wit da peopo. Her was bleeding fo twelve years.
5.26: Her wen suffa plenny, no matta plenny doctas wen try make her good. Her wen spend all her money, but her neva come good. Her come mo worse.
5.27: Her wen hear bout Jesus, so her come in back a him wit all da peopo aroun him, an her touch his clotheses.
5.28: Her tinking, âIf I can ony touch his clotheses, I goin come good again.â
5.29: Right away her bleeding wen pau, an her wen feel inside her dat she no mo suff
5.30: Right den an dea, Jesus wen feel power go outa him. He wen turn aroun an look all da peopo. He tell, âEh, who wen touch my clotheses?â
5.31: His guys say, âHow come you say dat? Get uku paila peopo pushing aroun you. But you go aks who touch you?â
5.32: Jesus stay looking aroun fo see who wen touch hi
5.33: Den da wahine, she wen know wat wen happen to her. She so scared, she shaking. She wen go down by his feet, an wen tell him da whole stor
5.34: An Jesus wen tell her, âEh sista, you wen trus me. Dass why you come good. Go now, yoa heart goin rest inside. You no suffa no moa.â
5.35: Jesus still talking, an some guys wen come from Jairus house, da leada guy fo da Jewish church. Dey tell him, âYoa litto girl wen mahke! Mo betta you no bodda da teacha no moa.â
5.36: But Jesus neva lissen to dem. He tell Jairus, âNo scared. Ony trus me.â
5.37: He ony let Peter, James, an James brudda John, go wit him.
5.38: Dey wen come Jairus house. Jesus see all da peopo an hear um making big noise an crying.
5.39: He go inside an tell, âEh, how come you guys making big noise an crying? Da girl neva mahke, her ony sleeping.â
5.40: An dey wen laugh at him. So he wen chase um all outside, an take da girl's fadda an mudda, an his three guys, an dey go inside da room wea da girl stay.
5.41: He take da girl's hand an tell her, âTalita kum.â Dat mean, âEh! Litto girl, get up!â
5.42: Eh, right den an dea her wen stand up, an walk aroun. An da peopo, right den an dea, dea jaws wen drop.
5.43: Den he wen tell um, âYou guys betta not tell nobody bout dis! Now, go make her someting fo eat.â

6.1: Jesus go way from dea, an go back his own place Nazaret, an his guys go too.
6.2: Wen da Rest Day come, he go inside da Jewish church an teach. Plenny peopo wen say, âWow! Wea he get all dis stuff from? How come he know all dis? Wea he get power fo do all dis awesome stuff?
6.3: Dass da carpenta, yeah? His mudda Mary, an his bruddas James, Joseph, Judas, an Simon. His sistas, dey stay hea wit us too.â Dis wen bodda dem, how he stay ac
6.4: But Jesus tell um, âOne guy who talk fo God get plenny respeck. But he no mo respeck notting inside his own town an his own ohana.â
6.5-6: An Jesus wen tink, âEh, how come dey no trus me?â Az why he neva do awesome stuff ova dea fo show his power. He put his hands on top litto bit peopo, an make dem come goo
6.7: He call his twelve guys togedda, an send um out two by two. He give um da power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo.
6.8: Dis wat he wen tell his guys: âOny take litto bit fo da trip, ony yoa walking stick. No take bread. No even take one bag, o money in yoa belt.

10.21: Jesus wen look at um, an get aloha fo him. He say: âOny one ting mo you neva do dat you gotta do. Go sell all da stuffs you get, an give da money to da poor peopo. An garans you goin get da real kine rich stuff up dea wea God stay. Den come wit me fo be my guy.â
