10.23: Jesus wen look aroun at his guys an say, âAz why hard fo one rich guy fo get God fo his King!â
10.24: His guys wen hear wat Jesus say, an wen blow dea minds. Jesus say one mo time, âEh you guys! Stay hard, you know, fo get God fo yoa King.
10.25: Stay mo easy fo one camel go thru da puka in one needle, den fo one rich guy fo get God fo his King.â
10.26: Dey all shock, an dey tell each odda, âIf dass how stay, who can come outa da bad kine stuff he stay in, den?â
10.27: Jesus look strait at dem an tell, âNo mo nobody dat can do um, but ony God, he da One dat can do um all.â
10.28: Den Peter wen tell, âEh, Boss, look! We wen give up everyting we get fo go wit you.â
10.29: Jesus say, âAz right! An I tell you guys dis: Whoeva give up dea home, dea bruddas, dea sistas, dea mudda an fadda, dea kids, an dea lands, so dey can stick wit me an da Good Stuff From God I stay telling you,
10.30: bumbye dey goin get hundred times mo plenny even befo dey mahke. Dey goin get home, bruddas, sistas, mudda, kids, lands. An one nodda ting dey goin get -- peopo goin make um suffa. Bumbye, in da time to come, dey goin live to da max foeva.
10.31: Goin get plenny peopo who like make demself come first, but bumbye dey goin come last. An get plenny peopo who like make demself come last, but bumbye dey goin come first.â
10.32: Jesus go in front his guys, an dey all going Jerusalem. Jesus guys was all shook up, an da odda peopo who wen go wit dem was all scared. One mo time he wen take da twelve guys by da side a da road, an tell um wat goin happen.
10.33: He tell dem, âEh, lissen, we going Jerusalem. I da Guy Dass Fo Real. One guy goin set me up so da main pries guys an da teacha guys dat teach God's Rules can take me. Den dey goin say I gotta mahke. Dey goin give me to da guys dat not Jews.
10.34: Dey goin make fun a me, an spit on top me, an whip me, an kill me. But on day numba three, I goin come back alive.â
10.35: James an John, Zebedee's boys, dey come by Jesus. Dey say, âTeacha, us guys like you do someting fo us, yeah?â
10.37: Dey say, âWen you come King, goin be awesome, yeah? We like you let us sit by you, one by da left side an da odda by da right side.â
10.38: Jesus say, âYou guys donno wat you aksing fo. You tink you guys can suffa jalike I goin suffa? You tink you can handle da big trouble I goin get?â
10.39: Dey say, âShua, us guys can handle.â
10.40: But fo sit by my right side an by my left side bumbye wen I come King, dass not mines fo say. My Fadda, he da One who can say dat, an he awready stay make da spesho places ready fo da peopo dat suppose to sit ova dea.â
10.41: Wen da odda ten guys hear dat, dey come all huhu wit James an John.
10.42: Jesus say, âEh, all you guys! Come ova hea! You know, da leadas fo da peopos dat donno God, dey get any kine power ova dea peopo. Dea main guys get da rights fo tell da peopo wat fo do.
10.43: But you guys, no goin be lidat wit you. Wit you guys, whoeva like be da leada guy, he gotta be da helpa guy first.
10.44: Wit you guys, whoeva like be da numba one guy, he gotta do wat you guys tell him.
10.45: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I neva come so peopo can take care me. I wen come fo take care dem. I wen come fo give up my life an mahke fo cut loose plenny peopo from da power dat da bad kine stuff get ova dem.â
10.46: Dey go Jericho. Wen dey going away from da town, get plenny peopo wit dem. Bartimeus, one blind guy, stay sitting by da road side begging. He Timeus boy.
10.47: He hear dat Jesus from Nazaret passing by, an he wen start fo yell, âEh, Jesus! You da guy dat suppose to show up from King David's ohana! Try pity me!â
10.48: Had plenny peopo ova dea dat wen scold him an tell um fo shut his mout. But he wen yell even mo loud, âEh Boss, you da guy from King David's ohana! Try pity me!â
10.49: Jesus stop an say, âCall him!â So dey wen call da blind guy an tell um, âEh, dass okay! Get up! He stay call you.â
10.50: He wen jump up an throw down his coat, an go by Jesu
10.51: Jesus aks um, âWat you like me do fo you?â
10.52: Jesus tell um, âGo! You wen trus me, dass why you come good now.â Right den an dea he can see, an he go wit Jesus on da roa

11.1: Den Jesus dem come near Jerusalem an come by Betpage an Betany, on top Olive Ridge. Jesus send two guys he teaching.
11.2: He tell um, âYou guys see dat small town ova dea? Go inside dea, an you goin find one young donkey dat stay tie up. Nobody ride on um yet. Hemo da rope from da post, an bring um ova hea.
11.3: If somebody aks you guys, âEh, how come you guys stay doing dat?â tell um, âDa Boss need um. Den he goin send somebody fo bring um right back.â-â
11.4: Da guys go an find da young donkey outside in da street. He stay tie up by da door, so dey hemo da rope from da post.
11.5: Get some guys standing aroun, an dey aks um, âEh! Wat you guys doing? How come you hemo da rope from da post?â
11.6: Dey tell um jalike Jesus wen say. Den da guys let um take um.
11.7: Dey bring da young donkey by Jesus. Dey throw dea coats on top um, an Jesus wen sit on top um.
11.8: Plenny peopo put dea coats down on top da road too, jalike fo one king. Odda guys cut branches from da palm trees in da fields, an put um down on top da road fo show respeck fo him.
11.9: An plenny peopo stay walking in front an behind, yelli
11.11: Den Jesus go inside Jerusalem, an go inside da temple yard. He look aroun at everyting. But late awready, dass why he go back Betany wit his twelve guy
11.12: Da nex day, wen dey go way from Betany fo go Jerusalem one mo time, Jesus wen come real hungry.
11.13: He spock one fig tree wit leafs, but kinda far. He go ova dea fo check out if get fruit. He come dea an find ony leafs, cuz not time yet fo fruit.
11.14: So he tell da fig tree, âNobody goin eat fruit from you no moa!â His guys wen hear wat he sa
11.15: Dey get to Jerusalem. Jesus wen go inside da temple yard, an he start fo throw out all da guys who was buying an selling stuff ova dea. He wen huli da tables wea dey sell da spesho kine temple money fo give to da temple, an da benches fo da guys who sell doves fo sacrifice.
11.16: He no let nobody carry any kine stuff thru da temple yard.
11.17: He teach um, âDa Bible say, âMy temple goin be one house fo all da peopos all ova da world fo pray inside.â But you guys stay make um jalike one hangout fo crooks!â
11.18: But da main pries guys an da teachas who teach God's Rules hear dat. Dey try figga out how dey can kill him. Dey scared a him, cuz da tings he teach, blow da peopo's minds.
11.19: Wen da sun go down, Jesus dem go outside da tow
11.20: Early da nex morning dey pass by da fig tree, an see um all dry up from da root.
11.21: Peter rememba, an tell Jesus, âEh, Teacha! Look da kine! You wen put kahuna da fig tree, an now, all dry up!â
11.22: Jesus tell um, âGotta trus God!
11.23: Az right! I like tell you guys dis too: You goin tell dis mountain ova hea, âEh, get up! Throw yoaself inside da ocean.â If you trus God fo make dat happen, an no trus um ony litto bit same time, den goin be lidat.
11.24: Dass why I tell you guys, wen you pray, everyting you aks God fo do, trus him jalike you get um awready, an dat goin be.
11.25: Everytime you guys stand up an pray, if you huhu wit somebody, you gotta let dem go, an no feel huhu wit dem. If you do dat, den yoa Fadda dat stay inside da sky, he goin let you guys go, an no feel huhu bout da bad kine stuff you guys wen do.
11.26: [But if you guys no like let da odda guy go, an like stay huhu wit dem, den yoa Fadda in da sky, he no goin let you guys go, he goin stay huhu bout all da bad kine stuff you guys wen do.]â
11.27: Jesus dem come back Jerusalem. He walk inside da temple yard, an da main pries guys, da teachas who teach God's Rules, an da older leada guys wen go by him.
11.28: Dey aks him, âEh, wat right you get fo do dis kine stuff? Who wen say you can do um?â
11.29: Jesus tell um, âI like aks you guys one ting. You tell me, an den I tell you guys wat right I get fo do dis kine stuff.
11.30: Da guy John, wen he wen baptize, wea he wen get da right? God in da sky, he give um da right? O da peopo, dey give um da right? Try tell me dat.â
11.31: Dey talking to demself. Dey say, âIf we tell him, âGod in da sky give um da right,â he goin say, âHow come you guys neva believe him den?â
11.32: But if we say, âDa peopo give um da right,â no way! You know, us guys scared wat da peopo goin do, cuz everybody tink dat John wen talk fo God.â
11.33: So dey tell him, âEh, we donno.â

12.1: Jesus start teaching um wit stories. He say, âOne guy wen go plant one grape field. He make one fence aroun um, an dig one puka inside da groun fo squeeze da grapes. An he build one watch tower. Den he wen rent da grape farm to some farma guys, an den he go far awa
12.2: âWen time fo cut da grapes, he send one worka guy fo get his share from da farma guys grapes.
12.3: But da farma guys wen grab da worka guy, an bus um up, an throw him outside wit notting.
12.4: Da boss send one nodda worka. Dey bus up his head an dey no shame fo make any kine to him.
12.5: So he send one nodda worka, an dey kill um. He send plenny odda guys. Some a dem dey bus up, but da oddas, dey kill u
12.6: âStill yet had one guy dea, but was his boy. He really love dat boy. In da end he wen send him. He say, âEh, dey goin show respeck fo my boy.â
12.7: But wen da farma guys spock da boy, dey tell each odda, âEh, dis da guy goin own da farm. Come, we kill him an take ova da grape farm.â
12.8: So dey grab da boy an kill him, an throw him outside da grape fiel
12.9: âKay den, wen da boss who own da grape farm come, wat you guys tink he goin do to dem? He goin kill da bad guys, an den he goin rent da farm to some odda guys.
12.10: Eh, you guys neva read inside da Bible bout da stone dass jalike me? Da Bible sa
12.12: Den da main pries dem was tinking how dey can bus him, cuz dey know he was talking bout dem. But dey scared da peopo. So dey go way from hi
12.13: Lata dey send some Pharisee guys an some King Herod guys fo try trick Jesus in wat he say.
12.14: Dey come an say, âEh, Teacha, we know you fo real, no matta wat da peopo tink o who dem. An you tell da trut wen you teach God's way. So, wat? Dass right fo pay King Cesar da tax money, o wat?â
12.15: But Jesus know dey say one ting an tink anodda, an he say, âHow come you guys like trick me? Show me da kine coin fo da tax so I can look at um.â
12.16: An dey wen show him. He say, âWho dis guy on top da coin? An wass his name?â
12.17: An he tell um, âKay den. Give um to Cesar, wat his, an give to God, wat his!â Wen dey hear dat, wen blow dea mind
12.18: Den some Sadducee guys go by Jesus. Dis how dey teach: If you mahke, you mahke, you no goin come back alive again. So dey aks him,
12.19: âEh, Teacha! Da guy Moses who wen give us God's Rules, he wen say, âWen one guy mahke an he no mo kids, his brudda gotta marry his wife, an make kids fo carry da name fo da brudda who wen mahke.â
12.20: âNow den, had seven bruddas ova hea by us guys. Da first one wen marry one wahine, den he wen mahke, but neva have kids.
12.21: Da nex brudda wen marry da brudda's wife, an den he wen mahke, an neva have kids. Da same ting wen happen to da nex brudda.
12.22: An dis ting wen happen to all da seven bruddas. An all dem guys neva have kids notting. An den afta dat, da wahine wen mahke to
12.23: âSo, wen da time come wen all da peopo dat wen mahke come back alive, who goin be her husban? Cuz dey all wen marry her.â
12.24: Jesus tell um, âYou guys all jam up, you know. Cuz you guys donno wat da Bible say from befo time, az why, an you guys donno God's power.
12.25: Wen da peopo dat wen mahke come back alive again, dat time dey no marry. Dey goin be jalike da angel messenja guys in da sky.
12.26: But da guys who wen mahke, dey goin come back alive. You guys neva read inside da Bible wat Moses wen write bout da burning bush? God say, âI da God fo Abraham, an fo Isaac, an fo Jacob.â
12.27: He not da God fo da mahke peopo. He da God fo da peopo dat get one spirit inside dem dat stay alive. Dass why you guys wrong!â
12.28: One teacha who teach God's Rules was standing dea. He hear dem talking, an he know dat Jesus wen shut up da Sadducee guys. So he aks him, âEh, from all da Rules God wen give us, wat da main Rule?â
12.29: Jesus tell him, âDa main Rule dis: âLissen, all you Israel peopo! Da Boss Up Dea, he our God, an he da one an ony Boss.
12.30: Get love an aloha fo da Boss yoa God, wit all yoa heart, an wit everyting inside you, an wit how you tink, an wit all yoa power.â
12.31: An da nex main Rule jalike dis one, âGet love an aloha fo da odda guy jalike you get love an aloha fo yoaself.â No mo odda Rule, mo importan den dis two Rules.â
12.32: Da teacha who teach God's Rules tell um, âEh, Teacha, right on! Dass right wat you say, âGod, he one God, an no mo odda God, ony him.â
12.33: Us guys gotta get love an aloha fo him wit all our heart, an wit how we tink, an wit all our power. An we gotta get love an aloha fo da odda guy jalike we get love an aloha fo ourself. Dass mo importan den make da burn kine offering an da sacrifice.â
12.34: Jesus know dat da guy was tinking good wen he say dat. He tell him, âYou stay near God, fo get him fo yoa King.â
12.35: Jesus was teaching inside da temple yard. He say, âHow come da teachas dat teach God's Rules say, âDa Spesho Guy God Goin Send, he goin come from King David's ohanaâ?
12.36: You know, God's Spirit wen tell David fo say di
12.37: âKay den. David call God's Spesho Guy âBoss,â yeah? Den how he can be David's boy, same time?â All da peopo wen hear him, an dey feel good insid
12.38: Wen he was teaching, he say, âWatch out fo da teachas who teach God's Rules! Dey like wear rich kine clotheses. Dey like da peopo talk to dem wit respeck inside da open market.
12.39: Dey like sit in da main place in da Jewish churches, an in da bestes place at da lu`aus.
12.40: Dey no mo shame fo trick da widows an take away dea house, an same time dey praying, saying plenny stuff, so nobody tink dey ripping off da widows. God goin punish dem mo den da odda peop
12.41: Jesus go sit down da odda side by da place wea da peopo give money fo da temple. He watch da peopo. Plenny rich guys throw in plenny money.
12.42: Den one widow dat no mo notting put in two small copper coins dat make one penn
12.43: Jesus tell his guys fo come. He say, âDass good! An I like tell you guys dis too: Dis widow da no mo notting wen put in mo plenny fo da temple den all da odda peopo.
12.44: All da odda peopo wen give dea money from plenny money dey get. But she no mo notting, an she wen give everyting she get fo stay alive.â

13.1: Jesus was goin outside da temple yard, an one guy he teaching say, âEh, Teacha, check out dese buildings, da stone blocks! Awesome, yeah?â
13.2: Jesus say, âYou see all dese awesome buildings? Bumbye no goin get one stone on top da odda ova hea. Dey goin throw um all dow
13.3: Lata on, Jesus go Olive Ridge, an sit down ova dea wea can see da temple da odda side da valley. Peter, James, John, an Andrew come by him wen no mo odda guys dea. Dey aks him,
13.4: âWat time all dat kine stuff goin happen? How we goin know wen da time come?â
13.5: Jesus tell um, âWatch out! No let nobody fool you guys!
13.6: Plenny guys goin show up an use my name. Dey goin say, âEh, me, I dat Spesho Christ Guy from God!â An dey goin fool plenny peopo lidat.
13.7: No get all shook up. You guys goin hear, âDey fighting, an get war all ova da place.â Dat gotta happen, but dat no goin mean everyting goin pau yet.
13.8: One country goin fight one nodda country. One king goin fight one nodda king. Plenny diffren places, da groun goin shake hard plenny. Plenny peopo goin get notting fo eat. Dey goin suffa plenny, but all dat ony fo star
13.9: Watch out! Dey goin take you guys to dea leadas. Dey goin punish you guys wit whips inside da Jewish churches. You guys goin stand in front da governas an kings, cuz you my guys. An you goin tell um bout me.
13.10: But befo dis stuff happen, all da diffren peopos all ova da world gotta hear da Good Stuff From God.
13.11: Every time dey bus you guys, an take you in front da judge, no worry wat you goin say. Ony say wat da Spirit tell you right den. Dat time goin be God's Spesho Spirit talking, not you.
13.12: Bruddas goin sell out dea bruddas fo mahke, an da faddas goin sell out dea kids. Kids goin fight dea mudda an fadda, an set um up fo mahke.
13.13: Everybody goin hate you cuz you my guys. But da guy dat hang in dea to da end, he goin come out oka
13.14: âSometing goin happen dat God hate plenny. Da bad ting goin stand wea not suppose to. Dat ting so bad, goin make everybody go way. (Whoeva read dis, dey gotta figga um out.) You know, wen you guys see dat happen, if you stay Judea side, run to da mountains.
13.15: If you stay on top one house dat get flat roof, no go inside fo take yoa stuffs wit you.
13.16: If you stay inside da fields, no go home fo get yoa clothese
13.17: âDat time goin get hard time fo da hapai wahines an da muddas dat stay nursing dea babies!
13.18: Aks God fo no let dis stuff happen winta time.
13.19: Cuz dat time everybody goin suffa to da max. Neva have notting lidat eva wen happen befo, not even from wen God wen make da world till now, an no goin get notting lidat eva goin happen again.
13.20: If da Boss Up Dea neva make dat time mo short, nobody goin come out okay. But fo help da peopo da Boss wen pick, he goin make dat trouble mo shor
13.21: âDat time, if get one guy dat tell you guys, âEh, look! Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, he stay ova hea! He stay ova dea!â no go trus dat kine guy!
13.22: Goin get plenny fake kine guys who say dey Christ, an goin get plenny fake kine guys who say dey talk fo God. Dey goin do unreal an awesome stuff fo try prove dat dey fo real, an dey goin even try fool da peopo dat God wen pick, if dey can.
13.23: Watch out, eh! Befo all dat happen, I stay telling you guys everyting now awready.â
13.24: âRight afta dat time fo suff
13.26: âI da Guy Dass Fo Real. Dat time, da peopo goin see me coming inside da clouds wit all kine power, an I goin be awesome!
13.27: Den I goin send my angel messenja guys fo bring togedda all da peopo God wen pick from all ova da world, every place dat get unda da sk
13.28: âEh, you guys, try learn someting from da fig tree. Everytime da fig tree make new branch an get new leafs, you guys know dat summa time coming.
13.29: Same ting, wen you guys see all dis stuff happen, den you goin know, I stay coming, an everyting stay ready, jalike I outside da door.
13.30: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: From da peopo dat stay hea right now, get guys dat no goin mahke befo all dis stuff goin happen.
13.31: Da sky an da world goin pau, but da tings I say neva goin pa
13.32: âNobody know wen all dat goin happen, not even da day, o da time. Da angel messenja guys inside da sky, even dem, dey donno. Even me, I God's Boy, an I donno da time. Ony my Fadda know da time!
13.33: So watch out! Stay ready! Cuz you guys donno wat time yoa Boss goin come back.
13.34: Jalike one guy goin on one trip. Befo he go, he tell his worka guys, âCome. Take care my house.â Every guy get someting fo do. He tell da guard, âStay ready!â
13.35: You guys gotta make lidat! Stay ready! Cuz you guys donno da time I goin come back. Might be afta da sun go down, o midnite, o real early in da morning wen da roosta make noise, o wen da sun stay coming up.
13.36: If I come all of a sudden, you no goin like if I find you guys sleeping, yeah?
13.37: I tell you guys an everybody dis: Stay ready an watch!â

14.1: Da spesho religious time fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast, dat da time wen dey no put yeast inside da bread dat make um come big. Two days befo da spesho religious time an da Passova, da main pries guys an da teachas who teach God's Rules, dey trying fo find one way fo trick Jesus so dey can bus him an kill him.
14.2: Dey say, âWe no can do um wen get da spesho religious time, cuz bumbye da peopo goin make big noise an figh
14.3: Jesus was Simon's house, inside Betany town. Simon, he one lepa guy befo time. Wen Jesus stay eating ova dea, had one wahine dat wen bring one fancy bottle made from alabaster rock. Inside had da nard kine fancy perfume dat cost plenny. She wen put da perfume on top Jesus head wen he was eating.
14.4: Some guys dea come all huhu, an tell each odda, âEh, how come she throw way da perfume lidat?
14.5: How come she neva sell um fo plenny money, an give um to da peopo dat no mo notting?â An dey scold he
14.6: Jesus tell um, âEh, no give her hard time! âHow come you guys bodda her? She wen do dis fo me wit plenny aloha.
14.7: Everytime goin get peopo dat no mo notting stay wit you guys, an you can help dem weneva you like. But I no goin stay wit you guys everytime.
14.8: She wen do wat she can do. Wen she wen put dis perfume on top me, befo I mahke, dis wen make me ready fo wen dey goin bury me.
14.9: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Weaevas my guys goin teach da Good Kine Stuff Bout Me all ova da world, dey goin tell wat dis wahine wen do, an da peopo goin rememba her.â
14.10: Judas Iscariot, he one a Jesus twelve guys. He go talk to da main pries guys, so he can set Jesus up fo dem guys.
14.11: Dey hear dat, an dey stay good inside. Dey promise dey goin give him money. From dat time Judas wen look fo chance fo set Jesus u
14.12: On da first day a da spesho religious time wen dey make da Bread dat No Mo Yeast, dass wen da peopo kill da baby sheep fo make da Passova sacrifice. Jesus guys wen go by him an aks him, âWea you like us make da stuff ready fo you fo eat da Passova kine food?â
14.13: He send two a his guys. He tell um, âGo inside da town. One guy goin come by you guys dea. He carry one big water jug. Go wit him.
14.14: Da guy going inside one house. Tell da owna, âDa Teacha say, âWea my spesho room stay, so I can eat da Passova food wit my guys?ââ
14.15: Da owna goin show you guys one big room upstairs, all set up awready. Dass da place wea you guys can make da food ready fo us.â
14.16: Da two guys go inside town, an find everyting jalike Jesus wen say. Dey make da food ready fo da Passova dinn
14.17: Afta da sun go down, Jesus wen come wit his twelve guys.
14.18: Dey eating, an he say, âI tell you guys fo shua: one a you guys who stay eating wit me goin set me up!â
14.19: Dey come real sad, an each guy tell him, âBoss, eh, fo shua you not talking bout me, yeah?â
14.20: Jesus say, âOne a you twelve guys who wen put his piece bread inside da same sauce wit me, he da guy goin set me up.
14.21: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I goin mahke jalike da Bible wen say befo time. But auwe! Da guy who goin set me up goin get it! Mo betta he neva been born!â
14.22: Dey eating, an Jesus take one piece bread an tell God he good heart fo give peopo food. He broke da bread, an give um to his guys. He tell um, âTake dis an eat um. Dis hea, my body.â
14.23: He take da cup an tell God, âMahalo plenny,â an give um to his guys, an dey all drink from um.
14.24: He say, âDis hea, my blood fo make solid da new deal dat God making. Dey goin kill me, an my blood goin come out from my body jalike wen dey make one sacrifice. Dat goin happen so God can help plenny peopo, an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey do.

2.24: An Joseph an Mary wen make one sacrifice cuz dea numba one boy wen born, jalike da Rules from da Boss wen say, âIf dey no mo notting, den two doves o two pigeons fo da sacrifice.â

5.1: One time Jesus was by Gennesaret Lake, an all da peopo wen try come close by him fo hear wat God say.
5.2: He spock two boats ova dea near da water. Da fisha guys wen leave um dea. Dey stay washing dea nets.
5.3: Jesus go inside Simon's boat, an tell him fo go out litto bit from da beach. Den Jesus sit down an teach da peopo from de
5.4: Wen he pau teach, he tell Simon, âEh Simon, go out wea stay deep, an drop yoa nets.â
5.5: Simon tell, âBoss, we wen work hard all nite, an ony whitewash. But cuz you wen say um, I goin do um.â
5.6: So dey drop da nets, an dey catch uku paila fish, an da net wen start fo broke.
5.7: Dey wen make signs fo dea bruddas inside da odda boat fo help um. Dem guys wen come an dey wen fill up da two boats so full, da boats wen start fo sink.
5.8: Wen Simon Peter see how plenny fish dey get, he wen go down on his knees in front Jesus an say, âEh, Boss, go way from me, cuz I one guy dat stay do bad kine stuff!â
5.9: Simon an all da guys ova dea by him, wen blow dea minds, cuz dey wen catch so plenny fish.
5.10: James an John, Zebedee's boys dat work togedda wit Simon fishing, an wen blow dea minds too. Jesus tell Simon, âNo scared. Da way you guys bring in da fish, I goin teach you guys how fo bring in peopo fo be my guys too!â
5.11: Right den an dea, dey pull dea boats up on top da beach, an leave all dea stuffs, an go wit Jesu
5.12: Wen Jesus stay inside one town, one lepa guy wen come dea. Da guy get da kine sores all ova. Wen he spock Jesus, he go down, an his face wen touch da groun, an he beg him, âBoss, if you like, you can make me come good, yeah?â
5.13: Jesus wen stick out his hand an touch da guy. Same time Jesus say, âOkay, I can do dat. Come good.â Right den an dea da guy wen come good.
5.14: Den Jesus wen tell him, âMake shua dat you no tell nobody bout dis. Go, let da pries guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside God's Rules. Gotta do all dat, so everybody goin know dat you stay good now.â
5.15: But everybody all ova da place wen hear da stuff Jesus wen do, an plenny peopo wen come fo hear him, so he can make dem come good from all dea sick.
5.16: Plenny times Jesus wen go wea neva have nobody, fo pray ova de
5.17: One time Jesus stay teaching. Had Pharisee guys an teachas dat teach God's Rules sitting ova dea. Dey wen come from every town inside Galilee an Judea, an from Jerusalem. Jesus wen get power from da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky fo make da sick peopo come good.
5.18: Had some guys dat wen bring one guy on top one mat. Da guy, he no can move, notting. Dey wen try bring him inside da house fo put him in front Jesus.
5.19: But dey no can find one way fo do um, cuz da place stay jamming. So dey go on top da flat roof, an make one puka, an wen let um down on top da mat in front Jesus.
5.20: Jesus wen see dat, an he tink, âEh, wow! Dis guys trus me fo real kine, dat I goin make dea friend come good!â Den he tell da guy, âEh you, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do? I tell you now, da shame from all dat, pau awready!â
5.21: Da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach God's Rules, dey tinking, âEh, dis guy ack an talk jalike he God! Ony God can let peopo go fo da bad kine stuff dey do an hemo dea shame!â
5.22: But Jesus wen know wat dey tinking. He say, âHow come you guys tinking bad kine stuff lidat?
5.23-24: I like show proof you guys, dat I da Guy Dass fo Real, an I get da right inside dis world, fo let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, âEh, stand up an move aroun!â -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy come strong.â
5.25: Right den an dea da guy wen get up in front all dem guys, take da mat, an go home, talking shaka stuff bout God.
5.26: All da peopo wen see dat, an wen blow dea minds. Dey wen talk shaka stuff bout God too. Same time, dey wen come real scared. Dey say, âDis awesome! We wen see unreal stuff today!â
5.27: Afta dat Jesus go outside an spock one guy dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, sitting down inside his place. His name Levi. Jesus tell him, âEh, come wit me, an be my guy!â
5.28: So Levi wen get up, leave all his stuffs ova dea, an go wit Jesu
5.29: Den Levi make one big lu`au fo Jesus inside his house. An plenny guys dat collect money fo tax an odda guys wen eat wit dem.
5.30: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach God's Rules an stick wit da Pharisee guys, dey wen grumble at Jesus guys. Dey say, âEh, how come you guys eating wit da guys dat collect money fo tax an odda guys dat get bad name?â
5.31: Jesus wen tell, âDa peopo dat not sick, dey no need docta, ony da sick peopo need docta.
5.32: I neva come fo tell da good peopo fo come by me, but da peopo dat get bad name, so dey can come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an no do um no moa.â
5.33: Den da Pharisee guys an dea friends wen say, âPlenny times, da guys dat John Da Baptiza guy teach, dey no eat so dey can pray. An da guys dat da Pharisee guys teach, dey no eat so dey can pray. But da guys you teaching, dey stay eating an drinking. How come, aah?â
5.34: Jesus wen tell, âWat you tink? You can make da guys at one wedding skip food wen dea friend dat getting married stay dea wit dem? No can!
5.35: But you know, bumbye da time goin come wen peopo goin take away dea friend. Den his friends goin feel bad, an den dey goin skip food.â
5.36: He tell um anodda ting fo teach um. âFo cover one puka on one old clothes, you no goin cut one piece from one new clothes, fo put on top da old clothes. You do dat, you goin mess up da new clothes, an da new piece no goin match da old clothes.
5.37: An you no goin put grape juice fo make wine inside one old wineskin. You do dat, wen da grape juice come wine, goin bus da old wineskin. You goin lose da wine, an da skin too. Everyting poho!
5.38: Mo betta, you put new wine inside new wineskin.
5.39: Nobody like drink da new kine wine afta he wen drink da old, cuz he say, âDa old wine mo betta.â-â

6.27: âI telling you guys dat hear me, get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you. Do good stuff fo dem.
6.28: Aks God fo do good tings to da peopo dat put kahuna on top you, an pray fo da peopo dat make you guys suffa.
6.29: If one guy hit yoa right cheek, let him hit yoa left cheek too. If one guy steal yoa coat, give him yoa shirt too.
6.30: Give to everybody who aks you fo someting, an if one guy rip off yoa stuffs, no tell him fo give um back.
6.31: Do to da odda guy jalike you like him do to yo
6.32: âIf you guys ony get love an aloha fo da peopo dat get love an aloha fo you, you tink God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da bad kine guys get love an aloha fo da guys dat get love an aloha fo dem!
6.33: An if you guys ony do good to da peopo dat do good to you, you tink God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da peopo dat do bad kine stuff do dat.
6.34: If you guys ony lend someting to da peopo you tink goin give um back, you tink God owe you money fo dat? Even da bad kine peopo lend stuff to da bad kine peopo, if dey tink dey goin get um all back.
6.35: No way! Get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you, an do um good, an lend um stuff, an no tink if you goin get um back! Cuz da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, he everytime do good to da peopo dat no tank him an da peopo dat do real bad kine stuff. If you make like God, dat show dat he you guys Fadda, an you his kids. An bumbye, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo you guys cuz a dat.
6.36: Give chance jalike yoa Fadda give chanc
6.37: âNo make like one judge to nobody, an God no goin be yoa judge. No say da odda guy gotta be punish, an God no goin punish you. Let da odda guy go, an no stay huhu wit him. Den God goin let you go an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.
6.38: Give to da odda guy, an God goin give to you. He goin fill um up, shake um, fill um up some moa, plenny goin even run ova, an he goin pour um all inside yoa bag. Cuz da way you give, same way he goin give to you.â
6.39: Jesus talk some moa. He say, âYou tink one blind guy can lead anodda blind guy? He do dat, an dey both goin fall down inside one puka.
6.40: One guy not mo importan den his teacha, but everybody dat learn all da stuffs from dea teacha, dey goin come jalike dea teach
6.41: âHow come you guys spock da small piece junk inside yoa brudda's eye, an no tink bout da big two by four inside yoa own eye?
6.42: How you goin tell yoa brudda, âEh, try let me pull da small piece junk outa yoa eye,â wen you no see da big two by four inside yoa own eye? You say one ting an do anodda! First take da big two by four outa yoa own eye, den you can see good fo take da small piece junk outa yoa brudda's ey
6.43: âDa good kine tree no can give bad fruit, an da bad kine tree no can give good fruit.
6.44: You know da kine tree from da kine fruit dey give. No can pick da fig o da grape from da kine tree wit kuku.
6.45: Da good guy do good kine stuff from da good stuff inside his heart, an da bad guy do bad kine stuff from da bad stuff inside his heart. Da kine stuff inside da heart goin come out thru da mout by wat da guy sa
6.46: âHow come you guys call me âBoss, boss,â but you no do wat I say?
6.47: I goin show you guys how da guy stay dat come by me, an hear wat I say, an do um.
6.48: He jalike da guy dat stay build his house, an dig deep an put da foundation on top da rock. Den da big water come, an pound da house, but no can shake um, cuz he wen make um good.
6.49: But da guy dat hear wat I say an no do um, he jalike da guy dat build his house on top da groun, but no mo foundation. Da big water pound um, an dat house fall down an bus up.â

7.1: Wen Jesus pau teach da peopo all dat stuff, he go Capernaum town.
7.2: One captain fo da Rome army guys ova dea get one sick worka guy he get plenny love an aloha fo, an da guy stay dying.
7.3: Da captain wen hear bout Jesus, an he send some older Jewish leadas by him, fo aks him fo come an make his worka guy come good.
7.4: Wen dey come, dey beg him real hard. Dey say, âDis captain, he one good guy. So dass good if you can help him.
7.5: He get love an aloha fo our Jewish peopo, an he wen build our church fo us.â
7.6: So Jesus wen go wit dem. Wen he come near da house, da captain send his friends fo tell him, âBoss, no bodda yoaself, cuz I not good nuff fo you fo come inside my house.
7.7: Dass why I wen tink I not good nuff fo come by you. Jus say da word, an my worka guy goin come good.
7.8: You know, I get one army boss who tell me wat fo do. An I tell my army guys wat fo do. I tell one guy, âGo,â an he go. An I tell anodda guy, âCome,â an he come. An I tell my worka guy âDo dis,â an he do um.â
7.9: Wen Jesus hear dat, his jaws wen drop, an he wen tell all da peopo dat stay dea, âHo! Dis guy get um! No mo Israel peopo dat trus me lidat!â
7.10: Den da guys da captain wen send wen go back to da house, an wen see dat da worka guy wen come goo
7.11: Afta dat Jesus wen go Nain town. His guys an plenny odda peopo wen go wit him.
7.12: Wen Jesus come to da town gate, da peopo from da town wen carry one open box wit one mahke guy thru da gate. His mudda one widow, an he was her ony boy. Plenny peopo from da town wen go wit her.
7.13: Da Boss wen spock her, an he get pity fo her, an he say, âNo cry now.â
7.14: Den Jesus wen go an touch da open box wit da guy inside, an da guys dat stay carry um wen stand dea. He say, âEh, brah, I telling you, get up!â
7.15: Da mahke guy wen sit up, an start fo talk, an Jesus wen give him back to his mudd
7.16: Everybody wen come real scared, an dey wen talk good bout God lidis, âOne importan guy dat talk fo God wen come by us! God wen come fo take care his peopo!â
7.17: An dey wen tell all dis stuff bout Jesus all ova Judea an all da place aroun de
7.18: Da guys dat John stay teaching wen tell John all dis stuff. He wen tell two a his guys fo come by him,
7.19: an tell um fo go by da Boss Jesus an aks him, âEh, you da guy suppose to come, o wat? O we suppose to wait fo one nodda guy fo come?â
7.20: Wen dey come by Jesus dey say, âJohn Da Baptiza wen send us by you fo aks, âEh, you da guy suppose to come, o we suppose to wait fo one nodda guy fo come?â-â
7.21: Now, dat time Jesus stay make plenny guys come good from all kine sick, an wen make da bad kine spirits let go plenny peopo, an wen make plenny blind guys see.
7.22: So he tell um, âGo, tell John wat you guys stay hear an see. Had guys dat no can see, now dey can see. Had guys dat no can walk, now dey can walk. Had lepa guys, now dey no mo sick. Had guys dat no can hear, now dey can hear. Had guys dat wen mahke, now dey alive. Da peopo dat no mo notting, now dey hear all da Good Kine Stuff From God dat I teaching dem.
7.23: An if da tings I do no bodda you, den you goin stay good inside too.â
7.24: Afta John's messenja guys wen go way, Jesus tell all da peopo bout John. âWat you guys wen go in da boonies fo see? Da wind shaking one bamboo?
7.25: Nah! Kay den, wat you guys wen go ova dea fo see? One guy wit fancy kine clothes? You know wat? Da guys dat wear awesome kine clotheses an get all kine rich stuffs, dey stay inside da king's palace.
7.26: If not dat, wat you guys wen go fo see? One guy dat talk fo God? Dass right! I tell you, John, he mo den jus one guy dat talk fo God.
7.27: Dis da guy da Bible wen talk bout befo time, âI goin send my messenja guy befo you. He goin make everyting ready fo you, befo you come ova dea.â
7.28: An Jesus say, âI like tell you guys dis: No mo nobody eva wen born dat mo importan den John. Even da mostes small kine guy dat get God fo his King, he mo importan den John.â
7.29: Wen da guys dat take money fo tax an all da odda peopo wen hear dat, dey wen say, âYeah! God everytime do da right ting!â Cuz dey wen lissen John, an he wen baptize dem.
7.30: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach God's Rules, dey neva do wat God like dem fo do, an dey neva like John fo baptize de
7.31: Jesus say, âBut da peopo nowdays, how dem?
7.32: Dey jalike da kids sitting inside da open market place, an yelling to dea friends, âEh! Us guys play da flute fo you guys, but you guys no like dance! Us guys sing one sad funeral song, but you guys no like cry.â
7.33: Same ting, wen John Da Baptiza show up, he skip food plenny, an he no drink wine. Dass why you guys say, âHe get one bad kine spirit in charge a him!â
7.34: But me, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I come, I eat, I drink, an you guys say, âYou know wat? Dis guy everytime eating an drinking! He friends wit da tax guys, an da odda kine guys dat get bad name too.â
7.35: No matta wat me an John do, you guys no like! But da good guy who get da smarts from God, da tings he do, goin make proof dat he right.â
7.36: One Pharisee guy wen aks Jesus fo come his house fo eat. So Jesus wen go ova dea an wen sit down by da table.
7.37: Had one wahine from dat town dat wen do bad stuff an wen fool aroun. She wen hear dat Jesus stay sitting inside da Pharisee guy's house, an she bring one bottle made from da alabaster kine stone, full wit perfume.
7.38: She wen stand behind Jesus by his feet. She stay crying, an her tears wen make his feet wet. Den she wen wipe his feet wit her hair, kiss um, an wen pour da perfume on top de
7.39: Wen da Pharisee guy dat wen aks him fo come wen see dat, he wen tink, âEh, if dis guy was one guy dat talk fo God fo real kine, den he know wat kine wahine stay touching him, dat she one wahine dat do bad kine stuff.â
7.40: Jesus wen tell him, âSimon, I like tell you someting.â Simon say, âYeah, Teacha? Tell me.â
7.41: âHad two guys dat wen owe some money to one guy dat lend money. One guy wen owe him five hundred dolla, an da odda guy fifty.
7.42: Dey no can pay him back. So da guy wen tell, âDass okay. Foget um.â Which guy you tink goin get mo plenny love an aloha fo him?â
7.43: Simon say, âI tink da guy dat wen owe him moa.â
7.44: Den Jesus wen turn aroun to da wahine, an tell Simon, âYou see dis wahine? I wen come inside yoa house, an you neva give me water fo wash my feet. But she wen wash um wit her tears, an wen wipe um wit her hair.
7.45: You neva say âAlohaâ an give me one kiss, but wen I wen come inside yoa house, dis wahine no pau kiss my feet.
7.46: You neva give me olive oil fo my head fo show me respeck, but she wen cover my feet wit da perfume.
7.47: Az why I tell you, she wen do plenny bad kine stuff, but God wen let her go awready an hemo her shame fo all dat. An how come he wen do dat? Cuz she get plenny love an aloha fo God now, az why. Da guy dat wen do litto bit bad stuff, an God wen hemo his shame fo dat, he ony goin get litto bit love an aloha fo God.â
7.48: Den Jesus tell da wahine, âGod wen hemo da shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.â
7.49: An da odda guys sitting ova dea wen start fo talk to each odda, âWho dis guy dat even hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff?â
7.50: Jesus tell da wahine, âCuz you wen trus me, God wen take you outa da bad kine stuff you stay in. Go, an yoa heart can rest inside.â

8.1: Afta dat Jesus wen go thru da big an da small towns, an he teach da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King. Da Twelve Guys wen go wit him.
8.2: Befo time Jesus wen make some wahines come good from da bad kine spirits an all kine sick. Dey all wen go too: Mary da Magdala wahine, dat had seven bad kine spirits dat wen take ova her befo, an Jesus wen make um let her go.
8.3: An Joanna, Chuza's wife, she wen go. (Chuza, he da guy dat stay in charge, King Herod's house.) An Susanna, an plenny odda wahines, dey all wen go too. Da wahines wen use dea own money fo help take care Jesus de
8.4: Plenny peopo stay coming by Jesus from plenny towns, an he wen teach um wit one story.
8.5: He say, âYou wen hear da story bout da farma guy? He wen go plant seed. He throw da seeds all ova da groun fo plant. Some seeds fall down by da side da trail. Da peopo wen walk on top um, an da birds wen go eat um up.
8.6: Some seeds fall down on top da rocks, an grow, an den dry up, cuz no mo water inside da dirt.
8.7: Odda seeds wen fall down inside da kine bushes wit kuku. Da seeds an da bushes grow up togedda, an da bushes wit kuku choke um.
8.8: Odda seeds, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey wen grow good, an come up plenny, one hundred times mo den da farma wen plant.â
8.9: Da guys Jesus teach wen aks him, âWat dis story mean?â
8.10: He tell, âGod let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King. But I teach da odda peopo wit stories, so jalike da Bible say, âdey see, but dey no can see fo real kine. Dey hear, but dey no can hear fo real kine.â-â
8.11: Den Jesus tell, âDis wat da story mean. Da seed, dass wat God say.
8.12: Da seeds dat fall down on top da trail, dass jalike da peopo dat hear. But da Devil come take away wat God say from inside dea heart, so dey no can trus God. Dass why God no can take um outa da bad kine stuff dey do.
8.13: Da seeds on top da rocks, dass da peopo dat take wat God say, an dey stay good inside wen dey hear um. Dey trus God litto bit, but wen get hard time dey pau trus, cuz dey no mo root, jalike da seeds on top da rocks.
8.14: Da seeds dat fall down inside da bushes wit kuku, dass da peopo dat hear, but den dey worry plenny, an dey like come rich an get plenny stuffs, an dey like play aroun all da time. All dat stuff grab um, an choke um. Dey no rememba wat God say, jalike da seeds dat no mo wheat cuz dey stay inside da bushes wit kuku.
8.15: But ho! Da seeds dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike da peopo dat hear an rememba wat God say. Dey get good heart, do da right ting, an no give up. Dey jalike da seeds dat give good kine wheat.â
8.16: âYou no light one lamp an cover um wit one bucket, o put um unda da bed. No way! You goin put um on top one shelf so da guys dat come inside dea can see da light.
8.17: Cuz everyting dat stay hiding, bumbye God goin show um, an everyting dass hard fo undastan he goin make um clear, so da peopo can undastan.
8.18: Tink! You gotta lissen good! Da guy dat lissen good goin undastan plenny, but da guy dat no lissen good, God goin take away everyting he tink he know.â
8.19: Dat time Jesus mudda an bruddas wen come fo see him, but dey no can come near him cuz get choke plenny peopo ova dea.
8.20: One guy tell Jesus, âEh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.â
8.21: Jesus tell da guy, âMy mudda an my bruddas? Da peopo dat hear wat God say an do um, dey da ones az my mudda an bruddas fo real.â
8.22: One time Jesus wen tell his guys, âWe go da odda side da lake.â So dey go inside da boat an wen start fo go.
8.23: Wen dey stay sailing, Jesus wen sleep. One big wind storm wen come down on top da lake, an da waves was bussing ova da boat, so da boat almos wen huli. Dey was in bad shap
8.24: Da guys wen go wake Jesus up, an say, âEh, Boss! We goin mahke!â
8.25: He tell his guys, âHow come you guys no trus me?â
8.26: Dey wen sail da odda side da lake from Galilee, wea da Gerasa town peopo get dea fields.
8.27: Jesus wen go on top da beach. One guy from dat town wen come dat get some bad kine spirits in charge a him. Long time dat guy neva wear clotheses o stay inside one house, but he stay inside da caves wea dey put da mahke guys.
8.28-29: Plenny times befo, one bad spirit wen grab um. No matta if da guy had chains on his hands an feet, an one nodda guy wen watch um real good, he still wen broke da chains. An da bad spirit wen make da guy go odda places wea nobody stay. So wen da spirit spock Jesus, da guy yell, an fall down by Jesus feet. Jesus tell da bad spirit, âLet go da guy!â
8.30: Jesus aks da guy, âWat yoa name?â
8.31: Da bad kine spirits, dey beg Jesus plenny times fo no make um go suffa inside da Devil's Deep Dark Hol
8.32: Had plenny pigs dat stay grinding on top da hill. Da bad kine spirits wen beg Jesus, âIf you go make us let da guy, we like go take ova da pigs, yeah?â
8.33: So da bad kine spirits wen let go da guy, an go take ova da pigs. An den all da pigs wen run down one steep hill, an fall inside da lake, an drow
8.34: Wen da guys taking care da pigs wen see wat wen happen, dey wen run go tell everybody inside da town an all ova da place wat dey wen see.
8.35: All da peopo wen come fo look. Wen dey come by Jesus, dey spock da guy, an he no mo da bad kine spirits now. He stay sitting by Jesus feet wit clotheses on, an he tink good stuff now. An all da peopo wen come real scared.
8.36: Da guys dat wen see wat wen happen, dey tell da peopo bout da guy dat da bad kine spirits wen take ova, dat he stay good now.
8.37: Den all da peopo from aroun Gerasa town aks Jesus fo go way from dem, cuz dey real, real scared. So he go inside da boat an go wa
8.38: Da guy dat no mo bad kine spirits now, he wen beg Jesus if he can go wit him, but Jesus tell him, âNo, brah. No can.â Jesus tell,
8.39: âGo home. Tell how God wen help you plenny.â So da guy go way an tell all ova da town how Jesus wen help him plenn
8.40: Wen Jesus come back, plenny peopo feel good inside fo see um, cuz dey stay waiting fo him.
8.41: Had one one leada guy from da Jewish church, name Jairus. Right den an dea he wen come an go down by Jesus feet. He beg Jesus fo go his house,
8.42: cuz his ony girl, bout twelve years old, litto mo mahke ova de
8.43: Had one wahine ova dea dat stay bleeding twelve years. She wen pay everyting she get to da doctas, but nobody can make her come good.
8.44: She wen come behind Jesus, touch his clotheses. Right den an dea she wen pau blee
8.45: Jesus say, âWho wen touch me?â
8.46: But Jesus tell, âSomebody wen touch me. I know, cuz power wen go out from inside me.â
8.47: Den da wahine wen know dat dey goin find out, an she come an go down by Jesus feet, shaking real hard. In front all da peopo she wen tell how come she wen touch him, an how quick time she wen come good.
8.48: Jesus tell her, âSista, you trus me, dass why you come good awready. Go. Now yoa heart can stay rest inside.â
8.49: Wen Jesus still talking, one guy come from Jairus house, an say, âYoa girl mahke awready. No need bodda da teacha no moa.â
8.50: Wen Jesus hear dat, he turn aroun an tell Jairus, âNo scared, ony trus me, an she goin come good.â
8.51: Wen Jesus wen come Jairus house, he ony let Peter, John, an James, an da fadda an mudda go inside wit him, an no odda peopo.
8.52: Same time all da peopo wen cry an moan fo her. Jesus tell, âStop crying! She not mahke, she ony stay sleeping.â
8.53: An dey all wen laugh an make fun a him, cuz dey know she mahke.
8.54: But Jesus take her hand an say, âEh litto girl, get up!â
8.55: Right den an dea her life wen come back, an she wen get up. Den Jesus tell um, âGive her someting fo eat.â
8.56: An her fadda an mudda, wen blow dea minds. But Jesus tell um, âEh! No tell nobody wat wen happen, aah.â

9.1: Jesus tell his twelve guys fo come togedda, an he give um da right an da power fo make all da bad kine spirits let go peopo, an make all kine sick peopo come good.
9.2: Den he send um all ova fo tell everybody bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an fo make da sick peopo come good.
9.3: He tell um, âNo take notting fo da trip; no walking stick, no bag, no bread, no money, no extra clotheses.
9.4: Wen you guys go somebody's house, stay dea till you go way from dat town.
9.5: If da peopo inside da town no like you guys come, an no like hear wat you guys teach, den wen you guys go outa da town, dust da dust from yoa feet, fo show da peopo dea dat God no like if dey no lissen.â
9.6: So da guys wen go out an go from one small town to anodda, an dey teach da Good Stuff From God, an make da sick peopo all ova da place come goo
9.7: Dat time King Herod wen hear bout all dat wen happen. An he come all mix up, cuz some peopo wen say John Da Baptiza Guy, he wen come back alive.
9.8: Odda peopo say dat Elijah wen show up. An oddas dat one guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago wen come back alive.
9.9: Herod say, âI wen make my army guys cut off John's head. Den who dis guy? I stay hearing bout all da kine stuff he do.â An Herod wen like see Jesu
9.10: Da guys Jesus wen send all ova da place come back, an dey tell Jesus wat dey wen do. Den he take dem wit him an dey go way by demself to Betsaida town.
9.11: But all da peopo wen hear dat Jesus dem stay ova dea, so dey go dea too. Jesus give da peopo his aloha. He tell um bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an he make da sick peopo come goo
9.12: Wen da sun stay going down, da twelve guys wen come by him an say, âSend all da peopo away so dey can go da small towns an odda places aroun hea an get someting fo eat an some place fo sleep, cuz ova hea no mo notting.â
9.13: Jesus say, âYou guys, you give um someting fo eat.â
9.14: (Had bout five tousand guys ova dea
9.15: His guys wen do dat, an everybody sit down.
9.16: Jesus take da five breads an da two fishes. He look up da sky, an tell God âEh God! You good heart fo give da peopo food!â an broke da bread an da fishes. Den he give um to his guys fo give to da peopo.
9.17: Dey all wen eat, an come full. His guys wen take twelve big baskets an fill um up wit da lefova
9.18: One time Jesus wen pray in one place wea neva have nobody, an ony his guys wen stay dea wit him. He aks um, âSo! Who da peopo tink me?â
9.19: Da guys say, âSome guys say you John Da Baptiza Guy. Odda guys say Elijah. An odda guys say you one guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago, an now you come back alive.â
9.20: He aks dem, âKay den, wat bout you guys? Who you guys tink me?â
9.21: Jesus tell um, âYou guys betta not tell nobody dat I da Christ Guy, da Spesho One God wen send.â
9.22: He say, âI da Guy Dass Fo Real. I gotta suffa plenny stuff. Da older leadas, an da main pries guys, an da teachas dat teach God's Rules, dey goin figga I not Da Guy Dass Fo Real, an dey goin kill me fo dat. But day numba three, I goin come back alive.â
9.23: Den he tell all dem, âWhoeva like stick wit me, dey gotta make up dea mind dat dey no goin be dea own boss no moa. Goin be hard, jalike dying on top one cross every day. An den dey can stick wit me.
9.24: If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do everyting you do fo me, an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kine.
9.25: Dis poho: one guy get everyting inside dis world, but end up losing himself, an no mo life inside.
9.26: If one guy stay shame a me an da tings I say, den me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, I goin be shame a him wen I come back. I goin be awesome jalike my Fadda, wen I come back wit my spesho angel guys.
9.27: Dass true, wat I telling you guys: Some a da peopo dat stay hea now, dey no goin mahke befo dey see how stay wen God da Kin
9.28: Bout one week lata, Jesus wen take Peter, John, an James wit him up one mountain fo pray.
9.29: Wen he stay praying, his face wen change an he look real diffren. His clotheses come bright jalike da lightning.
9.30: Right den an dea two guys, Moses an Elijah, come outa no wea, an dey stay talking wit Jesus.
9.31: Dey awesome. Dey talk bout how Jesus goin do everyting, jalike God wen say, cuz pretty soon he goin mahke Jerusalem side.
9.32: Peter an his friends wen sleep. But wen dey wake up, dey see Jesus, an da two guys standing dea wit him. An he look awesome.
9.33: Wen da two guys wen start fo go way from Jesus, Peter tell him, âYou know wat, Boss? Good we stay ova hea! We goin make three shacks, one fo you, one fo Moses, an one fo Elijah!â (He neva know wat he was saying
9.34: Wen Peter still talking, one cloud wen come an cover um. An his guys come real scared.
9.35: Den one voice from inside da cloud say, âDis my boy, da One I wen send. Lissen to him!â
9.36: Wen da voice pau talk, ony Jesus stay dea. Dat time da guys he teaching no tell nobody bout wat dey wen se
9.37: Da nex day dey wen go down from da mountain, an plenny peopo come fo meet Jesus.
9.38: One guy wen yell, âTeacha! I beg you, look my boy, my ony boy!

12.44: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis: Da boss goin put him in charge all his stuffs.
12.45: But if da worka guy tink, âLong time my boss no come,â an he beef wit da odda worka guys an da wahines, an he eat an drink an get drunk,
12.46: dat guy's boss goin come back one day wen da luna guy no tink he goin come, an one time wen da luna guy donno. Da boss goin wipe out da luna guy an send um away wea da peopo stay dat no trus Go
12.47: âDa worka guy dat know wat his boss like, an no get ready fo do um, an no do wat da boss like him fo do, his boss goin punish him real hard.
12.48: But da worka guy dat donno wat his boss like um fo do, so he do someting bad, his boss goin ony punish him litto bit, cuz da guy neva know. So, if God give you everyting you need fo work fo him, you betta do um good job fo him.â
12.49: âI wen come fo bring da fire on top da earth, an now I like da fire fo start.
12.50: But first I gotta suffa plenny, an I get hard time now till dat pau.
12.51: You tink I wen come to dis world fo help everybody come friends an no fight? I no come fo dat, but fo make um go agains each odda.
12.52: From now, on goin get five peopo in one ohana dat stay fight each odda, three agains two, an two agains three.
12.53: Dey goin stay agains each odda, da faddas agains dea boys, an da boys agains dea faddas, muddas agains dea girls, an girls agains dea muddas, mudda-in-laws agains dea daughta-in-laws, an daughta-in-laws agains dea mudda-in-laws.â
12.54: Jesus tell da peopo, âWen you spock one black cloud coming up, right den an dea you say, âGoin rain,â an dass wat happen.
12.55: An wen you feel da kona wind blowing, you say, âGoin come hot,â an dass wat happen.
12.56: You guys say one ting an do anodda! You can figga wat goin happen from da earth an da sky. How come you no can figga da tings dat stay happening now?â
12.57: âHow come you no figga fo yoaself wat stay right?
12.58: Wen you going in front da judge wit one guy dat stay agains you, try fo make good wit him befo you go ova dea. Cuz if you no do dat, he goin drag you in front da judge, an da judge goin give you to da police, an da police goin throw you in jail.
12.59: I telling you, you gotta pay everyting you owe befo you can come out.â

13.1: Dat time some peopo stay dea, an tell Jesus bout da peopo from Galilee dat Pilate's army guys wen kill, same time dose peopo making sacrifice inside da temple.
13.2: Jesus say, âYou tink dem guys from Galilee wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo from Galilee cuz dey wen suffa lidat?
13.3: I telling you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an pau do um, all you guys goin mahke too.
13.4: Da eighteen guys dat wen mahke wen da tower Siloam side wen fall down on top um -- you tink dey wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo inside Jerusalem?
13.5: I telling you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an pau do um, all you guys goin mahke too.â
13.6: Jesus wen tell um dis story fo teach um. âHad one guy dat wen get one fig tree dat stay growing inside his grape field. He go fo look if get fruit on um, but no mo fruit.
13.7: So he wen tell da worka guy dat take care da field, âThree years now I stay come fo look if get fruit on dis fig tree, an no mo fig! Cut um down, fo no use up da dirt!â
13.8: But da worka guy say, âBoss, leave um one mo year. I goin dig one ditch aroun um, an put fertiliza inside da ditch.
13.9: If da tree give fruit nex year, dass good! If no give fruit, den cut um down!â-â
13.10: One Rest Day Jesus stay teaching inside one Jewish church.
13.11: One wahine stay dea dat no can walk good. One bad kine spirit wen make her lidat eighteen years befo. She was bent ova an no can stand up strait.
13.12: Jesus spock her, an tell her, âSista, I make you come good from all yoa sick!â
13.13: Den he put his hands on top her, an right den an dea she wen stand up strait an tell how awesome God sta
13.14: Da main leada guy fo da Jewish church wen come huhu cuz Jesus wen make her come good on da Rest Day. So, he tell all da peopo, âGet six days fo work. So, come let um make you come good on dem days, an not on da Rest Day!â
13.15: Da Boss Jesus wen tell um, âYou guys say one ting an do anodda! Every one a you guys hemo his cow o his donkey from da fence an lead um out fo get water on da Rest Day.
13.16: But dis wahine from Abraham's ohana, da Devil wen make her so she no can walk good fo eighteen years. You no tink dass okay fo hemo her from da sick dat wen make her no can walk, an do um on da Rest Day too, o wat?â
13.17: Wat he say, wen make all da guys dat stay agains him come shame. But da peopo stay good inside cuz a all da awesome stuff he wen d
13.18: Jesus wen tell, âWat you tink stay like, wen God stay King? Wat story I can tell you guys fo make um mo clear?
13.19: Start small, den come big. Dass jalike one small mustard seed. One guy take um an plant um inside his yard. Da small seed grow up, an come one big bush, an da birds come down outa da sky an make house inside da branches.â
13.20: An Jesus tell, âWat you tink stay like, wen God stay King?
13.21: Make everyting come diffren, yeah? Dass jalike da yeast. One wahine take um an put um inside one big bowl wit flour. Bumbye da whole bread come diffren cuz a da yeast.â
13.22: Jesus wen go thru da big an small towns, an teach. He stay going Jerusalem.
13.23: One guy wen aks him, âBoss, ony litto bit peopo goin come outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, yeah?â
13.24: âMake shua you try hard fo get God fo yoa King! You know, dass jalike you go inside one place thru one skinny door. Plenny peopo goin try fo go inside dea, but dey no ca
13.25: Jalike da house owna goin pau eat, he go lock da door fo go sleep. Den you guys goin stand outside an start fo knock da door an say, âEh Boss, open da door fo us!â
13.26: Den you guys goin say, âEh! Us guys wen eat an drink wit you, an you wen teach us wen you was walking down our street.â
13.27: He goin say one mo time, âI donno who you guys o wea you guys come from! Get outa hea, all you guys dat no do wass right!â
13.28: You guys, you goin see Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob, an all da guys dat wen talk fo God, an dey goin stay dea wit God da King, but he goin throw you guys outside. Den you guys goin cry an grind yoa teet cuz you so mad an futless.
13.29: Da peopo goin come from mauka side an makai side an all ova an dey goin sit an party wit God da King.
13.30: An you know wat? Get guys dat peopo tink dey not importan now, an dey goin be da mos importan guys wen God stay King. Get odda guys dat peopo tink dey importan now, but dey no goin be importan wen God stay King.â
13.31: Dat time, had some Pharisee guys dat wen come by Jesus an tell him. âYou betta get outa hea, an go anodda place, cuz King Herod like kill you, you know.â
13.32: Jesus say, âGo tell dat bugga dat I say, âI make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an I make da peopo come good today an tomorrow, an day numba three, my work goin pau.â
13.33: But I still gotta go today an tomorrow an da nex day, till I get to Jerusalem. You know, befo time da Jewish peopo wen kill da guys dat wen talk fo God, an Jerusalem was da place dey wen kill u
13.34: Auwe! You peopo inside Jerusalem! You wen throw rocks an kill da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time. Plenny times I wen like bring all yoa kids togedda, jalike one mudda hen bring togedda her chicks unda her wings, but you guys no like come by me!
13.35: Auwe! Everyting all poho fo you guys awready! I tell you guys, you no goin see me again till bumbye wen you guys say, âDis da Guy dat come fo da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky, an we like God do good tings fo him!â-â

14.1: One Rest Day, one Pharisee guy wen tell Jesus fo come his house fo eat. He one main leada fo da Pharisee guys. An da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach God's Rules wen watch Jesus real good.
14.2: Had one sick guy dat show up ova dea in front Jesus. He get da kine sick dat make da arms an da legs come fat.
14.3: Jesus wen aks da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach God's Rules, âYou tink da Rules say dass good fo make one guy come good on da Rest Day, o wat?â
14.4: But dey neva say notting. So he wen take da sick guy, an make um come good, an tell um fo go.
14.5: Den he tell dem, âIf da Rest Day, an one a you guys get one boy o one cow dat fall down inside one deep water hole, you goin pull um out right away, o wat? No matta da Rest Day, yeah?â
14.6: But dey no can say nottin
14.7: Jesus see dat befo dey eat, some guys ova dea wen pick da main places by da table. So he tell um dis fo teach um:
14.8: He say, âWen somebody tell you fo come da wedding lu`au, no go sit down by da place fo da spesho wedding guys. You do dat, an den one guy mo importan den you goin come.
14.9: Den da boss fo da lu`au dat wen tell him an you fo come, he goin tell you, âGive dis guy yoa place.â Den you goin come shame, an take da place fo da guy dass not importan.
14.10: Mo betta, wen dey tell you fo come, go take da place fo da guy dass not importan. Den wen da boss fo da lu`au come, he goin tell you, âMy friend, ova hea mo betta.â Den everybody dea goin get respeck fo you cuz a dat.
14.11: Cuz whoeva make himself importan, no goin be importan, an whoeva make himself not importan, goin be importan.â
14.12: Den Jesus tell da guy dat wen tell um fo come his place fo eat, âWen you make one lunch o one dinna, no tell yoa friends, o yoa bruddas, o yoa ohana, o da rich guys nex door fo come. You do dat, an bumbye dey goin tell you fo come dea house, an dat goin pay you back fo wat you wen do.
14.13: Mo betta, wen you make one lu`au, tell da guys dat no mo notting fo come, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can walk, an da guys dat no can see.
14.14: Den you goin stay good inside. Cuz dem guys no can pay you back bumbye. But God, he goin give you back someting good fo wat you wen do, wen da peopo dat wen do da right tings come back alive.â
14.15: One guy dat stay sitting at da table wen hear dat, an he tell Jesus, âFo shua, da guys dat goin sit down at God's table wen he come King, dey can stay good inside!â
14.16: Jesus tell, âYou wen hear da story bout da guy dat wen make one big lu`au? He aks plenny peopo fo come.
14.17: Bumbye he send his worka guy fo tell da peopo, âCome on! Everyting stay ready!â
14.18: But dey all wen start fo make up story. Da first guy wen tell da worka guy, âI jus wen buy one field, an I gotta go look um. Sorry.â
14.19: Anodda guy say, âI jus wen buy ten cows fo plow, an I goin go see if dey strong nuff fo work. Sorry.â
14.20: Anodda guy say, âI jus wen get married, so I no can go wit you.â
14.21: Da worka guy go tell his boss. Da boss fo da house wen come huhu, an tell da worka guy, âHurry up! Go out by da big an small roads inside town, an bring back da guys dat no mo notting, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can see, an da guys dat no can walk.â
14.22: Bumbye da worka guy come an say, âWe wen do wat you wen say, an still yet get room.â
14.23: Da boss tell da worka guy, âGo out by da big an small roads in da country side an make da peopo come in, so my house can come full.
14.24: I telling you now, da peopo I wen tell first, not one a dem goin taste my lu`au food.â-â
14.25: Plenny peopo wen go wit Jesus. He turn aroun to dem, an say,
14.26: âWhoeva come by me, an get love an aloha fo dea fadda an mudda, dea wife an kids, dea bruddas an sistas -- an even fo demself too, mo den dey get love an aloha fo me, dey no can be my guy.
14.27: Whoeva no like suffa fo me, o even mahke on top one cross, dey no can be my gu
14.28: âIf one a you guys tink you goin make one tower, you betta sit down first an figga out how much goin cost, fo know if you get nuff money fo finish da tower, yeah?
14.29: If you no do dat, you goin make da foundation, an den you no can make da rest. Den everybody goin bus laugh at you.
14.30: Dey goin say, âDis guy wen start fo make litto bit, an he no can finish da job.â
14.31: âIf one king going out wit ten tousand army guys fo fight anodda king, an da odda king come agains um wit twenty tousand army guys, da guy wit ony ten tousand army guys goin sit down first an figga if him an his guys strong nuff fo fight da odda king an his guys, yeah?
14.32: If he not strong nuff, he goin send talka guys fo meet da odda king wen he still stay far away, an dey goin talk so dey no fight.â
14.33: Jesus say, âSame ting. You guys no can be my guys if you no give up everyting you get.â
14.34: âSalt stay good. But if da salt no mo taste, no way you can make um work like salt again.
14.35: Dat kine salt no good fo even da dirt o da manure pile. Ony ting can do, throw um away. If you hear dis, you betta lissen!â

15.1: One time all da guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen an da odda guys dat get bad name wen come togedda by Jesus fo lissen.
15.2: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach God's Rules wen squawk. Dey say, âDis guy get peopo wit bad name fo his friends, an he eat wit dem.â
15.3: So Jesus tell um dis fo teach u
15.4: He say, âWat you tink? If one a you guys get hundred sheeps, but one sheep stay lost, you goin leave da ninety nine sheeps inside da boonies, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, yeah?
15.5: Wen you find um, you feel real good inside, an you put um on top yoa shouldas,
15.6: an go home. Den you tell all yoa friends an da peopo nex door, âCome, party wit me! Cuz I wen find my sheep dat was lost.â
15.7: I telling you, same ting, God an da angel guys inside da sky feel mo good inside cuz a one bad guy dat come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an like pau do um, den cuz a all da odda guys dat tink dey no need come sorry.â
15.8: âO, wat you tink? If one wahine get ten silva coins, an she lose one, wat she goin do? She goin open one lamp, den she sweep da whole house, an look real good till she find um.
15.9: An wen she find um, she goin tell all her friends an da peopo nex door, âCome, party wit me! Cuz I wen find my coin dat was lost!â
15.10: I telling you, same ting, da angel guys dat stay wit God feel plenny good inside, everytime one bad guy come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an pau do um.â
15.11: Jesus wen tell, âHad one guy dat get two boys.
15.12: Da younga boy wen tell his fadda, âPapa, give me my share from all you get.â So da fadda wen split all he get an give da boys dea share.
15.13: Afta dat da younga boy wen get all his stuffs, sell his share an take da money, an go one far place. An ova dea he spend um all, cuz he no stay in charge a himself.
15.14: Den, afta he spend all his money, get hard time ova dea. No mo food da whole place. An da boy, he no mo notting.
15.15: Den da boy wen go by one guy from dat country, an da guy wen send him out inside his fields, fo feed da pigs.
15.16: Man, da boy stay so hungry he like eat da pods da pigs was eating, an neva have nobody dat give him nottin
15.17: âDen he wise up an tink, âEh, how come?! All da guys dat work fo my fadda fo pay, dey get mo plenny food den dey can eat. Me, I so hungry ova hea, dat I litto mo mahke!
15.18: Mo betta I go back wit my fadda. Den I tell um, âPapa, I wen do bad ting agains God in da sky, an agains you.
15.19: I not good nuff fo be yoa boy. Let me work fo you fo pay, so den bumbye I pay you back.â
15.20: Den he wen leave da place an go to his fadd
15.21: Da boy say, âPapa, I wen do bad ting agains God in da sky, an agains you. I not good nuff fo be yoa boy.â
15.22: âBut da fadda wen tell his worka guys, âCome quick! Hurry up! Go get one robe, da bestes one, an put um on him. Put one ring on top his finga an shoes on top his feet.
15.23: Go get da bestes young cow an kill um. We goin make one party an eat an dance an sing!
15.24: Cuz dis my boy. Jalike he wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!â An dey wen make part
15.25: âDa older boy, he stay working inside da fields. Den he come near da house, an he hear da music wit da hula.
15.26: So he aks one a da kids, âEh, wass da haps?â
15.27: âDa kid tell, âYoa brudda wen come back home, an yoa fadda wen tell da worka guys fo kill da bestes young cow, cuz yoa fadda wen take him in, an everyting okay now!â
15.28: âDa older brudda, he wen come real huhu. He no like go inside da house. So da fadda guy go outside an beg him fo come inside.
15.29: He tell his fadda, âLook hea! I wen work fo you jalike one slave, plenny years! I neva go agains notting you wen tell me fo do! Wat you wen give me, hah? You neva even give me one goat fo make party wit my friends!
15.30: But dis guy, yoa boy, he wen eat up all da money fo yoa land fo pay da kine wahines dat fool aroun fo money. An wen he come home, right den an dea you kill da bestes young cow fo him, an den!â
15.31: âBut da fadda tell, âMy boy, you everytime stay hea wit me, an everyting I get, yoas too.
15.32: But eh! good we make party an dance an sing an feel good inside! Cuz jalike dis guy, yoa brudda, wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!â-â

16.1: Jesus wen tell da guys he teaching, âYou wen hear da story bout da rich guy dat get one luna, an he wen spend da rich guy's money on all kine stuffs?
16.2: So da rich guy tell da luna fo come, an he say, âEh, wat dis I hear bout you? You betta give me one paper dat tell how you wen spend my money, cuz you no goin be in charge no mo.â
16.3: âDa luna tink, âWat I goin do now? My boss goin fire me, an I not strong nuff fo dig da ditch, an I shame fo beg.
16.4: I know wat I goin do, so dat wen I no mo job hea, da peopo goin let me come dea house.â
16.5: âDen da luna tell all da guys dat owe da rich guy money fo come. He aks da first guy, âHow plenny money you owe my boss?â
16.6: Da guy say, âOne hundred barrel olive oil.â Da luna say, âDis yoa bill. Hurry up! Sit down an write fifty.â
16.7: Da luna aks anodda guy, âHow plenny money you owe?â He say, âOne tousand bushel wheat.â Da luna say, âDis yoa bill. Write eight hundred.â
16.8: No matta da luna wen do stuff dass not right befo, now da boss talk good to him bout dis smart ting he wen do. You know, da peopo dat stick wit dis world mo smart wit da kine money stuff den da peopo dat stick wit God's light.â
16.9: âI telling you, no matta can use money fo all kine stuff dass not right, you guys can use um too fo make friends fo yoaself. Den bumbye, wen da time come dat da money an everyting goin pau, God goin tell you guys âAloha!â inside his place dat stay foeva.
16.10: Whoeva do da small kine stuff he suppose to, you can trus him fo do da big kine stuff he suppose to. Whoeva no do da right ting fo da small kine stuff, you can trus him fo no do da right ting fo da big kine stuff.
16.11: So, no matta peopo can get money fo do stuff dass not right, if you not da kine guy peopo can trus wit even dat kine money, no way God goin trus you fo take care all his rich kine stuffs dass fo real.
16.12: An if nobody can trus you fo take care odda peopo's stuffs, no way God goin give you stuff fo yoaself.â
16.13: âDa worka guy no can work, an two boss guys own him same time. Bumbye he goin hate one boss an love da odda boss. He goin do good kine stuff fo one boss an tink bad bout da odda boss. You no can work fo da God dass fo real an da money god.â
16.14: But da Pharisee guys, dey love money. Wen dey hear all da stuff Jesus wen say, dey make fun a him.
16.15: Jesus tell um, âYou da guys dat tell da peopo you do da right kine stuff, but God know how you guys stay inside. Da stuff da peopo tink stay real good, dass da stuff God tink no good.â
16.16: âHad da Rules Moses wen write down, an da stuff da guys dat talk fo God wen write down, till John Da Baptiza come. Afta dat us guys tell da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King, an everybody stay jamming, cuz dey like get God fo dea King.
16.17: Stay mo easy fo da sky an da earth fo go pau den fo one litto line from God's Rules fo go pa
16.18: âWhoeva dump his wife an marry anodda wahine, dass jalike he stay fool aroun somebody not his wife. An da guy dat marry one wahine afta her husban wen dump her, dass jalike he stay fool aroun wit anodda guy's wife.â
16.19: Jesus say, âOne time had one rich guy dat wear da rich kine clotheses. Everytime he live jalike one king.
16.20: Had one begga guy name Lazarus dat get sores all ova him. Every day his friends wen put him down by da rich guy's gate.
16.21: You know, he like eat da stuff dat fall down from da rich guy's table. An da dogs even wen come lick his sore
16.22: âBumbye da begga guy wen mahke an da angel guys carry him by Abraham's side wit God. An da rich guy mahke too, an dey bury him.
16.23: Inside Hell da rich guy wen suffa plenny, an he look up. He spock Abraham far away wit God, wit Lazarus by his sid
16.24: âSo he yell, âEh Abraham, my ancesta guy! Pity me an send Lazarus fo dip da tip a his finga in water fo cool my tongue, cuz I stay suffa plenny inside dis fire.â
16.25: âBut Abraham say, âMy boy, rememba dat wen you wen stay alive, you wen get all da good kine stuffs, an Lazarus wen get all da bad kine stuffs. Now he stay good ova hea, an you stay suffa inside dis fire.
16.26: Anodda ting, in da middle get one real big ditch. You stay on one side, an we stay on da odda. Da peopo dat like go from ova hea to you no can, an da peopo dat like go from ova dea to ova hea no can.â
16.27: âDa rich guy say, âDen I beg you, cuz you my ancesta guy, send Lazarus to my fadda's house,
16.28: cuz I get five bruddas. He gotta tell dem bout dis place, so dat dey no come hea an suffa.â
16.29: âAbraham say, âYoa bruddas get Moses Rules, an da tings da odda guys dat talk fo God wen write down inside da Bible. Yoa bruddas can hear wat dey say.â
16.30: âBut da rich guy say, âNo way, Abraham, my ancesta guy! But if one guy come back to dem from mahke, dey goin come sorry fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um.â
16.31: âBut Abraham say, âIf dey no lissen to Moses Rules, an to da guys dat wen talk fo God, dey no goin lissen an trus God, even if one guy come back alive from mahke.â-â

17.1: Jesus tell da guys he teaching, âTings dat make peopo do bad kine stuff goin happen, but auwe fo da guy dat make anodda guy do um!
17.2: Mo betta take one big stone, tie um aroun da guy's neck, den throw him inside da deep ocean fo drown, so he no can make even one a my small kids hea do bad kine stuff.
17.3: So watch out wat you d
17.4: If he do bad ting fo hurt you seven times in one day, an he come back by you seven times, an say, âI really sorry, an I pau do dat,â den no stay huhu wit him, but let him go.â
17.5: Da guys da Boss Jesus like send all ova tell him, âHelp us trus God moa.â
17.6: Da Boss say, âIf you trus God litto bit jalike one small mustard seed, you can tell dis mulberry tree, âPull yoaself up an go plant yoaself in da ocean,â an da tree goin do um.â
17.7: âWat you tink? If get one worka guy dat plow da dirt fo his boss, o take care his sheeps, wen da guy come inside from da field, you tink da boss goin tell um, âCome on! Eatâ? No way!
17.8: Da boss goin say, âMake my suppa, go get ready, an bring um all fo me so I can eat an drink. Afta dat, you goin eat an drink.â Dass wat he goin say.
17.9: You tink he goin tank da worka guy cuz he wen do wat da boss tell um fo do? No way!
17.10: Same ting. Wen you guys go do everyting you suppose to, den you goin say, âWe jus worka guys. We ony wen do wat we suppose to.â-â
17.11: Jesus stay going Jerusalem, an he pass by wea Samaria an Galilee come togedda.
17.12: He go inside one small town, an ten lepa guys wen come by him. Dey stand far away
17.13: an yell, âJesus, Boss, pity us!â
17.14: Jesus see um an tell um, âGo let da pries guys check you guys out.â An wen dey stay going, dey wen come goo
17.15: One a da guys see dat he wen come good. He come back, saying good stuff bout God wit one loud voice.
17.16: He throw himself down by Jesus feet, an tell him âMahalo plenny!â He one guy from Samari

10.1: Jesus say, âDis fo shua wat I telling you guys: If get one place fo da sheeps, an somebody no go inside dea by da gate, but he go climb ova da wall one nodda place, dat guy ony like steal da sheeps.

10.11: âI jalike one good sheep farma, cuz da good kine sheep farma give himself fo mahke fo his sheep
10.12: âBut if get one worka guy dey pay, den he not da sheep farma guy. He no own da sheeps. So wen he spock one wild wolf coming, he run away from da sheeps. Den da wolf grab da sheeps, an all da odda sheeps run all ova da place.
10.13: Da worka guy run away, cuz he ony working fo da money, an he no care fo da sheep
10.14: âI jalike one good sheep farma. I know my sheeps, an dey know me,
10.15: jalike my Fadda know me, an I know my Fadda. I give myself fo mahke fo my sheeps.

10.17: âDis why my Fadda get love an aloha fo me: cuz I goin give myself fo mahke so I can come back alive again.

10.21: But odda guys wen say, âNah! One guy wit one bad kine spirit in charge a him no talk lidis! You tink one bad kine spirit can make one blind guy see? No way!â
10.22: Was one spesho religious time. Dass wen da Jewish peopo rememba da time wen dea ancestas wen make da temple inside Jerusalem spesho fo God again. Was winta time.

11.1-2: Had one guy, name Lazarus. He get two sistas, Mary an Marta, an dey all come from Betany town. Mary, she da wahine dat wen put da perfume on top da Boss Jesus feet, an wipe um wit her hair. Now, Lazarus wen come sick.
