7.1: Da Head Priest guy wen tell Stephen, âDass true, o wat?â
7.2: Stephen say, âMy bruddas an my faddas, try lissen to me! Da awesome God wen come by our ancesta Abraham wen he stay Mesopotamia side, befo he wen go Haran side.
7.3: God wen tell him, âGo way from yoa place an yoa ohana, an go da place I goin show you.â

Latas, Isaac wen get Jacob fo his boy, an Jacob wen get twelve boys. Dem twelve guys wen come da main faddas an leadas fo da twelve ohanas fo da Israel peop
7.9: âDa bruddas wen come jealous cuz a dea brudda Joseph, an dey wen sell him fo come one slave in Egypt side. But God wen stay wit him.

7.11: Den one big hard time wen come all ova Egypt an Canaan, an everybody wen suffa plenny. So our ancesta guys no can find food fo eat.

7.13: Da nex time dey wen go, da guy Joseph tell his bruddas who him, an den Pharaoh wen hear bout Joseph's ohana.

7.15: Dass how Jacob wen go Egypt side. Bumbye he wen mahke, an our ancesta guys, dey wen mahke too.
7.16: Our peopo wen bring back dea bodies to Shechem, an wen put um inside da tombs dat Abraham wen buy from Hamor's boys befo tim
7.17: âWen da time wen stay near fo God fo do all da stuff he wen promise our ancesta Abraham, our ohana in Egypt side wen come mo big.
7.18: Den one odda king wen come Pharaoh in Egypt dat neva know who Joseph.
7.19: He wen bulai our peopo an make our ancesta guys suffa plenny. He wen make dem throw out dea babies dat jus wen born, so dey no goin stay live.
7.20: Dat time Moses wen born. Everybody tink he look real nice. Three months dey wen hide Moses an take care him inside his fadda's house.
7.21: Wen dey no can hide him no moa, dey wen put him outside, an Pharaoh's girl wen find him an wen take care him jalike he her own boy.
7.22: Dey wen teach Moses plenny so he wen know all da stuff da smart guys in Egypt wen know. An he wen talk an make jalike one guy dat get powe
7.23: âWen Moses wen come forty years old, he wen like go by his bruddas an sistas, da Israel peopo.
7.24: He wen spock one Egypt guy dat wen bus up one Israel guy, so he wen go help da Israel guy. He wen kill da Egypt guy, fo pay him back.
7.25: He wen tink his own peopo goin know dat God wen use him fo take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, but dey neva know dat.
7.26: Da nex day Moses wen come by two Israel guys dat stay beefing. He wen try fo make um come friends. He wen say, âEh, you guys bruddas. How come you hurting each odda?â
7.27: But da guy dat stay bussing up da odda guy wen push Moses away an wen say, âEh, who you tink you? Who wen make you da leada guy an da judge fo us?
7.28: You like kill me jalike you wen kill da Egypt guy yesterday?â
7.29: Wen Moses wen hear dat, he wen beat it outa dea an go Midian side. An he wen stay ova dea long time, but he not from dea. An he wen marry an get two boy
7.30: âAfta forty years, one angel guy wen come by Moses inside one bush dat stay burning in da boonies near da mountain name Sinai.

7.32: âI yoa ancestas God; I Abraham's God, an Isaac's God, an Jacob's God.â Eh, da guy Moses wen come so scared he wen shake all ova, an he neva like look.
7.33: Da Boss wen tell him, âTake off yoa slippas, cuz da place wea you stay standing, dat one place dat stay spesho fo me.
7.34: Fo shua I wen see how da Egypt peopo stay make my peopo suffa plenny. I wen hear dem moaning, an I stay come fo let dem go. Come, I goin send you back Egypt side.â-â
7.35: Den Stephen wen tell dem, âMoses, he da guy dat da Israel peopo wen throw out. Dey wen say, âEh, who make you da leada guy an da judge fo us guys?â But Moses da one God wen send fo come dea leada an da one dat wen cut um loose from da bad kine stuff dey stay in, cuz da angel messenja guy dat Moses wen see inside da bush wen help him fo know dat he da one God wen pick.

7.37: Moses, he da same guy dat wen tell da Israel peopo lata, âGod goin send one Guy fo you dat goin talk fo him, jalike he wen send me. An dat One goin come from you guys ohana.â
7.38: Moses wen stay wit all da peopo dat wen stay togedda inside da boonies, wit all our ancesta guys, an wit da angel guy dat wen talk to him on top Sinai Mountain. God wen tell him good stuff fo tell us, an dat stuff still stay going stron
7.39: âBut our ancesta guys neva like do wat Moses wen say. Inside dea hearts dey like throw him out, an like go back Egypt side.
7.40: Dey wen tell Aaron, âMake odda gods fo us dat can show us da way fo go. Moses wen bring us outa Egypt, but we donno wea he stay now!â
7.41: Dat time dey wen make one idol kine god dat look jalike one baby cow. Dey wen make sacrifice fo um, an den wen make one big party fo da ting dey wen make wit dea own hands.
7.42: So God wen turn away from dem, an give dem ova so dey can go down an pray to da sun an da moon an da stars. Dat wen happen jalike da guy Amos, dat wen talk fo God long time ago, wen write down. He wen sa
7.44: An den Stephen say, âOur ancesta guys dea inside da boonies wen get da big tent dat show God stay wit dem. Dey make um jalike God wen tell Moses.
7.45: Dey wen make da tent, an carry um wit dem. Den bumbye Joshua wen bring dem inside dis land. God wen push out da diffren peopos dat stay hea. An our ancesta guys wen take away da land from dem. Dat tent wen stay hea long time till King David wen come.
7.46: God wen do plenny good tings fo David. So David wen aks God fo let him make one mo betta house fo God, da same God dat David's ancesta Jacob wen pray to.
7.47: But David's boy Solomon, he da one wen make dat house fo Go
7.48: âBut da God Dat Stay Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, he no stay everytime inside one house dat peopo make. Jalike da guy Isaiah dat wen talk fo God, wen say, âDa Boss sa
7.51: Den Stephen say, âYou guys so hard head! Yoa hearts an yoa ears, you no like give um to God! You make jalike yoa ancesta guys! You everytime like beef agains God's Spesho Spirit!
7.52: Yoa ancesta guys everytime wen make da guys dat wen talk fo God suffa. Yoa ancesta guys even wen kill da guys dat wen tell dat God's Spesho Guy dat everytime do da right ting goin come. An den, you guys wen set him up an wen kill him!
7.53: No matta was you guys dat wen get da Rules from God, an da angel messenja guys wen bring um, still yet you guys no do wat God's Rules say!â

7.55: But God's Spesho Spirit wen take charge a him. An he look up to da sky, an see how awesome God stay, an Jesus standing by God's right side.

7.57: Den dey wen yell real loud, an dey wen cover dea ears, an dey wen run at him,

7.59: Dey all stay throwing stones at Stephen, an he wen tell da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky, âJesus, you da Boss. Take my spirit!â
7.60: An he wen fall down on his knees, an wen yell, âBoss, no hold dis bad ting agains dem.â An afta he wen say dat, he wen mahk

9.1: Saul still yet stay telling da peopo dat stay tight wit da Boss dat he goin kill dem. He wen go da Head Priest guy

9.10: Inside Damascus had one guy name Ananias dat wen stick wit da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He wen see someting jalike one dream wea da Boss wen tell him, âAnanias!â

15.3: Da Antioch church guys wen send dem. Dey wen go thru Fonecia an Samaria, an dey wen tell da bruddas an sistas dea dat da peopo dat not Jews wen trus Jesus. All da bruddas an sistas wen stay good inside wen dey wen hear dat.

15.5: But some a da Pharisee guys dat wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus wen stand up an say, âDa guys dat not Jews, no matta dey trus Jesus, dey gotta cut skin an do all da odda stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules.â
15.6: Da guys Jesus wen send an da older leadas wen come togedda fo talk bout dat.
15.7: Dey talk fo long time, an den Peter wen stand up an tell um, âBruddas, you know dat befo time God wen pick me fo go tell da peopo dat not Jews da Good Stuff Bout Jesus so dey can trus him.
15.8: God, he know wat stay inside us. He show us dat he wen take in da peopo dat not Jews, cuz he wen make his Spesho Spirit take charge a dem, jalike he wen do fo us.
15.9: God see dem da same, jalike he see us. He wen make dem clean inside, cuz dey wen trus him.
15.10: Now, how come you guys try find out if God really mean dat he see dem da same jalike us Jewish peopo? Why you guys put hard kine rules on top da guys dat stick wit Jesus? You guys know dat we an our ancesta guys neva can do um.
15.11: No can! We trus dat we wen come outa da bad kine stuff we do, not cuz we do wat da Rules say, but cuz da Boss Jesus wen do plenny good tings fo us, jalike he wen do fo da peopo dat not Jews.â
15.12: All da guys wen come quiet fo lissen wen Paul an Barnabas tell um bout all da awesome stuff God wen do fo show his power wen dey stay wit da peopo dat not Jews.
15.13: Wen dey pau talk, James say, âBruddas, lissen to me.
15.14: Simon Peter wen tell us bout da time God wen show he stay care fo da peopo dat not Jews, cuz he wen pick some peopo fo himself from dem guys.
15.15: Da guys dat wen talk fo God long time ago, dey say da same ting. Dey wen write dis down inside da Bible, dat God sa
15.19: An James say dis too: âDass why I tink mo betta we no put rules dat goin make um mo hard fo da diffren peopos dat not Jews fo trus God.
15.20: Mo betta we write um one letta fo help da Jews an da odda peopo get togedda. We tell um
15.21: Cuz da Rules Moses wen write down, get peopo teach dat stuff in all da towns from long time ago, an dey read um in all da Jewish churches every Rest Day.â
15.22: Den da guys Jesus wen send, an da older leadas, an all da Jerusalem church guys, dey wen pick some a dea own guys fo send um Antioch wit Paul an Barnabas. Dey wen pick Judas Barsabas, an Silas, two guys dat wen lead da bruddas an sistas.
15.23: Dey wen send dis letta wit de
15.24: We hear dat some guys wen go by you guys from ova hea, but we neva send um. Dey wen bodda you guys, an wat dey wen say bout gotta cut skin, wen make you guys all mix up.
15.25: So, us guys wen talk togedda, an tink stay good fo pick some guys fo send um by you guys, wit our good friends Barnabas an Paul.
15.26: Barnabas an Paul almos wen mahke cuz dey stick wit da Boss Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.
15.27: Dass why we send Judas an Silas so dey can tell you guys dat wat we wen write stay true.
15.28: God's Spesho Spirit an us guys tink no good fo us put hard kine rules on top you guys, ony dis:
15.29: No eat da meat from da sacrifices dey wen make fo da idol kine gods, o da blood, o da meat from da animal dey wen choke, an no mo fool aroun. You guys goin do good if you no do dat kine stuff. Dass all.â
15.30: Dey wen send da guys, an dey wen go Antioch town. Dey wen tell all da church guys fo come togedda, an dey give um da letta.
15.31: Da peopo wen read um an dey stay good inside, cuz da letta wen kokua dem.
15.32: Judas an Silas, dey wen talk fo God. So dey kokua da bruddas an sistas fo come strong, an wen help um trus God moa.
15.33: Dey wen stay dea long time, an den da bruddas wen send um back wit aloha so dey can go by da guys dat wen send um befo.
15.34: [But Silas wen like stay ova dea.]
15.35: Paul an Barnabas wen stay Antioch town. Dem an plenny odda guys, dey wen teach wat da Boss Jesus wen say an tell da Good Stuff From Go
15.36: Afta long time Paul wen tell Barnabas, âWe go back an stay wit da bruddas an sistas in all da towns wea we wen teach wat da Boss wen say, so we know how dey stay.â
15.37: Barnabas wen like take John Mark wit dem.
15.38: But Paul neva like take um, cuz John Mark wen go way from dem befo, in Pamfylia, an neva work wit dem from dat time.
15.39: Paul an Barnabas no can tink da same way, an dey wen talk hard. So dey wen split up. Barnabas wen take da guy Mark an wen sail up Cyprus side.
15.40: Paul wen take Silas an wen go way, an da bruddas an sistas wen aks God fo take care dem wit his aloha.
15.41: Paul dem wen go Syria an Cilicia, an wen kokua da church guy

16.1: Paul wen go Derbe an Lystra. Had one guy ova dea name Timoty dat wen stay tight wit Jesus. His mudda stay Jewish, an she wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. His fadda not Jewish, he Greek.
16.2: Da bruddas an sistas inside Lystra an Iconium stay talk good tings bout Timoty.
16.3: Paul wen like take Timoty wit him wen dey go all ova, so Paul wen cut skin Timoty, cuz da Jewish peopo in dat place know dat his fadda stay Greek.
16.4: Dey wen go from one town to anodda. An dey wen tell da peopo dea da stuff from da guys Jesus wen send an da older leadas Jerusalem side, wat dey wen say, all dat stuff Jesus guys gotta do.
16.5: Dey wen kokua all da church peopo, an dat wen make um trus Jesus moa. An den had plenny odda peopo dat wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus to
16.6: Dey wen go all ova Frygia side an Galatia side. But God's Spesho Spirit neva let um tell wat God say Asia side.
16.7: Dey wen come near Mysia, an dey wen try fo go inside Bitynia, but Jesus Spirit neva let um go inside dea.
16.8: So den dey wen pass by Mysia an wen go Troas town.
16.9: Dat nite Paul wen see someting jalike one dream. He wen see one guy from Macedonia stand dea an beg um, âTry come ova hea Macedonia side fo help us.â
16.10: Afta Paul see dat, we wen come ready fast fo go Macedonia side. We tink dat God wen call us fo go tell da Good Stuff From Him to da peopo ova de
16.11: We wen sail from Troas strait to Samotrace. Den da nex day to Neapolis.
16.12: We wen go way from dea an go Philippi, one place da Rome govermen wen run. Dat da main town fo Macedonia. We wen stay ova dea litto wile.
16.13: On da Rest Day we wen go outside da town by da river side. We wen tink dat get one place fo pray ova dea. We sit down an wen start fo talk story wit da wahines dat wen go ova dea.
16.14: One wahine dea name Lydia wen lissen. She sell purple cloth from Tyatira town. She everytime go down an pray to God. Da Boss Jesus wen open her heart, an she wen like take in wat Paul wen say.
16.15: Her an her ohana wen get baptize, an she wen tell us, âIf you tink I trus da Boss Jesus, try come an stay my house.â So den we wen go wit he
16.16: One time we stay going da place fo pray, an one slave girl come by us. She get one bad kine spirit in charge a her dat help her tell da stuffs dat goin happen bumbye. She wen make plenny money fo her boss guys, cuz she wen tell da peopo wat goin happen to dem.
16.17: Dat girl wen walk behind Paul an all us odda guys, an yell, âEh! Dese guys work fo da God Dat Get Mo Power Den All Da Odda Gods. Dese guys, dey stay telling you guys how you can come outa da bad kine stuff you guys stay do.â
16.18: She stay saying dis plenny days, an dat wen bodda Paul to da max. He wen turn aroun an tell da spirit dat stay in charge a her, âCuz a Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, I tell you fo let her go!â An right den an dea da spirit wen let go da gir
16.19: Wen da bosses fo da slave girl wen know dat dea chance fo make money all pau, dey wen grab Paul an Silas an drag um inside da open market place fo see da leada guys.
16.20: Da bosses fo da slave girl wen bring um in front da govermen guys, an da boss guys say, âDese buggas stay Jews, an dey stay make big trouble inside our town.
16.21: Stay agains our Rules fo us guys believe o do da kine stuff dese buggas teach. Cuz us guys dat get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo, you know.â
16.22: All da peopo wen come togedda wit dem an stand up agains Paul an Silas. An da govermen guys tell dea guys fo take off Paul an Silas clotheses an whip u
16.23: Afta dey wen whip um real hard, dey wen throw um inside da jail. Dey tell da jaila guy fo watch um real good.
16.24: Wen da jaila guy hear dat, he wen throw um inside da deep jail, an wen lock dea feets in da wood shackle
16.25: Midnite, Paul an Silas stay praying an singing songs fo God, an da odda prisona guys inside da jail wen lissen to dem.
16.26: Right den an dea da groun wen shake real hard so da whole jail wen shake. Den all da doors fo da jail wen open. An da chains wen fall off all da prisona guy
16.27: Da jaila guy wen wake up. Wen he see dat da jail doors stay open, he pull out his sword fo kill himself, cuz he tink dat da prisona guys wen bag.
16.28: But Paul wen yell, âEh! No hurt yoaself! Us guys all stay hea!â
16.29: Da jaila guy wen tell da odda guys fo bring one light. Den he wen run inside da jail an wen go down in front Paul an Silas. He stay shaking real hard.
16.30: He wen take um outside da place an say, âYou guys, wat I gotta do so I can come outa da bad kine stuff I stay in?â
16.31: Dey say, âTrus da Boss Jesus, an you goin get outa all da bad kine stuff you wen do. Same ting fo yoa ohana.â
16.32: Den dey tell him an all his ohana da Good Stuff bout da Boss Jesu
16.33: Was nite time, an da jaila guy wen take um an wen wash dea cuts. An right den an dea, him an all his ohana wen get baptize.
16.34: Da jaila guy wen bring um inside his house, an feed um. Him an his ohana wen feel real good inside, cuz now dey stay trus Go
16.35: Wen da sun wen come up, da Rome govermen guys wen send da police guys by da jaila guy fo tell him, âLet da guys go.â
16.36: Da jaila guy wen tell Paul, âDa govermen guys wen say dat you an Silas can go. So, go wit aloha.â
16.37: But Paul wen tell da police guys, âDey wen whip us in front all da peopo, but dey neva even check fo find out if we wen do someting wrong. An dey wen throw us inside da jail. But us guys, we get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo too, you know. An now dey like send us away so nobody know. No way! Da govermen guys, dey da guys gotta come an take us outside demself.â
16.38: Da police guys wen tell da govermen guys wat Paul an Silas wen say. Wen dey wen know dat Paul an Silas get da same rights jalike da Rome peopo, dey wen come real scared.
16.39: Da govermen guys wen come an tell Paul an Silas dey sorry, an take um outside da jail, an beg um fo go way from da town.
16.40: Afta Paul an Silas wen go outside da jail, dey wen go Lydia's house. Dey wen meet da bruddas an sistas dea, an give um good kine words. Den dey wen g

17.1: Dey wen go thru Amfipolis an Apollonia, an wen come Tessalonika. Had one Jewish church ova dea.
17.2: Paul wen go da Jewish church, jalike he everytime wen go. Fo three week on da Rest Day he wen talk to dem bout da Bible.
17.3: He wen teach um an show um dat da Spesho Guy God Wen Send gotta suffa an come back alive from mahke. He say, âDis guy Jesus I stay tell you guys bout, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.â
17.4: Some a da Jewish peopo wen trus wat he say, an wen go wit Paul an Silas. An plenny guys dat not Jewish dat get plenny respeck fo God, an plenny wahines dat stay importan, dey wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus to
17.5: But da Jewish guys wen come jealous. So dey wen get togedda some bad kine guys from da market place, an dey wen come one big gang, an wen start one big beef inside da town. Dey wen run by one guy name Jason's house fo look fo Paul an Silas so dey can bring um outside by da peopo.
17.6: But dey no can find um. Az why dey wen drag Jason an some odda bruddas in front da town leadas. Dey wen yell, âDese guys, dey wen make big trouble all ova da whole world, an now dey stay come ova hea.
17.7: Dis guy Jason wen tell dem fo make house his place. An dey all stay broke King Cesar's rules, cuz dey say get one nodda King, one guy name Jesus.â
17.8: Wen dey hear dat, all da peopo an da town leadas, wen bodda dem plenny.
17.9: Den dey wen make Jason an da odda guys pay some money, an dey wen let um g
17.10: Dat nite da bruddas wen send Paul an Silas away to Berea. Wen dey wen come ova dea, dey wen go da Jewish church.
17.11: Da Berea peopo, dey mo betta den da Tessalonika peopo, cuz dey wen like take in da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, an dey wen check out wat da Bible wen say from befo time, every day, fo find out if wat Paul wen say stay true.
17.12: Plenny Jewish peopo, an plenny wahines dat not Jewish dat stay importan, an plenny guys dat not Jewish, dey all wen trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.
17.13: Wen da Jewish guys inside Tessalonika wen know dat Paul stay teach wat God say inside Berea, dey wen go ova dea too, an dey wen make plenny peopo like beef.
17.14: Da bruddas wen send Paul da coast side fast, but Silas an Timoty wen stay inside Berea.
17.15: Da guys dat wen go wit Paul wen take him to Athens. Den dey wen go back an wen tell Silas an Timoty fo go by Paul fas
17.16: Paul wen wait fo dem inside Athens, an he wen bum out wen he wen see had plenny idol kine gods ova dea.
17.17: He wen go da Jewish church an wen talk wit da Jewish peopo bout da Good Stuff, an da Greek peopo dat had plenny respeck fo God, he wen talk wit dem too. An, he wen go da market place every day an talk to da peopo dat stay come dea.
17.18: Some teachas dat tink like da guy Epicureas an odda teachas dat tink like da Stoic guys, dey wen come fo talk wit Paul. Some a dem wen say, âWat dis mynah bird guy trying fo say?â Odda guys wen say, âSound like he telling bout odda peopo's gods.â Dey wen say, dat cuz Paul stay teaching da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, an telling peopo dat Jesus wen come back alive from mahke.
17.19: Den dey wen take Paul in front da leada guys dat stay come togedda on top Ares Hill. Dey say, âTell us bout dis new kine stuff you stay teach.
17.20: You stay tell us some stuff we no can figga, an we like know wat dat mean.â
17.21: (You know, all da peopo from Athens an da peopo from odda places dat stay dea, dey everytime talk bout an lissen to da new kine stuff. Dass all dey do
17.22: Paul wen stand up in da middle a dem guys on top Ares Hill, an say, âYou guys from Athens, I see dat you guys everytime do da religious kine stuff.
17.23: Cuz wen I wen walk aroun an see all da places wea you guys go down an pray, I even wen find one altar place dat get one writing on top um dat say, âFo Da God We Donno.â Now I goin tell you bout da god dat you go down an pray to, dat you donno.
17.24: Da God dat wen make da world an all da stuff inside um, he da Boss fo da sky an da earth. He no stay inside da temples da peopo make.
17.25: Peopo no need take care him jalike if he stay need someting. Cuz he da One dat stay make all da peopo alive, an he give dem air fo breathe, an all da odda stuff.
17.26: From one guy, God wen make all da peopos, so dey can stay all ova da world. He wen make da times an da places fo dem fo stay.
17.27: God wen do dat so da peopo can go look fo him. Den might be dey goin reach out an find him. But he no stay far from every one a us guy
17.29: Cuz we stay his kids, no good if we tink dat God stay jalike one idol kine god dat one guy wen tink bout an make from gold o silva o one stone.
17.30: Befo time God wen let da peopo tink dat stuff, cuz dey neva know, but now he stay tell all da peopo all ova da world dat dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um.
17.31: He wen make one day wen he goin judge everybody inside da world. He goin send one guy fo judge um da right way. He wen show dat dis stay true cuz he wen bring dat guy back alive from mahke.â
17.32: Wen dey wen hear him say dat one guy wen come back alive from mahke, some a dem guys wen make fun a him. But odda guys say, âWe like hear you talk bout dis stuff one mo time.â
17.33: Den Paul wen go way from da main leadas.
17.34: Some guys wen go wit Paul an trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. One a dem guys name Dionysius, he wen stay one leada guy, an one wahine name Damaris, an odda peopo, dey wen trus Jesu

18.1: Afta dat Paul wen go way from Athens an wen go Corint.
18.2: Ova dea he wen come by one Jewish guy name Aquila. He from Pontus, an he jus wen come from Italy wit his wife Priscilla. Claudius da Big King wen tell all da Jewish peopo fo get outa Rome, az why. Paul wen go an talk wit dem.
18.3: Paul make tents, an Aquila an Priscilla wen make um too, so he wen stay wit dem an work wit dem.
18.4: Every Rest Day he talk plenny wit da Jewish peopo an da peopo dat not Jewish inside da Jewish church fo try help um trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesu
18.5: Silas an Timoty wen come from Macedonia. An den Paul wen ony talk to da Jewish peopo everytime. He tell um da Good Stuff Bout Jesus, dat he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.
18.6: But wen da Jewish guys wen stand up agains Paul an wen talk bad to him, he wen shake out his clotheses fo show he wen had it wit dem, an wen tell um, âYou guys get da blame if you guys goin be cut off from God! I no mo da blame fo dat. Now I goin go talk wit da peopo dat not Jews.â
18.7: Den he wen go way from da Jewish church, an wen go nex door, da house wea one guy name Titius Justus live. Dat guy, he get plenny respeck fo God.
18.8: Crispus, he da leada guy fo da Jewish church. Him an all his ohana wen trus da Boss Jesus. An had plenny peopo from Corint dat wen hear Paul an trus Jesus too, an wen get baptiz
18.9: One nite Paul wen see someting jalike one dream. Da Boss Jesus wen tell him, âNo need be scared. No give up telling da Good Stuff.
18.10: Cuz I stay wit you, an nobody goin hurt you. Plenny peopo from dis town, dey stay mines.â
18.11: So Paul wen stay ova dea an wen teach um wat God wen say fo one year an a hal
18.12: Wen Gallio stay governa fo Akaia, da Jews wen gang up on Paul an wen take him in front da governa.
18.13: Da Jews wen tell da governa, âDis guy, he stay make da peopo go down an pray to God da way dat stay agains our Rules.â
18.14: Paul wen start fo talk, but Governa Gallio wen tell da Jews, âIf you Jewish guys wen squawk bout someting dat stay wrong o some crime, den dass good fo me fo lissen to you guys.
18.15: But you guys squawk bout how da guy talk, an names, an yoa own rules. So you guys make um right yoaself. I no goin judge dat kine stuff.â
18.16: An he wen tell his guys fo throw um outside da place.
18.17: Den da Jewish guys wen grab Sostenes, da Jewish church leada guy, an wen bus um up in front da governa. But Gallio neva care bout da
18.18: Paul wen stay Corint long time. Den he wen go way from da bruddas an wen sail Syria side. Priscilla an Aquila wen go wit him. Befo Paul wen sail, he cut off his hair inside Kenkrea, cuz he wen make one promise fo do someting.
18.19: Dey wen come Efesus, an Paul wen go way from Priscilla an Aquila. Paul wen go inside da Jewish church, an wen talk to da Jewish peopo fo help um trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus.
18.20: Dey wen tell him fo stay ova dea some moa, but he neva like.
18.21: Wen he stay going, he wen promise dem, âI goin come back if az wat God like.â Den he wen sail from Efesu
18.22: Wen Paul wen come Cesarea, he wen go show face to da church guys. Den he wen go Antioch.
18.23: He wen stay Antioch long time. Den he wen go all ova Galatia an Frygia, an wen kokua da peopo dat stay tight wit Jesu
18.24: One Jewish guy name Apollos wen come to Efesus. He from Alexandria. He one guy dat wen go school long time, an he know plenny stuff from da Bible.
18.25: Befo time odda bruddas wen teach him bout da Boss Jesus, an da way he wen talk, everybody know he tink dass importan. He wen teach da right way bout Jesus. But he ony know bout da guy John's baptism.
18.26: He wen start fo talk wit power inside da Jewish church. Wen Priscilla an Aquila hear him, dey tell him fo come dea house. An dey teach him bout Jesus way mo betta.
18.27: Apollos wen like go Akaia, an da bruddas wen kokua him. Dey wen write one letta fo da bruddas an sistas ova dea, so dey goin give Apollos dea aloha. Wen he go ova dea, he wen help da peopo dat wen trus God cuz God wen do plenny good tings fo dem.
18.28: An he wen talk wit plenny power to da Jewish guys in front all da peopo. He show um proof from da Bible dat Jesus, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Sen

19.1: Apollos wen stay inside Corint. Paul wen go da back road, an come Efesus. He find some guys dat trus God ova dea.
19.2: He aks um, âYou wen get God's Spesho Spirit fo take charge you wen you wen trus God, o wat?â
19.3: Paul say, âWat kine baptism you wen get?â
19.4: Paul say, âJohn's baptism stay fo da peopo dat come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um. He tell dem fo trus da Guy dat goin come bumbye, Jesus.â
19.5: Wen dey hear dat, dey wen get baptize fo show dey wen trus da Boss Jesus.
19.6: Wen Paul wen put his hands on top dem, God's Spesho Spirit wen take charge a dem. So den dey wen talk odda kine talk, an wen tell wat God wen say.
19.7: Had bout twelve guys ova dea dat tim
19.8: Paul wen go inside da Jewish church. Fo three months he not scared fo tell da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He teach um real good bout how dey can get God fo dea King, so dey can trus him.
19.9: But some a dem wen get all hard head. Dey neva like trus da Good Stuff, an dey wen talk any kine in front everybody bout da Boss Jesus way. So den Paul wen go way from dem. He wen take da guys dat stay tight wit Jesus wit him, an dey wen talk togedda every day inside da big room at Hale O Tyrannus.
19.10: Dey wen do dat fo two years, an all da Jewish peopo an da peopo inside Asia dat talk Greek wen hear wat da Boss Jesus wen sa
19.11: God wen help Paul do real awesome stuff wit power.
19.12: Dey wen take handkerchiefs an aprons dat he wen touch, an bring um by da sick peopo, an dey wen come good. An da bad kine spirits wen let da peopo go.
19.13: Had some Jewish guys dat wen go all ova an make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo. Dey wen try use da Boss Jesus name fo make da bad kine spirits let um go. Dey say, âWit Jesus power, da guy Paul talk bout, I tell you bad kine spirits fo let go da guy.â
19.14: Had one a da Jewish main pries guys name Sceva dat get seven boys. Dey wen make lidat.
19.15: But da bad kine spirit wen tell dem, âI know who Jesus, an I know who Paul, but who you guys?â
19.16: Den da guy dat get da bad kine spirit wen jump um, an hold um down. Den he wen bus um all up. So den dey wen all run outside da house naked an all bleeding.
19.17: Da Jewish peopo an da Greek peopo dat stay inside Efesus wen hear bout dat, an dey wen all come real scared. An dey wen get plenny respeck fo da Boss Jesus.
19.18: Plenny peopo dat trus da Boss now, wen come fo tell everybody all da bad kine stuff dey wen do.
19.19: Befo time, plenny a dem guys wen make da kahuna. So dey wen come an pile up all dea kahuna books, an burn um in front everybody. Wen dey wen figga how plenny da books cost, wen cost um fifty tousand dolla.
19.20: Dass how plenny peopo wen hear wat da Boss Up Dea wen say, an trus him, an wen do wat he sa
19.21: Afta all dat wen happen, Paul wen tink fo go Jerusalem, an go thru Macedonia an Akaia. He say, âAfta I go ova dea, den I gotta go Rome too.â
19.22: He wen send two a his helpa guys Macedonia side, Timoty an Erastus. But he wen stay Asia side litto wile mo
19.23: Dat time some guys wen make big trouble bout Jesus way.
19.24: Had one guy name Demetrius dat wen make stuff from silva. He make silva tings dat look jalike da temple fo da idol kine wahine god Artemis. Da guys dat work fo him wen make plenny money.

24.7: but da main captain name Lysias, he come an grab him from us.
24.8: He wen tell us dat we gotta come in front you.] You can aks him yoaself, an you goin find out all da stuff we saying agains dis guy.â
24.9: An da Jewish guys wen poin finga at Paul too, an say dat all da stuff Tertullus wen say, stay tru
24.10: Da governa wen tell Paul fo talk. An Paul wen sa
24.11: You can check all dis stuff out. Twelve days befo dis I wen go Jerusalem fo go down an pray to God dea.
24.12: Da guys dat poin finga at me neva find me making argue wit nobody inside da temple. I neva make da peopo like beef inside da Jewish churches o odda place inside Jerusalem.
24.13: Dey no can make proof da stuff dey say agains me.
24.14: Dass true I go down an pray in front da God fo our ancesta guys. I stick wit da Jesus Way. But dese guys, dey say dass one fake way. I trus all da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Jewish Rules, an wat da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen write down too.
24.15: I stay trus an wait fo God jalike dese guys. We trus dat da guys dat stay doing da right tings an da guys dat no do wass right, dey all goin come back alive from mahke.
24.16: So, I everytime try fo do all da right stuff an make my heart stay good in front God an da peop
24.17: âLong time I stay odda places, an den I wen come back to Jerusalem fo bring money fo my peopo, fo da poor peopo, an fo make sacrifice inside da temple.
24.18: I wen make myself right fo go inside da temple, an dese guys wen find me ova dea inside da temple yard making lidat. Neva have plenny peopo dea, an I neva make trouble.
24.19: But get some Jewish guys from Asia side ova dea. Dey neva even come ova hea fo tell you how come dey poin finga at me. If dey get someting agains me, let um come ova hea in front you an tell um.
24.20: An da guys dat stay hea, let um say wat wrong ting dey tink I wen do. Dey neva tell dat wen I wen stand in front da main leadas.
24.21: Da ony ting, wen I wen stand in front dem I wen say, âDey poin finga at me today cuz I trus dat we all goin come back alive from mahke.â I tink dass wat dey say agains me.â
24.22: Felix, he wen know plenny stuff bout da Jesus Way. So he wen tell um dey can go home. He wen say, âWen Lysias, da main captain, come, I goin take care dis stuff.â
24.23: He tell da captain fo watch Paul, an no tie him up, an let his friends come take care hi
24.24: Afta litto wile Felix wen come wit his wife Drusilla. She one Jew. Felix tell da guards fo bring Paul, an Felix lissen to him. Paul wen tell Felix bout how gotta trus Jesus Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.
24.25: Paul say dat we gotta get um right wit God, an do da right stuff, an we all goin stand in front God da Judge. Den Felix wen come scared, an he say, âDass nuff fo now! You can go. Wen I like, I goin tell you fo come one mo time.â
24.26: An he wen tink dat bumbye if he wait, Paul goin give um some money. So plenny times he wen tell Paul fo come an talk wit hi
24.27: Two years lata, Porcius Festus wen take Felix place, but Felix wen like do someting fo da Jewish peopo, so he wen leave Paul inside jai

25.1: Governa Festus wen come Cesarea side fo take charge, an three days lata he wen go from Cesarea to Jerusalem.
25.2: Az wea da main pries guys an da Jewish leadas wen come in front him an wen poin finga Paul.
25.3: Dey wen beg Festus fo do someting fo dem. Dey wen like him fo bring Paul to Jerusalem, cuz dey like kill him wen he stay coming.
25.4: Festus tell um, âPaul stay one prisona inside Cesarea, an I going back dea pretty soon.
25.5: Make some a yoa leada guys go wit me, an dey can poin finga at him ova dea, if he wen do someting wrong.â
25.6: Festus wen stay ova dea eight o ten days, an den he wen go back Cesarea. Da nex day he wen sit down on top da judge chair, an wen tell um fo bring Paul in front him.
25.7: Paul wen come, an da Jewish guys dat wen come from Jerusalem wen stand aroun Paul, an wen poin finga at him real hard. But dey no can prove notting.
25.8: Paul wen say, âI neva do notting wrong agains da Jewish Rules o da temple o Cesar, da Big King.â
25.9: Festus wen like do someting fo da Jewish guys, so he wen tell Paul, âYou like go Jerusalem an stand in front me ova dea fo tell bout all dis stuff?â
25.10: Paul say, âI goin stand in front King Cesar. Dass da right place. I neva do notting wrong fo da Jewish peopo. An you know dass true.
25.11: If I wen do someting wrong so I gotta mahke, I goin take dat. But if da stuff dey say agains me no stay true, nobody get da right fo hand me ova to dem. I going in front King Cesar!â
25.12: Festus wen talk to his guys, an den he say, âYou wen aks fo go in front Cesar. Kay den. Dass wea you going!â
25.13: Bumbye King Agrippa an Queen Bernice wen come to Cesarea fo give dea aloha to Festus.
25.14: Cuz dey goin stay ova dea long time, Festus wen tell King Agrippa bout Paul. He say, âGet one guy ova hea dat Felix wen leave inside jail.
25.15: Wen I wen go Jerusalem, da main pries guys an da older leadas fo da Jews wen poin finga at him, an say I gotta punish him.
25.16: I wen tell um dat da Rome peopo no hand ova anybody befo he stand in front da judge, an den dey can poin finga at him an he can talk fo himself.
25.17: Wen dey come ova hea by me, right den an dea I neva wait, but I wen sit on top da judge chair da nex day. An I wen tell um fo bring da prisona in front me.
25.18: Wen da guys dat poin finga at him wen stand up fo talk, dey neva say notting I wen tink dey goin say.
25.19: But dem guys believe one way an Paul believe one nodda way, an dey wen make argue bout dat, an bout one mahke guy name Jesus, dat Paul say he still stay alive.
25.20: I neva know how fo check out all dat stuff, dass why I wen aks him if he like go Jerusalem an stand in front da judge ova dea.
25.21: But Paul say he like go in front King Cesar. So, I wen tell da army guys fo guard him till dat time come.â
25.22: King Agrippa wen tell Festus, âI like lissen to dis guy.â
25.23: Da nex day King Agrippa an Queen Bernice wen come all dress up an make big show. Dey wen go inside one big place wit all da main captains an da main leada guys fo da town. Festus tell da guys fo bring Paul inside, an dey wen bring him.
25.24: Festus say, âKing Agrippa, an all you guys dat stay hea wit us, hea da guy! All da Jewish peopo wen tell me bout him inside Jerusalem an ova hea inside Cesarea. Dey wen yell dat he gotta mahke right now.
25.25: But I neva find notting he wen do dat he gotta mahke. But he wen aks fo go in front King Cesar, so I say he can go ova dea Rome side.
25.26: But I no mo notting fo write down bout him in one letta fo send da Boss Cesar. Dass why I wen bring him in front all you guys, an even mo in front you, King Agrippa, so you can check him out, an den I can write down someting.
25.27: Cuz I tink no stay good fo send one prisona ova dea if I no can say how come dey poin finga at um.â

26.1: King Agrippa tell Paul, âYou can talk fo yoaself.â An Paul wen wave his hand an sa
26.2: âYoa Honor King Agrippa, I tink dass good fo me fo stand in front you today fo talk fo myself agains all da stuff da Jews wen say agains me.
26.3: I know dat you know all da ways da Jewish peopo do stuff, an all da stuff dey make argue bout. Dass why I beg you fo try lissen to me till I pau tal
26.4: âAll da Jewish peopo know how I wen make from small kid time, from my own country Tarsus side, an inside Jerusalem.
26.5: Long time dey know me. I wen do all da stuff jalike one Pharisee guy. Dey can tell you, if dey like, dat I wen do even da small stuff an da hard stuff inside da Jewish Rules.
26.6: An now I stay standing ova hea in front you cuz I trus an wait fo da stuff God wen promise our ancesta guys, az why.
26.7: Dass da real stuff our twelve ohana stay waiting fo. Dey work fo God day an nite so dey can see um. Yoa Majesty, da Jewish guys stay poin finga at me cuz we trus an wait fo dis.
26.8: God can make da mahke guys come alive again. How come you guys tink he no ca
26.9: âBefo time, I wen tink dat I gotta do all da kine stuff fo stand up agains da guy name Jesus from Nazaret, jalike dem.
26.10: An dass wat I wen do inside Jerusalem. Da main pries guys wen give me da power, an I wen throw plenny peopo dat stay spesho fo God inside jail. An I wen vote dat dey gotta mahke.
26.11: Plenny times I wen go from one Jewish church to da odda fo punish um, an I wen try fo make um talk stink agains God. I wen come plenny huhu wit dem, an I even wen go da towns far away fo make um suff
26.12: âDass why one time I stay going Damascus. Da main pries guys wen give me da power an wen tell me fo go afta da Christian peopo.
26.13: Yoa Majesty, noon time I stay going on da road, an I wen spock one light from da sky. Da light stay mo bright den da sun. An wen flash all aroun me an my friends.
26.14: We all wen fall down on top da groun, an I wen hear one voice dat wen talk in local talk, âSaul, Saul, why you make me suffa? You ony stay hurting yoaself.â
26.15: Den I say, âWho you, Boss?â An da Boss wen say, âI Jesus, da one you stay make suffa.
26.16: Now stand on yoa feet. I wen come fo pick you fo work fo me an fo tell odda peopo wat you wen see an wat I goin show you.
26.17: I goin take you away from yoa own peopo an from da guys dat not Jews, so dey no kill you. I goin send you
26.18: fo open dea eyes an fo turn um away from da dark kine stuff to da light; fo turn um away from da Devil's power an turn um to God. Den I goin let um go, an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey do, an dey can come togedda wit all da peopo dat trus me an come spesho an good fo me.â
26.19: So den, King Agrippa, I wen do wat God wen show me.
26.20: First I wen go by da peopo inside Damascus, an den inside Jerusalem an all ova Judea. An I wen tell da peopo dat not Jews too dat dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey do, an turn to God. An dey gotta show dat dey sorry fo real by da stuff dey do.
26.21: Dass why da Jewish guys wen grab me inside da temple yard an wen try fo kill me.
26.22: But God wen help me everytime till now. So I stand hea an tell da small peopo an da big peopo. I ony say da stuff da guys dat wen talk fo God an Moses wen say goin happen. I no say odda stuff.
26.23: I tell um dat da Spesho Guy God Wen Send gotta suffa. An he da first Guy fo come back alive from mahke. An he goin tell his own peopo an da peopo dat not Jews bout God's light.â
26.24: Den Festus wen butt in an wen yell, âPaul, you stay pupule! All da stuff you wen learn stay making you pupule!â
26.25: Paul wen say, âYoa Honor Festus, I not pupule. Wat I say stay true. You can undastan um.
26.26: I know dat you, da king, know bout dis stuff, an I can talk strait to you. I know dat you know all bout dis stuff dat wen happen, cuz neva happen in one corner.
26.27: King Agrippa, you trus wat da guys wen write down dat wen talk fo God? I know you trus um.â
26.28: Den Agrippa wen tell Paul, âYou tink dat in dis litto bit time you goin make me come one Christian?â
26.29: Paul wen say, âLitto bit time o long time. I pray an aks God dat you an all da peopo dat stay listening to me now goin come jalike me -- but not tie up wit chains lidis.â
26.30: Da king wen stand up, an da governa, an Queen Bernice, an da oddas sitting wit dem.
26.31: Dey wen go outa da room, an wen tell each odda, âDis guy neva do notting wrong dat say he gotta mahke o go jail.â
26.32: An Agrippa wen tell Festus, âIf dis guy neva aks fo stand in front da Big King Cesar, we wen let him go.â

27.1: Da leadas say we goin sail Italy side, an dey wen hand ova Paul an some odda prisona guys to one captain name Julius from Cesar's army guys.
27.2: We wen go inside one boat from Adramytium dat stay ready fo sail da port towns on da Asia coast, an we wen go out on da ocean. Aristarkus from Macedonia, Tessalonika side, wen go wit us.
27.3: Da nex day we wen come Sidon, an we wen go on top da land. Julius wen like do someting good fo Paul, an he wen let um go by his friends so dey can take care him.
27.4: We wen go from ova dea out on da ocean again an wen pass near Cyprus Island on da leeward side, cuz da wind wen blow agains us.
27.5: We wen sail da deep ocean by da Cilicia an Pamfylia coast, an wen come Myra, Lycia side, an wen go on top da land.
27.6: Ova dea da captain wen find one boat from Alexandria dat stay going Italy side, an he wen put us on top u
27.7: Plenny days we wen go slow, an had hard time fo come by Knidus Island. Da wind neva let us go da way we like, so we wen sail by Crete Island, leeward side, unda Salmone Head.
27.8: We wen get hard time wen we wen go by da coast side. An we wen come by one place dey wen call âSafe Harborâ near Lasea tow
27.9: We wen lose plenny time, an da Spesho Day Fo Pray An No Eat wen come awready. Da ocean wen stay too rough fo sail dat time. So Paul wen tell um,
27.10: âEh, you guys. We betta not sail. I can see dat bumbye we goin get rough time. We goin lose da boat an all da stuffs, an all us too.â
27.11: But da captain neva like lissen to Paul. He wen do wat da pilot an da boat owna say.
27.12: Dat port town no stay good fo da winta time, an almos all da guys wen tink mo betta fo go. Dey wen trus dat dey can come to Phoenix an stay ova dea winta time. Phoenix one port town Crete side dat face da soutwest an da nortwes
27.13: One soft wind wen start fo blow from da sout, an dey tink dass da one dey need. So dey wen pull up da anchor an wen sail close by da Crete coast.
27.14: afta litto wile one real strong wind wen blow on um from da island. Dat wind dey name âDa Norteast.â
27.15: Da storm wen grab da boat, an dey no can handle da boat in da wind, so den we wen give up, an da wind wen blow us.
27.16: Wen we wen pass by one small island name Cauda, on da leeward side, we almos no can bring da litto boat up.
27.17: Da guys wen bring um up on top da big boat, an dey wen tie da ropes good aroun da big boat fo hold um togedda. Dey scared dat dey goin scrape on da sand by Syrtis inside Africa. Dey wen put out da sea anchor an wen let da boat go wit da wind.
27.18: Da wind wen pound us real hard, an da nex day da guys wen start fo throw da stuffs ova inside da ocean.
27.19: Day numba three, da guys even wen throw da tackle fo da boat inside da ocean.
27.20: Plenny days da sun an da stars neva come out, an da storm still was going strong. An den we wen give up an tink we no goin come outa di
27.21: Da guys neva eat plenny days, an den Paul wen stand up in front dem an say, âEh, you guys, you neva like lissen to me wen I say we betta not sail from Crete. If you guys wen lissen, we neva get all dis trouble an lose all da stuffs.
27.22: Now I beg you guys fo no give up, cuz you all goin come outa dis. We ony goin lose da boat.
27.23: I stay tight wit God an work fo him, you know. Last nite one angel messenja guy from God wen stand by me.
27.24: He say, âNo scared, Paul. You gotta stand in front da Big King Cesar. God doing plenny good kine stuff fo you, an now he goin let all da guys dat sail wit you come outa dis okay. Dey no goin mahke.â
27.25: You guys, try no give up. Cuz I trus God dat he goin do jalike wat he wen tell me.
27.26: But da boat goin get bus up on one island.â
27.27: Afta fourteen nites da wind still wen blow us across da Adriatic Ocean. Bout midnite da sailor guys wen tink dey coming near one land.
27.28: Dey wen drop one line an wen find out dat da water stay one hundred an twenty feet deep. Afta litto wile dey wen find out dat da water stay ninety feet deep.
27.29: Dey wen come scared dat da wind goin pound us agains da rocks, an dey wen put down four anchors from da stern an wen pray dat da day time can come fast.
27.30: Da sailor guys wen try fo escape from da boat, an wen put da litto boat down inside da ocean. Dey wen ack like dey putting down da anchors from da front a da big boat.
27.31: Den Paul wen tell da captain an da army guys, âIf dese guys no stay by da boat, you no goin come outa dis.â
27.32: So da army guys wen cut da ropes fo da litto boat an wen let da litto boat g
27.33: Jus befo da sun wen come up, Paul wen beg da guys fo eat. He say, âFourteen days you guys wen wait, an you neva eat notting.
27.34: Now I beg you guys fo eat someting. You need um fo stay alive. You guys no goin lose even one hair from yoa head.â
27.35: Wen he wen say dat, he wen take some bread an wen tank God in front all dem. Den he wen broke um an wen start fo eat.
27.36: Dat wen kokua dem, an dey all wen eat.
27.37: (Had two hundred seventy-six guys on top da boat.)
27.38: Wen dey wen eat all da stuff dey wen like, dey wen throw da grain inside da ocean an wen make da boat mo ligh
27.39: Wen da sun wen come up, dey neva know da land wea dey was. But dey wen spock one bay an one sandy beach. Dey wen tink stay mo betta fo make da boat eat it ova dea.
27.40: Dey wen cut da ropes fo da anchors an wen leave um inside da ocean. Same time dey wen hemo da ropes from da ruddas. Den dey wen raise all da sails in front to da wind an wen steer um to da beach.
27.41: But da boat wen hit one side current. Da front wen come stuck an no can move. Da back wen come all bus up cuz da surf wen pound u
27.42: Da army guys wen like kill da prisona guys so dat dey no can swim away an escape.
27.43: But da captain wen like take Paul outa dea alive, so he neva let um. He wen tell da guys dat can swim fo jump ova inside da ocean first an swim to da land.
27.44: He wen tell da odda guys fo hang on da boards o da pieces from da boat. Dass how all da guys wen come to da land, an nobody wen mahk

28.1: We wen come to da land okay, an we find out dat dey name da island âMalta.â
28.2: Da local peopo wen show us plenny aloha. Dey wen make one fire an tell us fo come cuz stay raining an cold.
28.3: Paul wen bring some wood fo da fire. Wen he put um on top da fire, one snake wen come outside da wood, cuz stay hot. Da snake wen grab Paul's hand.
28.4: Wen da local peopo wen spock da snake hanging from Paul's hand, dey wen tell each odda, âEh, fo shua dis guy wen kill somebody. He wen get outa da ocean okay, but da gods no goin let um stay alive.â
28.5: But Paul wen shake da snake from his hand inside da fire, an notting wen happen to Paul.
28.6: Da peopo wen tink he goin swell up o mahke fast. Dey wen wait plenny, an dey neva see notting funny kine happen. So dey wen change dea mind an say, âEh! Must be he one god!â
28.7: Had one big place near dea fo da governa fo da island, his name Publius. He wen show us aloha an tell us fo come inside his house. We wen stay dea fo three days, an he wen take care us real good.
28.8: His fadda stay sick in bed. He get one feva an da runs. Paul wen go by him an pray an put his hands on top um, an he wen make um come good.
28.9: Afta dat, da peopo wen bring all da odda sick peopo on da island, an Paul wen make um come good.
28.10: Dey wen give us plenny stuffs, cuz dey get respeck fo us. Wen we was ready fo sail, dey wen give us all da stuffs we wen nee
28.11: Afta three months we wen sail on top one boat dat wen stay by Malta Island all winta. Da boat wen come from Alexandria an had da twin gods Castor an Pollux on da front.
28.12: We wen come to Syracuse an stay ova dea three days.
28.13: We wen sail from dea an wen come Regium. Da nex day da sout wind wen come, an da nex day we wen come Puteoli.
28.14: Ova dea we wen meet some bruddas. Dey wen tell us fo come stay dea house fo one week. An den we wen go way from dea fo go Rome.
28.15: Da bruddas ova dea wen hear dat we stay coming, an dey wen come to da Appius Market an da Three Taverns fo meet us. Wen Paul wen spock dem, dat wen kokua him, an he wen tank Go
28.16: We wen go inside Rome, an dey wen let Paul stay inside one place by himself, an one army guy wen guard u
28.17: Afta three days Paul wen tell da leadas fo da Jewish peopo fo come. Wen dey wen come, Paul wen tell um, âMy bruddas, I neva do notting agains our peopo o agains our ancesta guys ways. But dey wen bus me inside Jerusalem an hand me ova to da Rome guys.
28.18: Da Rome guys wen aks me plenny stuffs, an dey wen like let me go, cuz I neva do notting dat say I gotta mahke.
28.19: But da Jewish guys neva like dem fo let me go, so den, I wen say I gotta come in front da Big King Cesar. But I no mo notting fo poin finga at my peopo.
28.20: So I wen tell dese guys I like talk to you. I trus God dat he goin take da Israel peopo outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in. Dass why dey wen tie me up wit dis chain.â
28.21: Da Jewish guys wen say, âWe neva get no lettas from Judea bout you. An da bruddas dat wen come from ova dea neva say notting stink bout you.
28.22: But we like lissen to wat you say. We know dat da peopo all ova da place stay talking agains dis stuff you teach.â
28.23: Den dey wen say dey goin come togedda one spesho day. An dat time even mo peopo wen come to da place wea Paul stay. Wen da sun come up till da sun go down he wen tell um all da stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King. He wen try help um fo trus da Good Stuff Bout Jesus. He start wit da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules, an den he talk bout da odda guys dat wen talk fo God befo time.
28.24: Some guys wen trus da Good Stuff Paul wen tell um, but da odda guys neva like trus um.
28.25: Dey wen go way an make argue wit each odda. But first Paul wen say, âGod's Spesho Spirit wen tell yoa ancesta guys da trut! Isaiah wen talk fo him
28.28: Paul say, âI like you guys know dat God send his guys by da peopo dat not Jews, so he can take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey do. An dey goin lissen!â
28.29: [So da Jewish guys wen go way an wen make argue real hard wit each odda
28.30: Fo two years Paul wen stay ova dea inside one house he wen rent. He wen show aloha fo all da peopo dat wen come by him.
28.31: He wen teach um how dey can get God fo dea King an all bout da Boss Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He not scared fo tell um, an nobody wen try make him shut u

1.1: Dis letta from me, Paul. I one worka fo Jesus Christ, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. God wen tell me fo come be his guy, cuz he like send me all ova da place fo talk fo him. God wen make me one spesho talka fo tell peopo da Good Kine Stuff From Hi
1.2: Befo time, God wen make his talka guys write his Good An Spesho Bible fo um. Dat time, God wen promise um dat bumbye he goin tell peopo da Good Kine Stuff
1.3: bout his Boy. His Boy's blood come from King David.
1.4: But how his spirit stay, an da way he stay good an spesho fo God, dass wat show dat he God's Boy. We know dat, cuz God wen use plenny power fo make um come back alive afta he wen mahke. You know, I stay talking bout Jesus Christ. He da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He stay da Boss fo all us guy
1.5: Dass how Jesus stay, an dass why God like do good tings fo us guys. Dass why he stay sending us guys all ova da place, cuz he like all da peopos from diffren places fo trus um an make da way he tell um. An me, I like do dat so dey know who Chris
1.6: Same ting fo you Rome guys too. You guys come from all da diffren peopos from diffren places, an Jesus Christ tell you guys, âEh come! Be my guys!â
1.7: You Rome guys, dis letta fo you. Eh, God get love an aloha fo you guys. He tell you fo come his spesho guys. God, he our fadda, an Jesus, he da Boss, he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. I like dem two do plenny fo you guys, an make yoa hearts rest insid
1.8: First ting fo start, I like tell God âMahalo plenny!â everytime I tink bout you guys, cuz Jesus Christ, he stay make me feel lidat. I feel good inside cuz all ova da world get peopo talking bout da way you guys trus Go
1.9: God know dat I telling da trut. He know I stay work fo him hundred percent wit my spirit. I make like dis fo tell da peopo all da Good Kine Stuff Bout His Boy. An God know dat I not goin give up tinking bout you guys.
1.10: Everytime I go pray, I aks God lidis: âYou know, if you like, I donno how you goin do dis, but been really long time I like go see dem guys Rome side.â
1.11: I really like stay by you guys, cuz I like share da good kine stuff from God's Spirit wit you guys. Den you can stay mo strong an mo solid inside.
1.12: Dis, az wat I mean: Bumbye wen I go stay wit you guys, I like you guys give me good kine words cuz you guys trus God, an same ting, I goin give you guys good kine words cuz I trus him too jalike you guy

15.44: Befo dey put da dead body inside da groun, was one guy dat can ony tink an feel, yeah? But afta he come back alive, goin be God's Spirit dat make da guy live fo real kine! Get peopo dat can ony tink an feel, you know, an get peopo dat get real kine life from God's Spirit. An dey get diffren kine bodies.
15.45: Dis wat da Bible wen say befo time: Da first guy dat was jalike us guys was Adam. He âwen come alive an he wen tink an feel.â But da last Adam kine guy is Christ. He get one spirit inside him dat can make odda peopo come alive fo real kine to
15.46: First ting, get da guy dat can ony tink an feel. Den latas, get da guy dat get da real kine life from God's Spirit.
15.47: Da first guy Adam wen come from da groun. God wen make him from da dust. Da odda guy Christ, he wen come from da sky.
15.48: An us guys dat come from da dust, we jalike dat odda guy Adam dat God wen make from da dust. But da peopo dat stay tight wit God in da sky, dey stay jalike da Christ guy dat wen come from da sky.
15.49: Us guys, right now we look jalike da Adam guy dat God wen make from da dust. Bumbye, we goin come jalike da Christ guy dat come from da sky, to
15.50: Eh bruddas an sistas! Let me tell you guys someting. Peopo wit blood an bones inside, not nuff fo come God's kids an get him fo dea King! Peopo wit body dat goin come rotten, dey no can handle da good kine stuff dat no goin come rotten eva.
15.51: So, lissen up! I like tell you guys one ting dat was secret befo time! From all us guys, get some guys dat no goin mahke! But all us guys, we all goin come diffren!
15.52: Dis all goin happen real fast, mo fast den you can blink yoa eye. Goin happen bumbye, wen time fo blow da last trumpet. Goin get da noise from da trumpet. Right den, da mahke guys goin come back alive. No way dey goin mahke an come rotten one mo time! Same ting wit us guys, we all goin come diffren.
15.53: All dis stuff dat goin come rotten, gotta come diffren kine, so bumbye no come rotten one mo time. Dis body dat can mahke now, gotta come diffren kine, so no can mahke eva again!
15.54: Dat time, wen da body dat can come rotten now, goin come diffren kine, an no goin come rotten eva again! Da body dat can mahke now, goin come diffren kine, an no goin mahke eva again! Dat time, goin happen jalike da Bible wen say befo tim
15.56: How come he can zap us guys now an we mahke? Cuz we wen do da bad kine stuff, az why. An how come da bad kine stuff we do, get plenny power lidat? Cuz God's Rules show dat da bad kine stuff stay plenny wrong, az why.
15.57: But now, everyting stay diffren! All us guys like tell God, âMahalo plenny!â He wen make us guys da winnas ova da bad kine stuff, cuz our Boss Jesus Christ, he da winna fo real kin
15.58: So den, bruddas an sistas, my good friends. Stand strong an solid. No let notting shake you guys up. You guys stay working fo da Boss awready, so den, go do mo an mo plenny good kine stuffs fo him everytime. You guys know dis: Wen you guys stay tight wit da Boss, no matta you work hard an sweat plenny, no goin be wase tim

16.1: Now we like talk bout da money dat you guys like give fo help da peopo dat stay spesho fo God. I wen tell da church peopo all ova Galatia, wat fo do wit da money, an now you guys, gotta do da same ting.
16.2: Every Sunday, everybody suppose to stash some money fo dis, from wateva dey wen make. No good you guys try fo get da money all togedda afta I come dea.
16.3: Den, wen I come dea, whoeva da bestes guys, you guys go pick um fo carry dis money dat you guys goin give da church peopo Jerusalem side, an I goin write lettas fo tell da church leadas who dem.
16.4: An if you guys figga az good fo me fo go too, den we all going togedd
16.5: Afta I go thru Macedonia, den I like go by you guys. But first, I gotta go Macedonia.
16.6: Den, might be I can stay wit you guys litto wile, o even all winta. Den you guys can help me go da nex place from dea, wea eva.
16.7: Right now, I figga no good ony pass by you guys, cuz den I ony goin see you guys short time. Mo betta I go dea lata, cuz den I stay shua I can hang out wit you guys long time, if da Boss let me.
16.8: But I goin stay ova hea Efesus side till Pentecost time.
16.9: Cuz jalike God wen open one door ova hea, so I can do plenny, no matta get plenny peopo dat like go agains m
16.10: Timoty, wen he go dea by you guys, take care him so he no need worry bout notting. He one worka guy fo da Boss Up Dea, jalike me.
16.11: So no let nobody make him jalike he notting. Help um out befo he go an stay good wit him, so he can come back by me. Me an da odda bruddas, we all stay waiting fo hi
16.12: One nodda ting. Our brudda Apollos, I wen give him plenny good kine words fo go by you guys wit da odda bruddas. But right now, he no like go. Bumbye wen he can, he goin
16.13: Eh! Watch out! Stay solid an trus God! No scared! Stay strong!
16.14: Everyting you guys do, do um wit love an aloh
16.15: Eh, bruddas an sistas, you all know Stefanas an his ohana guys, yeah? Dey was da first peopo dat wen go trus Christ from all ova dea Akaia side by you guys. An dey wen go all out fo kokua all da peopo dat stay spesho fo God.
16.16: I like tell you guys fo lissen to dat kine peopo an do wat dey tell you. I mean, everybody dat work hard togedda lidat.
16.17: I wen stay real good inside cuz Stefanas, an Fortunatus, an Akaicus wen come hea. Cuz dey wen do wat you guys no can do.
16.18: Dey wen make me come jalike new again inside, an dey wen do da same ting fo you guys. Peopo like dem, show um respec
16.19: Da peopo dat come togedda fo church all ova Asia side, dey like tell you guys âAloha!â Aquila an Priscilla, an all da odda peopo dat come togedda inside dea house, dey really like tell you guys âAloha!â too, cuz dey stay tight wit da Boss too.
16.20: All da Christian bruddas an sistas ova hea like tell you guys âAloha!â An you guys, give each odda one hug an kiss cuz you da peopo dat stay spesho fo Go
16.21: Now dis me, Paul, an I writing dis part wit my own hand: Aloh
16.22: Anybody who no mo love an aloha fo da Boss, dey goin get punish fo shu
16.23: I like fo our Boss Jesus do plenny good tings fo you guys.
16.24: I get love an aloha fo all you guys, cuz we all stay tight wit da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, Jesu

1.1: Aloha! Dis letta from me, Paul. God wen send me all ova fo tell peopo da Good Stuff From God's Spesho Guy, Jesus. Brudda Timoty, he stay hea an he say same tin
1.2: I like God our Fadda an Jesus Christ our Boss do plenny good tings fo you guys an make everyting come okay fo you guy
1.3: We like everybody talk good bout God. He da God an Fadda fo our Boss Jesus Christ. He da Fadda dat pity us an give us plenny chance, an he da God dat everytime give us good kine words.
1.4: He give us good kine words weneva we get hard time, an cuz a dat, we can give good kine words to da odda peopo dat get any kine hard time. We give dem good kine words jalike God wen give us.
1.5: Christ, God's Spesho Guy, wen suffa plenny fo us guys. So, cuz Christ wen do dat, his Fadda give us choke good kine words wen we suffa.
1.6: Weneva me an Timoty get hard time, God give us good kine words. Same time, good you guys figga God goin give you good kine words too, an take you outa da bad kine stuff you stay in. Weneva you guys suffa jalike us, God give you guys good kine words too, so den you guys know you can handle da whole ting.
1.7: Az why we stay shua you guys goin come out okay. We know dat wen you guys suffa jalike us, God goin kokua you guys jalike he kokua u
1.8: Bruddas an sistas, we like you guys know da hard time we wen get ova hea Asia side. We had plenny presha, mo plenny den we can handle, dat we even wen give up an tink we goin mahke.
1.9: We wen bum out plenny, jalike one crook guy feeling wen da judge say he gotta mahke. But all dat wen happen so dat we can learn fo trus God an no trus ourself. God, he get power fo even make da peopo alive again dat wen mahke.
1.10: He wen take us outa da bad kine stuff, wen we almos wen mahke. An he goin take us outa da bad kine stuff nex time too. We still yet stay shua he goin take us outa da bad kine stuff ova an ova.
1.11: If you guys stay pray fo us too, den dat goin help us guys cuz God goin do plenny stuffs fo us. He goin do dat cuz plenny peopo wen pray. Den plenny peopo goin tell God âMahalo plennyâ wen dey tink bout us guy
1.12: Dis how come we talk big. We know inside us dat da way we do stuff in dis world, we do wat God like us fo do, an we no move from dat, so everybody can see dat we fo real. We no do um wit da kine smarts da peopo inside dis world get, but wit da kine smarts dat God give us cuz he get good heart fo us. Az how we wen do um even mo plenny, dat time we wen stay wit you guys.
1.13: Da ony stuff we write to you guys, you guys can read an can undastan um. Den da stuff you guys undastan litto bit awready, I stay shua dat bumbye you guys goin undastan um mo betta.
1.14: Right now, you guys ony undastan litto bit bout us guys. But wen our Boss Jesus come back, I stay shua you guys goin undastan plenny. Den you guys goin talk big bout us, jalike we goin talk big bout you guy
1.15: Cuz I wen know dat, da first ting I wen tink fo do was go back by you guys, so you guys can get someting good two times.
1.16: I wen tink I goin come see you guys wen I go Macedonia side, an one mo time wen I coming back, cuz I like you guys kokua me so I can go Judea side.
1.17: Wen I wen tink fo come by you guys, you guys tink I change mind everytime? Nah! Wen I tink fo do someting, you guys tink I like do um ony my way, jalike all da odda peopo inside da world? You guys tink I saying âOh yeahâ an âNo wayâ same tim
1.18: Jalike we can trus God fo do wat he say, wat I tell you guys everytime not âOh yeahâ an âNo wayâ same time.
1.19: Me an Silas an Timoty wen teach you guys bout Jesus Christ, God's Boy. Jesus, he not one âOh yeahâ an âNo wayâ same time kine guy. He everytime âYeah!â
1.20: Da stuff God wen promise fo do, you guys tink he can do um? Jesus say, âYeah!â An us guys can say, âDass right!â cuz we know wat Jesus Christ wen do. We say dat fo show how awesome God stay.
1.21: God, he da One dat make us guys an you guys all be Christ's peopo, an no mo notting goin change dat. God wen pick us fo be his guys.
1.22: God wen put his awesome Spirit in charge a us guys, fo show wat he goin do fo us bumbye. Dass jalike he wen put his mark on top us fo show he own u
1.23: Wen I say dis, I aks God fo back me up, cuz he know me inside. He know how come I no going Corint still yet. I no like make you guys shame, dass why I no going dea still yet.
1.24: We no ack like boss an try fo tell you guys who you gotta trus. We work wit you guys so you can stay good inside. Cuz you know you guys can be strong wen you trus Go

2.1: So I wen figga dis: I no goin go by you guys an make everybody sad again.
2.2: Cuz if I make you guys all sad, den who goin make me feel good inside? Ony get you guys, da ones I wen make feel sad.
2.3: Az why I wen write befo dat I not going yet, so dat you guys can make everyting right, an den wen I go ova dea, I no goin feel all sad cuz a you guys dat suppose to make me feel good inside. I know all you guys, so I know dat wen I stay good inside, den you guys goin stay good inside, jalike me.
2.4: Dat time I wen write you guys, my heart was all presha out an plenny sad. I was crying plenny, you know! But I neva write lidat jus fo make you guys feel sad -- was fo make you guys know how plenny love an aloha I get fo you guy
2.5: Get one guy ova dea dat wen make peopo feel all sad. Da guy wen make me feel lidat too, but den he make some a you guys feel mo sad still yet. I no like make um sound like he wen make all you guys sad.
2.6: Dass nuff awready, cuz mos a you guys wen tink same kine way an tell da guy he wen do wrong. Dat wen make um come sorry awready.
2.7: So now, let um go an no stay mad at um. Talk nice to him. No good da guy bum out an give up cuz he awready feel too sad from you guys.
2.8: Dass why I beg you guys, come togedda an all make shua da guy know how plenny love an aloha you guys get fo him.
2.9: Az why I wen write you guys befo fo see if you guys goin do da right ting, an do everyting I tell you.
2.10: If you guys no stay mad fo wat da guy wen do, an let um go, den I not mad, an I let um go too. Me, I no need stay mad at da guy. Dass why I let um go. I do dat in front Christ, an fo kokua you guys.
2.11: Cuz I no like da Devil trick us. We know he one sly bugg
2.12: Dat time, I wen go Troas, an da Boss Up Dea wen let me teach da Good Stuff From Christ dea.
2.13: But I wen get funny kine feeling bout someting, cuz I no can find my brudda Titus ova dea. So I wen tell da Troas peopo bye, an wen go Macedoni
2.14: I wen worry, but no matta wea I stay, I like tell God âMahalo plenny!â cuz Christ, he wen fight an win ova da bad kine stuff, an us guys stay tight wit him. Dass how come God everytime let peopo see dat we his guys. Az how, wen we tell da peopo bout Christ, dass jalike wen someting smell real good, an everybody can smell um.
2.15: An God like us guys, cuz we jalike one sweet smell dat make him tink bout Christ. Da peopo dat God goin take outa da bad kine stuff, an da peopo dat goin cut demself off from God, jalike dey can smell dat sweet smell too.
2.16: Wen da peopo dat goin cut demself off from God see us, dat make dem tink bout how dey goin be cut off from God bumbye. Wen da peopo dat goin get life to da max fo real kine see us, dat make dem tink bout how dey goin stay alive fo eva. Eh! Who stay big nuff fo handle all dat? No mo nobody, fo shua!
2.17: Us guys, we not like plenny odda peopo dat ony teach wat God say so dey can make money. No way! Wen us guys talk, everybody can see dat we fo real, an dat da stuff we say come from God, an dat we stay tight wit Chris

3.1: If you guys tink we starting fo talk big bout ourself some moa, we not! If you guys tink we need lettas to you guys o from you guys, fo tell dat we good guys, jalike da odda guys need, we no need um!
3.2: We get one letta awready, an dass you guys, you know. Da stuff we know bout you guys, stay inside our heart awready. Everybody know you guys, jalike dey reading one letta.
3.3: Stay clear dat you guys, you stay jalike one letta dat Christ wen write, an dat he wen give to us guys fo bring ova hea. Christ neva use ink fo write um, he wen use da Spesho Spirit from da God dat stay alive fo real kine. Christ neva write um on top one flat stone da way da Boss Up Dea wen do um fo Moses -- da ting Christ wen write on top, dass someting dass alive, I mean jalike he write um inside da peopo's hearts so dey know u
3.4: We know we can trus God dat all dis stuff stay true, cuz Christ wen show us.
3.5: Our own self, we no can say dat we get da power fo do anyting. Da ony power us guys get, come from God.
3.6: God da One wen make us da kine workas dat can tell peopo bout God's New Deal. Dat New Deal not bout sticking wit some rules, but sticking wit God's Spirit. If you ony stick wit da Rules, jalike you mahke inside, you no get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva. But if you stick wit God's Spirit, you live fo real kin
3.7: Da time God wen carve da Rules on top da flat stone, was awesome, you know. (But no matta you do wat dose Rules say, still yet you goin cut yoaself off from God.) Den, afta Moses wen get da Rules, his face wen shine so plenny, was so awesome, dat da Israel peopo no can stay look at um. But den da shine wen go way.
3.8: So den, wat God's Spirit do inside our hearts stay plenny mo awesome den dat!
3.9: You know, cuz a da Rules we mahke, but still yet da Rules stay awesome. God's Spirit help us get um right wit God, an dat even mo awesome.
3.10: Da Rules dat everybody wen tink stay awesome, jalike dey not awesome now, cuz get someting dat stay even mo awesome.
3.11: You know, da Rule kine stuff stay awesome. Dey awesome jalike Moses face an den da shine wen go way. Still yet, dey stay awesome. But dose tings dat stay foeva, dat kine stuff stay mo awesome still ye
3.12: All us guys know fo shua dat God's New Deal goin stay foeva, dass why we no mo shame fo talk strait out.
3.13: We no need ack jalike Moses. He wen cover up his face so da Israel peopo no can see da shine go way.
3.14: Da Israel peopo, God wen make um hard head so dey no can tink good. Even right now wen dey read inside da Bible bout da Deal from befo time dat God wen make, jalike dey get cover ova dea head, cuz dey no like lissen, an no can undastan. No mo nobody can make um lissen an undastan, ony Christ can.
3.15: Even now still yet, weneva da Jewish peopo read wat Moses wen write, dey lissen, but dey no undastan, cuz dey no lissen inside dea hearts, jalike dey get cover ova dea hearts.
3.16: But weneva somebody start fo trus da Boss, Christ help um undastan inside dea hearts. Jalike da Bible wen tell bout Moses, âHe take away da ting dat cover his face.â
3.17: Inside da Bible, wen Moses wen talk bout âDa Boss,â he mean God's Spirit, same ting. Wen we get da Spirit from da Boss Up Dea, we can talk to God any time we like.
3.18: Az how he change us fo come awesome jalike him, mo an moa. An our faces no stay cover up, an now we can stay tinking plenny bout how awesome da Boss stay. Da Spirit from da Boss Up Dea, dass how he help u

4.1: God wen give us guys chance, so he wen give us dis job fo tell peopo bout his New Deal. Dass why we no give up.
4.2: So dis wat we do: we tell everybody we no goin do da bad kine stuff some odda peopo do. Dey do um wen nobody can see, an dey no mo shame. We no try bulai nobody. We no try teach fake stuff bout wat God say, but we goin teach da true stuff strait out. Den everybody can go check us out demself, an dey can see wat kine guys us in front God.
4.3: If get peopo dat no undastan da Good Stuff From God dat we teach, dey da peopo dat goin wipe out.
4.4: Da Devil, he jalike da god fo da peopo nowdays. He wen make some peopo jalike dey blind inside dea heads. Az da peopo dat no trus da Boss who fo real. Dass jalike dey no can see da light. Dey no can undastan da Good Stuff bout how awesome Christ stay. Christ, he o same like God. He jalike one picha fo show how God stay.
4.5: Us guys no talk plenny bout ourself. We talk plenny bout Jesus Christ da Boss. We ony say dis bout ourself: us guys come fo kokua you guys, cuz we Jesus guys.
4.6: God wen say, âFrom da dark place, I like da light shine,â an he wen make his light shine inside our hearts. God like give us da light. Dat mean, wen we tink bout Christ, we know how awesome God sta
4.7: We get plenny rich kine stuff from God inside us, no matta we jus regula kine peopo. Dat show dat da big power come from God an not from us guys. Dass jalike wen somebody get rich kine stuff inside cheap clay bowls.
4.8: We get plenny presha from all ova, but we still can handle. We no can undastan everyting, but we no give up.
4.9: Get guys dat make us suffa plenny, but God no leave us by ourself. Dey bus us up, but dey no wipe us out.
4.10: Every place we go, da way us guys suffa an get bus up, show how plenny Jesus wen suffa wen he wen mahke. An cuz our body no mahke no matta we get bus up, dat show dat Jesus still stay alive now.
4.11: Every day, us guys dat stay alive, we almos mahke cuz we Jesus guys. An dis way everybody can see dat Jesus give us real kine life, no matta our bodies goin mahke bumbye.
4.12: So den, us guys no scared fo talk fo Christ, no matta we can mahke cuz a dat, so dat you guys can stay live fo real kin
4.13: Inside da Bible, get somebody dat tell, âCuz I wen trus God, dass why I wen talk.â Us guys tink togedda same ting: Cuz we trus God, dass why we talk.
4.14: We know dat da God dat wen make our Boss Jesus come back alive from mahke, he goin make us guys come back alive too, cuz we stick wit Jesus. God goin put us guys an you guys dea in front him, wea he stay.
4.15: God do all dis stuff fo help you guys. He goin do plenny good kine stuff fo mo an mo peopo, an dey goin tank him plenny, an tell how awesome he sta
4.16: Dass why us guys still can handle an no bum out. No matta our bodies stay coming junk outside, but inside God stay making us mo strong every day.
4.17: We get plenny big time trouble now, but you know wat? Wen we tink bout how we goin come awesome foeva, all dat trouble, ony manini kine stuff!
4.18: So we looking at an tinking bout da kine stuff you no can see, not da kine stuff you can see. Da stuff you can see, ony goin stay litto wile. But da kine stuff you no can see, dat kine goin stay foev

5.1: Eh, we know dat our body, da one we stay inside now on top da earth, jalike one tent dat ony goin stay up litto bit. No matta dat body goin come wipe out, we no need worry, cuz God get one good place fo us fo stay inside da sky. Peopo neva make dat place. God wen make um, an stay foeva.
5.2: So we tink plenny bout get our place da come from da sky.
5.3: Wen we get dea, dass jalike we no goin stay wit notting on, cuz den, we goin come new kine, jalike we goin put on new kine clotheses.
5.4: Now we stay ova hea inside dis world, an we bum out, cuz we get hard time. We like put on da new kine clotheses -- minas get rid a da old kine. Minas we goin mahke. Main ting, we goin come alive fo real kine!
5.5: God, he da One wen make us ready fo all dis. He wen give us his Spirit fo proof dat goin happe
5.6: An dat make us feel real good inside, an no mo worry, no matta we know dat all da time we stay alive inside dis body, we no stay wit da Boss in da sky.
5.7: Da way we live, we trus God everytime, no matta we no can see him.
5.8: We feel good inside bout dis. Dass why we figga, mo betta leave dis body hea, an go live up dea wit da Boss.
5.9: Dass why dis da mos importan ting fo us guys: fo do wat God like, no matta we stay ova hea, o we go up ova dea wit God.
5.10: You know, we all gotta go in front Christ da Judge, an no can hide notting. Dat time we goin get back wat we wen do wen we wen stay inside dis world, da good kine stuff o da no good kine stuf
5.11: We get choke respeck fo God. Dass why we try help da peopo get same kine respeck fo him. God know how we stay inside. I like you guys know inside yoa hearts how we stay inside too.
5.12: We not trying fo make ourself look good again in front you guys. But we tell you guys all dis so you can talk big bout us, an no mo shame. Den you guys goin know wat fo say to dem guys dat talk big bout wat dey can see, an not bout wat stay inside da heart.
5.13: Maybe you guys tink dat we talking lolo kine. Bodda you, o wat? We do um fo God, an God know we not lolo! An if we talking strait, we do um fo help you guys.
5.14: Christ wen get choke love an aloha fo us guys, dass why we like do wat we gotta do. We know fo shua dat one Guy wen mahke fo all da peopo, an dat mean, jalike everybody wen mahke.
5.15: Christ wen mahke fo everybody, so dat da peopo who stay alive no goin do stuffs ony fo demself no moa. Dey goin do everyting ony fo Christ, da Guy who wen mahke fo dem an wen come back aliv
5.16: So, from now on, we no tink bout nobody da same way odda peopo tink. No matta befo time we wen tink bout Christ da same way odda peopo tink. Now, we no tink bout Christ dat way no moa.
5.17: Dass why, whoeva stay tight wit Christ, dey one new guy. Da old tings no stay no moa! Look! Da new tings wen come.
5.18: All dat stuff come from God. He wen bring us back da same side wit him, cuz a wat Christ wen do. An he tell us fo work so da odda peopo can come back togedda wit him too.
5.19: Wen Christ wen stay inside dis world, God wen use him fo bring da peopo inside da world back da same side wit God. So, he no make dem take da blame fo da way dey wen mess up. An he wen tell us guys all dat, so we can kokua all da odda peopo fo come back togedda wit him.
5.20: We da talka guys fo Christ. We tell all da peopo dat God stay begging um fo come back. Cuz we Christ guys, we stay beg you guys, âEh, come back da same side wit God.â
5.21: Christ, he neva do notting bad, but God wen make him take da bad kine stuff us guys wen do. God wen do dat fo us guys, so dat we can come right, jalike God stay right, cuz a wat Christ wen d

6.1: Cuz us guys stay work togedda wit God, we like give you guys good words: No let all da good kine stuff God wen do fo you guys stay fo notting.
