4.21: Dis wat Christ wen tell us guys fo do: Whoeva get love an aloha fo God gotta get love an aloha fo dea brudda an sista to

5.1: Whoeva stay shua dat Jesus da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, dey God's kids. Everybody dat get love an aloha fo one fadda get love an aloha fo his kids too.
5.2: Dis how we know dat we get love an aloha fo God's kids, cuz we get love an aloha fo God an do wat he tell us fo do.
5.3: If we get love an aloha fo God, dat mean we do wat he tell us fo do. An da stuff he tell us fo do, not too hard.
5.4: Cuz all God's kids can stand up agains da bad kine stuff inside da world, an win. Dis how we can do dat: we trus God.
5.5: Da guy dat stay shua dat Jesus God's Boy, az da ony guy dat can stand up agains da bad kine stuff inside da world, an wi
5.6: Jesus, he da Guy dat wen come wit water, dat time John wen baptize him. He come wit blood, dat time dey wen kill him. He come, not wit water ony, but wit water an blood. God's Spirit tell us dat dis stay true, cuz his Spirit tell da trut.
5.7: So, get three tings dat tell da trut bout Jesus,
5.8: da Spirit, da water, an da blood. An dey all say da same ting.
5.9: We lissen wat da peopo tell us. But wat God say get mo power still yet, cuz come from God. An dass wat God awready tell bout his Boy.
5.10: Whoeva trus God's Boy get wat God say bout him inside his heart. But whoeva no trus God, jalike dey stay say, âGod, he one bulaia!â cuz dey no trus wat God wen say bout his Boy.
5.11: Dis wat God say: he wen give us da real kine life dat goin stay to da max foeva, an dat kine life come from his Boy.
5.12: Whoeva stick wit God's Boy get dat kine life inside him. Whoeva no stick wit God's Boy no mo dat kine life inside hi
5.13: I write dis to you guys dat stay trus God's Boy so you guys can know dat you guys get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva.
5.14: Everytime we aks God fo do da tings he like make happen, we know fo shua dat he hear us.
5.15: An if we know dat he stay lissen fo wateva we aks him, den we know dat we goin get da tings we wen aks him fo d
5.16: If you see yoa brudda doing bad kine stuff dat no make da brudda mahke, you gotta aks God fo help um, an God goin give da brudda life. I talking bout da bad kine tings dat peopo do, but dat no make um mahke. Get bad stuff dat make um mahke -- I no say dat you gotta pray bout dat kine.
5.17: Everyting dat stay wrong, dass bad kine stuff. An get bad kine stuff dat no make da guy mahke dat do u
5.18: We know dat everybody dat stay God's kid no stay doing bad kine stuff, cuz God's Boy take care him, an da Bad Guy, da Devil, no can hurt hi
5.19: Us guys know dat we come from God, but da Bad Guy stay in charge a all da odda peopo inside da whole worl
5.20: We know dat God's Boy wen come an help us fo undastan, so dat we can know da One dass God fo real kine. Us guys stay tight wit da One dass God fo real kine -- wit God's Boy Jesus, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. Dass da real God, an dass da real kine life dat stay to da max foev
5.21: Eh you guys! You jalike my own kids! So, stay away from da idol kine god

2.14: âBut eh! I get dis agains you guys: You guys get peopo ova dea dat make jalike da guy Balaam wen do long time ago. Dat guy wen teach King Balak how fo make da Israel peopo do bad kine stuff. He wen make um eat food da odda peopo awready wen give fo sacrifice to da idol kine gods, an go fool aroun wit peopo dey not married to.
2.15: Same ting wit you guys, yeah? You guys get peopo ova dea dat still yet do da bad kine stuff da Nicolaitan guys teach.
2.16: So den, you guys gotta come sorry, an no do all da bad kine tings you doing no moa. Cuz if you guys do dat, den I goin come by you guys pretty soon, an wat I say goin show dat dey stay wrong. Dass jalike I use one sword fo fight an win ova da guys dat stay agains m
2.17: âIf you guys can hear dis, you betta lissen, an go do wat God's Spirit stay telling da church peopo!â
2.18: Den da One I wen see tell me, âDa angel messenja guy I wen send fo help da peopo who come togedda fo church Tyatira side, write one letta to him, an say di
2.19: âEh, I know everyting wat you guys stay doing, dat you guys get love an aloha fo each odda an fo me. I know you guys trus me, work fo me, an stay by me. You guys stay doing mo fo help me den da first time wen you guys wen start fo tru
2.20: âBut eh! I get dis agains you guys. You guys take da Jezebel kine wahine. She say she talk fo God, but she bulai da peopo dat work fo me wit wat she teach. So dey go fool aroun da peopo dey not married to, an eat da food from da sacrifices dat odda guys wen give to da idol kine gods.
2.21: I wen give her plenny chance awready fo come sorry an no do da bad kine stuff she doing, but she no like.
2.22: So, I goin make her come real sick, an her an da guys dat wen fool aroun behind God's back wit her goin suffa plenny, if dey no come sorry an pau do da bad kine stuff dey doing.
2.23: Fo shua, I goin kill everybody dat make like her. Den all da church peopo goin know dat I da One dat look inside da heart an head an know wat everybody stay like, an wat dey tink, an I goin pay everybody fo wat dey wen do, good o ba
2.24: âNow, I like tell dis to all you odda peopo inside Tyatira, you guys dat no lissen to da Jezebel wahine an no like learn wat dey call âda deep secrets from da Devilâ: I no goin make tings mo hard fo you guys.
2.25: Jus hang in dea an trus God real good, till I come bac
2.26: âEverybody dat fight an win ova da bad kine stuff, an do wat I like um fo do till da end, I goin give um da right fo be in charge a da diffren peopos all ova da worl
2.27: âDa Bible say dis bout me, Jesu
2.28: âEverybody dat fight an win ova da bad kine stuff, dey goin be awesome, jalike da early morning sta
2.29: you can hear dis, you betta lissen an go do wat God's Spirit stay telling da church peopo!â-â

3.1: Den da One I wen see tell me, âDa angel messenja guy I wen send fo help da peopo who come togedda fo church Sardis side, write one letta to him, an say di
3.2: So, wake up an no go back sleep now! An make strong wat you guys get still yet, cuz litto mo goin mahke. I see dat you guys neva do stuff all da way, da way my God like.
3.3: So den, rememba how you guys wen take da stuff I wen teach you guys, an you guys wen go all out fo do um. So, stay doing lidat. Come sorry fo da bad kine stuff you guys stay doing now, an no do um no moa. If you guys no wake up, I goin come quick, jalike one steala guy, an you guys no goin know da time I goin show up.
3.4: But get some peopo ova dea by you guys Sardis side dat stay do wass right an not pilau. Dey da guys dat goin walk wit me an wear clean white kine clotheses, cuz dey get da right fo do da
3.6: âIf you guys can hear dis, you betta lissen an go do wat God's Spirit stay telling da church peopo.â-â
3.7: Den da One I wen see tell me, âDa angel messenja guy I wen send fo help da peopo who come togedda fo church Philadelphia side, write one letta to him, an say di
3.8: âI know everyting wat you guys doing. Look! Jalike I wen open one door in front you guys, an no mo nobody can close um. I wen do dat cuz you guys get ony litto bit power still yet, an you guys wen do wat I wen say, an you guys no tell dat you donno who me.
3.9: Get peopo dat come togedda inside one church, an say dey God's peopo. But dey da Devil's peopo fo real. Dey ony bulai. I goin make dem come an go down in front you guys feet. An dey goin find out dat I get love an aloha fo you guys.
3.10: You guys wen do wat I wen say, an wen hang in dea an no give up. Az why I goin take care you guys wen da big presha come, da kine presha dass goin come on top da whole world, fo check out everybody dat stay down hea.
3.11: Eh, I coming back pretty soon! Hang in dea, so dat nobody can take away wat you wen wi
3.13: âIf you guys can hear dis, you betta lissen an go do wat God's Spirit stay telling da church peopo.â-â
3.14: Den da One I wen see tell me, âDa angel messenja guy I wen send fo help da peopo who come togedda fo church Laodicea side, write one letta to him, an say di
3.15: âI know everyting wat you guys stay doing. You guys not agains God, but same time, you guys not all out fo God! I like mo betta if you guys was all out fo God, o agains him.
3.16: But you guys stay in da middle. You no care. So I goin bahf you guys outa my mout!
3.17: You guys tink, âMe, I stay rich. I get plenny, an no need notting!â Auwe! You guys donno still yet dat you all jam up! You guys no mo face, no mo money, no mo clotheses, an no can se
3.18: âNow I goin tell you guys wat I like you guys fo do. Fo come rich inside, come by me an get da stuff you guys need. Dass jalike you guys goin buy da bestes kine gold, da kine dat dey put inside da fire fo take out da junk kine stuff. An den you guys come by me an buy white clotheses fo put on, fo take away da shame, cuz jalike you guys no mo clotheses! An den you guys come by me an buy da kine medicine fo put on top yoa eyes so you guys can see fo real kine!
3.19: Everybody I get love an aloha fo, I tell um wen dey mess up, an I help um fo do da right ting. So, come on, go all out, come sorry, an no do da bad kine stuff no moa.
3.20: Lissen! I stay ova hea, standing outside da door an knocking. Anybody hear my voice, an open da door, I goin go inside his place, an eat wit him, an he goin eat wit m
3.22: âIf you can hear dis, you betta lissen an go do wat God's Spirit stay telling da church peopo fo do.â-â

4.1: An afta dat I wen look, an I wen see someting jalike one dream. An I wen see one open door inside da sky. An I hear da same voice I wen hear befo time, dat sound jalike one trumpet. He was talking to me, an he say, âEh, come up hea! I show you wass gotta happen bumbye.â
4.2: Right den an dea, God's Spirit wen take charge a me. In front me, up dea inside da sky, had one throne, an somebody was sitting on top da throne.
4.3: Da One dat sit dea get strong light dat come from him, jalike da light dat come from da jasper stone an da red carnelian stone! An aroun him had one rainbow dat look jalike da green emeral
4.4: Aroun da throne had twenty-four odda thrones, an twenty-four older leadas sitting on top dem. Dey had white clotheses on, an had da gold kine crown on top dea heads.
4.5: Outa da throne da lightning was flashing, an thunder making big noise. In front da throne had seven torches dat stay burn real bright, an dass da seven spirits dat come from God.
4.6: In front da throne wen look jalike one pond dat you can see thru, jalike da glass. In da middle, aroun da throne, had four tings dat stay alive, an dey get eyes all ova da front an bac
4.7: Da first one dat stay alive wen look jalike one lion, da nex one look jalike one boy kine cow, numba three get one face jalike us, an da last one look jalike one eagle dat stay flying.
4.8: Da four tings dat stay alive, dey all get six wings, an day get eyes all ova, even unda dea wings. Dey no stop singing all day an all nite. Dey sing like di
4.9: God da One dat sit on top da throne, an stay alive foeva an eva. Da four tings dat stay alive, dey show respeck fo him, an tell him âMahalo plenny!â an tell um how awesome he stay.
4.10: Everytime da twenty-four older leadas go down in front God dat sit on top da throne, an show love an respeck fo him. He da One dat stay alive foeva an eva. Dey put dea crowns down in front his throne, an sing lidi

5.1: Den, jalike one dream, I wen see da One dat stay sitting on top da throne, dass God. He get jalike one roll up paper in his right hand dat had writing on top two side, front side an back side. Befo time dey roll um up an close um wit seven wax kine seal on to
5.2: Den I see one angel messenja guy dat get plenny power. He tell wit one loud voice, âEh! Who get da right fo broke da wax kine seal an open da paper?â
5.3: But no mo nobody inside da sky, on top da earth, o unda da earth get da right fo open da paper an look inside u
5.4: So den, I stay cry real hard cuz dey neva find nobody dat get da right fo open da paper an look inside.
5.5: But one older leada guy wen tell me, âEh, brah! No need cry! Look! Christ, God's Spesho Guy! Jalike da Bible wen say, he jalike one Lion! He da King dat come from Judah ohana! He da Main One dat come from King David. He wen win ova da bad kine stuff, so he get da right fo broke da seven wax kine seal, an open da pape
5.6: Den, jalike one dream, I wen look, an had da Baby Sheep Guy. Look like dey wen kill him awready. He standing on top da throne, in da middle. All aroun him had da four tings dat stay alive, an da older leada guys. He get seven horn an seven eye. Da horns an da eyes, dass da seven spirits from God dat he send all ova da world.
5.7: Da Baby Sheep Guy wen come an take da paper from da right hand a da One dat stay sitting on top da thron
5.8: Afta he take um, da four tings dat stay alive, an da twenty-four older leadas, dey wen go down in front da Baby Sheep Guy. Dey all get someting jalike guitar an gold kine bowl wit incense inside. Da incense, dass jalike all da tings da peopo dat stay spesho fo God wen aks him fo do.
5.9: Den dey sing one new song, dat sa
5.11: Den jalike one dream, I wen look an I hear uku million angel guys singing. Dey wen come togedda in one circle aroun da throne, an aroun da tings dat stay alive, an da older leada guys.
5.12: Dey sing wit one loud voic
5.13: Den I wen hear everyting dat stay alive inside da sky, an on top da earth, an unda da earth, an inside da sea -- everyting inside da whole world, an dey was singing lidi
5.14: Den da four tings dat stay alive wen say, âDass right!â An da older leada guys wen go down an give God an da Baby Sheep Guy love an respec

6.1: Den, jalike one dream, I wen see da Baby Sheep Guy broke open da numba one seal from da seven seals on top da paper. Den I wen hear one a da four tings dat stay alive talk wit one loud voice dat sound jalike thunder. He tell, âStart now awready!â
6.2: Den, eh! I wen look an see one white horse. Had one guy on top um wit one bow fo shoot arrow. He wen get one crown. An he wen go out jalike one army guy fo fight an win agains da guys dat hate hi
6.3: Den da Baby Sheep Guy wen broke open da numba two seal. An I wen hear da numba two ting dat stay alive, he tell, âGo awready!â
6.4: Den one nodda horse wen come out. Dat horse was red jalike fire. Da guy dat sit on top um get da power fo make da peopo all ova da world no stay good wit each odda, so dey fight an kill each odda. He get one real big swor
6.5: Den da Baby Sheep Guy wen broke open da numba three seal. An I wen hear da numba three ting dat stay alive tell, âGo awready!â I wen look, an had one black horse, an da guy on top um get one scale fo weigh stuff inside his hand.
6.6: Den I wen hear someting dat sound jalike one voice dat stay come from da four tings dat stay alive. Da voice say, âNo goin get nuff food! Two pound wheat flour cost one day's pay, an six pound barley flour cost one day's pay. But no mess up da oil from da olive trees o da wine from da grape vines!â
6.7: Den da Baby Sheep Guy wen broke open da numba four seal. An I wen hear da numba four ting dat stay alive say, âGo awready!â
6.8: I wen look, an eh! Had one nodda horse. Look jalike ready fo mahke kine color! Da guy dat stay ride on top um name Mahke Die Dead, an da boss fo da Mahke Peopo's Place wen follow behind him. Dey get da power fo wipe out bout one quarta a da peopo inside da world cuz get war, cuz no mo food, cuz everybody sick, an cuz da wild animals kill u
6.9: Den da Baby Sheep Guy wen broke open da numba five seal. An by da altar place I wen see all da spirits, da one da bad guys wen kill cuz dey God's peopo, an dey wen tell wat God wen say, an dass was da trut.
6.10: Da spirits wen talk loud, an say, âEh Boss, you get all da power! You spesho, an you tell da trut! How long mo we gotta wait till you come fo judge all da peopo hea on top da earth an punish dem? Cuz dey wen kill all us guys!â
6.11: Den God wen give all da spirits white robe fo put on. An he wen tell um, âRest an wait litto bit moa. Cuz yoa bruddas, dey still stay working fo me jalike you guys was. Da bad guys goin kill dem too jalike dey wen kill you guys. Den da time goin come fo punish da bad guys.â
6.12: An jalike one dream, I wen watch wen da Baby Sheep Guy wen broke open da numba six seal on top da paper. Right den an dea da earth wen shake real hard all ova! Da sun wen come real dark, an da moon wen come red jalike blood.
6.13: An da stars wen fall down from da sky to da earth, jalike da fig kine fruit dat not ripe yet fall down from da tree wen da strong wind shake um real hard.
6.14: Da sky wen move away, jalike wen you roll up one paper! All da mountains an all da islands wen move to diffren place.
6.15: Den everybody all ova da world, da king guys, da odda leadas, da army bosses, da rich peopo, da guys dat get power, an all da slave guys, an da guys dat not slaves, dey all wen go hide inside da caves, an unda da rocks on top da mountains.
6.16: Dey wen yell to da mountain an da rock, âFall down on top us an hide us, so dat God who stay sit on top da throne, he no can see us! Hide us from da Baby Sheep Guy, cuz he no take da bad kine stuff we stay doing!
6.17: Cuz da time stay come awready wen dey goin punish us. Auwe! Fo shua, no mo nobody goin come out alive!â

7.1: Afta dat, jalike one dream, I wen see four angel guys standing by da four corners a da earth. Dey was holding back da four winds so dey no can blow on top da land o da sea o on any tree.
7.2: Den I wen see one nodda angel guy coming up from da east. He get one ting fo make one mark on top peopo, from da God dat stay alive. Wit one loud voice he call to da four angel guys dat get da power fo mess up da land an da sea.
7.3: He tell dem, âEh! No mess up da land o da sea o da trees! Wait till afta we put da mark from our God on top da forehead a da peopo dat work fo him dat stay alive!â
7.4: Den I wen hear how plenny peopo get God's mark on top dea forehead. Was 144,000 peopo from inside all da Israel ohan
7.9: Afta dat, jalike one dream, I wen look, an dea in front me had uku plenny peopo! Dey so plenny dat no can count um. Dey come from all da countries, all da ohanas, all da diffren peopos, an all da language all ova da world. Dey stay standing in front God's throne, an in front da Baby Sheep Guy. Dey was wearing white kine clotheses, an dey stay holding branches from da palm tree inside dea hand.
7.10: Wit one loud voice dey wen tel
7.11: All da angel guys stay standing aroun God's throne, an aroun da older leada guys, an aroun da four tings dat stay alive. Dey all go down wit dea face on top da groun in front God's throne, an dey give God love an respeck.
7.13: Den one a da older leadas wen aks me, âEh! Who da guys wit da white clotheses? An wea dey wen come from?â
7.14: I tell him, âMista, I donno. But you know!â

8.1: Wen da Baby Sheep Guy wen go open da numba seven seal, neva had no noise inside da sky fo bout half hour.
8.2: Den I wen see da seven angel guys dat stand in front God all da time, an he wen give um seven trumpe
8.3: Anodda angel guy wen go stand in front da altar place. He get one gold pan fo burn da incense. He wen get plenny incense fo put togedda wit all da prayers from da peopo dat stay spesho fo God. He put da incense on top da gold kine altar in front God's throne, fo give um to him.
8.4: Da smoke from da incense dat stay burning, wen go up to God from da pan dat da angel guy stay hold. An all da prayers from da peopo dat stay spesho fo God wen go up to God too, wit da smoke.
8.5: Den da angel guy wen take da incense pan, fill um up wit da red hot coals an da fire from da altar, an throw um all down on top da groun. Den had thunder an big noise, da lightning wen flash, an da earth wen shak
8.6: Den da seven angel guys dat get seven trumpet wen get ready fo blow u
8.7: Da first angel guy wen blow his trumpet. An had ice jalike da rain, an fire dat stay mix wit blood, come down real hard on top da earth. An thirty percent da earth, da trees, an all da grass wen burn u
8.8: Da numba two angel guy wen blow his trumpet. Den someting dat wen look jalike one big mountain dat stay burning wen fall down inside da sea. An thirty percent da sea wen come blood.
8.9: Thirty percent da tings dat stay alive inside da sea, dey wen all mahke. An thirty percent all kine boats wen all broke u
8.10: Den da numba three angel guy wen blow his trumpet. An one big star dat stay burning jalike one torch, wen fall down from da sky on top thirty percent da rivers an da pukas fo water.
8.11: Da star, dey call um âBitta Taste.â Thirty percent all da water wen come bitta, an plenny peopo wen drink um an mahke, cuz da water wen come bitt
8.12: Da numba four angel guy wen blow his trumpet, an someting wen hit thirty percent da sun, thirty percent da moon, an thirty percent da stars, an dey wen come dark. Da day time, thirty percent mo dark, an da nite time, thirty percent mo dar
8.13: Den, jalike one dream, I wen look an hear one eagle dat stay flying high in da sky. An wit one loud voice he say, âAuwe! Auwe! Auwe! Goin be real bad fo everybody dat stay alive on top da earth wen da odda three angel guys goin blow dea trumpet!â

9.1: Den, jalike one dream, I wen hear da numba five angel guy blow his trumpet, an I wen see one star fall down from da sky to da earth. Den somebody wen give da star one key fo open da Deep Dark Hole.
9.2: Da star wen open da Deep Dark Hole wit da key, an da smoke wen come outa da hole, jalike da kine smoke from one real big imu. Da smoke from da hole wen make da sun an da sky come dark.
9.3: Den outa da smoke, plenny grasshoppas wen come down on top da earth. God wen give um da kine power jalike da scorpions get.
9.4: God wen tell da grasshoppas, âNo mess up da grass, o plants, o trees on top da earth, but ony da peopo dat no mo God's mark on top dea forehead!â
9.5: Da grasshoppas no mo da power fo kill dem, but ony fo make um suffa five months. Da kine suffa was jalike da kine suffa da scorpions give wen dey sting one guy.
9.6: Dat time da peopo goin like mahke, cuz hurt plenny. Dey goin beg plenny fo mahke, but dey no ca
9.7: Da kine grasshoppas, dey look jalike horses, all ready fo fight one war. On top dea head dey get someting jalike one gold crown. Dea face look jalike peopo face.
9.8: Da grasshoppa hair, jalike wahine kine hair. Dea teet, jalike lion kine teet.
9.9: Dey get metal plate on top dea chest. Dea wing sound real loud, jalike plenny horses an wagons fo war going real fast fo fight one war.
9.10: Dey get da tail an da sting jalike da scorpion. Dea tail get power fo make plenny peopo suffa fo five months.
9.11: Dey get one king fo lead dem. He da bad angel messenja guy from da Deep Dark Hole. Da messenja get da name âAbaddonâ in da local language, an âApollyonâ in da Greek language. Dat mean, âDa Guy dat Wipe Out Everyting.â
9.12: Dis da first time God goin make da peopo suffa plenny. Bumbye goin get two mo times dey goin suff
9.13: Den, jalike one dream, I wen hear da numba six angel guy blow his trumpet. An I hear one voice come from in front God, from da four horns dat stick up on da corners a da gold altar place.
9.14: Da voice tell da numba six angel guy dat get da trumpet, âLet um go, da four angel messenja guys dat stay all tie up by da big Eufrates River!â
9.15: Dose angel messenja guys, dey stay ready fo dat year, an month, an day, an hour. So da numba six angel guy wen let um go fo go kill one guy from every three peopo on top da earth.
9.16: Somebody wen tell me had two hundred million guys riding hors
9.17: All da horses an da guys on top um wen look jalike dis inside my dream: da plate on top dea chest was red jalike fire, dark blue, an yellow jalike sulfur. Da horse head wen look jalike da lion head. An fire, smoke, an sulfur wen come outa dea mout.
9.18: Da fire, da smoke, an da sulfur dat wen come outa dea mout, dat was three big trouble dat wen kill one guy from every three peopo dat stay on top da earth.
9.19: Da mout an da tail, dass wea da horses wen get dea power. Dea tail jalike da snakes wit head an mout fo bite da peopo, an make um suff
9.20: Da odda peopo dat neva mahke from da big trouble, dey still yet no come sorry an pau do da bad kine stuff dey do. Dey still yet no pau go down in front da bad kine spirits, an da idol kine gods. No matta dey make da idols wit da gold, da silva, da bronze, da stone, an da wood. An no matta da idol kine gods no can see, o hear, o walk, notting!
9.21: Da peopo still yet no come sorry o pau kill peopo, o make kahuna, o fool aroun, o steal stuff

10.1: Den, jalike one dream, I wen see anodda angel guy dat get plenny power, coming down from da sky. He get one cloud fo his clotheses, an one rainbow aroun his head. His face jalike da sun, an his legs jalike fire.
10.2: Da angel guy stay hold one small paper in his hand dat stay open. He put his right feet on top da sea, an his left feet on top da land.
10.3: He make big noise, jalike da lion. Afta dat, da thunder make big noise seven times.
10.4: Afta da thunder make noise, I wen start fo write. But I wen hear one voice from da sky dat say, âNo write down wat da thunder wen tell. Dass one secret.â
10.5: Den da angel guy dat I wen see, da one dat stay standing on top da sea an da land, he wen raise his right hand to da sky.
10.6: Da angel guy wen make one strong promise fo God, who stay live foeva an eva, who wen make da sky an da world, an da sea, an everyting dat stay inside um. Da angel guy wen promise, âDis stay true: God no goin wait no moa! Time awready!â
10.7: Wen da numba seven angel guy stay ready fo blow his trumpet, den God goin do da secret ting jalike he wen plan, jalike da Good Stuff From Him say, dat he wen tell da guys dat wen work fo him an talk fo him befo tim
10.8: Den da same voice dat I wen hear befo from da sky, dat voice tell me, âGo, take da paper dat stay open inside da angel guy hand, da one dat stay standing on top da sea an da land.â
10.9: I wen go by da angel guy an aks him fo give me da small paper. He tell me, âTake um an eat um. Goin come sour inside yoa stomach, no matta inside yoa mout taste sweet, jalike da honey!â
10.10: I wen take da small paper from da angel guy's hand, an I wen eat um. Wen taste sweet jalike da honey inside my mout, but wen I wen swallow, wen come sour inside my stomach.
10.11: Den da angel guy tell me, âEh, you gotta tell wat God wen say again bout plenny countries, peopos, language, an kings.â

11.1: Den, jalike one dream, somebody wen give me one bamboo, jalike one stick fo measure. An dey tell me, âGo. Measure God's temple an da altar, an count how plenny peopo get dea dat show God love an respeck.
11.2: But no go measure da yard outside da temple, cuz God wen let da peopo dat not his peopo take um ova. Dey goin walk all ova Jerusalem, da town dat stay spesho fo God, fo three an a half year. (Dass 42 months, o 1,260 days, you know
11.3: Goin get two guys. I goin give dem da power fo talk fo me fo all dat time. Dey goin put on burm bag kine clotheses fo show dat dey stay crying inside.â
11.4: Dese two guys, dey da two olive trees an da two stands fo lamp dat Zekariah wen tell bout inside da Bible. Dese guys, dey stay standing in front God, da Boss fo da earth.
11.5: If somebody like hurt dem, fire come outa da guys mout an burn dem up. Dass how da guys goin wipe out anybody dat go agains de
11.6: Dose guys get da power fo shut up da sky, so da rain no stay come, wen dey stay telling wat God wen say. An dey get da power fo make da water change fo come blood. An dey get da power fo make all kine trouble come on top da peopo all ova da world too, wen eva dey lik
11.7: Den, wen dey pau tell wat God say, da Wild Animal dat come up outa da Deep Dark Hole, he goin fight agains dose two guys. An da Wild Animal goin win, an kill um.
11.8: An dea bodies goin stay on top da street inside da Big Town, da one you can say stay jalike Sodom town o jalike Egypt. Dat Big Town, dass wea dey wen put da Boss Jesus on top da cross fo mahke.
11.9: Fo three an a half days goin get peopo from all da countries, ohanas, language, an diffren kine peopos from all ova da world ova dea. Dey goin look at da guys bodies, an dey no goin let nobody bury um.

13.1: Den, jalike one dream, I wen see one Wild Animal coming outa da water. He get ten horn an seven head, wit ten crown on top da horns. On top da heads, each one get one name dat tell any kine stink stuff bout God.
13.2: Da Wild Animal I wen see look like one leopard, but he get feet jalike da bear, an da mout jalike da lion. Da Dragon wen give da Wild Animal his power, an his throne, an da right fo take charge a da peopo wit hi
13.3: One head a da Wild Animal wen look like was bus up real bad an he litto mo mahke, but den he wen stay alive. All da peopo all ova da world wen blow dea minds, an dey wen stick wit da Wild Animal.

13.11: Den I wen see one nodda Wild Animal coming outa da earth. He get two horn jalike one baby sheep, but he talk jalike one dragon.
13.12: Dis Wild Animal, he da numba one guy fo da first Wild Animal, an he stay use all da power dat da odda Wild Animal get fo take charge a da peopo.
